nyams so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bka' smod cing gdeng ma zin pas dngos grub yal bas nyams so// gsang sngags spyod pa mi gzob par spyad na yang nyams so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phya sla ba dang 'chal rgad du gyur pas nyams so// gsang sngags gsang sgo med par spyad na de bas kyang nyams te/ ya ga dang sgro skur dang/ mtshang tshig tu gyur pas nyams so// sngags shes rab brtul zhing ma shes pas spyad na nyams so// de ci'i phyir na don ma khrol bar the tshom dang rtog pa skye ba'i rgyur gyur pas nyams so// gsang sngags rgyu le lo dang sgyu snyoms can gyis spyad na yang nyams te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ las su ma rungs pas sgro skur 'debs shing rdzun par spyod pas nyams so// de bas na sman pa mkhas pa 'dra ba'i/ sa ra sa dang tra dang/ pradz+nyA dang sa ma ya dang/ dz+nyA na dang/ g+huh+ya dang sin du ma dang/ d+harma ta la dang ldan pa rnams kyis spyod pa gsungs so// de yang 'di skad do// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ yang gsang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// nyan cing blta la mi dbang ba'i// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i sems can la// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi'i dam chu 'dis// lus sems rgyud la phog pas kyang// thal ba rdul bzhin brlag 'gyur zhing// blta ba'i rdo rje dug chen po// gzhan yang mi bzad pa yi dug/ dug kyang dug ste sman kyang sman// rtogs pa rnams la sman yin kyang// ma rtogs pa la dug tu 'gyur/ khu ba khrag tu dmigs nas kyang// rang sems dbang du btsugs nas kyang// tha tshig gnyen po srog bsrung phyir// gzhan gyi drin la mi gnas par// 'khor lo rdo rje gtor ba'o// oM badzra ya tha sarba hUM ta tha b+h+ri thaM kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ zhes sman gyi sgo nas mtshams bcad do// de nas rnal 'byor chen po phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas/ rnal 'byor tshogs la longs spyod cing/ mchod pa dag par 'dul ba yang kun gyi thun mong ma yin te/ gnas yid du 'ong bar tshogs 'dus pa'i gnas rung bar/ slob dpon dgos ched kyi thabs lnga dang ldan pas/ mched lcam dran pa'i snod drug yod pa dang/ gzungs ma pha rol du phyin pa'i thabs rgyud dang ldan pa dang/ rgyal tshab kar ma phyi nang la brda mjal ba dang/ yon bdag bsam pa dag pa'i stobs gsum dang ldan pa dang/

mchod pa bshams sbyar gtsang sbra'i tshul shis pas/ gang yang ma spangs pa'i longs spyod chen pos rgyal ba mchod pas skang skong dgyes dgyes shing dgongs pa 'phel dngos grub thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur/ gzhung 'di yang gar song song bab col du ma yin te/ rdo rje slob dpon rim gyis snang ba'i dbang ma nos pa/ chags shing 'jungs pas dad pa chung bas/ nga rgyal dang khengs pas dam la mi gnas pa/ shes rgya dang thos pa chung bas gtan tshigs nyung zhing don ma khrol ba/ ci la yang yid ma ches pas/ ras chod dang smyon thabs byed pa/ sems klung du ma phebs pas phyogs ris dang rtog pa can ma yin pa dang/ gzungs ma thob pas g.yem zhing ngo tsha dang bral bas/ gsang med cing dpral ba 'thug pa'i 'phyar sham ltar song ba/ rgyal theb dang kar mas byed pa'i brda la shed ma bye ba dang 'dra ba dang/ mched la mkhon brnyas dang/ lkog 'phyas dang dad pa chung zhing brtse gdung med pa dang/ mchod pa'i rgyu ma tshogs par phud nyams grangs nyung zhing char shor ba dang/ mchod pa byin gyis ma rlobs shing chad dbang dang gnyid dbang du gtang ba dang/ gnas grong dbus dang 'du 'dzi can du mchod cing bsgrubs kyang bsod nams dang grub pa thob par mi 'gyur te/ slar bar chad dang lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib par 'gyur bas/ tshe srog la gnod pa 'di skad do// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang bshags bya// thang lhod med pas brtson 'grus 'byin// rnal 'byor mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// nga ni rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu dbang bdag/ nga yi bka' las 'da' byed pa// de ma thag tu brlag par 'gyur// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung// gnod par byed pa gang yin pa// rdul phran bzhin du brlags nas kyang// theg chen la yang dgod par bya'o// oM badzra ban+d+ha tra tha tsam pa hUM phaT/ zhes pas/ tshogs kyi bar chad rdul cha tsam yang med par gyur to// de nas yang gsung gi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ gsang ba'i theg pa mtha' ma rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshams bcad mtshams 'tshal lam mi 'tshal zhes gsol pa dang/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos bka' stsal pa/ gang la yang mi rtog ma chags pa ni/ ci la yang mtshams bcad du med na/ de na gnas pa ni nyung gis/ de lta bu dang ma mi ldan pa sha stag mang bar gnas te/ rtogs pa chung zhing shes rab zhan pas ci spyod cing brtsam yang/ dang por mtshams bcad pa dang/ bar bar rdzogs rdzogs kyi skabs su/ smon lam gyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtsal bgos te/ gdod ci bya ba la nyes pa med cing mthar phyin par gyur te/ de ni dper na bshan thog dang/ sku 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ cis kyang mi 'jigs shing bag tsha

ba med la/ de dang mi ldan pa'i rgyal po ni/ sku la bsngo bas dus thams cad du bag tsha ba bzhin du/ khro bo 'di dag ni rnal 'byor dang/ sems can gang phong ba'i skyabs dang dpung mdzad pas/ ji ltar bcol ba'i don mdzad de/ rnal 'byor pa gzhung dang mthun zhing klong du gyur pa rnams ni/ 'di ltar bskul kyang mi g.yel lam bskul kyang de nyid la 'dris pas bag tsha ba med la/ phal cher dang du ma blangs na bar chad du 'gyur bas nan tan du bya ba'i phyir ro// de bas na 'di skad do// bgegs zhes bya ba gzhan na med// bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung// rnam rtog ma yin mtshan ma ni// rgyal bas bltas kyang mi gzigs so// dngos grub bar chod gang yin pa// nor bas gnyis su bzung bas te// don gyis sun ni ma phyin pas// bsod nams phral bar byed pa yin// de bas 'di rnams sun dbyung zhing// rang byung dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir// lhas kyang lha yi gshang gci za// mis kyang ma rig dri ma sbyangs// rnam rtog med pa'i ye shes kyis// dug ni bdud rtsir 'gyur bar bshad// phal pas spyod pa'i rdzas min pas// gsang bas spyad la sba bar bya// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bsang chen bsgrub pa'i rdzas yin pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// lha la gtor bas thugs dam bskang// bgegs la phogs pas thal bar rlom// mi la babs pas dngos grub 'bebs// ya mtshan rmad du byung ba yi// rdzas 'dis bar chad brlag par 'gyur// oM badzra a mr-i ta sa ma ya hUM phaT/ zhes dngos grub bsgrub la bar du gcod pa'i mtshams bcad do// ngag gi dbang po/ mkhas par ma sbyangs pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// slob dpon gyi bsgo ba ma nyan pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// zol zog gis dngos grub mi 'thob bo// gsang 'chol bas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// dbang ma thob pas dngos grub mi 'thob bo// tshe thung bar 'gyur ro// de dag kyang ci phyir zhe na/ snod dri ma can gyi rdzas dang 'dra ste/ cir yang spyad du mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro// ngag gi dbang po/ dus nam zhig gi tshe gsang ba 'di dag gsang mtshams med par blta ste/ dar bar byed pa'i dus byung ba'i tshe/ gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas gsang ba'i don bzhin ma spyad pas gsang ba'i bsgrub rtags kyi 'bras bu ma thob tsa na/ de la rgyud lung nas sngags 'di dag tshig gcig tsam du ston pa las/ de bzhin du ma grub pas brdzun to zhes skur pa btab nas/ rgyu'i chos la 'jug cing/ sngags kyi mtshang 'bru zhing smod par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir yang gsang zhing mtshams bcad pa'i rgyud 'di rab tu zungs su bzung ngo// ngag gi dbang po/ dus nam zhig tsa na/ sngags brdal ba chen por byung bas/ ta na la

sogs pa'i spyod pa dang/ phrin las thams cad ma gsang bar skye bo mi nag kun la cha yod par byas pas/ sman chus mna' dgag pa brdung zhing gtag pa dang/ bsgral zhing dmod byad la sogs pa brtsams/ mi nag la sogs pa rnams kyang 'di ltar spyod pa dang gnod pa dang nges pa 'di spyod pas/ 'di dag gi srog la ma phab na/ mtha' phung bar 'gyur zhes sems nas/ rnal 'byor pa srog dang phral nas/ rnal 'byor pa'i sku dgra 'byung bas/ de'i bar chad gdul zhing bsgral ba'o// de'i don du yang khro bo bcu+u po 'di med du mi rung bas/ 'di'i don la rab tu brtson par bzung ngo// ngag gi dbang po/ dus gzhan zhig gi tshe na/ rnal 'byor gyi chos dbang ma thob par la las bshad/ la las bstan/ la las bstabs/ bsgrub pa'i mthu rtsal dang bral te/ 'khor gyi dbang phyug thams cad bros byer du ma brdzabs pas/ mu stegs dang log pa'i phyogs mtha' dag gis bstan pa la dgra dar bar byed de/ rgyu 'bras kyi theg pa la sogs pa ma rungs par byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i tshe/ khro bo bcu po 'dis 'dul zhing/ thugs rje dang thugs dam du ldan pas thabs mkhas pa'i dbang phyug yin pas khyad par gyi dam tshig tu yang dka' 'di gzung ngo// ngag gi dbang po dus yan 'ga'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bka' la dam mi srung ba dang/ lus dang srog dang tshe dang/ nor dang longs spyod la brku zhing rlom pa mang ba'i phyir/ rnal 'byor thabs med cing mi mkhas pas/ mu stegs log chos la sogs pa spyad de/ sha za gshin rje dang/ ma mo dang/ bdud dang/ byad stems dang/ klu mi bsrun pa la sogs pa dang/ yi dwags 'byung po la sogs pa'i dam rdzas dang/ bskul ba dang/ rbod gtong gi las byas pas/ lo nyes dang/ sad dang/ ser ba dang/ btsa' dang/ mu ge dang/ mdze dang/ 'brum bu dang/ nad ngan pa dang/ rims sna tshogs dang/ smyo 'bogs la sogs pa 'phel bas/ bgegs dang ra tri dang/ dgra mi tri dar bas sdug dus ngan pa la bab pa'i tshe thugs rje can gyi lha khro bo bcu las gzhan med pas/ log par blta ba 'dul ba dang/ sems can gyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi phyir khro bo 'di bcu yi dam du bcang zhing mchod do// ngag gi dbang po/ dus dang phal pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa yang dag pa'i don mi 'tshol bas/ ras chod dang gzu lum dang/ tho co dang smyo thabs kyi las byas te/ shes mi shes med par slob dpon ni kun byed/ mkhas mi mkhas med par ris ris su bzung nas kun 'chang pas dbang dang dam tshig dang/ phrin las dang/ gtan tshigs ni slob dpon la yang med/ nga rgyal che ba dang/ khe dang dregs pa ni 'khor yan chad 'dzin pas/ man

ngag can gyi mkhas pa rnams kyang thugs ma mnyes pas/ thugs kyi man ngag bka'i thigs pa gsang ba nges pa'i don zab mo sbas te/ dmod pa btsugs so// rnal 'byor pa phal cher ras chod can mgo rmongs par bya ba'i phyir/ dkrugs 'chol pas/ gsang ba'i don dag bon smrang ngam gtsug lag bzhin du brjod pas/ bka' las ma byung ba'i chos yin par rgyas btab pa'i las rtsing ngo// srog gcod pa la sogs pa mu stegs rgyang 'phen bzhinadu spyad pas/ 'phral gyi sgo yon dang/ gang zag gi bkur sti tsam la chags pas/ bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka'i 'bras bu chus khyer te/ 'bras bu ngan song gsum du skye nges pa'o// gang zag gdon gyis bslus pa dang 'dra ba la yang/ gong du bstan pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gis/ skyabs dang dpung mgon khro bo bcu yin nges pas/ gnyen du blangs te/ rgyud 'di ltar shes par bya zhing yid la gzung ngo// ngag gi dbang po/ rnal 'byor pas chos zab mo'i snod dang mi ldan pa'i tshe/ yin rung min rung bka' la 'dogs so// de'i tshe snod dang ldan pa rnams ni nyung ste/ bka' btsan par sems nas don gsang zhing gsangs nas bsgrubs pas/ grub pa thob sa srid pa tsam gnas so// snod mi ldan par phal cher gyis spyad pas/ don gyi bden pa ma rig par gsang sngags la brten nas/ 'bras bu bde ba 'tshol zhes pa las gol te/ snying rje phar mi gtang bar zhe sdang phar gtang/ byams sems phar la mi bsgom par bkur sti tshur 'dod/ mkhas pa rang gis ma sbyangs par dpon por phar 'chol/ sbyin pa rang gis mi gtang bar bza' zhing spyad pa phar dga' bas bden pa'i chos lugs ni shor/ mi bden pa'i nga rgyal ni che/ gnyen pa'i dam tshig ni med/ mi gnyan pa'i rang mthong ni che/ don gyi man ngag ni nub/ mi dgos pa'i rtsing chos ma spangs pas/ ston pa'i bka' ni nub/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig ni gting nas nyams te 'phags pa'i zhabs 'dren/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' ni bslus par 'gyur tsa na/ nyes pa ci byas na brjod mi rung ba'i sdug bsngal myong bas/ sgro skur rang gi chos la btab/ dpe ngan byed la rung ba yod par smos/ spyi don las med kyi zer te ngan par brtag cing byas sngon nas sdod/ rtag tu re ba rlung gi 'khor los ded tsa na/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra me ma mur gyi 'obs steng na/ khras nyen pa'i bye'u mang po 'phur ba la/ thog dang glog gi rgyas bskor nas/ khro chu khol ma'i chu phab ste/ sdug bsngal log pa'i 'bras bu dus gcig tu smin tsa na yang/ bskyab par bya ba'i thabs dang rgyab rten dang dpung gnyen du smon lam du btab pa'i khro bo bcu las/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang skabs dbye mi nus pas/ rgyud 'di dam tshig

nyams pa skong bar gsungs pa'o// ngag gi dbang po/ dus lnga brgya pa'i tshe rnal 'byor pa thos pa chung zhing/ dad pa med pas sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i nad kyi dbyings rgya mtsho tsam gnas pa la/ de 'dul ba'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho gsungs pa bzhin du/ chos nyung bar dgos pas/ phyi nang gi bka' 'di dag gang zag gi snod kyi rim pa dang sbyar nas/ 'drer mi gnang ba ni brda sbyor tshad mang du bya byed kyi spre'u zhugs pa bzhin du bsres bcos/ gong 'og gi phrin las thams cad phyis mi shes pa'i khrab sdebs pa bzhin du las kyi gong 'og thams cad zhal lce ba gshag bya ba bzhin rings par 'debs/ mi shes pa'i ltor bcug/ su la yang mi ster ba yin no// gsang ba yin no// gsang ngo zhes bris nas kun la ster/ nang na 'di gces zhes mnyam nyid kyi chos la khyad 'dor/ gang zag gi sgrin tshig dang grub pa ma thob pa'i rang shes dang mngon shes med pa'i bcos mang pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la thug thub spyad pa'i sgrib pa chen pos bka' chad kyi gnas su gyur nas/ 'chi 'pho ba dang ltung nge ba byed po'i lce dang kha tshig la sdug bsngal myong ba yang/ bshags pa dang sbyong ba dang sgrol ba'i smon lam gyis/ khro bo bcu las thugs rje che ba med pas pha ma ltar rgyud 'di gzung ngo// ngag gi dbang po/ rnal 'byor pa chos la mos shing rjes su 'breng ba/ bka' bzhin du bgyid cing lus dang srog la yang mi blta bar rdo rje theg pa la mos/ mchod sgrub bsrung ba las/ shes rab kyi rgyud med pas gang ma 'byong ste/ long ba grogs shor ba dang 'dra ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi khro bo 'di rnams ma bsgoms/ spyan ma drangs mchod pa ma byas kyang byon gshegs byin gyis rlobs dbang bskur dngos grub gsol bar mdzad pas/ mig gi 'bras bu dang 'dra bar khro bo bcu gzung bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ngag gi dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dag pa shin tu thabs mkhas la thugs rje che ba'i rgyud 'di/ ston pa byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje dang de dang mi gnyis pa'i sras zhing khams thams cad 'dul ba'i gtso bo lag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa 'di/ ma rig pa'i sems can rnams la nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi dang ldan pa rnal 'byor pa mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams cad la/ bu gcig pa la ma byams pa ltar mdzad pa ji ltar re ba ltar yid bzhin du skong ba thugs byang chub sems dpa'i cha byad du ldan pa/ nam 'khor ba ma stongs kyi bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas/ sku khro bo'i cha lugs su bzhugs pas/ nga rgyal dregs pa can dang/ gti mug rang

shes can dang/ gol zhing chos spyod pa la rgol zhing gnod pa rnams tshar gcod par mdzad pa'o// gzi ldan 'bar ba smon lam gyi rgyud 'di rnal 'byor pa dang sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sangs rgyas zhing kun spyod par gyur cig par smon lam btab bo// 'khor rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rnams kyang dga' nas dong ngo/ khro bo bcu'i smon lam gzi ldan 'bar ba'i mtshams kyi rgyud rdzogs so//// ! ja ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ dad brtson dang ldan pa'i skyes bus rgyud 'chang ba'i thabs dang/ rgyud kyi che ba bstan pa bzhugs// ca/ chat+yath+ya na mo gu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni hUM/ dad pa dam tshig la gnas shing/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la mos pa lam du byed pa'i rnal 'byor pho mo gang dag gis/ rgyud 'chang bar 'dod pas/ dus khyad par can nya stong brgyad gsum dang tshes bcu la sogs pa dang/ gza' skar bzang po la babs pa'i tshe/ bkra shis la byin chags shing yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs shing sku rten bkram/ phyi nang gi mchod pa dang/ sman rag gtor gsum la sogs pa mchod pa'i yo byad bshams shing/ bsgrub mchod ci 'grub la 'bad/ de nas rang nyid bris mkhan lus ngag yid gsum rgyud dag cing sems bskyed dang ldan pa'i ngang nas/ rtsa ba'i spyi rgyud pad sdong brtsegs pa rin chen sna tshogs pa'am/ ma grub na tshon rtsi sna lngas bri/ sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo dngul lam dung btul ba'i khu bas bri/ gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra zangs dang mtshal btul ba'i khu bas bri/ thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs baiDUr+Ya dang mthing btul ba'i khu bas bri/ yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing gser sbyangs pa'i khu bas bri/ phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod skyes dar ma grir shi ba'i khrag dang dug dang rgya snag gi khu bas bri/ bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod/ yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram dang/ mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig gsum/ bdud rtsi a mr-i ta dang/ byang sems dkar dmar/ sin d+hu ra/ tsan+dan/ ga pur/ gur gum/ gi waM/ li shi/ ru rta/ dzA ti rnams sbyar zhing/ gzhan yang byin rlabs kyi rdzas rnams mtshal dang bsres shing bri/ yi ge dbu can lhag chad med par bris te/ thams cad rang gi sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas te glegs bam mgo zhabs ma dkrugs par phyogs gcig pa can du bris te/ so sor rigs mthun gyi dar kha dog can gyis gril ba la mchod pa'i rdzas rin po che sna tshogs/ 'bru sna tshogs/ sman sna tshogs/ dar sna tshogs dang bcas pa rin po che'i za ma tog gam ga 'ur bcol nas/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su khri'u'i khar bzhugs su

gsol/ de nas rang nyid dri bzang po'i chus kha lag gdong gsum dag par bkru/ gos gsar pa dri ma med pa gon cing/ bde ba'i stan la gnas pas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i chos spyod bya/ yul phyogs kyi gzhi bdag dang/ 'byung po'i tshogs la gtor ma byin la bden pa'i stobs brjod/ de nas bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sa ma ti dang ldan pas/ glegs bam gu gul gyi dud pas bdug cing/ swab+hA was stong par sbyangs pa'i ngang las/ glegs bam gyi bris gzhi gzhal yas khang rnam par dag cing bkod pa du ma dang ldan par gsal ba'i nang du/ yig 'bru'i ngo bo thams cad phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnam par gsal zhing/ de dag thams cad kyang/ rang rang gi rgyan cha lugs rnam 'gyur dang bcas pas/ rgyud dgu po'i tshig 'bru saM skr-i ta'i skad du ti ri ri bklag par bsam pa la yang/ chos gsung yig 'bru'i char sgra chi li li babs pas glegs bam la thim/ gzhan yang bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'phags pa'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa byon nas glegs bam du bsams pa'i sku la thim par dmigs te/ gzhan du las kyi po ti bris pa'i rgyud tshig dgu po rab brgya rtsa brgyad/ 'bring lnga bcu rtsa bzhi/ tha ma nyer bdun bklag pa'i dus/ dang po la rang nyid ston pa snang ba mtha' yas su bskyed de/ pad+ma'i ljags kyis bklag/ des 'gre bar/ gnyis pa la bdag nyid rnam snang/ ljags 'khor lo/ gsum pa la bdag nyid 'od dpag med/ ljags pad+ma/ bzhi pa la bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'/ ljags rdo rje/ lnga pa la bdag nyid rin chen 'byung ldan/ ljags rin po che 'bar ba/ drug pa la bdag nyid don yod grub pa/ ljags sna tshogs rdo rje/ bdun pa la bdag nyid mtsho skyes rdo rje/ ljags gser gyi rdo rje/ brgyad pa la bdag nyid rta mgrin dbang chen/ ljags dngul gyi gri gug dgu pa la bdag nyid yum rdo rje phag mo/ ljags gnam lcags kyi ral grir bsams la bklag/ de tsam spros pa la mi dga' na/ bdag nyid ston pa snang ba mtha' yas/ ljags pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma can du bsams la/ ha cang thal ba'i rnam pa can gang yang ma yin par bklag/ bar gyi thun mtshams rnams su gtor mchod dang tshogs kyi yo byad la sogs pa 'bul/ rnal 'byor pa'i lus ngag yid gsum dkyil 'khor gsum gyi sa ma ti dang ma bral zhing/ skabs su dam tshig dang ldan pa'i grogs su yod pas rtsa ba gsum gyi bsnyen 'dzab brjod/ de ltar 'bad pas 'ja' dang 'od dang/ zer dang/ dri bzang gi ngad pa dang/ chos kyi sgra (6)

dbyangs la sogs pa'i sgra dang/ glegs bam la 'od 'bar ba la sogs pa'i ltas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas mched dang lcam dral la sogs pa 'dus pa rgya mtsho la zab mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang yon 'bul ci 'grub byas shing/ dus bzang po'i tshe snga dro dang por glegs bam rang gi spyi bor blangs pa tsam gyis phyogs dus kyi bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'/ yi dam zhi khro rab 'byams/ dpa' bo mkha' 'gro la sogs pa thams cad rang gi spyi bor spung gis byon nas byin gyis brlab/ dbang bskur mdzad de thams cad rang gi snying gar sib kyis thim par bsams la/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngang la mnyam par bzhag/ glegs bam nam du yang zhal ma phye bar rang gi mchan khung g.yon du drod dang skad cig kyang ma bral bar 'chang zhing dus dang rnam pa thams cad du dad pa mos gus kyi shugs bskyed la ci ltar 'dod pa'i don 'bras la gsol ba gdab/ de nas bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro la gtang rag gi mchod pa rgya chen po 'bul/ gzhan yang rjes kyi bya ba spyod pa thams cad spyi dang mthun la gzhan dad ldan gyi skyes bu gang dang gang la gdogs par 'dod pas kyang/ tshul de dag la rdo rje slob dpon gyis gang gis 'chang ba de la glegs bam gyis dbang bskur nas gdags par bya'o// de ltar khyad par rmad du byung ba'i rgyud 'di dag tshar gcig tsam bzhengs pa'i bsod nams kyis phung po dpag tu med de/ bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung rab mtha' dag bris pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam pa'o// rgyud kyi glegs bam gang gis mthong ba dang reg pa dang/ de'i tshig 'bru thos pa thams cad ni bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa zad nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro// 'chang zhing kun chub par byed pas ni/ de gnas skabs tshe 'dir lha dang mi dang lha min thams cad kyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur te/ bkur sti phu dud dpag tu med pa byed/ mi dang mi ma yin gyi gnod pa gang dang gang gis kyang mi tshugs shing lha 'dre thams cad kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang gi bar chad nyer 'tshe thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro// ci ltar 'dod pa'i thun mong gi dngos grub thams cad char bzhin 'bab par 'gyur ro// bdud dang bdud kyi rigs kyis cho 'phrul gnod par byed pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro// 'du ba rnam bzhi'i nad kyis mi gnod par 'gyur ro// bgegs dang ma rungs pa thams cad nyer ma nus shing dbye bar 'gyur ro// dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro dam can chos skyong srung ma thams cad kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro// mi mthun pa'i phyogs ngan pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur

ba la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ro// nam 'chi ba'i tshe yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing/ mnar gcod kyi sdug bsngal med par dga' bde spro ba'i 'dun pa dang bcas te 'chi zhing bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i sun ma sprin gyi phung po gtibs pa ltar gtibs nas spos kyi dri/ rol mo'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs dang bcas pas bsus te/ bde ba can la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rnam par dag pa rnams su skyes nas mngon par byang chub par 'gyur ro// rab dbugs chad pa'i dus der sgra dang 'od dang zer dang/ 'ja' tshon dang me tog gi char la sogs pa'i ltas khyad par can dpag tu med pa 'byung zhing phung po la yang sku gdung ring bsrel la sogs pa 'byung ste/ de dag gang gis mthong ba'i 'gro ba thams cad kyang las kyi sgrib pa zad nas rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po brnyes par 'gyur ro// gang gi lus la rgyud kyi glegs bam bzhugs pa'i gang zag des/ 'gro ba gang gi lus la reg pa'i 'gro ba de dag kyang/ lus kyi sgrib pa byang zhing/ ngan song gi skye sgo chod nas thar pa'i sa bon thebs pa yin no// de ltar rgyud 'di dag mthong thos dran pa la sogs 'di dang gang 'brel bar gyur pa'i 'gro ba rnams ja med byang chub kyi lam sna zin pa'o// gzhan yang che ba'i yon tan rdo rje'i ljags kyi dbang pos kyang brjod pas mi langs pa'o// de lta bu'i yon tan gyi che ba du+u ma dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ltar brtson par bya'o// tha na rgyud de dag rnams tshar re bris te rang bzhin kyis bcangs pas kyang/ yul ris rgyal khams thams cad bkra shis bde legs kyis khyab nas dpal phun sum tshogs pa la spyod par 'gyur ro// d+ha thim/ rgyud kyi bcangs thabs dang che ba'i yon tan brjod pa/ da lta mnga' bdag yab sras dang/ ma 'ongs rjes 'jug rnams kyi don du/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bkod pa'o// skal ldan las can gsung gi sras dang phrad par shog/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ gter rgya/ a+thi+-i/ guh+ya/ d+ha thim// !// zha tha gwas bya gla nA/ u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/

rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba tsit+ta a mr-i tau g+ha tan+t+ra rA dza pad+ma ku Ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rang byung gi lha bde ba chen po gzi brjid mtha' yas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na/ dkar ser dmar ljang rab 'khrugs shing// le brgan zla gam 'bar ba'i dbus// sna tshogs 'od kyi tshong khang du// dus gsum sa ler mthong nas ni// skye rga na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrugs// mi bzod g.yo bas rab bskul zhing// thugs rje spro bsdu 'gyed pa'i tshe// ye thog dang por lhun gyis grub// sna tshogs las la dbang bsgyur byed// rdzu 'phrul drwa ba phyogs bcur 'gyed// gsum snang dbyer med gcig mang pos// kun la khyab pa'i byang chub sems// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// yul bcas rgyan dang cha lugs ldan// rdo rdo pad+ma'i 'khor tshogs la/ srid dang sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// lnga 'joms drug rdzogs gsum dang ldan// gnyis bsdus don 'byung gnyis las grol// bzhi rdzogs gtan la dbab par bya// rdo rje chos la sogs pa yi// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad zhus// kye kye ston pa 'od mi 'gyur// gar bsgrub gnas kyi mtshan nyid dang// gnas der gang zag ji lta bus// nyams su med pa'i chos ni gang// chos de bla ma gang la zhu/ sgrub rdzas ji lta bu la brten// bsgrub pa'i grogs gang dus tshes nam// dkyil 'khor lha sngags rtags tshad dang// phrin las kha bsgyur ji lta bu// smin byed dbang dang dam tshig dang// grol byed gdams pa ngo sprod bcas// de yi lta bsgom spyod 'bras bu// chags lam gsang ba'i gdams pa stsogs// de ltar bskyed rdzogs thams cad kyi// mthar thug 'bras bu grub mtha' dang// sa lam chod tshul ji lta bu// ldan 'bras dus skabs bka' stsol cig/ de skad 'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshe// bcom ldan dpag med mtha' yas kyis// rang shar sprul pa'i 'khor rnams la// sna tshogs cho 'phrul 'di gsungs so// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// a+thi+-i/ !// gang zhol chu bo chen po'i 'gram// bran khol lha srin jag rkun dben// bag dro byin chags DAk+ki rgyu// 'dod yon longs spyod gang dgos tshang// gnam sa dkar zlum zhi ba la// gru bzhi ser po rgyas pa nyid// dmar po zla gam dbang la ste// ngam nag gru gsum drag po'i gnas// gang la gang 'os yid dang mthun// so so'i rten 'brel rgyu rkyen 'dzom// gtser ba 'tsher ba kun dang bral// gzhan dbang ma song dben pa

mchog/ g.yer zhing mtho la nam mkha' yangs// khod snyoms dbyibs 'jam grong rgyang ring// 'jigs shing skyi g.ya' lha 'dre 'du// 'gol zhing gtsang sar rdzogs rim bsten// spyi dang bye brag gang la yang// gnas dang yul dang nye ba'i gnas// rgyal bas zhabs bcag bkra shis pa// yid dang mthun pa mchog tu gces// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi bsgrub pa dang nyams len gyi gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'di nyid nyams su len pa'i bu// dad dang brtson 'grus gtong phod che// blo yangs gsang thub rab tu brtan// dam gtsang gzhung bzang snying rus che// lus srog thed bor chags zhen med// tshe 'di mi gnyer gcig pur gnas// bla ma la gus grogs la brtse// chos phyir srog 'dor 'chi chos byed// shes rab che zhing rig pa myur// lhod chags zhi dul smra sgo nyung// chad btsan mdo che gzhan phan bsgrub// rdzun dang g.yo sgyu phra ma chung// 'dod yon sred bral rtog pa med// snying rje che zhing sems bskyed ldan// gzhan dbang ma song rang dbang thob// 'byor ldan rigs rgyud bzang ba'am// yang na skyid sdug sna tshogs myangs// tshe 'dis bya ba gang la yang// re ltos bral zhing kho thag chod// 'di min gzhan ltos bral bas bsgrub// thugs bcud 'dus pa rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ gang gis bsgrub pa'i gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dang du mi len spangs pa'i chos// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog la sogs kyis// dbang gyur rigs drug ngal ba'i rgyu// sgrub bya nyams len gcig dril chos// dang po nyan rang byang chub sems// stegs byas sa lam rim gyis bgrod// tha ma'i 'jug pa dang po nyid// kri u yo ga lha dang sngags// bskyed rim rtags rdzogs rang dbang thob// gzhan don phrin las rtsol bar ldan// 'bring pos brtan pa thob par bya// rdzogs dang rdzogs chen de sems pa// gnyis med rang grol 'ub chub don// bcings grol las 'das phyogs lhung bral// gsum ldan yang rab don spyod gcig/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis ldan bla med don// gzhan med dbang po dgu yi chos// 'di ni rang byung lhun rdzogs nyid// thams cad 'dus pa'i ngo bor grub/ thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ spang bya'i chos dang nyams su blang bya bskyed rdzogs kyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yid ches khungs btsun brgyud par ldan// rig pa'i gnas la ma rmongs shing// yid bzhin nor 'dra dgos 'dod ster// lam log 'khrul dang 'jigs las skyob// spro bskyed blo

gzhol chos la bskul// der khrid de phyir bri klog slob// rkyen byed lung ston 'dren pa yis// slob dpon phyi yi bla ma nyid// bde gshegs bka' lung lag len slobs// bka' babs sgrub rgyud rig pa 'dzin// slob dpon rgyud gtad de rjes bsnyegs// brgyud pa'i bla ma nang gi'o// mkhan slob sdaum stsol sems bskyed phog/ smin byed dbang bskur chos sgo 'byed// grol lam khrid gdab rgyud bshad pa// gsang ba rtsa ba'i bla ma'o// tshe rabs las smon bla ma ni// mthong thos dran pas rab gdung zhing// des bstan gdams pa rgyud la phan// dgongs shing 'bral med 'grogs sems 'byung// lta bsgom spyod bral gdeng dang ldan// snying rje byang sems gzhan don 'grub// phyi nang chos la lag len mkhas// gzhan rgyud shes dang der khrid brtson// bskyed rdzogs brtan thob lung bstan ldan// 'byung la sbrul bsgyur bsad gso nus// gang la gang 'dul bye brag shes// gar 'dug btsal la spyi bos blang// de lta bu yi bla ma rnams// lus ngag yid gus bka' bzhin bsgrub// log sems spang zhing mnyes par bya// de 'bras rang bzhin yid smon 'grub// de las log pa bla ma'i gzugs// bdud kyi byin brlabs sprul bsgyur ston// rnam thar shis shis 'dra na yang// mkhas pas legs brtags mi bsten 'dor// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ spang blang gi bla ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang dag don gnyer 'dod pa gang// snang srid rten 'brel rgyu rkyen las// 'byung phyir phyi nang gsang ba dang// gnas skabs la sogs rten 'brel rdzas// sku 'bag rdo rje dril bu dang// phyag rgya'i phu dung bum pa bzang// sna tshogs dar gyi pho long sogs// sku yi rten du gang dgos bcang// rkang gling thod lnga cang te'u// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// gang bsgrub las kyi phreng ba ni// dkar ser dmar nag la sogs gsung/ kha T+wAMb+han por shel me long// rat+na'i za ma tog la sogs// gang 'thad thugs rten rdzas rnams kyang// lus dang grib ltar mi 'bral 'grogs// zhi ba til dang sman sna tshogs// rin chen dar sogs rgyas pa la// mtshal dang sin+d+hu le brgan dbang/ khrag mtshon dug phur drag po la'o// gsang ba byang sems dkar dmar dang// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// dbang po sman rag gtor mar bcas// yid 'ong mtshan ldan mchog tu'o// gnas skabs rgyu rkyen rten 'brel rdzas// gang la gang dgos thams cad kyang// mngon zhen 'dzin chags med tshul gyis// don gnyis bsgrub phyir mkhas pas bcangs// dkyil 'khor lha dang mched lcam sogs// dgyes bskang phyi nang gsang

mchod rdzas// dgra bzlog go mtshon nad bzlog sman// de dag rnams kyang sta gon bya// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ sgrub rten gyi rdzas bsten pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// thabs grogs blo brtan snying rus che// gzhung bzang khrel che gsang tshig thub// dad brtson shes rab snying rje che// dam gtsang shes mthun ci smra nyan// g.yo sgyu ser sna mngon zhen chung// gsang sngags la mos skrag sems med/ khog yangs nyon mongs shas chung ba'i// grogs dang ldan zhing bsgrub par bya// sgrub rten shes rab grogs mchog ni// yid 'ong bzhin mdzes sngags la dad// ngag nyung gsang thub rnal 'byor gus// lus mnyen 'khril ldem dri bzang bro// lus thub dbyangs snyan bka' mi gcog/ g.yo sgyu ser sna rtog pa chud// rtsa bzang gsang rub nu ma mkhregs// blo yang tshig brtan gtong phod che// de las log pa'i bran khol rigs// nad gcong can dang gzhan dbang song// rigs ngan yun ring duHkhas mnar// gegs byed dngos grub mi 'byung spang// 'on kyang dngos grub stsol nus dang// mthong ba tsam gyis bde ba bskyed// rnal 'byor yid dang mthun gyur na// sgrub pa'i grogs gyur gang yang shis// spang 'os mi bsten 'os pa ni// thabs dang rten 'brel gang 'thad kyis// dang du blangs shing rgyud smin bya// tshags tshud bde ba'i grogs su bsten// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ bsgrub pa'i grogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// ra ba bzhi yi yar ngo dag/ bkra shis bde legs 'byung bar byed// nya dang gnam stong tshes brgyad nyid// ltas bzang bcas te bsgrub pa 'phel// rgyu skar rgyal sogs yid smon 'grub// gza' dang zla ba yar gyi ngo// gzhan phan brtson sogs dge ba rnams// cho ga yis ni bya ba brtsam// smin byed zla ba'i cha nyid de// grol bar byed pa nyi ma'i cha// gnyis ka'ang dus sbyor bzang po dang// shis pa'i gza' dang skar ma la'o// gzhan yang phrin las so so rnams// gcig nas stong gi bar dag tu// bsregs sogs kha bsgyur bya ba ni/ khyod kyi 'dod pa gang dgos brtson// bdud nyi dbul dang phung nyi nag/ de bzhin drag po'i gza' skar la// bstan pa bsrung dang rU tra btul// mnan bsregs 'phang dang gzir sogs shis// de bzhin bzang dang ngan pa dang// zhi rgyas dbang drag bya ba ni// so sor gang dang gang dag rnams// gza' skar tshes grangs dus kyang de// mdor na dang por legs brtags shing// dbang po'i bya ba shis pa ste// yang na rtog med gdeng ldan pas// bya ba gang yin nam yang rung// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal

po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ bsgrub pa dang las sbyor sogs kyi dus tshes bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// phyi nang gsang ba gnas skabs kyi// dkyil 'khor bya ba gang yin la// phyi snod sgyu lus dag bya'i phyir// byang chub bsgrub don gnyer bas 'bad// pho brang gling dgu 'dab brgyad mdzes// sgo khang rta babs khyud mor bcas// 'ja' gur dur khrod 'byung ba 'khrugs// mdzes bab lhun ldan brjid par dgod// 'byor tshogs rab 'bring tha ma yis// rin chen 'bru tshon gang 'byor dang// gzhal yas dar ldi tsa ka li// ras bris stegs bu rdul tshon gri// sgyu ma lus kyi grong khyer dang// rtsa rlung khams kyi dkyil 'khor dang// sa chu me rlung las grub rgyu// dngos sogs rab 'bring tha ma la'o// ma bcos lhun grub dkyil 'khor dang// lnga grol 'od lnga'i dkyil 'khor nyid// lug rgyud spro bsdu'i dkyil 'khor bcas// rab 'bring tha mar shes par bya// rgyas bsdus bsdus dang de nyid bsdus// sa brtag sa 'dul sa chogs sogs// chag chag thig tshon byin rlabs rnams// rab tu shis pa'i bya ba ste// mkhas pas lha yi nga rgyal gyis// skad cig gcig rdzogs babs lugs sogs// gang byung gang dgos gnas nyid du/ gdeng ldan dkyil 'khor bya ba bsgrub// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bla med bsgrub don gnyer 'dod gang// byin rlabs dngos grub phrin las kyi// lha yi rnal 'byor 'di dag la// nang bcud dag phyir gsal bar blta// rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i blos// ma bcos spros bral de nyid lha// rang byung gsal 'tsher lhun sdug lha// thugs rje zhal phyag gzugs snang lha// yab yum thabs shes zhi dang khro// dkar ser dmar ljang smug dang nag/ de bzhin kha dog sna tshogs pa// cha lugs phyag mtshan ma nges gsal// 'od dang 'od zer sna tshogs brgyan// sras dang sprul pa yang sprul tshogs// mi zad gsal bar sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las phyir snang lha// gang zag blo yi khyad par gyi// so sos ji ltar 'dod pa'i lha// phrin las kha bsgyur sna tshogs kyang// ye shes lha gcig nges 'grub na// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// lha tshogs gang dang gang dag la// ci 'dod dngos grub zhu ba 'am// bskul sogs las rnams nges par 'grub// des na gcig dang du ma'ang rung// gsal stong 'dzin med ngang nyid las// sku mdog phyag mtshan rgyan cha lugs// mkhas pas chags bral ldan par blta// de nyid ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// dur khrod 'dre ngan bsgrub gyur kyang// mchog dang thun mong 'bras bu gang// ci 'dod rang byung lhun grub

'byung// de nyid ma rtogs a 'thas blos// ye shes sems dpa' bsgrub gyur kyang// gnas skabs ldan 'bras phra'u las// yang dag 'bras bu srid mtha' tsam// yang na gzhan don blo nges dang// dad pa dam tshig ldan pa pos// mngon zhen bral bar bsgrub gyur kyang// ci 'dod 'byung bar rten 'brel lo// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ lha bskyed cing bsgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// lha bsgrub sngags kyi rnam grangs las// smra brjod las 'das de nyid sngags// gsang ba skye med rdo rje'i bzlas// lhun grub 'byung sgra nang gi'o// phyi ltar rtsol bcas tshig 'bru'i sngags// dril dang gtso 'khor kha bsgyur sogs// bye brag so sor smra ba yang// gsal dag sgra zur ma nyams gces// oM AHhUM hrIH badzra gu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi d+he wa DAk+ki ni/ bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma hA su kha/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ shAn+ti ka/ hrIHma ha ri ni sa/ ra tsa hrIHya/ sarba sid+d+hi/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ dz+nyA na satwa/ a mi de wa/ ma ma tsit+ta saM b+ha wa a d+hiSh+Tha naM/ ma ma A yur+dz+wA na/ sid+d+hi pha la hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM gu ru shrI/ pad+ma badzra hrIH/ d+hu ma g+ha ye DAk+ki ni na maHswA hA/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ bud+d+ha thod phreng rtsal/ bai ro tsa na oM/ sarba bud+d+ha DAk+ki ni hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ a k+Sho b+h+yo/ badzra su kha d+ha ri hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ pad+me b+ha sha ha/ DAk+ki ni ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ A tsar+ya ma hA badzra shAn ti pad+ma g+ha ru ti b+h+yoHDAk+ki ni hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha a rtsig ne rtsig/ mA ma ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ bud+d+hA ka pA li dpa' bo hUM/ bud+d+hi praDAk+ki ni mA ma ru lu hUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ badzra ma hA kro ta h+ya gr-i wa/ ma ma e ka tsa ti hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ badzra pA Ni ma hA kro d+ha/ ma ma sid+d+hi hUM/ oM AHhUM/ gu ru shrI/ yak+Sha sa ma ya/ hrIHma ha ri ni sa/ ra tsa hrIHya/ ma ma yo gi ni/ sarba duSh+tan hUM phaT/ shIMn+ta ku ru swA hA/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA hA/ wa shaM ku ru swA hA/ sha truM mA ra ya phaT/ oM AHhUM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHTha/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA rak+ta/ mU la rak+ta/ dz+wa la maN+Dal hUM hrIHTha/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA ba liM ta/ te dz+wa ba liM ta/ b+ha la b+ha te/ gu h+ya ma hA shrI/ sa ma ya swA hA/ oM badzra ar+g+haM a/ puSh+pe pu/ d+hU pe d+hu/ A lo ke hrIH g+han d+he g+han/ nai wi d+ya a/ shap+ta hUM/ a b+hi Shany+tsa maM/ b+h+ruM rak+Sha hUM/ de la sogs te sngags kyi rigs/ bsgyur dang bsgyur kha'i rnam grangs rnams// rgyas bsdus rnam pa ma nges par// gang byed so so'i sham bu gdags/ 'bru 'bum grangs kyi bsnyen pa ste// dus kyi tshad ni lo gsum la// tshad ni rtags rdzogs bar du bzlas// de la nges med shes par bya// rgyal po'i pho nya lta bu dang// zla ba skar phreng mgal me'i tshul// bung ba tshang grol lta bu ste// 'dzab dgongs bzhi dang ldan par shes// phyi

nang che chung go rim dang// ring thung mgyogs bul drag dad zhan// skyon drug dor zhing tshul shes par// don 'bras ma smin bar du 'bad// spyir ni rnam grangs go rim dang// tshul can tshul min spang blang sogs// sngags kyi byed las gang yin rnams// so sor brtags te bya bar shes// ting 'dzin sngags dang bzlas brjod gsum// gcig mdangs gcig gis bskyed pa'i phyir// gsal dag brjod pa gtsang ba gces// de 'bras yid 'dod dngos grub 'byung// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ sngags kyi rnam grangs bgrang tshul dang bcas pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// drod tshad rtags dang mtshan ma gnyis// mi rtog ting 'dzin de nyid thob// mngon zhen kun rdzob rdzun khung rdib// gding rnyed snang srid cir mi sems// dngos nyams rmi lam rab rib la// 'ja' 'od shel dang bum gter rnyed// dri bzang rol mo nyi zla shar// me tog khrus rgyan gos bzang gon// rdzing 'dor gzhan bkur ri mthon 'dzegs// sna tshogs 'bul skyel 'bru ljon dang// bla khams 'byung dar stobs rgyas ltas// zhal ston chos smra sngags nyams sad/ khyad par thun mong de sogs te// de las log pa ngan pa'i rigs// zhib brtag bye brag shes bya zhing// bzang ngan btang snyoms ngang la bzhag/ mdor na lus ngag yid bde zhing// khams rgyas rtogs 'bar 'dod pa'i don// chos 'grub gnas skabs mthar thug gi/ byed 'bras 'byung ba mtshan ma'o// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// lha dang bla ma grub nas ni// ci 'dod phrin las kha bsgyur brtson// byin rlabs 'dod pas bla mas ni// dad cing gdung bas las la sbyang// dngos grub 'dod pas yi dam lha// pho mo zhi drag gzhan phan blos// dril dang bye brag so so sogs// yid gnyis med par las la sbyar// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod sogs// bar chod sel dang bstan pa bsrung// ma mo DAk+ki chos skyong gi/ las sbyor dam tshig ldan pas 'bad// gzhan yang gnas skabs mthar thug gi/ phrin las kha bsgyur las phran rnams// dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig ldan// yid gnyis bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kyi// lha dang bla ma la sogs dang// 'khor dang sprul pa yang sprul gyi// bsgrub pa grub nas brtsam par bya// de grub mnyes par ma byas shing// 'dod pas las sbyor gang brtsams kyang// 'grub par mi 'gyur bar chad ni// mi rung ltas dang bcas te 'byung// de phyir lha dang bla ma nyid// grub na mnyes par bya ba dang// ma mo DAk+ki bran khol

bcas// thugs dam bskangs nas las la sbyar// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ phrin las kha bsgyur dang las sbyor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// lha dang sngags kyi de nyid don// ma rmongs bstan pa thob bya ste// mtshan nyid kun ldan bla ma yis// rang smin las ni gzhan smin brtson// dam tshig kun ldan dad pa'i gzhi// kun bslang skyes bu dam pa yis// lus dang longs spyod la sogs rdzas// dngos 'byor sprul cing maN+Dal dbul// dag byed nyid ni thog ma la// rig pa lnga yis lnga nyid bshig/ gsang ba shes rab tshig don bskur// yan lag mtha' rjes yongs su rdzogs// b+hUM bi shwa bi shud+d+he kA ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa mAM// oM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa trAM/ oM pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa hrIH/ oM karmA a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ oM AHhUM gu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba karmA a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA gu h+ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ oM DAk+ki ni pradz+nyA su kha dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA tsa tur a b+hi Shiny+tsa hraMH// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// lus la rdzas sbyin phyi rol pa// tshig sngags nang dbang ting 'dzin gsang// brda don sprad pa de kho na// bskur thob ma bskur thob pa nyid// bskur nas ma thob la sogs pa// dpon slob gnyis kyi spang blang rnams// dbang gi bye brag shes par bya// gsang sngags rtsa ba dbang nyid de// de nyid rtsa ba dam tshig las// 'da' bar mi bya bsrung mtshams rnams// gnyis kas shes phyir dngos grub 'byung// shugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ dbang bskur bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// a+thi+-i// gsang dang sngags kyi de nyid don// bla na med pa kho na ste// de yi bla na med pa ni// dam tshig la gnas mchog tu bsngags// phrin las yon tan thugs gsung sku// bye brag gnas skabs mthar thug gi/ yan lag rtsa ba'i dam tshig dag/ nyi shu lnga dang lnga nyid gces// skyon yon spang blang gzhig byas la// ma nyams bsrungs na don 'bras 'grub// nyams na yun ring duHkha myang// de phyir de don legs shes bya// rdo rje theg par gyur to cog/ spyi dang bye brag gang la yang// bstan pa'i rtsa ba dam tshig ni// rnam pa mang po de bzhin no// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las// dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// grol lam yang dag gcig nyid la// bden pa gnyis phyir bskyed dang rdzogs// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can gyis// gnyis med rdzogs dang bskyed pa'o// 'khor 'das spyi gzhi yang dag don// ma bsgribs rjen pa bskyed pa la// ngo bo stong pa rdzogs pa ste// sna tshogs 'phro 'du gnyis su med// gzhi rdzogs

lam snang 'bras bu mthong// sgo yul yul can gsum 'dzom na// mngon sum 'phel zhing tshad la pheb// zad nas gnyis 'bras de nyid thob// nyag thag gcig chod yan lag skam// klong 'phyo sgrogs grol brtan pa tshugs// rtsal rdzogs mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis spras// 'od zer 'phro 'du las kun byed// rtsad chod nga yang su 'dod khyer// seng+ge ri rbab glang po skyong// kun pal btang snyoms cir mi blta// nam mkha' ri bo rgya mtsho che// ma nor gcig chog blo bde ba'i// cod pan phog pa de nyid sogs// bsnyen cing mchod de bzlas pa 'bad// sta gon dang po'i bya ba'o// gnyis par dal dang rdzas bkod de// dmigs pa gsal zhing bsgrub la brtson// phyi nang gsang rtags rdzogs pa dang// rten 'chang rtag tu ma yengs blta// de nas gsum par las la sbyar// gang 'dod phrin las kha bsgyur gdags// 'dod don 'bras bu yid la bya// don grub gal ma mchis la bzhag/ bskyed rdzogs gnyis med dbang rab la// rdzogs rim gsum pa 'bring po nyid// tha mas bskyed rim bzlas pa 'bad// mthar thug bskyed rdzogs yang rtse yin// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ grol lam bskyed rdzogs kyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// chags chen lam du zhugs pa yi// bla med bcud kyi mthar thug 'di// sa lam myur bgrod skad cig gis// smin grol gnad kyi yang zhun 'di// dang po smin byed dal du gzhug/ gnyis par chags lam gsang khrid bsgom// gsum par nyams len gcig thog gzir// ngo sprod snang srid bde bar rol// le lo rnam g.yeng rab spang zhing// dben par DAk+ki'i dkyil 'khor bsham// mos gus gsol ba phur tshugs gdab// gsang ba'i dal zhugs dbang bskur bya// dga' dang mchog dga' mchog rab dga'// bde stong mi rtog ting 'dzin bzung// ma yengs 'bras bu ar la gtad// 'di ni nyag gcig gnyis med don// b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA tu a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ sgyu lus g.yo 'gul sna tshogs kyis// las la dbang 'byor mnyen lcug bde// phyag bskor gar bsgyur spyod lam bya// sngon du 'gro ba shin tu gces// ro dbyung gsar bzung rgyu rngub cing// gyen mthur me srog kun la khyab// dbang dang 'byor thob las su rung// bar du gnad la dbab par bya// dmigs pa'i mda' bsnun 'phen byas te// dbab bskyil bzlog bkram dbang 'byor thob// rang gzhan sbyor bas las la sbyar// tha ma nyid de rim pas so// mthar thug don ston ye shes bskyed// ngo sprod rgyas gdab la sogs te// yang dag bla med 'bras bu'i mchog/ rang gzhan rnal 'byor rgyal pos

blta// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ DAk+ki'i chags lam gsang ba bla med kyi gdams pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bskyed rdzogs brtan pa thob pa yi// 'bras bu bcud du smin tshul dag/ gnas skabs mthar thug yang dag don// ngo bo dbyer med grub tshul ni// chad rtags yid gnyis las grol te// 'bras bu sku gsum bcud du smin// rang gzhan kun don las byed cing// don gnyis yang dag tshad du ldang// pha rol rgol ba sun 'byin nas// sna tshogs las la dbang 'byor te// yang dag sa la 'god pa dang// yang na dbyings su grol bar byed// dbang po gsum gyi khyad par las// 'di nyid dang ni bar do ru// gcig gi brgyud de sa chod nas// yang dag brtan pa mi g.yo 'gyur// gdos bcas nyid dang bral ba'i tshe// rdul bral mkha' dang 'od zer 'ja'// yig 'bru sku gdung ring bsrel sogs// sku gsum thob rtags mang 'byung 'gyur// 'bad pa don yod gcig chog nyid// 'di ni dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka'// la las rna ba'i dbang po ru// lan cig thos kyang don chen 'grub// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ bskyed rdzogs kyi 'bras bu grub tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'di la dbang spyod rig pa'i bu// skye 'chi mi gos rdo rje'i sku// dri med mtsho dbus 'dab brgyad las// legs byung sprul sku pad+ma 'byung// rgyal ba rnams kyi phrin las bdag/ sna tshogs spyod pa rlabs po ches// gdul bya'i mos blo tha dad la// rnam pa bzhi yi don byed 'gyur// de sras sprul dang yang sprul dang// ma 'ongs don byed skyes bu ni// cho 'phrul ston pa la la zhig/ 'di nyid mtshan tsam 'dzin pa 'byung// de nas nyi ma'i zer thag ltar// snang sprul khyab byed gnas skabs 'gar// 'phros pa'i phreng ba'ang re re tsam// mtha' nas mtha' ru 'byung bar 'gyur// tshul min 'chol par 'byung srid kyi// tshul 'di nam yang 'jig mi mnga'// ci phyir rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin pa// g.yung drung nyid du brtan pa'o// bstan pa dam pa 'di dang ni// don byed dam pa sprul par bcas// 'di 'phrad srid pa ma lus kun// mi nub dar rgyas gnyis ldan shog/ thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ ma 'ongs lung bstan dang smon lam gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'di ni bstan pa gang bab kyi// rin chen bzhus pa'i khu ba'am// yang na gang 'thad sman sogs kyis// bris shing lus la bcangs pas kyang// tshe 'dir lha dang mis mchod cing// bar du gcod pa'i bdud tshogs kyang// zhi ba'i las la gnas pa dang// bkur sti bcas te bsrung bar

'gyur// tshe 'phos ltas bzang mtshan mar bcas// nad gdon duHkha nyer zhi zhing// mtha' yas bkod sogs zhing khams su// bgrod 'gyur the tshom med gyur na// bsgrub cing nyams su blangs pas ni// bla med 'bras bu myur thob ste// rang gzhan don gnyis 'grub pa dang// 'bras bu lhun rdzogs smos ci dgos// de phyir bstan la zhugs rnams kyis// nyams su len dang gzhan la ston// 'bri klog 'chang zhing gsol ba gdab// de 'bras nus pa dpag par dka'// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ che ba'i yon tan dang bcad thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// de skad dpag med rgyal po yis// dbang po la sogs 'khor rnams la// rang bzhin klong nas rang babs su// pad+ma'i ljags kyis smras pa dang// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// gzugs kyi snying po la sogs dang// ma mo mkha' 'gror bcas pa rnams// rjes su yi rang tshul gyis ni// e ma e ma bcom ldan 'das// yang dag don ldan bla na med// legs so legs so legs par smras// bstod bsngags du mas mngon par bstod// thugs bcud 'dus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug gzi brjid 'od dpag med kyi sprul pa rang byung du babs pa'i bka' dri ma med pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan dang/ phrin las mi zad pa dpal du 'bar ba'i dgongs pa mngon du phyung ba/ rgyud kyi rgyal po pad sdong brtsegs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// sa ma ya/ rta nag dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bka' 'di srungs/ gter rkun dam nyams log lta can gyi dbang po snubs/ skal ldan las can gsung gi sras dang 'phrad par shog/ sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ d+ha thim/ guh+ya/ sprul sku gar gyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas gling pas/ yos kyi lo glang gi zla ba'i tshes brgyad/ yos kyi nyi ma nyi dros 'brug gi dus su/ snga dkar dung gi sgo mo nas/ klu btsan drag po yab yum gyi bsnyen bskur byas nas gter phul ba lags so// phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du bkra shis par gyur cig///

u rgyan gsang ba brda skad du/ gwakyagyak+sharba rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba kA ya tan+t+ra a ma la pa ra ta ni sr-iSh+ta na ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba/ ye thog dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mgon po 'od dpag tu+u med cing gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// e ma ho// ye klong chen po'i pho brang du// ston pa dpag med rgyal po la// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// stobs ldan 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// thabs shes 'dus shing tshogs pa'i tshe// snang srid rol pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// gnad don bskyed pa'i don zhus pa// e ma e ma bcom ldan 'das// phyi nang snang srid rten 'brel kun// ye gdangs lha yi rol pa las// ma dag pa dang dag pa dang// ye dag chen po dag pa'i klong// sgyu ma lta bu'i sku bsgoms na// bla ma lha dang DAk+ki dang// de dang de sprul yang sprul pa// rkang grangs mtshan bshad stsal du gsol// de bzhin byin gyis brlab tshul dang// dkar ser dmar sogs sku mdog dang// de bzhin rgyan dang cha lugs dang// rnam 'gyur mdzad pa phrin las dang// phyag mtshan 'dzin dang de tshul dang// dpa' bo yab kyi rgyu mtshan dang// dpa' mo yum gyi rgyu mtshan dang// de dag 'khor gyi rnam grangs dang// 'khor bcas rnams kyi sprul pa dang// sprul pa de las yang sprul dang// de dag rnams kyi rtogs brjod dang// de ltar lha rnams ji ltar bsgrub// lha de bsgrub pa'i dgos pa gang// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu yon tan ci// ma bsgrub nyes pa ji ltar 'gyur// phyi ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// nang ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// gsang ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// de bzhin de nyid ji ltar bsgrub// lha mchod thugs dam ji ltar bskang// bdag nyid lha ru ji ltar gsal// mdun du bskyed tshul ji lta bu// dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo gang// de bzhin ye shes sems dpa' gang// de nyid bsres na ji ltar bsre// dbang bskur rgyas 'debs ji ltar bya// de dag rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gang// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// dgongs pa bkrol nas stsal du gsol// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ gleng gzhi'i dmig gi le'u ste dang po'o// a+thi+-i/// de ltar ji bzhin zhus pa'i don// dpag med rgyas pos bka' stsal pa// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs nyon// 'gyur med ye shes rdo rje'i tshig/ rtog bral chen pos yid la zung// ye gdangs chen po'i cho 'phrul las// rol pa ye shes lhar snang ba// rkang grangs mtshan bshad ji ltar na// nges don bka'

de smos par bya// 'jug pa rnams ni spro don du// rtsa ba smin dang grol ba dang// mchog dang thun mong bsgrub phyir dang// sna tshogs las kyi bye brag rnams// nges par 'dod la grangs mang yang// rnam par nges pa med mod kyang// gdul bya'i don du nges pa can// rkang grangs mtshan gyi 'jug sgo bstan// bla ma yi dam DAk+ki ste// kun don ye shes rol pa las// brda dang rtags kyi rim par spros// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba ste// tha ma 'bring dang rab kyi blo// nges pa can dang nges pa med// rab tu ma nges de bzhin nyid// nges pa can gyi lha smos pa// dpag tu med pa'i gzhal yas khang// mtshon bya mtshon par byed pa'i sku// lham mer lhang nger snang ba can// steng dang 'og tu rnam par rgyal// phyogs dang mtshams dang dbus dag dang// phyi ru gsal dang nang du gsal// bar ram yang ni de bzhin nyid// rnam par nges pa can du ste// gsal 'grib med pa rgyal ba'i sku// de bzhin che chung mtshan ma bral// rkang grangs gcig dang du ma sogs// mtshan 'dzin nor ba rnam par spang// nges pa med la lha rang nyid// gud na ma yin mtshan ma dral// brda dang rnam rol gar gyis mtshon// ye shes sgyu ma'i lhar snang ba// snang tsam nyid na brjod mtha' yas// de phyir rkang grangs cho 'phrul te// cho 'phrul nyid la cho 'phrul lo// rab tu nges pa med pa las// de bzhin nyid la de bzhin sku// gcig pa nyid la du mar ro// dgag dang bsgrub pa ma mchis shing// ye klong kun chub phyag rgyar mtshon// rab tu 'khrugs pas du mar gsal// kun tu gdal ba gcig tu 'dus// 'di don 'phrul gyi yang zhun no// de ltar gsum gyi mtha' bcad phyir// kun gyi spyi phud bla ma ste// cho 'phrul du ma yi dam lha// kun don rmad byung mkha' 'gro nyid// 'khrul pa ngan rtogs dgag pa yi// thabs kyi rgyal pos 'di smras pa// dri med mtsho gleng ge sar rgyas pa'i steng// mngal gyis ma gos pad+ma badzra rtsal// bde ba'i ro 'byin lha lcam man+da ra// thabs shes bde stong gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ rgyal ba yongs kyi thugs bcud 'dus pa ste// de yi rtsal las rnam 'phrul du mar snang// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs yab yum mched de brgyad// zhe sdang rdo rje nga rgyal rdo rje dang// 'dod chags rdo rje phrag dog rdo rje dang// gti mug rdo rje bde ba'i rdo rje dang// mtsho skyes rdo rje khrag 'thung rdo rje ste// dpa' bo yab kyi dgyes pa skong ba'i yum// skyod byed ma dang gshin rje 'joms ma dang// de bzhin sreg byed ma dang tsan+ti ka/ rmongs byed ma dang la ma man+da ra// gsod byed ma ste thabs shes yab yum tshul// mtha' bral rol pa'i ngang du rnam par gnas// bud+d+ha thod phreng rtsal dang bde yi yum// bud+d+ha DAk+ki rnam par rol pa ste// de (7)

yi cho 'phrul 'gyed pa 'khor gyi tshogs// badzra thod phreng rat+na thod phreng rtsal// pad+ma thod phreng karma thod phreng rtsal// rdo rje mos pa rtsal dang myu gu rtsal// bzhad pa rtsal dang gar gyi dbang phyug ste// de dag rnams la gnyis med 'khril ba'i yum// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las kyi rigs// bi shwa sarba dam tshig 'jig rten gyi// mkha' 'gro rnams dang gnyis med mnyam rol gnas// mi bskyod rdo rje bde ba'i dbyings phyug ma// yab yum gnyis kyi cho 'phrul spros pa las// pad+ma 'byung gnas blo ldan mchog gi sred// nyi ma 'od zer seng+ge sgra sgrog dang// pad+ma sam b+ha pad+ma rgyal po ste// shAkya seng+ge rdo rje grau bo lod// kun gyi dgyes skong sprul pa'i yum chen brgyad// ye shes rje mo bde ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bdag med lha mo rdo rje phra men ma// rgya mtsho gling gnas mkha' 'gro zhi ba 'tsho// shAkya de ma mkha' 'gro bdud 'dul ma// gdul bya'i re 'dod bskang zhing nyams dang ldan// pad+ma dbang chen rig byed lha mor bcas// bde stong rol pa'i cho 'phrul sprul pa'i 'khor// rdo rje nyi ma thogs med rgyal po dang// dbang chen nyi ma gser gyi nyi ma dang// rdo rje khro bo rdo rje hU~M mdzad dang// ro langs bde ba rdo rje thog rgod 'bar// yum chen legs skyes phra men dbyings phyug ma// srid pa'i rgyal mo nyi khros dbang mo che// gar gyi dbang phyug las kyi dbang mo che// srid pa chags byed 'byung ba lnga yi bdag/ bde stong zag med ro yis tshims par byed// dpa' bo chen po rig 'dzin thod pa rtsal// mkha' 'gro nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// yab yum gnyis kyi cho 'phrul 'khor gyi tshogs// lhun gyis grub dang phyag rgya chen po dang// tshe la dbang dang rnam smin rig 'dzin te// dam tshig dbang dang man ngag lung dang ni// shes rab rgyud dang nyams chag skong ba ste// de dag rig 'dzin bzhi dang slob dpon bzhi/ spyan gcig ma dang rnal 'byor dgyes sde ma// dbang gi lha mo rnal 'byor ro langs ma// dam tshig bdag mo rdo rje skul byed ma// skyod byed tshangs ma tshe 'dzin rgyal mo ste// de ltar yab yum rnams kun mchog la rol// rdo rje drag po khams gsum srid pa'i bdag/ yab yum gnyis kyi cho 'phrul 'bar ba las// ya ma rA dza skos rje drang dkar dang// srin mo glog phreng yak+sha me dbal dang// gza' bdud spu gri klu bdud mgo dgu pa// dbang phyug chen po ma hA kA lA'i sku// za byed nag mo bdud mo re ma ti/ khrag mig ma dang mon mo mi srun ma// lcam gcig ma dang thog gi bu yug ma// u ma de bI lha mo dung skyong ma// bstan pa bsrung tshul yab yum 'jigs pa'i sku// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thod pa'i dum bu dang// sangs rgyas dpa' mo gnyis med 'khril ba las// sprul pa'i 'khor brgyad yab yum bcas pa yang// rdo rje

dpa' bo rin chen dpa' bo dang// pad+ma dpa' bo las kyi dpa' bo dang// 'dzin ging 'gugs byed sgrol ging gsod byed dang// stobs ging za byed rgyug ging las byed pa// rdo rje dpa' mo rin chen dpa' mo dang// pad+ma dpa' mo las kyi dpa' mo dang// rdo rje ging mo rin chen ging mo dang// pad+ma ging mo las kyi ging mo ste// 'khril zhing sbyor bas dpal gyi bka' lung nyan// rta mgrin dbang chen e ka tsa ti gnyis// gtso bo'i tshul las sprul pa'i 'khor brgyad po// ye shes zil gnon las kyi khro bo dang// ye shes ma mo zil gnon khyung zil gnon// pho rgyud zil gnon mo rgyud zil gnon dang// klu 'dul khro bo gnod sbyin 'dul byed de// yum chen mi pham ma dang khro gnyer ma// spyan gcig ma dang rdo rje rtsa 'jibs ma// rdo rje las byed gshin rje las byed ma// klu mo las byed gnod sbyin las byed ma// yab yum rnams kyang bde stong ye shes bskyed// lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// yab yum gnyis las sprul pa'i khro bo ni// rnam par rgyal ba dang ni gshin rje gshed// rta mgrin dbang chen bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang// dbyig pa sngon po dang ni mi g.yo mgon// 'dod pa'i rgyal po khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ khro bo hU~M ka ra dang stobs po che// rdo rje mda' snyems dur khrod bdag mo dang// rdo rje gtum mo rdo rje rlung 'byin ma// rdo rje sder mo rdo rje gtun khung ma// rdo rje snyems ma rdo rje skul byed ma// rdo rje sgra 'byin rdo rje gsod byed ma// yab yum rnams kyang rang rang phrin las brtson// kun kyang gtso 'khor tshul du rnam par gnas// mun pa'i smag sel gsal snang ye shes ston/ khwa gdong phag gdong khyi gdong 'ug gdong ma// brtan byed pho nya mche ba 'joms byed ma// phyogs dang mtshams rnams dpal gyi lung bzhin nyan// dpa' bo thod dbyug dpa' mo rab gtum ma// dpa' bo keng rus dpa' mo gtum mig ma// keng rus gtum po dpa' mo 'od ldan ma// dpa' mo mche gtsigs dpa' mo sna chen ma// su ra b+he ri dpa' mo brtan ma dang// 'od dpag med pa dpa' mo mi thung ma// rdo rje 'od ldan lang ka'i dbang phyug ma// rdo rje sku mchog dpa' mo shing grib ma// rdo rje gzhon nu dpa' mo sa srung ma// rdo rje ral pa dpa' mo 'od can ma// rab tu dga' ba dpa' mo rlung shugs ma// dpa' bo hU~M mdzad dpa' mo chang 'thung ma// rab tu bzang po dpa' mo gtsug phud ma// rdo rje bzang po dpa' mo rab bzang ma// dpa' bo 'jigs byed dpa' mo rta sna ma// spyan mi bzang dang dpa' mo khwa gdong ma// stobs chen rgyal po tsakra'i shugs 'chang ma// rin chen rdo rje dpa' mo dung skyes ma// rta mgrin rgyal po dpa' mo glang sna ma// nam mkha'i snying po 'khor lo'i go ca

ma// dpa' ldan he ru ka dpal rab dpa' ma// pad+ma gar dbang dpa' mo stobs chen ma// rnam par snang mdzad dpa' mo 'khor bsgyur ma// dpa' bo sems dpa' dpa' mo brtson 'grus ma// dpal gyi bka' sdod lung gi pho nyar bcas// so so rang rang las kyi gnyer 'dzin cing// stobs shugs rtsal ldan drod nyal bstan pa bsrung// de sogs drang don dpag med ye shes lha// rtog pa spur la drang phyir rnam par spros// de ltar lha yi rkang grangs su// shes par gyis shig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga yis drang por bshad pa la/ khyed kyis nges pa'i don du zung// slad du zung 'jug chen por sbyor// la thag dbyer med nyid du chod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha'i rkang grangs mtshan bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang ni 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// byin gyis brlabs la rnam mang yang// rnam pa lnga ru 'dus pa ste// snying rje byang chub sems sgoms pas// rang gi bsam rgyud byin gyis brlab// gang sdod u rgyan gnas su mos// sa phyogs thams cad byin gyis brlab/ khang pa gzhal yas khang du dmigs// gnas mal byin gyis brlab par bya// gang tshogs lha yi rnam par blta// ye shes lha ru byin gyis brlab// bza' btung bdud rtsir mos byas te// mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlab// de ltar byin brlab rnam lnga las// spros pa'i yan lag bsam mi khyab// de ltar byin brlab lnga ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa rmad du byung// 'di don ye shes rmad po che// med pa'i dbyings las dpag med snang// snang tsam nyid las rnam grol ba'i// gdeng thob lha yi rol par 'gyur// phyi nang snang srid dkyil 'khor nyid// gzhal yas khang dang lha rnams kun// spros la dga' rnams sna khrid phyir// 'jug pa'i thabs la snang ba yin// snang ba sprin ris 'dra ba la// mngon par zhen la lha mi snang// yang dag gnad kyi don bstan pa// sa mtshams sbyar bas shes par bya// rtog pas sbags pa'i lha rnams ni// byin gyis ma brlabs blangs las byung// rlangs pa sel ba'i nyi zer du// ye shes rab ldan rang snang ltos// e ma 'di ni thabs kyi gsang// ma dag 'khrul pa'i blo can la// rgyu don dgongs pa yang yang gsang/ khor yug dag la lhang nger snang// de nas byin gyis brlab pa yang// gnad du che bas shes par bya// gang gis gtan la phebs nges kyang/ snying gi khur du che ba yin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ byin gyis brlab pa'i gnad bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang ni 'khor tshogs sems dpa' nyon// dkar ser dmar ljang la sogs pa'i/

kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba ni// ye shes lha las mngon snang ba'i// gdul bya'i mos blo tha dad las// rab tu dkar zhing 'tsher ba dang// de bzhin dmar la dngas pa dang// nag la rngam pa'i rang bzhin can// ser gsal gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// la lar mthing nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// sngo skya dang ni thal ba'i mdog/ yang ni char sprin mun rum bzhin// dmar ser gur gum mdog ltar 'tsher// smug nag dang ni rab tu ljang// dud pa'i mdog la rngam par snang// la la phyed gzugs ri mo can// 'ja' sna lta bur khra bo'i mdog/ de sogs kha dog rnam pa ni// gcig tu ma nges du mar snang// de yi dgongs don gnad rnams ni// thugs rje che ldan rnams kyis ni// gdul bya'i re 'dod bskang don du// rnam pa sna tshogs bstan pa dang// yang ni phrin las sna tshogs kyis// sgyur byed rim par spros pa ste// de phyir gang 'dod blo yis bsgyur// 'on kyang gzu lums dgag pa'i phyir// phyogs dang de bzhin phyogs bral ba// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing gar snang// 'gyur med dag pa de bzhin nyid// brda dang rtags kyi rim par yang// rab tu spro zhing bstan pa'o// rnam dag gzugs kyi sku rnams la// rnam par nges pa'i kha dog can// sprul dang yang sprul du mar snang// mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// nam mkhas khyab pa'i gdul bya la// 'dul byed thabs kyi rgyal por spros// gdul bya'i snang tshul du ma la// 'dul byed bye brag bsam mi khyab// thabs mkhas snying rje'i cho 'phrul du/ kha dog sna tshogs snang ba'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i sku mdog gi rnam par nges byed bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// kye ho 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// de ltar ye shes lha rnams kyi// rgyan dang cha lugs ji ltar na// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan gyi// lha yi cho 'phrul sna tshogs las// rgyan dang cha lugs ma nges kyang// gdul bya'i bsam yid tshim slad du// rol pa'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// zhi ba'i tshul dang khro bo'i tshul// de bzhin zhi ma khro yi tshul/ khro bo la yang rnam pa dgu/ khro dang rngam dang rab tu khro// 'jigs gzugs bstan khro ngang gis khro// dam tshig dbang gis khro ba dang// sprul pa lta bur khro ba dang// rnam 'gyur shugs kyis khro ba ste/ khro tshul yan lag bcas pa'o// rang bzhin babs kyis khro ba ste/ 'khor ba bsnyil phyir khros nas ni// spyod lam gtum pos log byed rnams// 'joms shing brlag par byed pa ste// ba spu spu gri'i so ltar gzengs// lag na 'joms byed mtshon cha thogs// rab tu drag rtsub ngar dang ldan// rngam pa'i tshul gyis khro ba ni// 'jigs tshul bcas nas am tsig

bstan// mig bgrad mche bas ma mchu bsdam// lag na mtshon thogs brdeg tshul ston// rab tu khros la dur khrod chas// stobs ldan glang chen ko rlon dang// mi yi pags pa khrag ris can// gcan gzan stag gi shun lpags rnams// stod khebs smad dkris sked la bcings/ khrag zhag thal ba'i tshom bus byugs// thod phreng sprul gyi chun pos brgyan/ kha gdangs mtshe gtsigs mig gsum bgrad// lus la bskal pa'i mi chen 'bar// ha ha hU~M hU~M phaT phaT sgrogs// lag na mtshon cha'i char pa 'bebs// skal med la sogs 'joms pa'o// 'jigs pa'i gzugs bstan khro ba ni// sku che yan lag rags pa la// dpa' brjid ldan zhing 'gying ba can// mthong ba tsam gyis skrag pa'o// ngang gis khro ba rnam pa gnyis// ye shes lha yi ngang khro dang// las byed shan pa lta bu'o// ye shes lha yi ngang khro ba/ khro bo'i cha lugs du mar bcas// dgongs don g.yo ba med pa'o// las byed shan pa lta bu ni/ nam yang brtse sems bral ba la// yang ni brnag pa'i dmigs med par// gang byed drag shul ldan pa'o// dam tshig dbang gis khro ba ni// gshis la khro ba med bzhin du// log spyod sgrol bar dam bcas pa// sngon tshe dpal gyi spyan snga ru// rU tra bsgral bar khas blangs nas// ji bzhin du yang khro ba la// gnas skabs dus stabs bstun nas su// de la cha lugs nges pa med// sprul pa lta bur khro ba ni// zhi ba'i ngang las khro skur snang// gang la ci 'dul rnam 'gyur can// rnam pa sna tshogs spyod pa'o// rnam 'gyur shugs kyis khro ba ni// stangs stabs rnam pa mang po dang// rol pa'i cha lugs du mar bcas// drag po'i shugs kyis rtsub 'khrugs ston// ye shes lha yang skrag byed na// nyams pa rnams ni lta ci smos// thams cad brgyal zhing rengs par byed// ye nas khro bar bsngags pa'o/ khro tshul yan lag bcas pa ni// gar dgu'i nyams dang ldan pa ste// mgo dang yan lag mang po yis// so sor las byed phrin las skyong// de ltar khro dgu gang la yang// lus stobs ldan zhing yan lag rags// so dang mche ba rab tu rno// kha gdangs mig bgrad khro gnyer bsdus// smin ma ag tshom me ltar 'bar// rkang lag sen mo lcags kyu 'gugs// skra dang ba spu mtshon char gzengs// dpa' rtags dur khrod chas rnams dang// dar dang rin chen du mas spras// me dpung 'bar ba'i klong nas 'gying// lus la sprul pa du ma 'gyed// zhi ba la yang rnam pa lnga// ye nas zhi dang gnas skabs zhi// gdul bya'i don du zhi ba dang// rnam 'gyur stabs kyis zhi ba dang// mngon par 'phags pas zhi ba dang// de yang ye nas zhi ba ni// gdod nas skye ba med pa'i klong// thugs rje kun snang nyi

'od gdal// chags bral nyon mongs ngang gis 'jil// rgyan dang cha lugs rnams ma nges// rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gnas skabs zhi ba ni// mdzes shing yid 'ong rgyan gyis spras// gzhon sha chags shing bag dang ldan// kun ldan ye shes spyan rab mdzes// gdul bya'i don du zhi ba ni// sprul pa'i 'od zer phyogs bcur 'gyed// ye shes snang ba lam mer ston// gang la gang 'dul mdzad pa mdzad// rnam 'gyur stabs kyis zhi ba ni// thams cad yongs la khyab par brtse// log spyod byams pa'i shugs kyis 'dul// nyer zhi kun dang mthun pa ston// mngon par 'phags pa'i zhi ba ni// tshad med bzhi yi dpyang thag can// gdal ba chen po kun la snyoms// thang lhod skyo dub med pa'o// kun kyang cha lugs rgyan rnams ni// 'jam mnyen dar gyi cod pan dang// stod g.yogs smad dkris 'ja' snam ris// spyi gtsug mthon ka rin chen tog/ rtse bran prog zhu pa tra can// mgur chu snyan yod 'khor lo ris// phyag zhabs dpung rgyan gdu bu dkris// se mo do dang do shal can// sna tshogs rin chen phra rnams kyis// stod smad sku yi rgyan du byas// gzhan yang rus pa'i phreng ba dang// sna tshogs dar gyi pho long spras// mnyen lcug zhi sgeg 'khril ldem can// bzhengs dang bzhugs dang stangs stabs kyi// skyil krung la sogs rol par gnas// zhi ma khro yi rnam pa ni// gcig tu ma nges sna tshogs tshul// 'dzum la ngar ba'i rnam pa can/ khro la zhi ba'i cho 'phrul dang// sku ni zhi la rnam 'gyur khro// rnam 'gyur zhi la cha lugs khro// cha lugs zhi la stangs stabs khro// spyan dang zhal gyi rnam 'gyur yang// gcig zhi gcig khro phyed ma'i tshul// mche ba sbas pa'i so mdangs can// bzhad na spyan gyi rnam 'gyur khro// 'dzum zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa can// zhi zhi 'dra la khro zhing rngams// rngam rngam 'dra la rab tu zhi// g.yo ba'i rnam pas rol pa ste// kun kyang sprul dang yang sprul lo// de ltar zhi dang khro bo dang// phyed ma la sogs gang dang gang// rgyan dang cha lugs dpag tu med// la la gdul bya 'dul slad du// la la rnam rol gar gyi tshul// la la 'jug tshul tha dad de// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// nges dang ma nges de bzhin no// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rgyan dang cha lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang 'dus sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// gsal snang ye shes lha rnams kyi// rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las ni// phyi nang gsang ba bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang ye shes rnam rol pa// kun rdzob tsam du sna tshogs snang// don dam rnam nges yongs la 'dres// zhi bar mdzad

dang rgyas par mdzad// de bzhin dbang drag phrin las mdzad// sna tshogs las rnams dbang bsgyur mdzad// gang yang dngos dang dngos min gyi// 'khor dang sprul pas gzhan don mdzad// mos pa rnams la mos snang mdzad// ma mos pa la'ang de dag gi/ 'dul thabs cho 'phrul du ma yis// zhi dang drag dang phyed ma dang// brtse ba'i nyams kyis dpa' brtul ston// snang mdzad rol pa ye shes sku// gcig las du mar 'gyed pa dang// de las de bzhin rim gyis spros// mang po gcig tu dril nas ni// ci bzhin 'gro don thabs kyis brtson// sa 'og sa bla sa steng dang// de dang de las gzhan pa rnams// rnam par g.yo zhing las la sbyar// 'khrugs mar sna tshogs rol par ston// dpa' dang rol pa nyams kyis kyang// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang// mnyam rol sprul pa yang dang yang// rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las kyis// lus la sku dang ngag la gsung// de bzhin sems la thugs kyi'o// rgyan gyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul gyis ni// bskal pa grangs 'das gdul bya la// rdzas rnams du mas 'dul thabs ston// thabs dang shes rab rnam gnyis kyi// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// rnam 'gyur dpag tu med pa yang// brda dang bcas pa'i phrin las rnams// char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bab par byed// dmigs pa dngabacas dmigs pa bral// phyag rgya du mar yang yang spros// kun la cha yis snyoms par 'gyur// mdor na gang yang sku dang bcas// dkyil 'khor rim pa las kyi ni// 'jug dang 'pho ba'i rnam 'gyur las// sna tshogs las kyi cho ga 'byung// bkres pa la sogs gdung ba sel// duHkha'i gnas las de bzlog cing// mthar phyin grong mchog bgrod pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rnam 'gyur mdzad pa'i phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// ma nges sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes rol pa'i lha rnams kyi// longs spyod rgyan gyi phyag mtshan dang// de dag tshul gyi rnam 'gyur ni// gdul bya'i re 'dod bskang don du// rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa// brda dang rtags kyis kun spyod de// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgya gram rnam pa lnga// bde gshegs mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'o// gri gug ral gri dgra s+t+wa dang// mda' gzhu zangs gri kha T+wAM ga/ mdung thung spu gri reg chod dang// chu gri dang ni mtshon cha yis// nyon mongs la sogs rnam rtog 'joms// phur pa tho ba gtun shing dang// thod dbyug tshon gyi gru gu dang// gnam lcags tho lum dug gi gri// ma rungs bdud dang ru tra 'dul// rgyu ma sprul dang rdo rje yi// zhags pas

dug gsum 'ching bar byed// bum pa lhung bzed gter gyi sgrom// pad phor rin chen gzhong pa dang// pad+ma rA ga'i gwa'u dang// b+han+d+ha skam rlon snod chen po// dngos grub rnam gnyis bcud char 'bebs// phyag mtshan zhing dbyug thong gshol dang// ba dan zhing gi rgyal mtshan dang// rnga yab be con khram shing ste// dpa' rtags nyon mongs g.yul rgyal rtags// rnga dang g+haN+De cang te'u dang// thod rngas chos gsung sgra sgrogs byed// po ti ut+pal rin chen phreng// sman gyi sdong po rin chen phreng// me long yid bzhin re 'dod bskang// nyi zla ri rab me dpung 'bar// chos 'byung rlung dang me thabs kyis// srid gsum gdar sha gcod par byed// sdigs pa mi ro khrag gi phur pa phor// lcags spyang rus sbal thog ser tsit+ta dang// lcags kyi par bu ne'u le'i rkyal pa ste// dregs pa las 'khol ma rungs 'joms pa'i rtags// me tog bdug spos mar me dri// zhal zas sgra dbyangs lha rnams kyi// dgyes pa bskang zhing mchod rdzas rtags// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// 'gugs dang 'ching dang sdom pa dang// ma rungs pa rnams myos par byed// de las gzhan yang longs spyod kyi// mdzes byed phyag mtshan du mar bcas// rang snang rnam dag chos kyi sprin// thugs mchog ye shes rtags kyi rgya// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsang mdzod 'dzin// rnam rol cho 'phrul dpag med pas// skyo dang dub med kun tu spyod// gang dang gang la spel byed cing// sgrib med yang dag kun la sbyor// brtul zhugs spyod pas 'gro don mdzad// e ma 'di dag rmad du byung// dgongs pa yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor bkra// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i phyag mtshan gyi rnam par dbye ba 'dzin tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// sprul pa'i 'khor rnams gus par nyon// ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dpa' bo yab kyi rnam rol ni// thabs kyi ye shes tshul bstan pa// don la yab yum ris med kyang// snang tshul gdul bya 'dul don du// thabs dang shes rab 'du 'phrod pas// phan tshun phyi nang g.yas dang g.yon// gnyis sbyor nyon mongs bral ba ste// dag pa'i skad cig so ma la// ma dag lo 'dab skye ba na// g.yo med dag pa'i rang snang sku// 'di kun thabs kyi rgyal po yin// nyon mongs la sogs 'khor rnams 'jig/ phung po gang yang gtor ba'i rlung// 'di kun rab mchog ye shes yin// rtsal chen dpa' bo he ru ka/ yab kyi tshul du rnam par snang// bzang po'i sprul pa rang byung ba// gsal tsam ma yin che bar grags// dpal chen brtul zhugs nas stobs 'dzin// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba ste// kun kyang 'joms pa'i dpal du

shar// dpal chen bde ba'i ye shes bskyed// dpa' bo srid pa'i rtse mo gnon/ khyod kyi sen mo'i khyon gyis kyang// nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal byed de// rdo rje'i cho 'phrul du ma las// sprul dang yang sprul de sprul zhing// 'dod chags dgra las rnam rgyal ba// 'dod chags dag pa'i ye shes kyi// 'dod chags ma spangs rang byung nas// 'dod pas 'dod pa nyid 'grub byed// des na dpa' bo e ma mtshar// yab kyi dkyil 'khor nyid la rdzogs// bzang po yang ni de yi pha// dbang rab gtso bo de bzhin byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha la gdul bya'i don du dpa' bo yab kyi snang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang nyon 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kun// ye shes lha yi dkyil 'khor du// dpa' mo yum gyi rnam rol ni// shes rab ye shes tshul bstan pa'i// yang dag don la yab dang yum// phan tshun rnam res byas mod kyang// yul gyi rnam par phyes nas ni// shes rab ye shes dag pa'i sku// mkha' klong yangs pa'i ngang nyid las// sgyu ma'i rtsal snang 'phro zhing 'du// nyid las byung zhing nyid la thim// nyid las ma g.yos byas gyur med// de phyir yum gyi rnam 'phrul las// 'gyed pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kun// shar lho nub byang phyogs dang ni// de bzhin byang shar la sogs mtshams// steng dang 'og sde phyogs bcu ru// rnam par 'phros pa'i rgyan dang bcas// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar yang// b+ha ga yangs pa'i klong las ni// byung dang 'byung 'gyur gnas pa nyid// de las gzhan yang dpa' bo yi// rgyud bskul thugs dam bskang ba ste// bde stong rol pa'i rnam 'gyur las// sprul dang yang sprul der sprul zhing// phyogs bcur dpag tu med 'gyed pa'i// rgyan gyi rnam rol mang po yang// kun tu snang zhing yang la spro// dga' bzhi ye shes spros dang bral// 'dod chags la sogs dug rnams kyang// nyid kyi klong las rang byung zhing// nyid kyi dbyings las rang sar thim// de ltar yang dag de las gzhan// g.yo ba med las rnam par g.yo// g.yo ba'i rlabs kyis yongs la khyab// yongs la khyab cing yongs la gsal// gsal ba thams cad sa ler snang// de yang bzang mo'i dgongs par ro// de ltar dpa' mo yum nyid las// snang ba ma 'gags rtsal ye shes// 'ub chub chen por 'dus pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i dpa' mo yum gyi snang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rnam rol sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi// 'khor gyi rnam grangs yang dag brjod// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang// yon

tan phrin las byung ba yi// 'khor dang de yi yang 'khor dang// de las gzhan yang sprul pa'i 'khor// 'jig rten pa ltar snang ba ste// gcig bcu brgya stong khri 'bum nas// grangs kyis mi rdzogs mthar thug par// 'khor gyi rnam grangs de snyed de// rigs drug skye 'gro lha yi 'khor// gdul bya skye ba rnam pa bzhi// rgyud lnga lam gyi 'gro ba rnams// ye shes lha la nye bar 'khor// de dang de yi dpal rnams ni// dkar dang nag pa'i las kyi mthar// de yang 'khor dang lhan cig pas// bka' nyan gus sdod yin pa ste// nyid kyi cho 'phrul las byung tshe// 'khor dang 'das pa gnyis ka'o// gnas skabs yul don 'khor rnams ni// 'bar ba zhabs kyi gdan khri la// nye bar reg pa'i 'khor yin cing// gtso bo nyid las sprul pas so// gud na ma yin klong rdol bas// las kyi gnyer len bran gyi tshul// yang du yang du 'du 'phro ston// byed pa de bzhin las kun byed// che las chung snang gtso bo'i phyed// de phyed phyi rol rnams la ste// de dang rjes mthun las kyang bsgrub// rnam par rol la rnam mi gnas// rnam rol rgyan gyi 'khor lo bskor// zhi ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang// de bzhin rgyas dang dbang sogs dang// rim nas rim bzhin 'khor lo rnams// skyo dang dub med yang yang bskor// bar mtshams med par 'byung ba ste// de dang 'di la nye bar gnas// rgyug dang 'phur dang 'jol ba dang// lag gis 'gro dang lto 'gro'i tshul// skad cig nyid la srid pa gsum// yongs su khyab pa'i bya ba byed// de bzhin re re la yang 'khor// grangs dang snyed kyi bka' nyan pa// sgo mtshams la sogs re re ni// brda tsam du ni snang ba dang// de phyir ming dang 'khor gyi grangs// de yi byed pa las dang bcas// de la spros shing de las sdud// de yi rnam grangs shes par bya// mdor na ye shes lha yi 'khor// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// sprul dang yang sprul bsam mi khyab// rang rang blo yi spyod yul du// gang 'tshams bar ni shes par bya'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i 'khor gyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar lha tshogs 'khor bcas kyi// sprul pa la ni rnam pa lnga// dngos su sprul dang brdzus te sprul// log par sprul dang ngang gis sprul// rnam par 'gyur ba'i sprul pa'o// dngos su sprul pa dngos 'dra ba'i// gcig las brgya stong khri 'bum sogs// mtshan dang bcas pa dpag med pa// rgyan dang rol pa'i rnam 'gyur bcas// rnam pa gcig la kun tu snang// gdul bya re re'i snang tshul du// tshom bu tshom bu tshul du snang// brdzus te sprul ni dngos ma

yin// rigs la rig byed mang po dang// dbus la sogs par snang bzhin du// yod pa ma yin med ma yin// yod med las 'das sgyu ma'i sku// snang la rang bzhin ma grub par// thugs rje'i zhal phyag rnam par gsal// che la rags dang phra zhing zhib// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs pa'o// log par sprul ni zhi ba las/ khro bo gtum po'i tshul du byung// sku mdog la sogs dkar po dang// nag la rngams par ston pa dang// ma rungs dur khrod chas chen rnams// dar dang rin chen rgyan dang bcas/ khro zhing gtum par gnas pa la// zhi 'dzum lham me lhan ner ston// de ltar zhi las khro bo dang/ khro bo las ni zhi ba ste// yab nyid yum du gyur pa dang// de bzhin yum nyid yab tu 'gyur// 'khor rnams gnas 'gyur gtso bo'i tshul// gtso bo gnas 'gyur 'khor du snang// de sogs rim pa bsam mi khyab// thugs rje ngang gis
