sprul pa ni// gang yin gtso bo g.yo med kyi// sku gsung thugs las 'od zer gyi// dkar dmar mthing ga'i rnam pa can// dngos dang dngos min 'dra ba yi// sprul pa dpag med bkyes nas ni// snang srid 'jig rten thams cad gang// so sor phrin las sna tshogs byed// yang ni so so'i gnas su thim// de bzhin gcig las gcig sprul zhing// mar me gcig las gcig 'phel bas// thams cad mar mes gang ba dang// sdong po gcig las yal ga 'bum// so sor dgyes pa lta bur sprul// de yang gdul bya'i snang tshul de// zla ba la ni chu snod bzhin// gcig las mang por sprul snang ngo// rnam par 'gyur ba'i sprul pa ni// thugs rje zhal phyag can gyi lha// sprul nas 'khor lo rdo rje dang// rin chen pad+ma rgya gram dang// ral gri kha T+wAM gri gug dang// phur pa dag tu sprul pa dang// sa bon hUM dang hrIHla sogs// yi ge'i rnam par sprul pa dang// de bzhin phyag mtshan yig 'bru las// thugs rje zhal phyag 'dzin pa yi// sku ru nges par ston pa dang// de bzhin me chu la sogs pa'i// 'byung ba'i rnam par sprul pa dang// rgyal blon btsun mo'i rnam pa'am// bran la sogs pa sprul pa ste// gdul bya gang dang gang 'dul ba// de dang de la der sprul nas// 'gro don spyod pa'i rnam 'phrul can// sangs rgyas mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// sprul pa la yang sprul pa dang// der sprul la sogs brjod mtha' yas// rnam par 'gyur ba'i sprul pa rnams// dgongs pa'i klong nas rang byung ba'i// gcig dang du ma'i grangs mtha' zad// rnam par ma nges nges med do// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las// ye shes lha yi gtso 'khor gyi sprul pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// thugs rdol sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sprul pa de las yang sprul

ni// snang srid phyi nang snod bcud kyi// gang stong skye 'bri mang po las// chags 'jig gnas dang stongs sa yi// srid pa'i rtse nas na rag bar// byed pa du mar bcas pa ste// lus dang lus kyi rnam 'gyur dang// ngag dang ngag gi rnam 'gyur dang// sems dang sems kyi rnam 'gyur dang// de las spros pa'i bde dang sdug/ rang babs btang snyoms bcas pa ste// rnam pa du mar snang ba kun// sprul pa de yi yang sprul nyid// bde gshegs snying po'i cho 'phrul te// rang rang so sos byas min par// 'dod 'tshams nyid las rab sbyar nas// skye dang 'gro 'ong lha dang lha// lha rnams nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul// de bzhin byed dang byed pa'o// sna tshogs las kyi bye brag kyang// de yi yang sprul byed pa las// byed pa chu las chu rdol lam// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin no// srid pa 'di dag srin bya yi/ kha chu rang log zad mtha' med// dper na bud med sbrum ma la// bu dang bu mo de la yang// rim bzhin 'phel ba'i 'khrul 'khor ltar// snang srid 'di dag yang sprul te// sprul pa'i sprul pa yin par bya// yang sprul de sprul 'khor lo bskor// des na snang srid rgyal ba yi// dkyil 'khor nyid du shes par bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha yi yang sprul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa'i// sprul pa'i 'khor rnams gus pas nyon// ye shes lha yi rtogs brjod ni// spros na brjod kyis mi lang yang// yang dag don rtogs 'di ltar brjod// e ma ngo mtshar chen po'i dpal// ye shes khro bo bzhad pa las// zhi bar snang zhing srid pa 'dul// mnyam par gnas dang mi gnas med// dkar la dngas dang ser gsal ba// dmar las ljang ba'i rang bzhin sogs/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// sku yi cha las 'od kyi sku// sku dang sku yi rnam pa can// chags pa mi mang bral mi mnga'// gsal dang 'grib pa yong mi mnga'// de bzhin skye dang 'bri med pa// ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje'i ye shes rdo rje 'chang// gzugs kyi rdo rje sra mkhregs pa// 'joms par byed cing 'jig par byed// srid pa'i gnas rnams skem byed pa'i// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid can// bskal pa grangs 'das mun sel ba'i// 'od kyi snying po phyogs kun brdal// bsnyel ba med cing dub pa med// rnam par sra zhing mkhregs pa can// 'jam mnyen 'od kyi gong bur gnas// dkar ser dmar ljang rab tu mkhregs// rgyang dang drung las khyad par bral// gzi brjid dpag tu med bzhin du// blta bar bzod cing gang gis mthong// bzhin gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bye// rnam rol bde ba'i dpal la spyod// ha ha dgyes

pa'i gad mo cher sgrog pa// kun tu tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis khyab// sgra las chos kyi tshig gis kyang// smin par byed dang de grol ba'i// skrag pa med cing zhum pa med// 'bru las don nyid rnam par ston// brjod mtha' yas kyang don mthun spyod// yang mtha' zad pa'i skal dman pa'i// chos nyid skad las rnam kun 'byung// gdul bya 'du ba rab snang grags// rnam rol 'du ba nges par sel// 'bras bu 'byin cing rnam rol ba// de dag dbyangs kyi gar mkhan no// hUM hrIH/ mkha' klong yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// brtse ba'i lcags kyu rnon po yis// srid pa gsum po gdar sha gcod// mkhyen pa'i ral gri 'bar ba yi// 'od kyis ma rungs dra ba gcod// srid pa'i gcod snying drungs nas 'byin// 'gyur med g.yo 'gul bral ba'o// yongs khyab mkha' gsal bcom ldan gyis// mu mthar thug pa stongs byed cing// ri bo thams cad rnam par 'jig khod mnyam chen po ting 'dzin gsal// sku gsum zhing rnams nges par snang// hoHhoHmi bzad rab 'khrugs dpal 'bar ba// ba spu'i mtshon cha rnam par gzengs// ral pa mi bzad mun ltar 'khrigs/ khrag gi rgyun 'dzag gdangs pa'i zhal// nyi ma 'bum gzi'i spyan rnams kyis// bud shing ma lus bsreg par byed// so dang sen mo spu gri yis// gzugs phung thams cad phye mar gtub// sa 'og gnas nas steng gi phyogs// gzir zhing zil gyis gnon byed pa'i// rab tu 'khrug pa'i ye shes kyi// gnam lcags rdo rje 'bar ba las// sprul pa ma rungs rnam par 'joms// bskrad cingabardeg pa'i rnam pa can// rim pa bdun yang rab tu g.yo// steng gi phyogs rnams 'dar zhing 'phrigs// bla 'og tsha ba'i dbal gyis bsreg/ rgyun babs rba klong 'khrugs 'dra ba'i// cho 'phrul rab tu bstan nas kyang// ma lus g.yo bar byed pa'o// nam mkha' khengs pa'i rnam 'gyur can// gzi brjid dpal 'bar 'chang bar byed// ha ha drag tu rgod pa'i gad rgyangs kyis// g.yo bar byed pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// 'brug stong ldir 'dra'i ngar byung nas// he ru ka dpal dbyangs chen sgrogs// ngan byed phra mo rnam par nyams// sa 'og sa steng sa bla yi// rgyu byed yi dwags mang skrag byed// ngan song gnas gsum drungs nas 'byin// rnam rol dpa' shugs rtsal 'chang ba'i/ kha nas 'od 'bar rgya mtsho skem// drang srong dmod pa'i rigs sngags kyang// skad cig se gol gtogs pas bzlog/ rim pa bdun gyi khro bo yang// bsnyil bar byed pa'i nga ro can// hUM hUM brnag cing gzir ba'i rnam pa yis// 'phags pa'i tshogs kyang g.yo bar byed// dran pa rab tu 'phro ba yi// cho 'phrul du mas gang khyab pa// nyid kyi dpal be'u'i dbyings su

sdud// 'joms par byed cing mos par byed// rnam par rab tu gzir bar byed// rgol ba log rtog drungs nas 'byin// nyon mongs tha rgod gnas nas bzlog/ skem byed lcags kyu chen po yis// gnas ngan nges par 'dren pa po// hUM mdzad stobs chen a la la// zhi dang khro dang 'dzum pa dang// ye shes lha dang de yi 'khor// sprul dang yang sprul mdzad pa yi// rnam thar mtha' yas brjod las 'das// thugs chen nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// gsung 'od 'bar ba tshangs pa'i sgra// lhun po sku chen gzi brjid 'bar// ye shes snang ba lam mer gsal// bkod pa du mar ldan pa ste// a la la mchog dgyes par mdzod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha'i rtogs pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// sems dpa' rang byung 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha yi bsgrub tshul ni// rnam pa gcig tu ma nges te// rdzas dang dkyil 'khor la brten nas// dmigs bcas nyid du bsgrub pa dang// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'dun pa bzung ste bsgrub pa dang// snying po srog gi gnad nas bskul// dam tshig dbang gis bsgrub pa dang// dad cing gdung ba'i ngang shugs kyis// rang dbang med par bsgrub pa dang// g.yel ba med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// thang lhod med par bsgrub pa dang// mchod dang bstod pa'i las rim gyis// dgyes pa bskangs nas bsgrub pa ste// de ltar bsgrub tshul rnam drug dang// de las gzhan pa'i grangs snyed kyis// bsgrub tshul rim pa mang bstan pa'i// ye shes lha dang lhan cig bya// dang pos ma dag 'khrul nor spang// gnyis pas shes pa drung nas 'don// gsum pas gsal dag sgra zur 'byung// bzhi pas log rtog the tshom spang// lnga pas nyin mtshan kha sbyar bslab// drug pas bdag 'dzin 'khri ba gcad// dang pos yo byad gtso bor ston// gnyis pas bskyed chog gtso bor ston// gsum pas rtags tshad gtso bor ston// bzhi pas lhag bsam gtso bor ston// lnga pas mtshams gcod gtso bor ston// drug pas longs spyod gtso bor ston// dang pos dus gnad gtan la dbab// gnyis pas ting 'dzin gtan la dbab// gsum pas grangs tshad gtan la dbab// bzhi pas thag chod gtan la dbab// lnga pas bsrung mtshams gtan la dbab// drug pas khrid rim gtan la dbab// de lta bu yi tshul gyis bsgrub// rim dang cig char rnam pa yis// ye shes lha yi bsgrub pa 'bad// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// rang nyid sgo gsum bag yod dang// ye shes lha ni sgrub byed gang// ring por mi thogs 'bras bu 'byung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel

gyi ri bo las/ ye shes lha ji ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha bsgrub dgos pa ni// lus sems dri mar bcas pa rnams// dri med rnam par dag byas nas// snang srid ro mnyam ngang nyid du// bde chen ye shes dag pa yi// snang zhing srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// tshom bu gcig tu grol ba dang// rang rang rgya mtsho'i gnas las sgrol// duHkha rnams las rnam par thar// mchog don 'bras bu brnyes byas nas// sku gsum nyid du yang dag nges// thun mong dngos grub sna tshogs la'ang// zhi bas zhi bar byed pa dang// de bzhin rgyas pas rgyas par byed// dbang gi dbang yul dbang du ste// drag pos dgra bgegs rnams gsod 'gyur// de las gzhan yang las rnams kun// 'bras bu mi zad shugs las 'byung// de las 'og tu rnam par rgyal// sa 'og spyod dang de bzhin du// 'og nas steng du rnam par spyod// mkha' spyod gdon mi za bar 'grub// rang la gzhan dang gzhan la rang// gnyis ka lhan cig nyid 'grub byed// rigs dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang// gnas dang gnas bzang la sogs te// skad cig ma bgrod lhun gyis grub// ci 'dod sa la chig chod du// nges pa'i gdeng dang bcas pas bgrod// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// nying lag las phran bcas pa yang// bsam 'phel yang dag don la reg/ pha rol dman par gyur rnams kyang// skad cig tu ni bdag nyid dang// lhan cig 'bras bu brnyes pa yin// yang dag bsam don gang yin rnams// 'di yis sbyor ro 'dus pa'i 'khor// rnam rol yid gnyis bral ba yi// nges pa can du'ang 'di 'gyur ro// ya nga'i gnas rnams rgyab kyis phyogs// gnas skabs thun mong la brten nas// mthar thug mchog la yang dag reg/ shugs kyis yang dag gang yin yang// thogs pa med par zang thal lo// sgro dang skur pa dang bral zhing// ngo mtshar bstod pa'i gnas su 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad 'bar ba yi// sku yi yon tan thams cad kyang// g.yel ba med par myur du myong// de bzhin gsung dang thugs mchog gi/ yon tan ma lus 'dir rtsol byed// e ma 'di ni bsam mtha' yas// legs pa spel nas nyes par snub// bla med la sogs don 'bras rnams// rang babs lhun gyis grub pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha nye bar bsgrub pa'i dgos pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang 'dus sems pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha bsgrub yon tan 'bras bu ni// gang gis brtson pa'i skyes bu de// lus nyid lha ru gyur nas kyang// tha mal la sogs mngon zhen (8)

bral// gzugs sku rnam pa gnyis gyur pa'i// gzhan don ma brtson lhun gyis grub// ngag kyang yang dag sngags kyi sgra// 'khrul pa'i gtam zungs zad nas kyang// bla med chos kyi sgra sgrogs shing// mi snyan bral nas kun tu yang// snyan cing don mthun yang dag ldan// dgra yi dbang po chos kyi dbyangs// 'brel dang bcas pa rab sgrogs shing// kun tu yang dag go 'byed pa'o// dmyal dang yi dwags dud 'gro dang// mi dang lha min lhar gyur pa'i// so so'i skad du 'di nges nas// chos kyis rnam par grol byed pa// 'di nyid las ni yang dag 'byung// gnas skabs mthar thug don 'bras brnyes// yid kyang de bzhin 'khrul sangs nas// mkhyen dang brtse ba'i rang bzhin gyis// g.yo ba med pa'i 'gro don spyod// gcig la nges gtad mi mnga' zhing// mkha' ltar yongs la khyab pa yis// gang dang gang la de dang der// dgongs pas yongs khyab smin pa dang// grol ba nyid du yang dag nges// bla ma lha dang mkha' 'gro yi// nus pa'i stobs gang 'dir 'dus byed// mdor na lus ngag yid gsum po// sku gsum dkyil 'khor nyid gyur pas// sku gsum zhing du sbyor bar byed// sku gsum ye shes lnga ldan pa'i// bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam chen zhugs// phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes brnyes// de sogs yon tan 'bras bu'i rigs// rab 'bring tha ma'i tshul du ste// yang mtha' nyid las gzhan pa yi// rtsal chen 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha bsgrubs pas grub pa'i yon tan dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang 'dus sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha ma bsgrubs pa'i nyes pa ni// mchog don ye shes lta ci smos// gnas skabs lam gyi 'char tshul yang// 'di nyid bral bar 'grub mi srid// thabs dang bral ba'i 'dre bsgom ni// 'dab gshog chag pa'i mkha' ld-ing bzhin// dmigs pa'i gnas su skyol mi nus// phyi nang snod bcud phung po kun// phung po nyid du gyur nas kyang// 'dod chags la sogs las la spyod// 'khrul zhing 'khor nas 'khor bar 'khor// 'bras bu lha mi'i nye lam tsam// smon pa'i dbang du gyur nas kyang// don gyi smon pa ma yin no// las kyi rtog sgrib 'thas pa'i mthus// zug rngu dang bcas yang yang myong// skye shi la sogs rba rlabs rnams// drag tu g.yo zhing 'khor bar 'khor// las kyi khung nas de mi thon// lha dang sngags kyis ma zin pa'i// skyes bu yang dag skyes bu ni// las kyi zhags pas dam bcings nas// las kyi kha brgyud yang dang yang// 'khrul pa'i lu gu rgyud du 'khor// nyes las rnam par grol min cing// gdan las

'phags par mi 'gyur ro// lha med nyes pa brjod mtha' yas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha ma bsgrubs pa'i nyes pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dbang po dran 'dzin 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha bsgrub brtson pa'i bu// phyi ltar bsgrub pa 'di lta bu// gnas ni rab 'jigs dur khrod gling// dus ni yar tshes bzang po'i tshe// lus ngag yid gsum rtsol ldan pas// dkyil 'khor la sogs rdzas bkram zhing// sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes dang bcas// lha gsal sngags dang bcas te bsgrub// rtags dang mtshan mas gtan la dbab// dad gdung nges shes bskyed nas ni// rang rgyud dul na 'grub pa ste// dngos grub blang sogs la'ang sbyang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha phyi ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yongs 'dzin sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// nang ltar ye shes lha bsgrub ni// bdag lus lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// g.yeng ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// skye med shub bu'i bzlas pa 'bad// rang snang rtogs pa'i gtor mchod 'bul// gsal snang dag pas gtan la dbab// snang srid sgyu mar shes pa na// ye shes lha nyid grub pa ste// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du'i las sbyor brtsam// gang la dmigs pa gnas su sbyor// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha nang ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang ba ltar du lha bsgrub pa// thabs kyi rim pa 'di lta ste// ye gdangs chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// rab gsal 'od kyi lha bkram zhing// skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya// chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor la// g.yo ba med par bsgrub pa yis// bdag gis bdag nyid gtan la phab// 'pho 'gyur med na grub pa ste// gang shar rol pa'i las sbyor bya// snang srid gzhir bzhengs chen por 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha gsang ba ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// sems dpa'i 'khor rnams ma yengs nyon// de bzhin nyid ltar lha bsgrub pa'i// man ngag thabs kyi rgyal po bstan// rang snang dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rtsol bral chen po'i lha bkod de// 'byung 'jug rlung gi bzlas pa 'bad// shugs 'byung rang babs bsgrub pa brtson// 'khrul pa dag nas lha 'grub pas// blang dor bral ba'i las sbyor bya// 'khor 'das gnyis med ro gcig 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi

sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha de kho na nyid ltar bsgrub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dbang po sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// lha mchod thugs dam bskang ba ni// phyi ltar thun mong rdzas kyis mchod// nang ltar dbang po rnam lngas mchod// gsang ba rtog tshogs rig pas mchod// de nyid spros bral dgongs pas mchod// bde stong ro mnyam dbyings su bskang// snang srid gzhir bzhengs chen po'i klong// blang dor bral na thugs dam bskang// bskang bya skong byed bskang ba'i yul// mnyam nyid rol pa chen por bskang// de ltar thugs dam bskangs pa yis// 'bras bu mchog dang thun mong kun// ye shes lha dgyes rtsol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha mchod cing thugs dam skong ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams kun// bdag nyid lha bsgom 'di lta ste// gzhi gnas ye shes dbang po yi// steng 'og phyogs bcur mi blta zhing// nang du bkug pas ar la gtad// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// ye shes lha yi rol pa ste// ma skyes rang gsal lam me ba// thugs rje zhal phyag rgyan dang bcas// rang babs lhug par bzhag pa la// dad pa'i dbang po gsal gdab pas// snang ba yab la stong pa yum// gnyis med zung 'jug chen po'i dbyings// gsal 'grib 'pho 'gyur med par blta// ngo bo bla mar gnas pa la// rang bzhin yi dam lha skur bzhengs// thugs rje 'gag med mkha' 'gror snang// bdag nyid las min lha med pas// ye grub babs su la thag bcad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ bdag nyid ye shes kyi lhar gsal ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs ma yengs nyon// mdun du ye shes lha bskyed na// pho brang rin chen gzhal yas khang// gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas// tshangs khang 'od kyi dra bas sbrel// sgrib g.yogs med par phyi nang gsal// rang bzhin 'od lnga 'khrigs pa'i dbus// sa bon yig 'bru phyag mtshan la// mngon par lhag pa'i sku bsgom zhing// gtso bo 'khor gyi sum 'gyur la// yang 'khor de yi phyed phyed gsal// rgyan dang cha lugs rnam par bkra// ngo bo bla ma chos sku las// rang bzhin yi dam longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje sprul sku mkha' 'gro ma// rnam grangs dam tshig rdzogs par gsal// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pa'i// 'od dang 'od zer 'phro 'dur bcas// rang snang dag pas gsal bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud

shel gyi ri bo las/ mdun bskyed ye shes kyi lha bsgom pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sems dpa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dam tshig sems dpa'i ngo bo ni// mos bsgyur blo yis bskyed pa ste// rkang grangs mtshan dang bcas pa ste// gtso bo nyid dang de yi yum// 'khor dang de yi yang 'khor dang// so sor tshom bur bcas nas ni// tshom bu dgu ru rnam par nges// spyi bo la sogs gnas rnams su// A+oM sogs yi ge'i 'bru rnams bkram// sngon gyi rjes bzung tha tshig ltar// dam tshig dbang gis bskyed rnams so// rang las byung zhing rang nyid dang// dam tshig gcig tu gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha dam tshig pa bskyed par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang shar sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya ba// gdod nas dag pa chos kyi sku// rang byung rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// shar grol sprul sku 'gro ba 'dul// rang babs byin rlabs bla ma mchog/ dngos grub gshis ster yi dam lha// phrin las rmad byung mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// snang ba'i rang bzhin yab kyi cha// stong pa'i bdag nyid yum mchog ste// mnyam par gnas pa zhi ba'i sku// hur byung thol skyes khro skur bzhengs// rol pa'i ye shes zhi ma khro// de dag gdod nas lhun gyis grub// byas bcos byung ba de ma yin// ye nas shes rig rgyal por snang// de phyir ye shes sems dpa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha ye shes sems dpa'i bzhugs tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang grol 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa// lha gnyis dbyer med bsre ba'i tshul// chu la chu bzhag ci bzhin du// de bzhin nyid la 'od kyi tshul// phan tshun tha dad ma yin par// dbyer med du ma ro gcig nyid// yin par shes shing yin tshul du// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta// bsre bya sre byed med pa dang// gzhag bya 'jog byed med pa ste// 'on kyang gnas skabs yul don du// bskyed pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' la// dbyings nas ye shes sems dpa' bkug/ chu la chu thim lta bur bsre// de bsres ngang bsgom lhug par bzhag/ 'di kun thabs kyi yan lag ste// gdul bya 'gro ba 'dren phyir spro// kun kyang yang dag dgongs don spyod// cho ga'i yan lag ji bzhin pa// sprul pa rnams kyis spro bar gyis// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ lha dam tshig pa dang ye shes pa bsre ba'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o//

a+thi+-i/// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs nyon// dam tshig ye shes sems dpa' gnyis// dbang bskur rgya yis 'di ltar gdab// rnam snang mi bskyod 'od dpag med// rin 'byung don yod grub pa ste// rigs rnams kun gyi gtso bo mchog/ sangs rgyas mnga' bdag rigs kyi lha// ji ltar snang ba'i rigs rnams la// rgyal thabs spyi blug rang dbang bskur// dag pa gsum gyis rgyas btab pas// 'bras bu sku lnga ye shes lnga// phung khams skye mched gnas dag nas// rang rang rigs kyis dbu brgyan nas// rigs bdag bdag po nyid kyis mtshan// 'od dpag med sogs de bzhin gshegs// dbang bskur rgyas gdab mtshon pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha dang rol pa gcig pa'i dbyings su dbang bskur rgyas gdab tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// de ltar bstan pa'i lha rnams kyi// rgyu mtshan rnam grangs dpag med kyang// gcig tu dril nas don ston pa// snod kyi 'jig rten la sogs pa// sgyu ma'i lus nyid gnas dag phyir// bzhugs gnas pho brang gzhal yas bstan// bcud kyi sems can gnas dag cing// sems nyid lha ru gnas gyur pas// ye shes lha yi rnam par bstan// gdul bya smin grol lam bgrod phyir// ye shes bla ma'i ngo bor bstan// dgos 'dod re ba bskang ba'i phyir// yi dam zhi dang khro bor bstan// phrin las dmigs su bsgyur ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro rol pa chen por bstan// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel phun tshogs phyir// de ltar 'phro 'du sna tshogs bstan// rtsa rlung thig le'i ngo bo yang// gzhal yas lha dang bcas pa bstan// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// rang byung ye shes lha yi ngang// ye shes rab rdzogs sku lnga'i zhing// spros bral lhun grub phyag rgya'i zhing// gzhi snang dag pa chos kyi dbyings// lhag med nyid du mya ngan 'das// sgra dang 'od du bcas nas kyang// sku gsum zhing du mngon du 'byung// gdul bya rnams la lhag mar bcas// sku gdung ring bsrel bzhag nas kyang// gzhan phan thabs kyis 'gro ba rnams// rim gyis 'dren par des byed do// yang mtha' bar do nyid du yang// rang snang ye shes lha dang phrad// rang ngo shes nas rnam par grol// de yang rgyu 'bras de yis yin// sprul pa las kyang sprul pa'i sku// sku dang mtshan dpes rab spras shing// las dag zhing la rab snang bas// byang chub mngon du de 'gyur zhing// de sogs dpal dang yang dag ldan// spyi phud nyid du snang bar byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ ye shes kyi lha bsgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste

nyer dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// de ltar 'khor gyis zhus pa'i don// dpag med rgyal pos rab gsungs pas// sems dpa' gzugs kyi rdo rje dang// sgra yi rdo rje dri rdo rje// ro dang reg bya'i rdo rje dang// sems dpa' chos kyi rdo rje sogs// gdul byar gyur pa'i 'khor rnams la// tshims par gyur pa'i don gsungs pas// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// rangs pa'i sems kyis spyi bos 'dud// lha dang mi dang lha min dang// klu dang rig sngags 'chang la sogs// 'jig rten pa rnams yi rangs shing// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi sku rgyud shel gyi ri bo las/ rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sprul pa/ rang byung du babs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shel gyi ri bo rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis/ sgra rang 'gyur du bkod pa'o// d+ha thim/ sprul sku sangs rgyas gling pas snga dkar dung gi sgo mo nas gdan drangs pa'i zab chos phyogs dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/ / u rgyan gsang ba brda skad du bstan pa/ rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba wA ka tan+t+ra rat+na gar+dz+dzi ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das chos gsung smra ba'i dbang po gzi brjid rgyal po mtha' yas pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam par rgyan bkod mdzes pa yi// pho brang gzhal yas brtsegs pa na// mdzes byed rma bya'i khri steng du// ston pa dpag med rgyal po dang// dpa' bo bde sbyor mnyam bzhugs nas// dgongs pa chen po bzhugs pa'i tshe// nyid kyi sprul pa las byung ba'i// bde bar rol pa'i 'khor rnams kyis// snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad zhus// e ma ston pa bcom ldan 'das// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang// yang dag ljags kyi pad+ma las// mnyam dbyangs chen po'i dpal mnga' ba'i// g.yang sa chen po gcod mdzad cing// sngags kyi sprin char 'bebs pa po// brtse ba'i thugs kyis 'dir dgongs shig/ ye shes dbyings kyi lha rnams kun// nye bar bsgrub par byed pa la// snying po sngags kyi bzlas brjod rnams// nges pa'i don du stsal du gsol// de yang sngags kyi ngo bo dang// nges tshig dbye ba rnam grangs dang// sngags dngos bgrang tshul bsnyen pa'i tshad// drod rtags dang ni bzlas pa'i tshe// dag dang ma dag skyon yon dang// sngags kyi bsgrub tshul rim pa rnams// ljags kyi

dbang po bkram nas kyang// bdag cag yid kyi 'dod pa rnams// dus 'dir skong bar mdzad du gsol// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// mchog don bsgrub 'dod rnal 'byor pas// ye shes lha dang dbyer med du// bsre bar 'dod na sngags la brtson// sngags pas sngags la mi brtson pa// sems kyi re ba skong mi 'gyur// gang gis sngags la brtson byed na// sngags kyi ngo bo ngos zin gces// de bzhin sngags kyi nges tshig kyang// gnad du che bas shes pa gces// sngags kyi dbye ba ma shes na// rang gis rang nyid 'ching bar 'gyur// rnam grangs ma shes sngags zlo ba// mun nag 'thom 'gros byed dang mtshungs// sngags dngos ngo yis ma zin na// sol ba gser du bsgrub dang mtshungs// sngags kyi bgrang tshul ma shes na// mtshon med g.yul du zhugs dang mtshungs// bsnyen tshad gtan la ma phebs na// nad ngos ma zin sman pa 'dra// sngags zlos drod rtags ma shes na// tshod med mda' rgyang 'phen pa 'dra// sngags kyi skyon yon ma shes na// dug dang 'dres pa'i kha zas 'dra// sngags kyi bsgrub tshul ma shes na// long bas long ba khrid byed 'dra// des na de dag rim pa rnams// shes par gyur pa'i sngags pa yis// lha bsgrub bsngags la 'bad pa na// stobs dang nus pa bsam mi khyab// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa'i// ji ltar yid la 'dod pa rnams// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i longs spyod kun// sngags la brtson pas 'grub gyur na// 'jig rten longs spyod smos ci dgos// des na snang srid 'khor 'das kyi// cho 'phrul nus stobs sngags kyis byed// sngags kyi nus stobs bsam mtha' yas// de phyir sngags pas sngags la brtson// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// ye shes lha rnams bsgrub pa la// snying po sngags kyi ngo bo bstan// yengs 'khrul med par yid kyis zung// ye shes lha sngags ngo bo dang// 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo ste// ye shes lha sngags la yang gsum// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro ste// bla ma bla na gnyan po'i gtso// spyi phud dkon mchog rin chen pas// yongs kyi thog mar byung bas gces// de dag sngags kyi ngo bo ni// gdung bas gsol ba btab pa'i don// brjod pa sngags su byung ba ste// ngo bo g.yel ba mi mnga' bar// rjes su 'dzin pa byed pa'o// yi dam zhi ba khro bo dang// zhi ma khro dang rnam pa gsum// zhi ba g.yo med ting 'dzin ni/ khyab gdal chen po kun la spro/ 'di bsgrub tshangs pa'i gnas gzhir 'gyur// ngo bo 'gyur med dgongs pa'i

klong// yengs 'khrul bral bar bsngags pa'o/ khro bo rngam byed rab gtum pa// rdo rje 'bar ba ma rungs 'joms// 'di bsgrub 'byung po la sogs pa// ma rungs pa rnams skrag cing byer// ngo bo rtsub khro gtum pa ste// gnod byed dgra bgegs gnyen por bsngags// zhi khro las rnams yongs kyi bdag/ zhi bar 'dod pa zhi ba dang// de bzhin khro bar 'dod la khro// gang yang rgyas par byed pa dang// dbang mdzad dbang gi rgyal po ste// drag po rab tu drag par byed// ngo bo gang la'ang 'jug pa ste// sna tshogs las la bsngags pa'o// de ltar zhi dang khro la sogs// yi dam lha yi sa bon dang// snying po sngags su 'byung ba'i phyir// sngags kyi ngo bo yang dag brjod// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi ngo bo ni// srog gnad gnad nas bskul nas kyang// phrin las dmigs su bskul byed te// bka' nyan gus phyir bsngags pa'o// las byed pho nya bran gyi tshul// gang dang gang la 'jug byed pa// de dang de yi las la bsngags// dregs pa gtum dang dregs byed rngam// gang yang mkha' 'gro shugs kyis 'gro// srog yig gnad nas bos pa'i tshe// dbang tshig dbang gis dbang med du// de phyir dgug dang 'khril ba dang// 'du 'bral med par 'grogs pa dang// bka' nyan las la bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten lha sngags ngo bo la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum// phyi ltar snang srid lha 'dre rnams// gnad nas bskul zhing las la rbad// dbang med bran du bkol ba'i phyir// gnad 'bebs dag tu bsngags pa'o// nang ltar dregs pa sde brgyad rnams// dpal gyi pho nya las mkhan du// gnyer gtad gang dmigs gnas su rgyug/ dam la gnas phyir srog nas 'dren// dam la gnas phyir bsngags pa'o// gsang ba rnal 'byor rang nyid dang// lhan cig dag tu skyes nas kyang// rtag tu 'bral med 'grogs byed cing// bsrung dang mgon skyabs byed pa dang// gnod cing 'tshe bar byed pa rnams// bsgral zhing bzlog pa'i mthu dpung can// de dag g.yel bar mi byed cing// dam la gnas nas bka' bzhin bsgrub// gnyer gtad las byed bran du 'gyur// 'dzin pa'i lcags kyu bya ba'i phyir// ming dang srog nas 'bod cing bsgrub// gzer du gdab phyir bsngags pa'o// mdor na sngags kyi ngo bo shes// ming dang srog nas drangs byas te// dam la gnas par byed pa dang// rang rang gnyen por rab bsngags pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi ngo bo bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// gzugs sgra la sogs 'dus pa'i 'khor// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi nges tshig bstan gyis nyon// bla ma'i

sngags kyi nges tshig ni// thugs rje skul bar byed pa'o// yi dam sngags kyi nges tshig ni// dngos grub skul bar byed pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi nges tshig ni// las la bsngags pa byed pa'o// gang dang gang gi srog sngags rnams// bsnyen cing bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni// dngos su mthong dang cho 'phrul ston// rtags dang mtshan ma ngos bstan nas// 'dod pa'i don gang 'grub pas na// bzlas pa sngags kyi nges tshig yin// ming dang srog gi yi ge dang// mtha' bsgyur las kyi yi ge dang// log gnon gnad kyi yi ge rnams// bzlas dang bris dang bcangs la sogs// gang dang gang byas de dang de'i// las 'grub sngags kyi nges pa'i tshig/ don rab dbye bas shes par bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi nges tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// sprul sras 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi dbye ba bstan par bya// bla ma'i mtshan nas 'bod pa dang// thugs srog gnad nas bskul ba dang// dam tshig gnyen po bsten pa dang// dgyes pa skongs par byed pa'i sngags// bla ma'i mtshan nas 'bod pa'i sngags// sgra don sngags kyi 'gyur dbus su// saM skr-i ta yi skad las drangs// g+hu ru ma hA bo d+hi sogs// rang rang mtshan spel smos pa'am// rang rang bod skad la sogs kyis// gdung bas 'bod cing mtshan nas drangs// mos gus bskyed de gsol ba gdab// byin rlabs smin grol don 'bras sbyin// rang gzhan bde la 'god par 'gyur// thugs srog gnad nas bskul sngags ni// sku gsung thugs kyi srog yin te// oM AHhUM gi sgra las drangs// yid kyi gsung ba bskyed bya zhing// ngag nas thugs dam bskul bar bya// ma yengs chu rgyun lta bu yis// gnad nas bskul bas rjes 'dzin 'gyur// dam tshig gnyen po bstan pa'i sngags// sa ma ya las drangs nas kyang// g+hu ru'i skad kyis mtshams sbyar te/ A+oM dang swA hA'i thems su gzhug/ dam tshig gnyen po dgyes dgongs shing// don 'bras myur du stsol bar 'gyur// dgyes pa skongs par byed pa'i sngags// tshig don gang gis 'gyur skad las// gdung zhing snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bya// bstod bsngags la sogs gang rigs kyis// brda dang rtags kyi sgo nas kyang// de dag gis ni rab dgyes pas// bdag gi 'dod pa'i don 'bras 'grub// de yang hUM hrIH'i gdangs dang ni// e ma hoHla sogs pa yi// 'dren dang bcas pa shes pa yin// mdor na bla ma'i mtshan smos pa// bod kyi skad dang rgya gar skad// gnad srog yi ge 'bru gsum pa'o// rgyas gdab 'dren dang bcas par brjod// dad dang

ldan pa sus brtson pas// bla ma'i sku gsung thugs dang ni// rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po// dbyer med gyur nas nus stobs mnyam// rang gzhan don 'bras ci 'dod pa// myur du 'grub phyir shes pa gnad// yi dam sngags kyi dbye ba yang// spyi dang bye brag rnam mang zhing// spyir ni srog sngags mtshan sngags dang// dam tshig sngags dang las kyi sngags// las la 'jug pa'i sngags dang ni// nges med dmod spel smon lam sngags// srog sngags rang rang sa bon las// sgyur byed yi ge dbyangs gsal can// gnad la dbab par byed rnams yin// de yang A+oM dang hUM phaT kyis// thems la bcug nas bgrang ba'o// mtshan sngags d+he wa zhes pa'am// lha yi mtshon byed mtshon gyi grangs// saM skr-i ta yi skad las drangs// thog mtha' can gyi thems la gzhug/ dam tshig sngags ni mtshan sngags mthar// sa ma ya yi sgra las drangs// las sngags de dag rnams kyi gsham// shIn+taM puSh+tIM la sogs pa'i// so sor gang 'dod las sngags gdags// yang yang ar la gtad pa gnad// las la 'jug par byed pa la// sngags mthar b+h+yo dang rbad sogs btags// hring hring dung dung gnad nas bskul// rgyug rgyug breng breng bcas pa ste// mtha' can rdzogs pa las 'jug sngags// myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// nges med dmod mo spel tshig dang// smon lam mtha' bsgyur bcas pa'i sngags// 'di dag dam tshig cha la gtogs// las myur brda yi sngags yin pas// gang 'dod gdags pa gnad yin cing// go rim ma log gces pa yin// mdor na yid la dam byed pa// spang blang med pa gnad dang ni// dam tshig dag las ma g.yos na// yi dam myur 'grub bsam gtan 'phel// bye brag yi dam lha yi sngags// gang la dmigs pa'i lha rnams kyi// rtsa sngags so sor nor 'khrul med// srog 'dren dang ni mtshan sngags te// skyes pa'i sa bon la sogs pa'i// gang yin sor gzhag dam du bcing// mdor na spyi dril rtsa ba dang// yan lag bcas pa 'di ltar ste// oM AHhUM hrIHbadzra g+hu ru pad+ma sid+d+hi d+he wa DAk+ki ni/ bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ma hA su kha/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ shIn+taM ka/ hrIHma hA ri ni sa/ ra tsa hrIHya/ sarba sid+d+hi/ kA ya wA ka tsit+ta/ dz+nyA na sa twa/ a mi de wa/ ma ma tsit+ta saM b+ha wa a d+hiSh+Tha naM/ ma ma A yur+dz+nyA na/ sid+d+hi pha la hUM swA hA/ dper na de 'dra'i tshul gyis ni// las grub spyi dril yin pa'i phyir// chu rgyun lta bur 'bad pa'i don// yang sras sems kyi gdeng 'cha' ba// bde legs yon tan spel bar byed// rang rang snying po'i mtshan don bcas// thog mtha' dbu zhabs thems la gzhug/ de ni yang dag gdams pa'o// de sogs bye brag gang yin pa// mkhas pas shes par byed pa gnad// mkha' 'gro rnams

kyi sngags la ni// srog yig ha ri ni sa la// las sngags mA ra ya sogs kyi// sham bur bcas pa las kyi sngags// DAk+ki ni yi sgra bzhin du// ming don gnad nas skul byed pa// thems dang bcas pas brtson pa ni// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par byed// dmod mor bcas pa'i sngags 'byung bas// dam tshig 'grel bar las la sbyar// phyi rol pa dang nang pa yi/ khyad par mgo mjug gnyis las byung// nga ro dang ni tsheg drag can// na maHtad+ya thA las drangs// sa bon srog nas 'dren pa yang// rgyan dang bcas pa yi ger 'byung// de sogs nang pa'i sngags la ste// bram ze dang ni drang srong gi/ dmod sngags las yin thun mong pa// thun mong la 'jug gzhan las min// nga ro bral ba'i rgyan yig dang// bsdus pa'i yi ge ma dag rnams// nor ba yin gyi sngags pa min// las byed gnad la dbab pa yi// sngags dkrug bzlog pa la sogs rnams// bye brag phra mo'i sbyor ba bstan// lugs 'byung nang nas lugs bzlog bstan// de dag rnams kyi bye brag kyang// sgra dang dbyangs gsal don la 'byung// mkhas pas 'byin 'jug shes par bya// mdor na spyi dang bye brag gi/ sngags kyi dbye ba bsam mi khyab// phal cher las kyi byed pa gtso// las grub 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir// sngags rnams klong kyang yang dag ste// 'bras bu mi 'byin sngags nor ba'i// zab zab 'dra yang mi brjaud spang// gnad kyis zin pa'i ting 'dzin dang// nor 'khrul med cing sel ma zhugs// sngags dang bcas nas lha bsgrub pas// don 'bras bla med mchog la reg/ brjod pa rlung gi 'byung 'jug kun// A li kA li'i sngags kyi sgra// tha mal ngag gi sgra don dag/ de la 'dris par sus byas pas// longs spyod sku ru rnam par grol// rlung gi gnad dang mi ldan zhing// sngags nor sgra tshig ma dag pa// lhag chad sel zhugs log par ltung// 'bras bu duHkha nyid du 'gyur// de phyir las dang las kyi rigs// rmad byung skrag pa med pa'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// las rnams sngags kyis 'grub pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang sprul rig pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sngags kyi rnam grangs mtha' yas kyang// bla ma dang ni yi dam lha// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi sngags la 'dus// de don sngags kyi rnam grangs brjod// bla ma'i sngags kyi rnam grangs la// nges pa can dang nges pa med// grangs dang yang dag de bzhin te// nges can rang rang gzhung las drangs// rgyud don gnad dang bcas pa'o/ nges med rang rang thabs kyi blos// mtshan nas gzhi blangs

bsgrub nas kyang// oM dang hUM sogs thems bcug pas// rigs 'dra dbyangs gsal las bsgyur zhing// dag par bya ba'i sngags byung ba'o// drang don sngags kyi rnam pa ni// gang zag 'dod can don slad du// 'gyur can smon lam dag pas bya// dad pas kun nas bslang rnams so// yang dag de bzhin nyid kyi sngags// spros dang bral ba'i rnal 'byor pas// de nyid sngags kyi gnad ldan zhing// rlung gi yon tan mthar phyin te// rol pa sngags la mkhas pa'o// swA hA A+oM sogs sgra med kyang// sngags kyi nus pa don 'bras gang// rtsol med shugs las 'byung ba'o// yi dam lha sngags rnam grangs las// spyi dril dang ni so so ba// spyi dril d+he wa la sogs dang// sa ma ti yi sgra yis bsgyur// gcig 'grub rgyal ba yongs 'grub pa'i// rnam grangs gcig la 'dus pa yin// so sor byung ba'i lha sngags kyi// rnam grangs dpag tu med 'byung ba'i// rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams dang// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rmad po che yi rigs// rdo rje can gyi sngags byung ba// rang gnad srog yig bcas pa'o// gang yang dngos grub 'byin sogs kyi// sngags thems mtha' bsgyur mang po 'byung// grangs snyed ye shes klong 'byung zhing// gzhi 'bras lam srong du ma'o// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi rnam grangs la// 'byung ba rnams kyi sgra las kyang// DAk+ki rang gnad srog sngags 'byung// dus kyi sbyor ba dang bcas pa'i// thabs dang shes rab spyod pa'i shugs// thams cad DAk+ki'i sngags kyi grangs// gnad kyi zin pa'i sngags pa yis// mkha' 'gro'i srog gnad rang sngags rnams// rang babs nyid las rang grags pas// rlung gi shugs dang bcas pa yin// de phyir sngags kyi rnam grangs ni// sgra yi rnam pa kun las 'byung// rang byung ma 'gags rtsal chen pas// las rnams shugs las 'byung ba yang// de dang de yi gnad kyis yin// de dang ldan par sus byas pas// mkha' 'gro ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub// mdor na bla ma'i sngags kyi grangs// dad dang mos gus ldan pas zin// yi dam rnams kyi sngags grangs kyang// brtson 'grus ldan pas nges par zin// mkha' 'gro'i sngags kyi rnam grangs kun// dam tshig lag nas skyes bu yis// zin 'gyur de las gzhan du min// yan lag rnam grangs phra mo kun// de dag klong las rang byung 'gyur// tshig med rnam grangs mang po kun// sngags kyi rnam grangs ma yin pas// grangs su gtogs par mi 'gyur ro// gnad la yang dag 'byung bas na// sa bon srog yig re res kyang// ci 'dod 'bras bu 'byung ba'i phyir// tshig la mi ltos don

la ltos// don ldan sngags kyi rnam grangs kun// gcig la yang dag rdzogs pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi rnam grangs bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang shar rig pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sngags rnams dngos kyi rim pa ni// bla ma lha dang mkha' 'gro sogs// gang dang gang gi sngags bzla ba// thog mar kun la oM gyi 'jug/ de bzhin na mar 'jug pa dang// ta d+ya thA dang na mo dang// dkrug dang bzlog pa nges med par// spyi gzhung rnams kyis gtan dbab par// sngags brten tha ma hUM dang phaT// gnyis ka dang ni swA hA dang// hring dang b+h+yo dang rbad nan dang// dzaHla sogs pa rnam mang gis// mtha' brten bcas pa'i thems par du// gang dang gang rigs gtems pa yi// sngags rnams dang ni dmod mo dang// smon lam la nye bcas pa kun// sngags dngos yin pas shes par bzung// gzhan yang las kyi rnam grangs ni// sngags la nges med bsam mi khyab// thog mtha' med rnams sngags min zhing// drang srong rnams dang bram ze sogs// las kyi dmod sngags zhes byar grags// thun mong las kyi sgrub byed la// sngags kyi rigs byed mang du 'byung// yig 'bru gcig pa'i sngags 'byung ba// de dag gang byung skye med sngags// rang gnad srog gi sngags su bshad// srog gi yi ge bsgrig pa rnams// sa bon las la 'jug pa'i sngags// tshig la ma spro gnad la gzir// rang srog snying por bgrang ba'i sngags// dam tshig yi ge'i sngags yin zhing// mda' mdung la sogs so gcig pas// drag bsnun gang yin rnam par nyams// rdo gcig gis ni bya tshogs skrod// de bzhin srog gnad 'bru sngags kyis// rgyal po las byed gcig thub yin// don med sngags 'bru grangs mang yang// sngags min sngags kyi don la gol// gsang sngags rig sngags gzugs sngags sogs// sngags rnams gang la'ang gtogs min pa'i// sngags kyi gseb nas dbyung bar bya// 'khrul med mtshan nas grangs pa yi// sngags rnams ma nor gnad la gzir// don 'bras 'grub 'gyur yid gnyis med// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las// sngags dngos bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yid kyi sems dpa' la sogs pa'i// rang byung 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// bzlas pa sngags kyi bgrang tshul la// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de nyid du ni bgrang tshul te// de la spy-i dang bye brag gnyis// spyir ni phyi ltar bgrang ba'i tshul// gsal la dag cing snyan pa yis// mchu sbyor sdebs dang bcas nas ni// phreng bas grangs tshad gtan la

dbab// nang ltar sngags kyi bgrang tshul ni// rdo rje shub bur bzlas nas kyang// don ma nor bar lce steng bsgril// drod dang mtshan mas gtan la dbab// gsang ba ltar du bgrang tshul ni// rang byung rlung gi 'gro 'ong dang// sprad pa'i bzlas pa nyer brtson te// phyi ru byung dang nang du 'jug khong du gnas pa rnam gsum gyi// rgyun chad med par 'khor lo'i tshul// bar mtshams med par bskor ba yis// rang gnad gtan la dbab par bya// de nyid sngags kyi bgrang tshul ni// skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste// rang byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du las// rang babs gshis kyis gtan la dbab// sgra sgrags sngags kyi rol pa las// lhun grub rang rtsal 'bras bu smin// rtsol dang bral ba'i bzlas pa yis// rtsol bral rang byung ye shes brnyes// bye brag sngags kyi bgrang tshul ni// bla ma la ni mos gus kyi// gdung ba drag tu bskyed pa yis// gsol 'debs nga ro 'o dod 'bod// yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin ngar// gsal dag snying po sngags 'dzab sgrogs// mkha' 'gro ngar bskyed brtul zhugs dbyung// 'brug stong ldir 'dra'i drag sngags sgrogs// de ni phyi yi bgrang tshul te// thun mong las rnams myur 'grub 'gyur// rang dang bla ma dbyer med bsre// brjod tshig gal ma mchis su bskur// gsol 'debs gdung shugs mchi ma bklag/ smra sgo bsdams shing brjod pa skyung// yi dam nang gsal lus la bkram// 'gro 'ong rlung gi 'gros dang bstun// srog sngags sgra med shub bur bzlas// lus gnad g.yo med gtan la dbab// mkha' 'gro snang srid rol par blta// smra brjod thams cad sngags su shes// phrin las 'phro 'du'i dmigs pa bsgyur// gang shar rang lugs gshis la dbab// de ni nang gi bgrang tshul te// mchog dang thun mong las mi 'gyang// 'khrul phyir yul gyi spros pa bcad// rang sems chos sku bla mar blta// 'byung 'jug gnas gsum rlung la bslab// tha mal ngag gi sgra brjod spong// phung khams skye mched lhar shes pas// brjod pa sngags kyi rang sgrar grol// A+oM sogs yig 'bru yid la bkram// dus kyi sa mtshams bcad du med// bdag lus 'byung ba'i grong khyer ni// ye byung mkha' 'gro'i cho 'phrul nyid// kun 'byung klong nas rang sgra sngags// ngag yid 'khrul pa gtan nas zad// de ni gsang ba'i bgrang tshul te// de dag gang gi brtson pa yi// skyes bu tha mal las sad nas// 'bras bu mchog la myur du reg/ g.yo ba med pa'i ngang nyid nas// 'khrul pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gsal// yengs pa med pa'i bzlas sngags bsgrub// gtang gzhag med par nus pa smin// lus nyid lha la ngag nyid sngags// yid chos 'pho 'gyur med par grol// bla ma

yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// sngags kyi bgrang tshul bla na med// 'bras bu ye grub gdeng chen rnyed// bgrang tshul phyi nang gsang gsum dang// de nyid sngags kyi bgrang tshul las// g.yo med don chen 'grub par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi bgrang tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang sprul sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs kun// ye shes lha sngags bsnyen pa'i tshad// bstan phyir ma yengs gus par nyon// gtso 'khor dang ni sprul pa dang// yang sprul rnams kyi bsnyen tshad la// grangs kyi tshad dang dus kyi tshad// rtags kyi tshad dang rnam pa gsum// grangs tshad gang yin gtso bo yi// snying po dag la 'bru 'bum ste// ming don sngags las de bzhin las// sa bon srog sngags de bcu 'gyur// 'khor gyi bsnyen pa 'bru khri ste// las kyi sngags la de las 'gyur// gnyis dang gsum sogs las dang bstun// rang gnad 'khor gyi srog sngags la'ang/ khri la lnga 'gyur bzlas pas 'grub// 'on kyang sngags dang rnal 'byor gyi// dgra grogs khams dang bstun pa yi// grogs phrad 'bring la nang phrad rab// dgra dang phrad na tha ma ste// de yis 'gyur tshul mkhas pas dpyad// rab la rkyang pa 'bring khug pa// tha ma dag ni spang ba'am// yang na 'dun pa bsgyur bas 'grub// pha rol dgra la rang nyid grogs// de ni rab tu spang ba gces// rang nyid dgra la pha rol grogs// de byung bsten par btub tsam la// yang dag 'bras bu 'gyangs par 'gyur// sprul pa la ni ma nges pas// yang sprul de bas nges pa med// la la gtso bo nyid dang mnyam// la la brgya stong 'grub pa'ang srid// ci phyir sprul pa yin phyir ro// dus kyi bsnyen tshad bstan pa ni// rang rang las kyi 'phen pa dang// dus gnad 'khor dang yo byad dang// gnas kyi khyad par la sogs dang// brtson 'grus dang ni dbang po'i khyad// rab 'bring tha ma'i khyad par las// la la bdun zhag la sogs dang// de bzhin la la zla ba bdun// la la lo bdun la sogs dang// ji skad skal ba dman pas kyang// dung phyur dag gi dus tshad las// nyi khri de bzhin mtshan khri yis// bcu gcig lo la 'bras bu 'byung// la la bdun phrag bdun 'das nas// thun mong las kyi bya ba 'grub// de bzhin nyin zhag phrugs gcig ste// skya rengs kha sprod las la 'jug/ mdor na dus kyi tshad rnams la// 'pho 'jug gnas stongs khyad par gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel nyid dang bstun// phyi dus dang ni nang gi dus// rtsa dang rlung gi khyad par las// 'jug pa'i thig le grangs su bcad// de shes pa yis dus mi 'gyang// gtso bos mchog

don ster bar byed// de la dus gnad bsring bar bya// 'khor gyi thun mong las grub pas// de la dus tshad grangs tshad sbyar// yang 'khor sprul dang yang sprul gyi// bsnyen pa'i dus tshad gzung du med// de yi mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag/ rtags kyis bsnyen tshad bzung ba ni// rab la dngos dang 'bring la nyams// tha ma rmi lam dag la 'byung// mchog la chos kyi sku yi rtags// 'bring la longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rtags// tha ma la ni sprul sku'i rtags// rab la mchog rtags 'bring po la// thun mong ye shes grub rtags dang// tha ma la ni thun mong gi/ las kyi 'bras bu 'byung ba'i rtags// go rim ma log rim par 'byung// rten can rten la rten med rten// yang dag don rten la sogs pa// rtags kyis bsnyen pa tshad pheb 'gyur// lhag dang chad dang nor ba dang// 'khrul par 'byung dang go log dang// log pa'i rtags rnams 'byung ba ste// nus med brda ngan du ma dang// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid gsum po// nyams shing rgud pa du ma 'byung// de byung mkhas pas lugs 'byung dang// lugs bzlog sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bcas// drag po'i las la gzud par bya// skong dang bshags dang gtor ma'i las// me dang mchod sbyin las la 'bad// grangs kyi tshad la grangs tshad bzung// dus kyi tshad ni dus gnad dbab// rtags la rtags rnams ngo yis bzung// des ni bsnyen pa mthar phyin nas// sngags rnams gtan la phebs nas kyang// ye shes lha dang mjal bar 'gyur// de brnyes las kyi 'bras bu 'byung// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha 'dre ni// ngang gis bka' nyan bran du 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rang byung rig pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// brtson 'grus ldan pa'i sngags pa yis// lha sngags tshad la phebs pa'i rtags// sngags kyi drod rtags 'byung tshul ni// legs par bshad kyis yid la bzung// mchog gi rtags dang thun mong rtags// las kyi kha bsgyur ran pa'i rtags// de las gzhan pa log min rtags// nges med nges pa can gyi rigs// dang po mchog gi drod rtags ni// lus dngos lha ru krong gis song// 'khrul pa zad nas ye shes brnyes// rnam par smin pa'i lus dag nas// 'gyur med g.yung drung rdo rje'i sku// skye ba ma 'phos grub pa dang// rang bsgyur sgra yi mngon shes thob// chos rnams ma bslabs ngang gis shes// gzhan gyi shes pa sgyur bar byed// skad cig lag pa brkyang bskum la// zhing khams dpag med nyul ba dang// sprul pa du mar 'gyed par nus// bskyed sdud cho 'phrul dpag med 'gyed// rang la rang dbang thob pa

yis// rgyal ba rnams kyi dgongs pa lon// snang srid chos la rang byan tshud// ye shes snang ba lhug par 'char/ de sogs rnam grangs brjod las 'das// thun mong rtags la grangs mang yang// rjes su 'dzin pa dngos grub ster// dngos grub nye bar thob pa'i rtags// rnam pa gsum la 'dus pa ste// lha yi rjes su 'dzin pa'i rtags// ye shes snang ba lhug par 'char// gang dang gang gi sngags bzlas pas// spro zhing rig pa dngas pa dang// rtags dang mtshan ma shugs las 'byung// bag gro nyams dga' rig pa 'ur// skyo dub med par bsgrub la brtson// byin pheb rdzas la gzi brjid 'bar// de byung rjes su 'dzin pa'i rtags// thang lhod med par bsgrub la 'bad// dngos grub ster ba'i brod rtags ni// dngos nyams rmi lam la sogs dang// gzhan gyi brda la brgyud nas ni// bza' btung la sogs ster ba'i tshul// rgyan dang cha lugs stsal bar 'gyur// dngos grub nye bar thob rtags ni// phyi nang gzhan rkyen 'tshe dogs med// gzhan gyi yid 'ong bkur sti dang// phu dung du ma byed pa 'byung// blo bde bag pheb yid smon 'grub// pha rol bsgo ba'i bka' la nyan// ngag la nus pa 'bar ba dang// lus stobs yang rtsal rdzu 'phrul ston// phyi nang 'bu srin srog chags med// yid 'ong gzhon sha chags par 'gyur// mdor na rnal 'byor lus ngag yid// gtan la phebs shing yon tan 'bar// bde legs yon tan dpal dang ldan// thun mong las rnams gang brtsam 'grub// gzhan gyis smon cing yid dga' byed// cho rol spyod pa gang spyad kyang// gnad du 'gro zhing gzhan don 'byung// rang snang chos dang mthun par 'gyur// 'jig rten log spyod gtan tshigs bral// 'khrul pa'i bag chags ma lus sangs// zas nor longs spyod la sogs pa// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med 'du// nyon mongs la sogs 'jig pa bral// mdor na rang dang gzhan gyi don// rtsol ba med par shugs las 'byung// las kyi kha bsgyur ran rtags ni// chu bo rgyas dang lo tog smin// gzhan gyi ded dpon byed pa dang/ khrom chen 'dus dang dmag dpung g.yo// nyi ma sprin gyis 'khrugs pa dang// go bdar bso sgra 'debs pa dang// me chen me 'bar dud pa 'khrigs// char sprin 'khrigs shing glog dmar 'byin// me tog kha 'bus ldum ra gang// dkyil 'khor rgyan med bkrag 'od 'bar// DAk+kis las la skul ma 'debs// de ltar rim pa gang byung yang// las kyi kha bsgyur ran pa'am// sngags kyi sham bu gdags ran rtags// de las gzhan gyi log rtags ni// bsgrub la bar chad byed pa yi// bdud kyi cho 'phrul du ma dang// mi dang mi min la sogs pa'i// tho mtshams glags lta sna

tshogs byed// dngos nyams rmi lam la sogs pa// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid gsum la// mi rung ltas dang cho 'phrul rnams// mi 'dod bzhin du 'byung 'gyur zhing// bsgrub g.yel dam sel la sogs pa'i// mi 'dod log dgu du ma 'byung// de sogs nges med nges pa can// re re tsam la nges pa med// yang yang bstun na nges pa ste// rang babs gnad kyi zin pa gces// ci bder 'jog pa man ngag yin// mdor na sngags la brtson pa yis// gnas skabs mthar thug la sogs la// mchog dang thun mong 'byung ba yi// drod brtags dpag tu med pa 'byung// yang yang gtan la phebs nas ni// rtags rnams gang yang mi 'byung bar// dngas sangs chen po nyid du 'gyur// rtags med rtags kyi rgyal po yin// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las// sngags kyi drod rtags 'byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// sems dpa' la sogs 'khor rnams nyon// sngags bzlas dag dang ma dag pa'i// skyon dang yon tan rnams mang yang// dang po ma dag skyon can ni// bzlas pa yun du 'bad gyur kyang// nus pa mi 'byung ngal ba'i rgyu/ sgra nor sgra ma dag pa dang// shed med zur ma thon pa dang// ha cang ring dang thung ba dang// drags thal yang ni zhan thal dang// dal brel ma snyoms ya ma zung// la la shub bur bzlas rgyu la// skad ngar skyes pa'i bzlas nor dang// la la 'dzab dbyangs lta bu la// shub bu'i bzlas pa byed pa dang// de sogs bye brag ma phyed par// nor ra res kyi bzla lugs kyis// yon tan mi 'phel skyon gyi rgyu// gsang sngags thams cad gsang thabs bzlas// rig sngags klog pa'i tshul du ste// gzungs sngags gang yang ldan pa la// de dag gsum la dbye ba'i tshul// bzlas tshul yun gyi skabs dang bstun// gzhan yang bzlas tshul rim pa rnams// yul dang yul can khyad par dang// rigs 'dra rigs min spang dang blang// de yi rgyu mtshon shes par bya// sngags la dam sel zhugs pa dang// lhag pa skyon can skyon med gnyis// zlos pa gang yang skyon med de// ma zlos lhag pa skyon du 'gyur// chad na gang yang skyon can no// bre mo dang 'dres bzlas pa la// nus rtags yun gyis 'gyangs par 'gyur// gnyid rmugs 'dres pa'i bzlas pa ni// bgegs kyi bar chad 'jug pa'i rgyu// log 'dod bsam pa'i bzlas pa ni// byang chub lam du 'gro mi srid// lam gyi 'chugs so med pa yi// bzlas pa yid bzhin nor bu yin// 'dod 'byung dbang gi rgyal po ste// sngags kyi rnal 'byor pas shes bya// yon tan ldan pa'i bzlas pa ni// sngags la nor 'khrul med pa dang// sgra la chad lhag med pa dang// bzla

lugs rang rang gzhung dang mthun// ring sar ring dang thung sar thung// de bzhin drag sar drag pa dang// de bzhin dal dang brel la sogs// rigs dang rigs mthun 'phrod pa yin// bzlas tshul yon tan mtha' yas bskyed// so so'i rtags dang nus pa dang// ci 'dod dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// spyi dang bye brag gang la yang// gsang nas sngags bzlas bsgrub pa yis// stobs 'byin yang dag las la sbyor// ma gsang 'chal zhing gang g.yel ba// stobs med nus pa mi 'byung phyir// de dang de yi bye brag rnams// mkhas pas legs par dpyad de 'bad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags bzlas pa dag dang ma dag pa'i skyon yon bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang dag sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// sngags kyi bsgrub tshul bshad par bya// rlung dang me yi sde tshan dang// chu dang sa yi sde tshan dang// de bzhin nam mkha'i sde tshan dang// bsdom dang phral ba'i rnam pa can// re re la yang lnga lnga las// phral ba'i sde la re re'o// sdom la rlung gi sde tshan la// ka ni rlung gi rlung yig go// kha ni rlung gi me yig ste// ga ni rlung gi chu yig ste// b+ha ni rlung gi sa yig yin// nga ni rlung gi nam mkha' yi// yi ge yin par shes par bya// de bzhin tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya// me yi rlung me chu sa mkha'// pa pha ba b+ha ma dang lnga// chu yi rlung me chu sa mkha'// ta tha da d+ha na dang lnga// sa yi rlung me chu sa mkha'// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na lnga yang// nam mkha'i rlung me chu sa mkha'// phral ba'i sde tshan yi ge ni// ya ra la wa rnam pa bzhi/ rlung me sa chu'i yi ge ste// sha ni me yi yi ge ste/ kha ni sgyur byed spyi la snyoms// sa ni sa yi yi ge la// ha dang a ni nam mkha' yi// yi ge yin par shes par bya// k+Sha ni nus pa skyed pa yis// yi ge yin pas kun la snyoms// ya sta thams cad sa ru bsdu// zhabs kyu chu la 'greng bu me// gu gu nam mkha'i khong du bsdu// na ro rlung la nga ro rnams/ lnga ldan yin pas mkha' khyab mkha'// me chu gnyis po dgra gshed la// de bzhin sa rlung dgra gshed yin// me rlung gnyis dang sa chu 'phrod// nam mkha' kun khyab kun la snyoms// de las gzhan yang 'byung ba'i sde// spyi mthun dgra grogs bskor bar bya// nang bsdeb nang dang nang 'phrad ni// srog yig yin par shes par bya/ khong nas byung dang rkan nas byung// so dang rkan dang lce rtsa dang// mnyam par 'byung dang sna nas 'byung// mchu nas 'byung dang bcas sbyor dang// ring dang thung dang sbom pa dang// phra dang ldir dang yang lci ste// stong pa'i yi ge la sogs pa// rlung me chu sa nam mkha' rnams// rkyang ded dang ni khug pa dang// gnyis sbyor gsum sbyor bzhi sbyor dang// lnga sbyor bsdeb kyi rim pa

rnams// rang rang khams kyi rigs dang ni// 'byung ba'i nang mthun bsdeb pa rnams// ma bu dang ni dgra grogs sprad// ma dang bu phrad bzang po la// dgra dang grogs phrad 'bring po ste// dgra gshed 'dom na tha ma ste// ring du spangs nas gnas bsgyur bya// nang phrad phal cher btang snyoms byed// dgra grogs ma bu'i bsdeb rnams ni// rigs mi mthun dang rigs mthun dang// gcig grogs gcig gis byed pa dang// gcig dgra gcig gis byed pa dang// gcig rkyen gcig gis byed pa yi// rgyu mtshan thams cad shes par bya// 'byung bsdeb gnad rnams ma 'chugs shing// rang rang khams dang bstun gyur na// nus stobs 'bar nas las myur 'grub// de nas de yi bsdeb log na// sngags kyi nus pas rang gshed byed// tshe dang srog la gzan pa dang// dbang thang longs spyod 'joms la sogs// nyes pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur// des na sngags kyi bsgrub tshul rnams// go rim ma log shes pa yis// oM dang na mo la sogs pa'i// thog ma'i yi ge gnad che zhing// de nas rim bzhin dbu rten dang// gzhung gi sngags 'bru bsdeb dang bstun// mtha' brten dag la nges pa med// swA hA hUM phaT la sogs pa// gang yang las kyi shugs ltar sbyar// dkar ser dmar dang ljang gu dang/ kha dog sdebs su bstan pa yang// dkar po chu la dmar po me// ser po sa la ljang gu rlung// nam mkha' dag ni sngo dang mthing// de bzhin mchu sbyor sngags dang mtshungs// phyogs dang dbyibs kyi rnam pa yang// shar lho nub byang dbus dang lnga// rlung me chu sa nam mkha'o// de dang de yi rigs mthun rnams// lha dang lha mo la sogs dang// bsdeb kyi yi ge sprad nas ni// mthun phyogs bsgrub la mi mthun spang// des mtshon ming gi rnam grangs kyang// yi ge 'byung ba'i dgra gshed brtsi// mthun phyogs gdags la mi mthun dor// dag dang ma dag khyad par las// nus pa 'phel dang mi 'phel gyis/ khyad par shin tu che ba'i phyir// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gtan la dbab// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las// sngags kyi bsgrub tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang 'dus sems dpa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// lha dang de yi bsgrub sngags dang// brtson par byed pa'i rnal 'byor rnams// sngags kyi dam tshig ldan pa gces// sngags kyi rlung gi sdeb sbyor dang// lce dang mgrin pa sna dang ni// so dang rkan mchu rnams las 'byung// skye med yi ge khong nas te// de ltar de yi dam tshig tu// bza' btung zas dang brjod pa ngag/ skyon gyi rnam pa gang yang spang// de yang ri sgog gzhag lnga nyams// rlung gi sgog pas zhag dgu nyams// lce yi dbang pos nyes

gcig nyams// sga g.yer za thug khu ba yis// zhag gsum nyams par 'gyur ba yin// byin gyis ma brlabs sha dang chang// zhag lnga'i bar du nyams par 'gyur// mdor na dri ngan dku ba'i rigs// bza' dang btung ba gang yin kyang// zhag mang sngags kyi nus pa gsod// de phyir de dag spang bar bya// rdzun dang phra ma la sogs pa// ngag gi mi dge'i las rnams kyis// sngags kyi nus pa gtan brlag gam// mtha' yang yun ring 'gyangs par 'gyur// des na de dag gang yang spang// bzlas brjod sngags la brtson pa'i tshe// phus gdab 'jig rten bre mo yis// sngags kyi nus pa nyams pas spang// dmigs pa'i las sngags ma gtogs pa// mchil snabs kha chu la sogs pa// 'grul lam na bor nus pa gsod// yang na khong du btang ba'am// gtsang ma'i gnas su dor bar bya// sma ba bcad de sngags la brtson// khyad par dam tshig nyams pa dang// dme pho dam log la sogs pa'i// mi gtsang rigs dang ngag mi bsre// bsres shing sngags bzlas nyams par 'gyur// de dang de yi rigs rnams dang// sngags la gces pa'i dam tshig rnams// gsang ba 'os pa gsang ba dang// de bzhin gsang bar gnyer gtad dang// gsang tshig gang yang gsang thub gces// sngags kyi nus rtags thon pa yi// rtags dang mtshan ma ci byung yang// shin tu gsang bar byed pa ni// dam tshig yin phyir thub par bsrung// gzhan yang sngags la gces pa yi// spyi dang bye brag dam tshig rnams// go rim ma log thub pa gces// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ sngags kyi dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bcom ldan dpag med rgyal po la// sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol ba'i don// brtse bar dgongs nas rab gsungs pa// e ma e ma'o ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing spro bas mngon par bstod// yang dag sngags kyi don gang yin// gtan tshigs go rim gang lags pa// bdag sogs gdul byar gyur pa yi// rang rang jo dang gang 'tshams pa'i// ye shes lha dang de yi 'khor// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// srog gnad rab tu bskul ba'i don// 'bru dang yi ge la sogs pa'i// g.yo ba med par rab snang ba// legs so legs so legs par gsungs// dga' zhing spro bas rjes yi rang// lha dang mi dang lha min dang// klu dang dri za la sogs pa'i// dga' zhing spro ba'i glu blangs te// a la bcom ldan mngon par bstod// snga ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi gsung rgyud rin chen 'brug sgra las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//

a+thi+-i/// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug gis/ ljags kyi pad+ma la bkram/ dung gi tshems bar nas bshar/ mgul gyi bum pa nas dril// thugs kyi dpal be'u nas bton pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rin chen 'brug sgra zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sbas rgya/ gter rgya/ gtad rgya/ a+thi+-i/ d+ha thim/ sprul sku sangs rgyas gling pa'i gter ma'o// phyogs dus gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig/// u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du// rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni sarba tsit+ta tan+t+ra ga ga nA bar+t+ta bistA ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha'i klong yangs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thog med kyi mgon po 'od mi 'gyur ba/ gzi brjid mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i snying po g.yo ba med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// zhing khams rnam par dag pa rgyan bkod pa'i pho brang brtsegs pa/ steng 'og phyogs mtshams dbus la sogs pa phyogs dang bral zhing/ rgya yongs su ma chad pa/ gsal la 'od 'bar zhing rnam pa rab tu bkra ba rgyan gyi lhun po rab tu brjid pa'i zhing/ snang yul du bkra ba las kyang/ gzung 'dzin ngos bzung dang bral ba'i klong yangs pa chen por/ gdod nas ting nge 'dzin rnam par g.yo ba mi mnga' zhing/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du bzhugs nas/ phyogs bral gyi gdul bya la gsal 'grib med cing/ mnyam par dgongs nas/ bzod par dka' zhing ltos pa med par gzigs nas/ mnyam pa chen po'i mdzad pa bsnyel ba med par mdzad pa'i ston pa bcom ldan 'das yangs pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i mgon la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i 'khor rnam par snang mdzad dang/ mi bskyod pa dang/ rin chen 'od mdzod dang 'dod chags bral ba dang/ don rab 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rigs lnga'i sems dpa' dang/ chos dbyings rdo rje ma dang/ gzugs rdo rje ma dang/ sgra rdo rje ma dang/ dri rdo rje ma dang/ ro rdo rje ma dang/ reg rdo rje ma ste rigs kyi sems ma la sogs pa/ sprul pa rang snang gi dkyil 'khor gyi rol pa las byung ba'i 'khor rnams kyis/ dus mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par byung ba rang byung dgongs pa klong gi 'od zer kun tu rnam par bkra ba'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las 'od zer dkar po dang/ 'od zer dmar po dang/ 'od zer mthing ga rab tu 'phro zhing 'khor sems dpa' dang/ sems ma rnams kyi gnas gsum du thim pa'i tshe/ sprul pa rang byung gi 'khor rnams rang snang

gi dkyil 'khor las langs shing/ gnas lugs kyi che ba rang la bstan pa'i don dam nam mkha'i klong yangs lta bu'i dgongs pa gtan la dbab par gsol bas/ de nyid du nyid kyi thugs yangs pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa'i 'phro 'du phyogs thams cad du khyab par mdzad de gsungs pa/ e ma bsam brjod bral ba'i 'khor// sems dpa' dang ni sems ma nyon// nga yi klong las rab spros pa// nga yi klong las rang shar ba// dkyil 'khor nga yi dbyings las gsal// 'phro 'du nga yi dbyings las snang// rang byung nga la thams cad rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i ye shes don rab bzung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klongs yangs las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// a+thi+-i/// rang snang sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// spros med spros dang bral ba'i don// spros bral ye shes chen po ni// spros pa med pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sems kyi spros pa bcad de bsgom// de bsgom gnad du bsnun pa la// ngo sprod gtan la dbab don du// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma gces// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus kyang// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la// gus btud 'bras bu rdzogs sangs rgyas// de phyir mtshan nyid kun ldan pa'i// bla ma de yi sku yi cha// mdzes shing bag dro lhun chags pa// spyod lam gdul bya'i yid dang mthun// gang la gang 'dul thabs la mkhas// gsung gi cha yang 'jam zhing snyan// 'jig rten 'chal gtam bre mo nyung// nges don chos kyi gsung char 'bebs// rgyal ba rnams kyi gsung dang mthun// de bzhin thugs kyang mkha' ltar dag/ lta bsgom gzhi 'bras don dang ldan// rang 'dod bral zhing gzhan don la// brtse bas skyo dub med par brtson// mdor na mdzad pa'i rnam thar rnams// bla med theg mchog chos dang mthun// de ltar ldan pa'i bla ma btsal// rnyed nas lus ngag yid gsum gyis// dgongs dang mnyes pa mtha' dag bsgrub// bkur sti yon gyis dgyes par bya// thugs sun mi dbyung sdom la gnas// de yi rjes 'jug bka' srol 'dzin// de ltar bla ma bsten pa yi// bde legs bsam 'phel yid smon 'grub// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma btsal nas bsten tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma la// phyi nang don 'dzom chos yod kyang// snod ldan slob ma ma 'dzom na// rnam grol 'bras bu mi 'byung phyir// gdul bya snod ldan slob ma gces// de yang dad brtson shes rab che// blo yangs ser sna 'dzin chags chung// chos spyod brtson 'grus

skyo dub med// bla ma la gus 'gro la brtse// dam tshig la gnas g.yo sgyu med/ khrel 'dzem ngo tsha chad gzhung btsan// 'jig rten chos la yid mi 'jug/ 'khrul phyir mi 'brang nyon mongs srab// yab yob mi byed 'gran sems bral// de sogs yon tan dpag med cing// bla ma mgo yi thod bzhin khur// mched dang grogs la dag snang che// gdams pa khong gi snying ltar 'chang// dam tshig mig 'bras lta bur btsa'// bsgo ba'i bka' nyan mnyen lcug ldan// brtsam pa mthar dbyung phyi thag ring// rang nyid pham khur gzhan sems 'dzin// de ltar 'dzin pa'i gang zag ni// skal ldan bde gshegs thugs kyi sras// snod kyi rab mchog gdams pa'i chos// lhug par sbyin cing thabs kyis bskyang// nyams len srang la rim gyis gcur// 'bras bu don mchog gtan la phab// rgyal ba rnams kyi nges lung sbyin// yon tan de las log pa yi// skyon gyi rnam pa mang tshogs pa'i// dam med slob ma rgyang thag bsring// de ltar blang dang dor ba yis// slob ma'i mtshan nyid legs par brtag/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i slob ma brtag cing spang blangs bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// gnas dus khyad par can 'dzom tshe// snod ldan rigs mthun slob ma la// spros bcas phyi yi bum dbang bskur// lus smin lha yi phyag rgyas gdab// ngag smin sngags kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sems smin chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab// dkyil 'khor yo byad rdzas tshogs pa// longs spyod rgyan gyi phyag rgyas gdab// zab mo g+ha Na'i yo byad kyis// ye shes lha yi dgyes pa bskang// stangs stabs gar gyis mnyes par bya// dpa' bo thabs kyi bde ba dang// dpa' mo shes rab stong nyid kyis// gnyis med rol pa'i rtsal la bslab// spros pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bya ba du ma la zhugs pa'i// spros pa thabs kyis bcad nas ni// spros dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// ngang du rim gyis gzung bar bya// dpa' bo yab dang dpa' mo yum// gnyis med rnam rol sems dpa' yis// ye shes myur du phab pa na// phab rtags 'dar dang 'khrab pa dang// yid rab g.yo zhing 'phar sogs 'byung// de la rab tu brtan sems bzung// spros bcas bum pa'i phyi dbang gis// 'bad pa dang bcas 'bras bu 'byung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las// smin byed spros bcas bum dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang ni yang dag bshad bya ba// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla ma yis// snod ldan skyes bu nyer gcig la// yo byad dkyil 'khor la sogs

pa// dam rdzas rnam pa mang tshogs pa'i// smin byed spros med nang gi dbang// yab yum gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor la// brten nas rim gyis bskur bar bya// de yang phyi nang 'jug pa dang// dmigs pa'i 'phro 'du dag la bslab// slob mas dad bdun bskyed nas kyang// bla ma dgyes pa'i maN+Dal phul// gsol ba gdab cing gus pa bskyed// bla ma yab dang yum bcas pa'i// lha yi nga rgyal ldan pa pos// gsang ba'i ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun// thabs shes slob ma'i lce steng dbab// brda dang bcas pa'i ye shes bskyed// bde dang stong par ngo sprad pas// lus ngag yid gsum rab smin zhing/ khyad par ngag la nus pa 'bar// dpal dang gzi brjid rab 'phro zhing// dbang don dran pas don 'bras 'grub// e ma zla gsang thig le yis// bde chen ye shes yang dag mchog/ 'bad med myur du skye bar 'gyur// de skyes spros med ngang la gzhag/ gzhag bya bzhag byed med bzhin du// rnam par rang grol lhug par 'char// de ni spros med nang gi dbang// gdul bya ngag grol ye shes brnyes// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ smin byed spros med gsang dbang gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yang ni mtshan ldan bla ma yis// rgyu rkyen nus stobs ldan byas te// snod ldan skyes bu bdun dag la// gsang ba shes rab ye shes dbang// shes rab gzungs la ma brten nas// bskyed rdzogs mnyam grol lhug par bskur// de yang bla ma he ru ka/ dpa' bo yum dang bcas pa la// rin chen dag pa'i maN+Dal sogs// dga' ston dgyes pa'i yon dbul zhing// thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba gdab// bla mas bde ba'i ye shes dbab// slob ma dad ldan skyes mchog gis// lus ngag yid gsum 'khrul 'khor sbyang// lus sbyangs ngag la phan pa dang// ngag sbyang sems la phan byas nas// dbab bskyil bzlog dang dgram pa la// mkhas shing goms pas dbang lung blang// pad+ma rdo rje mchu sbyor nas// ngo sprod rgya yis thebs par bya// dga' bzhi'i ye shes nyams ngos bzung// bde stong zag pa med pa yi// gnas lugs ngang du mnyam par bzhag/ g.yo med rig pa'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// gsang don b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du// mnyam gnas bde ba'i lha mo la// mchod pa 'bul zhing dgyes pa bskang// bcud 'bras bde rol dngos grub blangs// ro myong bcud kyi 'khor lo bskor// bag chags sems kyi 'khrul pa bshig/ bdag po bsad nas longs spyod 'phrog/ ma rnams chos kyi dbyings su bskyal// e ma shes rab ye shes kyi// dbang don thugs kyi phur du 'chang// 'bras bu nus pa'i gdeng ldan 'gyur/ bla ma yi dam

mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ smin byed rab tu spros med shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi le'u ste drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// de nyid rab tu spros med kyi// tshig dbang snod ldan skyes bu la// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bla mas bskur// gzhi rdzogs sems kyi dkyil 'khor du// rang byung rol pa'i lhar gsal zhing// mtha' bral don thob bla ma la// 'byor tshogs lus dang longs spyod kyi// maN+Dal ltos pa med par 'bul// gdung ba'i tshig gis gsol ba gdab// brda don tshig dbang ngo sprod gdab// nyams gsal ye shes 'khor lo bskor// 'khor 'das phyam gdal ngang la gzhag/ don dam byang chub sems dkyil du// mtshan ma bral ba'i dbang mchog gis// lus ngag yid gsum smin nas kyang// phyi nang snod bcud brda don sprad// snang srid tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// bdag gzhan mnyam gsal dbyings kyi ngang// 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// zhing dang bcas par lhun gyis rdzogs// de ltar bzhi rdzogs dbang bsgrub pas// dpon slob dga' bde'i gsal nyams bskyang// gtang rag rtse dga' glu bro 'khrab// bkra shis bsngo sogs mtha' rgyas kyi// rim pas las rjes dbyings su bskyal// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ smin byed de kho na nyid kyi tshig dbang rin po che'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dbang rnams thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gsang chen dam tshig rim pa rnams// dang du blang zhing tshul bzhin bsrung// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rnam pa lnga nyid kyi// rtsa ba yan lag phra mor bcas// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang// de nyid la sogs gang dang gang// dus gsum lus ngag yid gsum gyis// mnyam sbyor rmad du byung ba'i klong// spang blang mtshan nyid shes byas pas// blang dor med par rab tshul dang// spang blang bcas pa'i 'bring po dang// bshags dang sdom bcas tha ma yis// sgrib pa med pa'i don sems bya// yun dang skad cig la sogs pa'i// dus kyi sa mtshams gcad pa dang// sa mtshams gcad du med tshul gyis// yang nas yang du dran shes bya// gal te nyams pa lo tshigs yol// 'gyur dang bcas pa'i chag nyams las// de 'gyur rang lo'i grangs tshad kyis// rdzas dang bcas pa'i bshags pas byang// ltung bar mi 'gyur sor chud nas// dngos grub yang dag brnyes pa yin// rang lo nges par nyams 'das na// des ni ma bshags na rag spyod// de phyir lo zla zhag dus kyis// nyams 'gyur sa mtshams ma 'das par// 'gyod de gang bshags bde legs 'gyur// ma nyams yon tan rtsis las 'das// nyams kyang bshags pas

yon tan 'byung// nyams kyang bshags par ma byas dang// bshags kyang bla mas ma gnang na// bla ma nyid dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje dmyal ba'i yang gting du// 'tshod pa'i sdug bsngal rtsis las 'das// bshags par byed dang ma nyams bsrung// sdom par byed pa'i thabs mchog ni// dpal dang ldan pa'i spyod yul lo// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ dam tshig ma nyams par byed pa dang/ nyams na bshags par bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dgongs klong yang dag mchog gi don// grol byed rmad du byung ba las// rang snang rtsal chen rdzogs 'dod pas// gtan la dbab pa'i dang po ni// chos nyid rol pa ngos bzung ba'i// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta// gdod nas yang dag chen po la// spang blang gtang gzhag ming mtha' bral// de bzhin ngos 'dzin bya byed bral// rgyu rkyen las 'das phyogs lhung bral// smra bsam las 'das de bzhin nyid// ye klong kun bzang rab snang zhing// brda dang rtags kyis mtshon du med// gzhi snang rang gsal 'od chen po// spros dang bral ba'i ngang du gdal// e ma gdod nas rnam dag pa// smra brjod bral ba a la la// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ gdod ma'i dgongs pa ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// spyi gzhi chen po ngos gzung ba// rnam pa drug dang yang dag ldan// 'di ni 'dod chen gzhi nyid de// sna tshogs snang zhen 'chol bar rol// 'on kyang sna tshogs snang ba yi// ri mo dag la ngos bzung nas// du ma nyid du gzhir ma grub// kun tu mkhyen snang rang gsal la// yul dang yul can 'du 'phrod pa'i// brda las skad du grags pa bzhin// zad mtha' bral ba'i gzhi mar gyur// bsdus pas mig sogs dbang po la// de yul gzugs sogs rnam pa drug/ de las spros pa mang byung 'gyur// rnam pa du mar rab grags pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol ji bzhin no// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ gzhi sna tshogs su smra ba sun dbyung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'khor 'das spyi gzhi ngos 'dzin pa// rtogs na grol zhes lung ma bstan// ma rtogs 'khrul zhes sgro ma btags// btang snyoms lung ma bstan du gnas// dper na til la mar khyab bzhin// lo 'dab myu gu gang yang min// 'bras bu yin yang rgyur ldog bzhin// bde dang sdug bsngal gang yang min// rkyen gyis ma bslad cang mi spro// rkyen gyis nam bskul phra mo ldang// de la der snang 'byung ba ste// sna tshogs las kyi 'khrul 'khor srid// de sogs gang du'ang ma

yin la// sgro btags ming sogs min shes pas/ khong gyur yid spris sgong rgyar 'thum// de ni 'khor 'das spyi gzhi ste// rtogs te sangs rgyas gyur pa med// ma rtogs 'khor ba de ma 'khyams// btang snyoms nyid du gnas pa nyid// gti mug chen po'i mun snang la// ma rig 'thibs pa'i dra bas g.yogs// ye shes sgrib mun bag la zha// spyi gzhi mnyam pa nyid du'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klongs yangs las/ 'khor 'das gnyis kyi spyi gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// ye thog dang po'i sangs rgyas ni// grol gzhi 'pho dang 'gyur med pa'i// rang byung rang grol dgongs pa'i klong// rnam dag chos kyi dbyings las gsal// 'phro 'du ye shes thugs rje yis// rtsal dang cho 'phrul du ma 'gyed// rang byung ye shes rang grol gyi// rang rtsal 'phro 'du 'od po che// kun khyab chen po gting mi g.yo// mdzad pa med pa'i 'od zer gyis// mkha' mnyam 'gro la mkha' ltar khyab// gdod nas rang shes rig pa'i klong// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs rang 'jil rang rtsal rdzogs// de bzhin de la ye shes kyi// rol pa rang rtsal cho 'phrul yang// de nyid de las ma g.yos par// re re la yang lnga lnga ru// 'brel pa 'od dang bcas par snang// zang dang thal mar chos kun la// phyogs dang ris su ma chad khyab// thugs rje zhal phyag bcas pa yang// rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dper bcas// gdul bya rab snang gdal bar snang// 'bring dang tha mar bcas pa ste// re re bzhin du gsum gsum ste// dgu+u la dgur snang gcig la gcig/ brgya sogs de bzhin rtsis 'das kyi// mthar thug yul dang yul can dang// rab gsal gang dang gang 'dul snang// 'khrul bya 'khrul byed las 'das shing// grol bya grol byed las 'das pa'i// 'khrul grol rang babs ming mtha' bral// ka dag lhun grub rol par bzhugs// ye thog bzang po'i grol gzhi ste// bya byed bya rtsol las 'das so// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ dag pa sangs rgyas kyi grol gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// ma rtogs sems can 'khrul gzhi ni// nga med pa la nga ru bzung// ngar 'dzin thol skyes lang long las// nga yi 'dzin pa zhugs pa ste// dper na sprin med nam mkha' la// thol skyes glo bur lhags pa'i sprin// gcig la gnyis 'phel cher rgyas nas// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab par byas// de las char dang tshubs ma'i tshogs// rtsis las 'das pa byung bzhin du// ming med pa la ming btags 'khrul// gcig las gnyis kyis ming gi

tshogs// phung po 'dus las grangs dang gzugs// rnam pa du mar g.yos pa yis// nga dang khyod dang phan tshun bcas// de las cher langs sred pa sogs// thun mong sna tshogs las su snang// dmigs pa can dang 'dzin pa'i rkyen// 'bras bu sna tshogs rgyu ru 'khrul// yul can bdag por 'dzin pa yis// rkyen las sna tshogs ming byung 'khrul// de la de dmigs sna tshogs blo// thol skyes de la der 'dzin zhugs// de ma thag tu bdag rkyen gyis// yul dngayul can sprul pa ste// phan tshun gcig la gcig ltos pas// rnga dang dbyug gu 'phrad pa las// sgra 'byung ma phrad mi grag ste// bdag ces kun rtog phra mo las// bdag ces gnyis su snang las 'khrul// de yis de bskyed de sogs 'byung// de nas rim nas rim bzhin du// lha mi la sogs 'gro ba dang// mngal dang sgong skyes la sogs pa'i// rnam pa sna tshogs skyes nas 'khrul// las kyi 'phen sdud dpag med spyod// skye rga na 'chi'i rba klong 'khrugs// ma rtogs 'khrul pa lu gu rgyud// bag la nyal gyi rlung langs pas// rab tu g.yo zhing 'khrugs pa yis// byer sdug las kyi 'khrul 'khor las// zad med 'phel med 'khor bar 'khor// spyi tsam las n-i de bzhin te// sgos btsal las kyi mtha' gcod pa'i// srid pa'i sgo nga rdol bzhin du/ la la zad dang 'phel 'grib ston// la la zad pa rang zad de// rang snang rang ngo shes nas ni// rgyu dang rkyen gyi mtha' gcod 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi thugs rgyud nam mkha' klong yangs las/ ma rtogs sems can gyi 'khrul gzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// 'khrul pa de las zlog pa'i thabs// dang po sngon du 'gro ba'i las// 'khor 'das ru shan phye ba ste// lus sbyang sems la phan pa'i phyir// lus kyi gnad la goms bya zhing// sku gsum bdag nyid gnas pa yis// 'dug stangs rnam pa gsum la bslab// lus nyid grol ba rnam grol phyir// chos kyi sku yi bzhugs stangs su// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// chos
