'gyur// rang 'dod 'khri bcad zhen pa bskyung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gos 'gugs pa'i le'u ste nyer drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gzhan yang gang dang gang dag gi/ 'dod yon dmigs bya 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi ngar ldan pas// gang 'dod rdzas kyi gzugs dang ni// ming dang bcas pa gser gyis bri// dar dmar khung du dril byas te// 'dod pa'i lha mo de la bstim// rtsa sngags ha ri ni sa'i mthar// che ge mo wa shaM ku ru hring swA hA/ mang bzlas mchan khung g.yon du bcangs// ming byang tsan+dan dmar po yi// byang bu+u dag la bri ba ste// dbang sdud spel tshig dag kyang bkod// byang bu'i tshad ni sor bzhi'o// des ni gang dmigs dngos su 'du// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rdzas 'gugs pa'i le'u ste nyer bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// yid 'ong bu mo 'gugs pa'i thabs// bdag nyid dbang chen nga rgyal gyis// dri med dar dmar mtho skor la/ khye'u'i byang sems dkar po dang// rgya mtshal dang ni d+ha du ras// gang dgugs gzugs dang ming byang bri// nr-i dang bcas pa'i las sngags brjod// ha lo khug chos glang po'i sna// me tog gsum gyi khu bas byug/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi mtha' bsgyur du// che ge mo nig nal nig nal pra mo thun pra mo thun// ha~M shang bram khug dung nr-i swA hA/ zhes pa zhag gcig bzlas nas ni// dbang shes gos kyi sbyar ba yis// gang 'dod yid 'ong bu mo 'du// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ bu mo 'gugs pa'i le'u ste nyer brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// zas nor longs spyod sris sme'i thabs// phyug po'i rang thag lte phye dang// btsad po'i rus phywe skam

po dag/ bsre ba'i tsha tsha bzhengs pa gnyis// dar snas dril la ma sgyed 'og/ rdza yi ga bur bcug la sba// rten 'brel de yi sbyor ba la// brten nas sris sme 'phel bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ sris 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// lha rnams kun gyis bkur ba'i thabs// zangs sogs rin chen byang bu la// lha rnams kun gyi gzugs bris te// dngos bskyed spyan 'dren bkug bstim bya// rtsa sngags bzlas shing dar snas bril// rang gi dmigs rten zhabs su sba// cung zad gnad la dbab par bya// des ni lha rnams kun gyis bkur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar byed pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mi rnams kun gyis bkur ba'i thabs// tA la'i lo ma la sogs pa// gtsang ma'i shing gi lo ma la// skyes pa grir shi'i snying khrag gis// yi ge nr-i gcig bris pa'i mthar// yongs 'dus rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor// gzhan yang yi dam lha sngags dang// mtshal gyis A li kI li bri// de dag dar snas dril byas te// sa sna dgu yi tsha tsha dang// lhan cig lha rten zhabs su sba// rnal 'byor mi rnams yangs kyis bkur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mi thams cad kyis bkur bar byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mi ma yin gyis bkur ba'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// spre'u dar ma'i thod pa ru// pha bong long bu'i logs drug la// mtshal gyis yi ge tri bris gzhug/ lha 'dre mang po'i ming byang yang// gser dang mtshal gyis bris pa rnams// za 'og khug ma'i nang du gzhug/ rtsa sngags bzlas shing bkug bstim bya// rang nyid gang du gnas pa yi// yi dam lha rten 'og tu sba// rtag tu mi ma yin gyis bkur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mi ma yin thams cad kyis bkur bar byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan

la pheb byas te// blo dang shes rab 'phel ba'i thabs// ga bur tsan+dan dkar po dang// sman mchog rgyal po a ru ra// gser mdog rma med gcig dang ni// li shi dzA ti a ga ru// cu gang gur gum ka ra sbyar// ril bu nyer gcig byas pa rnams// dri med dar dkar khung du dril// pradz+nyA bar d+ha hrIH/ ma nua nu b+ha ra yin nam ta ra At+ma naM/ sarba pradz+nyA sid+d+hi swA hA/ zhes pa rtsa sngags sham bu can// 'bum phrag bzlas pa'i ril bu de// rang lus drod dang ma bral 'chang// bsgrub tshe sha chang sgog sogs spang// zla ba yar 'phel dus dang sprad// blo dang shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ blo dang shes rab 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag g-i/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gre lce bde bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal blta// lce ni pad dkar 'dab brgyad gsal// de steng shel gyi ral gri gcig/ sor bzhi 'od zer bcas par bsgom// ngag tu hrI baM e brjod pas// ral gri'i 'od kyis lce la dkris// lce zhu ral gri pad dkar rnams// dbyer med gcig tu gyur nas kyang// dmigs bral ye shes ngang la gzhag/ nyer gcig las kyi sbyor ba yis// gre lce rab tu bde bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gre lce bde bar byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mig sogs dbang po gsal ba'i thabs// rang nyid yi dam gsal ba yi// mig ni g.yas dang g.yon pa la// yi ge b+h+ri k+Sha dkar dmar bsgom// rna ba g.yas dang g.yon pa la// yi ge Sh+ti a+aai sngo ljang bsgom// sna bug g.yas dang g.yon gnyis la// haM baM dmar dang ser por bsgom/ kha la yi ge d+hIHdkar bsgom// mdzod spu yi ge hIHljang bsgom// snying kar yi ge hUM mthing bsgom// gsal gdab rang rang gnas su bstim// nya stong brgyad gsum dag la brtsam// lan re brgya dang rtsa brgyad dmigs// de ltar las kyi sbyor ba yis// dbang po thams cad gsal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbang po gsal bar byed pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste so lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mngon par shes pa 'char ba'i thabs// bdag nyid

mos pa'i lhar gsal ba'i// tsit+ta pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// snying gar A li dkar po dang// kA li'i phreng ba dmar po gsal// A li g.yas la kA li g.yon// rab tu 'khor ba'i 'od zer ni// dkar dmar dpag tu med 'phros pas// bdag gi ma rig mun bsal zhing// mngon shes thogs pa med 'char zhing// dus gsum sa ler shes par dmigs// nangs par skya rengs shar ba nas// dgong mo skar ma tsag tsig bar// rtag tu 'bad de mngon shes 'char// thun bar ye shes sems dpa' yi// las sbyor dam pa mngon shes 'grub// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mngon par shes pa 'char bar byed pa'i le'u ste so drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// yan lag mthil bzhir rgyal chen bzhi/ yul 'khor srung dang 'phags skyes po// mig mi bzang dang rnam thos sras// rang rang bran dang bcas pa bskyed// skra dang ba spu mtshon char gsal// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba yi// sbyor ba dmigs pa'i 'phro 'du bya// rtsa sngags stobs kyi dbang pos brjod/ khams dang bstun pa'i ru dar phyar// rigs dang mthun pa'i bdud rtsi gtor// g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste so bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag g-i/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rtsod pa las ni rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid rma bya'i rgyal por bsgom// pha rol ha la 'bar bar bsgom// rang gi lce ni khab len rdo// pha rol lce ni lcags phye? bsgom// ma yengs dmigs pas brtson par bya// bdag nyid rma byas dug zos pas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rab tu rgyas/ khab len rdo yi lcags blangs pas// stobs dang nus pa rab tu rgyas// rngam pa'i shugs kyis gang rtsod pa// rang nyid rab tu rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rtsod pa las rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste so brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// tshong las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid yi dam lhar bskyed pa'i// spyi bo la sogs gnas lnga ru// nor bu dbang gi rgyal po

ste// dkar dmar mthing ser ljang ba'i mdog/ 'od dang gzi brjid 'bar bar gsal// pha rol rdzas kyi dngos po rnams// sna tshogs nor bu mching bu ltar// spu bar byed pa'i las sbyor tshe// bdag gi nor bu'i 'od zer gyis// pha rol rang dbang med par bkug/ rang rang nor bu lnga la bstim// rngam pa'i sbyor ba shes par bya// gang byas tshong las rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ tshong las rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste so dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rgyan las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// lag pa g.yas pas thabs chen lcags// g.yon pa shes rab zangs su gsal// thabs dang shes rab las sbyor gyis// gang yin rgyan gyi cho lo rtse// gsal stong bdag gzhan dmigs pa yis// snang dang mi snang nyi zla yi// sbyor ba brtsams pas bdag nyid rgyal// bdag nyid mi g.yo rab brtan cing// pha rol g.yo ba'i sbyor bas kyang// gang yin de las rgyal bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rgyan las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// sgyu rtsal 'gran las rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dpag chen mda' gzhur dmigs// pha rol gtad pa'i 'ben du dmigs// ye shes lha yi las sbyor gyi// dmigs pa gnad la gzir ba'i tshe// gang dmigs de la phog nas kyang// phye ma rdul du song bar bsam// ma yengs dmigs pa'i rtsal bskyed cing// zhum pa med par 'gran pa yi// gang 'dren de las bdag nyid rgyal// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ sgyu rtsal las rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste zhe gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dpung las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs// rang nyid ri rab lhun por bsgom// pha rol ri phran phra mor gsal// ri rab chen po'i mnga' 'og tu// ri phran lhag pa'i dbang med cing// stobs kyis zil gyis mnan dmigs shing// bdag nyid dpa' shugs nga rgyal bskyed// dpung 'joms las kyi sbyor ba bya// des ni dpung las rgyal 'gyur te// bdag nyid bcu phrag dpung gis kyang// pha rol 'bum phrag

dpung tshogs 'joms// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dpung las rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste zhe gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// don 'grub rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid yi dam lhar gsal ba'i// g.yas su seng+ge 'gyeng ba dang// g.yon du stag mo ngar ba dang// mdun du glang chen stobs ldan 'gro// rgyab tu khro rgyal dmag dpung 'gyed// glad na mkha' lding rgyal po lding// de ltar rab tu gsal bsgom zhing// nyam nga med pa'i shugs kyis 'gro// gang yin las don myur 'grub bsam// don gang thogs pa med par 'grub// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ don 'grub par byed pa'i le'u ste zhe gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rig sngags kun las rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid dmigs med mkha' ltar blta// pha rol bdag la byad byed pa'i// rig sngags sbyor ba gang yin rnams// mun pa shin tu gnag par dmigs// rang gi bsgrub pa'i lha rnams ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rab rgyas nas// mkha' la shar ba'i 'od zer gyis// mun pa thams cad rab bcom nas// nyi 'od snang ba rgyas dmigs dang// rtsa sngags bzlas sogs lus ngag yid// byang chub lam gyi chos la 'bad// nyin re lan re'i sbyor ba yis// rig sngags bye ba'i tshogs kyis kyang// bdag la sdigs par mi 'gyur ro// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rig sngags las rgyal bar byed pa'i thabs bstan pa'i le'u ste zhe bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// blo gros rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs// bdag nyid yi dam lhar gsal ba'i// snying gar smra ba'i seng+ge bskyed// mig g.yas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// g.yon pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// de ltar gsal ba'i dad ldan pas// g.yo ba med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gang yin las dang bya ba rnams// zil gyis mnan nas brtsam par bya// gzhan snang mi bstun ya ma brla// snang srid bden par med par bzhag/ blo gros rnam par 'phel nas kyang// bsam 'dun gang spyod chos dang mthun// byang chub lam la tshud par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ blo

gros 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste zhe lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// bdag nyid chos srid rgyal ba'i thabs// yi dam lha dmigs snying ga ru// rnam thos seng+ge zhon pa'i bu// seng+ge zhon pa'i 'jol ber can// lag na rgyal mtshan ne'u le 'dzin// sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras// rang 'dra gnod sbyin 'bum sdes bskor// las byed pho nya skar ltar 'khrugs// kun kyang bdag gi chus srid skyongs// dpal dang dbang phyug spel bsam zhing// rtsa sngags 'dzab kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs// skabs su dmigs pa yang yang gsal// chus srid rim gyis rgyas nas kyang// gang bsam thun mong las 'bras 'grub// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chus srid rgyal bar byed pa'i le'u ste zhe drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mi kha smra mchu bzlog pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// sa sna dgu la bzos pa yi// mchod rten nag po khru gang la// bang rim dgu pa'i khang gseng du// tsan+dan byang bu mtho gang la// mi kha bzlog pa'i dmod mo dang// ba ra sha ya d+h+red dred thun b+h+yo/ sha sha ra li te pa shu tsi mi kha smra mchu sarba b+h+yo b+h+yo bzlog bzlog/ ces pa bris pa gzhug par bya// gzhan yang dug khrag bal tshon dang// sngau ngad sga g.yer la sogs pa// sna tshogs mi kha'i rdzas kyis bkang// de la dar ras nag po yi// cod pan gzugs la khram ris bris// dus gnyan sgo khang steng du bzhag/ yang na rang gi khang pa yi// byang shar mtshams kyi zur du bzhag/ mi kha thams cad bzlog par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mi kha smra mchu bzlog par byed pa'i le'u ste zhe bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// nyams grib mi gtsang bsrung ba'i thabs// srad bu nag po gsum bsgril la// mdud pa nyer gcig byas nas ni// rtsa sngags sham du 'di skad gdags// kro ti kA li sarba pA paM/ maM du sa ma yA/ bi na se shud+he shud+he ma hA shud+he phaT swA hA/ zhes pa brgya phrag bzlas nas kyang// gu gul dud pas srad bu bdug/ gang gi lus la btags dai la// grib dang mi gtsang 'jig pa med// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ nyams grib bsrung bar byed pa'i

le'u ste zhe brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// 'byung po'i sun ma bzlog pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// rat+na'i rdo rje rtse lnga la// sna tshogs dar gyi cod pan gdags// sa man+ta yi srung sngags las// brgya rtsa bzlas shing rdo rje gsor// gang gnod phyogs su gdengs shing gzir// rdo rje khro rgyal 'bar bar bskyed// cod pan me ri 'bar ba las// yang sprul me dang mtshon cha'i char// gnam lcags thog ltar rab 'bar zhing// gnod byed 'byung po'i sun ma rnams// rang rang gnas su bzlog bsam zhing// bsrung ba'i go cha brtan par dmigs// des ni phyin chad gnod mi 'gyur// rdo rje rang nyid gar gnas kyi// dben pa'i phyogs su dam par sba// skabs su dmigs pa drag sngags dang// rdo rje bcas pas gzir bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ 'byung po'i sun ma bzlog par byed pa'i le'u ste zhe dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// nad rims kun gyis mi tshugs thabs// gla rtsi bong nga chu dag dang// mu zi ldong ros shing kun dang// rta bon dri chen bya rgod tshil// de ltar dgu yi ril bu dang// pra ma d+hu ha ra/ ka ra shiSh+ta k+ShaM ni/ a lik+Sh+ya g+ha g+ha sa ma tri sa ma tri b+h+yaHphaT/ de ltar rtsa sngags sham can la// stong bzlas bsrung bya'i mgul du btags// rdzas kyi khu bas sngags kyang bri// ril bu sran ma'i tshad dang sbyar// de dag lus la sus 'changs pa// rims nad 'go ba'i nad las skyob// nyams na yang yang gso bar bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rims nad kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// 'byung po dag gis mi tshugs thabs// stag ma be dkar 'om bu dang// skyer pa tsher nag seng lding dang// shug pa bal dkar sol nag ste// de ltar shing dgu sor bzhi la// rtsa sngags stong gis rab gnas bya// dar tshon sna lngas mi mngon dkri// mi lag ma brgyud bsrung bya yi// lus la ji srid gnas kyi bar// 'byung pos mi mngon sgrib shing ste// bsrung ba'i mchog tu gyur pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ 'byung pos mi tshugs shing sgrib par byed pa'i le'u ste nga gcig pa'o//

a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mtshon gyi gnod pas mi tshugs thabs// gri lcags ral gri tshon gang la// gri khrag chu yi ngar blud la// dar dmar dag gis mi mngon gril// rtsa sngags dang ni bsrung ba'i sngags// ba ra pa ri thed/ yum yum yum thed/ khro tse thed/ rnor chum/ ma ma da yur rak+Sh+yaM/ ka la swA hA/ stong phrag bzlas shing lag ma brgyud// gang la bsrung bar 'dod pa yi// lus la btags shing rab gnas bya// ji srid rdzas dang ma bral bar// de srid mtshon gyis mi tshugs bsrung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mtshon gyi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste nga gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mthu rtsal che bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// ya so khro bo bcu ru bsgom// ma so khro mo bcu ru bsgom// lce ni gdug pa'i mtshon char bsgom// ba spu gser gyi rdo rje phyed// phyi 'bur rab ru gtams pa yis// go zhu lugs su gon bzhin bsgom// rtsa gnas lus kyi dra mig rnams// lcags zhun dag gis rab gang nas// rkang rub lcags sdong lta bur bsgom/ khro chu 'bar ba ha la la// ma hA khro chu ha la b+h+rUM// ma ma kA ya rak+Sha pha la hUM swA hA/ zhes pa rtsa ba'i sngags dang bcas// zhag bdun smra ba bcad la bzlas// lus la lcags phye a ru ra// chang dang sbyar la yang yang byug/ lcags sraug grub nas stobs kyi dpal// mthu rtsal rab tu rgyas par 'gyur/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mthu rtsal che bar byed pa'i le'u ste nga gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dug gis mi tshugs bsrung ba'i thabs// dug gis nges par shi ba yi// rus pa dang ni gser gyi mdog/ sman mchog skyon dang bral ba gcig/ cha mnyam btul ba'i phye ma la// dug spang khu bas ril gu sbyar// me dang nyi ma ma mthong bskam// ha la kA la phos phos/ ka ma tsi tri ha la phos// sarba ha la ka ma ra tsi dun phaT swA hA/ de dag rtsa sngags gsham la gdags// ston zla dar dmar khud du gtum// gang bsrung mgrin pa'i gnas su gdags// lo re bzhin du sngags rnams bskyar// dug rigs thams cad bsrung ba ste// yod rlom ched du dug mi bza'// des ni dam tshig nyams pa'o// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams

cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dug gis mi tshugs shing srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste nga bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gtad dang khram gyis mi tshugs thabs// ming rus mi gcig mi dgu yi// skra sen mdze pho'i thod rus rnams// ro ras nag po'i khug mar gril// lcags byang mig dgu'i thems su zhugs// rang gi mal 'og dong du mnan// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// pha rol gzhan la srung byed kyang// khyad par rtsa sngags bgrangs su gzhug/ des ni gtad dang khram las thar// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gtad khram gyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i srung ba'i le'u ste nga lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gza' skar ngan pa skyob pa'i thabs// dur rdo mtshal gyi khram ris can// tshon skud sna lngas rgya gram bcing// gza' skar ngan pa'i 'jigs pa las// srungs sogs spel tshig gang 'dod kyang// bris nas de dang lhan cig dril// de ltar brgyad byas phyogs mtshams su// rang nyid gar gnas sa ru sba// gza' skar ngan pa'i 'jigs pa kun// sngon chad byung ba grol gyur zhing// phyin chad gnod pa mi byed bsrung// lo re bzhin du lan re bskyar// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gza' skar ngan pa las skyob par byed pa'i le'u ste nga drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// don gnyer phyogs ngan srung ba'i thabs// skyer ba'i byang bu mtho gang la// mtshal gyis b+h+yo phaT nyer gcig bris// ngos gcig dag la stag seng gzugs// skye mched dod pa mkhas pas bri// 'dom gang dbyig pa'i rtse la btag/ gar 'gro'i phyogs su gom dgu khyer// de nas byang bu ske la gdags/ phyogs ngan nyes pas gos mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ phyogs ngan srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste nga bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dus min 'chi ba bzlog pa'i thabs/ kham sa'i rang gzugs lus tshod bzo// de la'ang rang gi gos bkon zhing// lus kyi dri ma phyi la byugs// ming 'dra mkhan 'dra'i

ston mo btang// zhag gcig rang dang lhan cig nyal// de nas rang nyid mun par gab// lus la thal chen ro sol byug/ yi dam lha yi ting 'dzin bsgom// rU pa gru gsum deng du bdur// steng nas sa sna mang pos byibs// gza' dang skar ma bzang la gtad// shi bdur lugs dang mthun par bya// des ni dus min 'chi ba bzlog/ tshe tshad gnas su skyol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba bzlog par byed pa'i le'u ste nga brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gag lhog gnyan mdzes mi tshugs thabs// gang bsrung lcags kyi phag rgod ni// 'jigs pa ri rgyud tsam zhig bsgom// phag rgod so dang sha tshil dang// nya sbal sdig pa'i sha bsres la// rtsa sngags khro chu'i sngags bzlas pas// ngar blud bsrung bya'i las la byug/ gnyan dang mdze lhog la sogs pa// sa bdag khros pa'i gnod pa bsrung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gag lhog gnyan mdze la sogs srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste nga dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// char pa dbab par byed pa'i thabs// sbal gsob gri thal dag gis brgyang// klu rdzas mang po btab pa yi// chur spangs steng nas rdza yis bkab// klu rnams bkug cing rdzas la bstim// phyi rol klu la mchod gsol bya/ char pa dbab pa'i phrin las gzhol// b+ha ri sha ya pa ta li hUM hUM/ nA ga ra tsa tsit+ta phrom phrom du phu rbad ya nA ga ra tsa b+ha ri sha ya sarba sid+d+hi swA hA/ stong phrag them nas char pa 'byung// rtsa ba'i sngags dang sbrel la bzlas// de bar sha chang sgog pa spang// las grub bcas bshig gnas su bskyod// drag char myur du 'bab par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ char dbab par byed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// char pa gcod par byed pa'i thabs// seng ldeng phur pa sor bzhi la// gri khrag dug gi khu ba yis// tsakra b+ha ri sha nA ga du tsit+ta rbad ram/ sa ma ya rbad swA hA/ rtsa sngags gsham can tshar gsum bri// la cha thang tshil nang du gtum// chu mig gnyan po'i gting du sba// ma bton bar du char pa chad// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud

bstan pa'i srog shing las/ char pa gcod par byed pa'i le'u ste re gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// sbud sna bzlog par byed pa'i thabs// khyi 'brug glang lug rus pa dang// rin chen sna lnga bsres pa'i sa// tsha tsha nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhengs// rab gnas gzungs sngags nang snying bcas// sbud sna 'ong ba'i thad du bkram// stobs chen khro bo'i nga rgyal bskyed// shwa sbud sbud sna bzlog par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ sbud sna bzlog par byed pa'i le'u ste re gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// skyi 'dang ser ba bzlog pa'i thabs// seng ldeng phur pa khru gang la// dar nag ro ras cod pan btag/ phur pa'i logs la khro bcu'i sngags// oM badzra kro d+ha hUM kA ra hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha b+hi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya g+h+r-I wa hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa ra dzi ta hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hUM/ dag par dris te gu gul dang// dug khrag khu bas byugs byas te/ khro bcu'i sngags kyis rno ngar blud// khro bo spyan drang phur bar bstim// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// ser ba dbab dus phur pa gzir// sngags bzlas stangs stabs sdigs mdzub bstan// skye 'dang ser ba bzlog par gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ser ba gcod par byed pa'i le'u ste re gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// nor phyugs god kha srung ba'i thabs// rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// gcan gzan dar ma'i thod pa ru// nad gdon bgegs kyi rU pa la// tshon skud sna lngas byad du gzhug/ ro ras yugs sa'i dor rtas gril// dgug gzhug byas la bcug nas kyang// 'bru nag la sogs thun rdzas kyis// thod pa de dag khengs par bya// dmod bcol drag sngags gang 'os bzlas// rgya srang lam gsum bzhi mdor mnan// ro g.yam rdo rje rgya gram dang// 'byung ba me chus mnan la bzhag/ god sri za lam dgra la gtad// zor dang thun gyi las rnams bya// des ni god kha 'byung mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/

god kha srung ba'i le'u ste re bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// chom rkun 'ching bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// dug shog ro ras mtho gang la// chom rkun dgra yi gzugs bris nas// zhing lpags khug ma'i nang du gtum// gnod byed sarba sha truM b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ sarba sha truM lo ka b+han+d+ha ya/ ma ra Na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ s+t+waM b+ha ya/ nA sha ya b+han+d+ha ya phaT/ ces pa rtsa sngags gsham la gdags// brgya phrag la sogs ci 'grub bzlas// zhing lpags gang bsrung gtso la gdags// de la gang 'khri thams cad bsrung// chom rkun dag gis gnod mi byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ chom rkun 'ching bar byed pa'i le'u ste re lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha 'ching la// dug shog dag la gcan gzan gzugs// lcags sgrog dag gis byad gzhug cing/ kha gdong rdo rje rgya gram bri// lto bar tsakra rtsibs brgyad bskor// du na sa khaM a mu ka phaT/ rtsibs brgyad dang dag la 'bru brgyad bkod// lto bar gcan gzan gang yin gyi// ming mthar mA ra ya chings bri// mtha' ma drag po'i sngags kyis bskor// gnod byed tsak+Shu mu khaM b+han d+ha ya/ tsakra war ti gcan gzan che ge mo mA ra ya/ du na sa khaM a mu ka phaT/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha sdoms/ lus rengs/ sems myos/ dbang po mA ra ya chings shig/ de ltar dmod pa'i drag sngags rnams// bris pa dag tu brgya phrag bzlas// de ni zha nye'i chu yis byug/ rang gshed rang rang rigs 'dra ba'i// mche ba can gyi thod par gzhug/ gcan gzan rgyu ba'i srang la mnan// des ni gcan gzan gdug pa 'ching// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gcan gzan gdug pa'i kha 'ching bar byed pa'i le'u ste re drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dug sprul khyi smyon la sogs pa// so dug can rnams srung ba'i thabs// gla rtsi bong nga nag po dang// rin chen gser dngul g.ya' dang ni// phyi tsher la cha phye ma rnams// dri chen dag dang lhan cig btul// ha la bI rtse kruM kruM/ shwa na haM ba na ka ba tsi ha la ma ra Na phaT/ de ltar rtsa sngags bcas pa la// gzhan tshig ma 'dres stong phrag bzlas// thum po byas te lus la (13)

btag/ des ni so dug thams cad bsrungs// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ so dug thams cad srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste re bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rmongs po srid dang 'phrad pa'i thabs// mi rta bong bu'i sa bon dang// g.yag lug ra gsum thug po yi// 'bras bu btul ba'i phye ma rnams// tsan+dan dkar dmar ga bur dang// dza ti a ru ra rnams btul// sbrang smyon dag gis ril bu bsgril// ri dwags gla ba'i ril ma tsam// pu tra sid+d+hi ku ru b+ha sa b+ha sa ma ri ted phob phob/ rtsa sngags bcas pa 'bum bzlas shing// lto staung gar chang dag gis phul// pho mo gang la btang gyur na// srid dang ldan par gdon mi za// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srid 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste re brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// srid 'phel pho ru bsgyur ba'i thabs// gdug pa sbrul gyi pags pa la// skyes pa'i sa bon mtshal bsres pas// ha k+Sh+yi khram pu tra bi dza hring/ gzab tu bris te dar dkar gril// bud med sbrum ma'i lus la btag/ skar ma rgyal dang sprad pa gces// des ni srid rnams pho ru 'byung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srid pho ru bsgyur ba'i le'u ste re dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rta phyugs la sogs srid 'phel bar// sre mo'i pags pa gsob bshus nas// gang gi srid 'phel 'dod pa yi// spu la srad bu byas nas kyang// dar tshon sna lngas de dag gril// gser dngul la sogs rin chen dang// 'bru sna rnams kyis gang ba byas// phyugs lhas la sogs ra ba yi// rta phyugs bres kyi steng du gdags// des ni rta phyugs srid 'phel nas// phyug po g.yang chen dag tu 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rta phyug la sogs nor gyi srid 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mi dang rta phyugs la sogs pa'i// srid rnams srung bar byed pa'i thabs// zangs dang zha nye dung gi sho// mtshal byug dmar po dar dkar gril// sho shaM haM

dz+nyai pa ra phaT du rbad rbad pra ma ni pu tra d+ha ri rak+Sh+yaM rak+Sh+yaM du swA hA/ rtsa sngags bcas pas brgya rtsa bzlas// srid dang ldan pa'i lus la gdags// srid la gegs med mthar phyin 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srid srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste don gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// pha rol gdug byed ngag gnon thabs// zha nye'i byang bu mig dgu la// kha sbyor bar du dmigs bya yi/ rU pa lce brkyang brang khebs steng// mtshal gyis rdo rje rgya gram bkod// yan lag byad du bcug pa can// bris te zag pa'i rdzas dang bcas// byang bur gtems nas tshon skud gril// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// dmigs bya'i rnam shes bkug la bstim// gang 'thad rwa co'i nang du gzhug/ kho yi 'grims lam sa ru mnan// smra mi shes te lkugs pa'am/ kha lce dig par gdon mi za// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ngag gnon par byed pa'i le'u ste don gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ngag mnan 'grol bar byed pa'i thabs// tsan+dan dkar po'i byang bu la// mtshal dang ga bur bsil ba'i chu// rang rang yi dam lha sngags dang// b+ha ga wa ti a pa ri mi ta/ wA ka sa ma ya b+h+rUM pra we sha ya phaT/ ces pa tshar gcig bris pa la// rang sngags stong gi rab gnas bya// nang ma nyer gcig de la ldag/ ngag mnan de las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi brgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ngag mnan 'grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste don gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ltas ngan cho 'phrul gtong ba'i thabs// bya rog 'ug pa wa spre'u sha/ sre mo'i slud bur gzhug par bya// yugs sa'i skra yi srad bu gdags// glad la bskor zhing sa la brdab// dmigs bya'i ming byang nang du gzhug/ a haM gul gul myag myag/ pra mo ni pra mo thun/ pra mo tra ma ni haM haM/ a ya ma du ru tsa sha na sa ma ya/ ku cho cho/ breng braing/ rgyug rgyug pa ra ling phaT b+h+yo/ zhag bdun mun pa'i gling du bsgrub/ gang dmigs dgra yi ming spel yang// haM dang a yi bar du gzhug/ lha srin sde brgyad tshogs rnams kyis// cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston par 'gyur// dang po rang la 'byung ba ste// de byung dgra la dmigs pa rbad// skul

byed las kyi gtor ma btang// pha rol khu 'phrig slong bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ltas ngan cho 'phrul 'byed pa'i le'u ste don bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ltas ngan cho 'phrul bzlog pa'i thabs// thod pa mtshan ngan dag gi nang// bra sran 'bru nag dag gis bkang// skyer pa tsher nag seng ldeng gi// phur pa mtho re byas pa la// sa ma ya ye ke tsit+ta rbad b+h+yo/ a ra li ye ke tsit+ta sa ma ya/ du ru ka sha pha ma sri tod pa we zlog byer zlog byer/ dug khrag dmigs bya mang du bri// de dag de yi nang du bcug/ steng na ro ras lding gur phub// rang gzhan gang yin khang phug sba// ltas ngan cho 'phrul gang yang bzlog/ sdigs par mi 'gyur phar la sdigs// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ltas ngan cho 'phrul bzlog pa'i le'u ste don lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mthun gnyis mi mthun 'byed pa'i thabs// rta rmig g.yag gi rwa co la// gang byed so so'i ming rus bri// bya rog 'ug pa'i pags pas gtum// dmigs bya'i zag rdzas gang rnyed byugs// so so'i lha rten 'og tu mnan// myur du so sor 'bral bar 'gyur// las grub rdzas bton bshig par bya// ji ltar mthun yang 'bral bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbye bar byed pa'i le'u ste don drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dbye ba mthun par byed pa'i thabs// rgyun 'bab chu sna dgu blangs la// ba ra 'bri yi 'o ma dang// tsan+dan ga pur la sogs pa// dri bzang sna tshogs btab pa la// lha sngags gang yin 'bum bzlas pa'i// chu de gang gang mi mthun pa// rkang lag gdong sogs lus rnams bkru// dri khus sbrus pa'i rang rang gzugs// dug shing me la bsregs nas kyang// de la rang rang lus po bshur// lan gsum bskyar bar gyur pa ni// ji ltar 'thab byed rtsod pa yang// mthun cing nyes pa grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dbye bar mthun par byed pa'i le'u ste don bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag

gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed khram la 'debs pa'i thabs// drag po'i shing la byas pa yis/ khram shing sor bzhi khru gang ba// dug khrag dag gis khyab par byugs// logs la stag re glang khrag dang// ro sol bsres pa'i snag tsha yis// gnod byed dgra bgegs che ge mo// lha yi khram la da thob cig/ de sogs sde brgyad khram yig bkod// ro ras nag pos gril byas la// sde brgyad 'gyu srang gnas su mnan// dmigs bya sde brgyad khram la 'debs// mi 'dod sna tshogs de la 'byung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dgra bo khram la 'debs par byed pa'i le'u ste don brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// khram la thebs pa phyi ba'i thabs// rang lus gzungs sngags chu yis bkru// gu gul dri chen dud pas bdug/ tsha tsha gnyis pa'i sa 'dag gis// mgo lus med par khyab par byug/ gcer bu phyogs bcur 'o dod 'bod// slar yang dur thal lus la byug/ dud 'gro mang po'i skad 'don zhing// bdag nyid che ge mo lha yi khram la thebs pa phyis// de'i 'gres yongs kyi khram phyis brjod// de nas rang gi dri chu yis// lus bkru gu gul dud pas bdug/ gang gis khram la btab gyur kyang// lan gsum dag gis grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ khram kha phyi bar byed pa'i le'u ste don dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod byed byad du gzhug pa'i thabs// shi skri'i srad bu 'dom gang bas// dmigs bya'i lus tshad rU pa bkyig/ rU pa 'bru nag sogs la bya// de yi snying gar ming byang gzhug/ bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// dmigs bya'i rnam shes bkug la bstim// dus gnyan drag po nam phyed dus// rgya srang lam gyi gzhi mdor mnan// lha 'dre'i ming 'bod dmod bcol bya// steng du dpal gyi rta bro brdung// dmigs bya rengs dang 'khums nas kyang// lus ngag yid gsum nyams par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gnod byed byad du gzhug pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gang dag byad las grol ba'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// bsrung bya

gang yin mdun du bzhag/ dang po byad thag sngo dmar gyis// mgo sogs yan lag bkyig tshul bya// mdun du dug shing hom me spar// ral gri'i so la rtsa sngags mthar// hri hri ma ma pa sha pra yo ga na maHhri d+hi sarba pA paM yak+Sha kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM phaT/ ces pa brgya phrag bzlas pa yis// ral gri'i byad thag thams cad bcad// dug shing me la bsreg par bya// lha sngags bzlas pa'i chu dag gis// bsrung bya'i kha lag gdong sogs bkru// gu gul dkar po'i dud pas bdug/ byin brlabs can gyi lha rten la// phyag dang skor ba byed du gzhug/ byad du bcug las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ byad du bcug pa las grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gang dag rmugs par byed pa'i thabs// gang la byed pa'i ming rus bri// bya nag sgong sgog nang du gzhug/ dmigs bya'i rnam shes bkug la bstim// bong bu'i sbangs dang sa nag bsre// gnag lce'i gwa'u byas par gzhug/ khri lam chen po'i 'og tu mnan// dmigs bya rmugs shing 'thom par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dgra bo rmugs par byed pa'i le'u ste gya gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rmugs shing 'thib las grol ba'i thabs// rang gi dbang po'i rdzas rnams dang// sa sbyin bsres pa'i rU pa ni// mtho gang skye mched dod par bzo// de la mi gtsang rdzas kyis byugs// ming rus mi gcig dgu dag gi/ dri chen dri chu la sogs pa// ba ra 'bri yi 'o ma dang// chu sna mi gcig dgu bsres la// dri bzang kha tshar btab pas bkru// til dang nyung dkar dud pas bdug/ mthar ni rU pa chu yis bshig/ de dag phyogs mtshams kun tu dor// rmugs shing 'thib las grol bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rmugs 'thib las grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gang dag rengs par byed pa'i thabs// g.yag lug rwa dang gtsod dang ni// rgya dang glang bu sha ba dang// gnyan dang dgo ba'i rwa co dgu// brdar ba'i phye la kham sa bsre// dmigs bya'i rU pa brgyang pa can// mtho gang skye mched dod pa

la// shing rigs mi mthun dgu dag gis// rtsang thur byas te lus la btsug/ shi skra'i skud pas rgya gram bcings// ri bo chen po'i rtse la bskyal// g.ya' sgrom byas pa'i nang du gzhug/ dmigs bya yan lag rengs par 'gyur// lus kyang g.yo 'gul mi shes 'byung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dgra bo rengs par byed pa'i le'u ste gya bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rengs pa grol bar byed pa'i thabs// dmigs bya dong brus nang du gzhug/ steng na kha leb byas pa'i mthar// ming rus mi gcig mi dgu yis// bro brdung shing sna'i dud pa btang// de nas bton la gzungs chus bkru// ras dkar dag gis lus la phyi// dug dung yin nam gi khu ba dkar po yis// lus la A li kA li bkod// de ltar lan gsum byas pas grol// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rengs pa'i sbyor ba grol bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mig nad sel bar byed pa'i thabs// nang par mi tshig ma 'dres par// rang gi dri chu drod mo yis// mig bkru bskams nas lag pas mnye// so la chags pa'i dri ma yis// lag g.yon srin lag dag gis byug/ bstud de nang ma nyer gcig bya// mig skyon rab rib mi 'byung zhing// skyon med yon tan ldan par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mig gi dbang po gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mgul nad zhi bar byed pa'ithabs// yung ba chu dag dkar po dang// ru rta tsan+dan dkar po rnams// bdud rtsi dbang po'i lag dang sbyar// ril bu sran ma 'bring tsam bya// rtsa sngags tha mar gdags pa'i sngags// ya ma sa du mu khaM/ b+ha ra b+he ya phaT/ ces pa stong phrag bzlas pa de// tho rangs dus su re re bstan// zhag re lo re'i mgul nad bsrung// sngon chad byung yang phan par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mgul nad zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub

gtan la pheb byas te// so nad zhi bar byed pa'i thabs// shing kun star zhun lug mig pa// gna' ba'i klad pa skam po dang// gla rtsi bong nag a ru ra// mu zi nag dang me ru tse// sngags pa'i dri chen cha mnyam nas// gu gul dri chur sbangs pa yi/ khu ba 'dam thag ril bu dril// sran tshad rul sum med par bskam// so nad rab tu gzir ba'i dus// khong du gsum btang gcig gis bdug/ lan gsum bskyar bas so nad rigs// gang yin thams cad 'joms par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ so nad zhi bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// lha gdon gnod pa bsrung ba'i thabs// dar dkar dri ma med pa'i khud// rin chen zur mang shel gril nas// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab gnas bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang// dam can chos skyong bkug la bstim// gsol mchod bkur sti rgya chen bya// mi lag mi brgyud lus la 'chang// lha gdon gnod pa dag las skyob// dar dkar dag la mtshal yig tu// rtsa sngags A li kA li dang// mos pa'i lha rnams mtshan sngags dang// rang rang gang 'dod dgod par bya// ye shes lha yis skyob pa dang// 'jig rten lha rnams bran du 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ lha gdon gyi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste gya dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// klu yi gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// wa dang grum pa phag gi sna// khyi dang spyang ki stag gi brun// sha ba g.yag dang gtsod kyi rA// lcags dang gser dngul rnam pa gsum// cha mnyam so sor dar gyis gril// lhan cig lcags kyi par bur bcug/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang khro bcu'i sngags// brgya stong la sogs mang bzlas la// par bu lus dang grib ltar 'chang// sa bdag klu yi gnod pa skyob// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ klu yi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste dgu bcu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gnod sbyin gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// byi la nag po'i thod pa ru// gnod sbyin rnams kyi srog sngags dang// dar zab rin chen sna tshogs gzhug/ gnod sbyin bkug bstim yang yang bya// de nyid dar dkar dag gis

gtums// rang nyid gang du gnas pa'i sar// byang du spas pas gnod sbyin gyi// gnod pa rnams las skyob par 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gnod sbyin gyi gnod pa las skyob par byed pa'i le'u ste go gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// dri za'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// tsan+dan phye ma'i 'de gu la// sman sna dri bzang gang 'tshogs bsre// ril bu phreng ba lus la 'chang// mi rta khyi yi bshul chen dang// gla rtsi bsres pa'i 'de gu yis// rkang pa'i mthil la skabs su byugs// dri za'i gnod pa bsrung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ dri za'i gnod pa las srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// mkha' 'gro'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// grong pa'i chos kyis ma gos shing// yid 'ong bu mos bkal ba yis// srad bu sum bsgril sna lnga la// mdud pa lnga lnga byas nas ni// so so'i rigs kyi DAk+ki bskyed// mtshan sngags rak+Sha'i gsham can la// rtsa ba'i sngags bcas brgya phrag gdab// mi lag ma brgyud bsrung bya yi// lus la srung byed srad bu gdags// ye shes DAk+kis bsrungs nas ni// 'jig rten mkha' 'gros gnod mi byed// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ mkha' 'gro ma yi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// drang srong gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// dza la b+ha ra'i so dang ni/ khyi so dar nag khud du gril// ha tri ru tra kha d+ha sa ma yA srog dung dung// nyi ma sa ti gza' kha Da ru tra tsit+ta hring hring// rtsa ba'i sngags dang sbrel te bzlas// brgya phrag grub nas lus la gdags// gang gi bcang ba'i mi de la// drang srong gza' yi gnod pa bsrung// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ drang srong gi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// srin po'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// dug shog dag la ra khrag gis// srin po'i gzugs bris yan lag sdom// k+Sha tri ni ra ti sa ma yA

srog dung dung tsit+ta rbad myog trag rak+sha ya dam la ma 'da' swA hA/ srin po gnad la dbab pa'i sngags// rtsa ba'i sngags sham btags la bri// phyi dang nang bcas gang bar bya// ra yi pags pas gril nas ni// gang gi lus la btags de la// srin po'i gnod pa 'byung mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ srin po'i gnod pa bsrung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ma mo'i gnod pa bsrung ba'i thabs// gri thal ro ras khug mar blug/ ma ma ru lu b+h+yo/ ro ru tsa pa la a shug me hUM b+h+yo/ sa ma ya rak+Sh+yaM swA hA/ rtsa sngags bcas pa brgya rtsa bzlas// til dang nyung dkar bcas pa yi// thum po lus la sus 'chang ba// de la ma mo'i gnod pa med// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ ma mo'i gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// shi 'dre'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// zhing lpags khug mar dur khrod kyi// sa rdo btul ba'i phye ma la// gu gul nyung dkar til nag bsre// chang gis sbrus pa'i ril bu bya// sngags pa'i dri chen dpung bskyed yin// ril bu sran ma rlon pa tsam// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis byin brlab bya// gang dag bsrung ba bya ba yi// lus la ril bu btag pas ni// shi 'dre'i gnod pa bsrung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ shi 'dre'i gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te/ gson 'dre srung bar byed pa'i thabs// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// btsan dug shing kun gu gul dang// chu dag spru nag rtsa ba dang// mu zi nag po spyang ki'i brun/ khyi nag brun dang rkyang gi sbangs// sdig pa nag po'i sha rnams btul// dri chen dri chus ngar blud la// nam gnod dus der dud pa btang// gson 'dre'i gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur// ril bu byas nas bcangs pa na// gson 'dres mi tshugs bsrung bar 'gyur// rtsa ba'i sngags kyis rab gnas bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gson 'dre'i gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam

mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rgyal po'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// chos 'khor rnying pa'i sa dag dang// tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong dang// dam tshig ma nyams sngags pa yi// dri chen dri chu sbyar ba yi// ril bu ri bong ril ma tsam// mi sha gu gul spre'u sha rnams// thum po bsrung bya'i lus la gdags// ra tsa tri ling hur thum myag tsit+ta sa ma ya myog myog ra tsa baM ri li li mA ra ya rbad/ ces pa rtsa sngags dril ba la// stong phrag bzlas pas rdzas ngar blud// rgyal po'i gnod pa bsrung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rgyal 'gong gi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste go dgu pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// the'u rang gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// byi ba sre mo'i klad pa dang// pha bong long bu btul ba rnams// sbang skam phye dang bsres nas ni// bra ba'i blud bu nang du blug/ nam dgos dus su dud pa btang// tri'u sha d+ha ra sha bing bing/ tri'u sha sha sa ma ya srog dung dung tri ling rbad swA hA/ zhes pa rtsa sngags gsham la gdags// mang du bzlas shing rdzas ngar blud// the'u rang gnod pas tshugs mi srid// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ the'u rang gi gnod pa srung ba'i le'u ste brgya tham pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// btsan gyi gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// shi skra'i srad bu khru gang la// mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// mi rta khyi gsum khrag gis byugs// gang gi lus la bcang de la// btsan gyi gnod pa bsrung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ btsan gyi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gcig pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gri bo'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// gri lcags btul ba'i phye ma la// mgar gyi sa mal til nyung dkar// dud pa gang du 'thul ba der// gri bo gang yang nyer mi nus// lus la btags kyang de bzhin no// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gri bo'i gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha'

'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// gshin rje'i gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// zangs lcags byang bu mig dgu la// shan pa nag po'i khrag gis byugs// dar sna lnga yi khud du gril// kA la rU pa ya mAn+ta ka sa ma ya rak+Sh+yaM du swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang bcas pa la// brgya phrag bzlas shing rab gnas bya// bsrung bya'i lus la byang bu gdags// gshin rje'i gnod pa bsrung bar 'gyur// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ gshin rje'i gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// grib gnon gnod pa srung ba'i thabs// gcan gzan stag gi thod rus la// hUM ya tik+Sh+yaM b+ha ru ti phaT rbad b+h+yo/ zhes pa mtshal lam dngul gyis bri// ro ras nag pos gril ba de// gang gi lus la btags pa la// grib gnon 'byung po'i gnod pa skyob// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ grib gnon gyi gnod pa srung bar byed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa'i thabs// rmi lam ngan pa gang rmis kyang// sad ma thag tu har gyis langs// gnod byed gtsor byas sems can la// byams dang snying rje rgya chen bskyed// skyabs gnas dkon mchog rin chen la// dad pas skyabs 'gro gsol ba gdab// snang srid 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// bden med rmi lam sgyu mar blta// gang yang gza' gtad med par gzhag/ phaT gdab bsam sems med par nyal// rmi lam ji ltar ngan gyur kyang// sdigs par mi 'gyur sangs par dag/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa'i thabs kyi le'u ste brgya dang lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// dad brtson ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro yi// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// bsnyen sgrub gtan la pheb byas te// ci bsam yid bzhin 'grub pa'i thabs// nang par tho rangs rlung ro dbyung// gsar ba bzung la mnyam par gzhag/ mnyam gzhag ngang las rang rig b+h+rUM// 'od dang gzi brjid ldan pa la// rang gi snying gi ngo bo de// dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// bkrag mdangs gzi brjid ldan par dmigs// de la bla ma yi dam dang// mkha' 'gro chos

skyong spyan drangs bstim// de ltar ma zin bar du bsgom// de la ma yengs zin pa dang// 'od kyis snang srid thams cad khyab// bdag don bsam grub re bskangs nas// longs spyod chos dang mthun nas kyang// bdag gzhan don 'bras gang bsams pa// rtsol med lhun gyis grub bsams nas// spros bral chen po'i ngang la gzhag/ de ltar nang re bzhin bsgoms pas// de nyid ji ltar bsams pa'i don// 'grub par gyur na gdon mi za// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ bsam don 'grub par byed pa'i le'u ste brgya dang drug pa'o// a+thi+-i/// rgyud 'di 'chang bar byed pa'i thabs// dus skar tshes grangs bzang po la// mthing shog rang sor bzhi pa'i tshad// gru bzhi mnyam nyid glegs bam la// rgyud tshig rin chen gser ram dngul// rat+na btul ba'i khu bas bri// gang yang lhag dang chad med pas// bris pa rang gi mdun bzhag ste// dam tshig yi ge'i 'bru rnams la// ye shes yig 'bru dgug la bstim// gzhan yang ye shes lha yi tshogs// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro rnams// mos pas spyan drang bkug la bstim// phyag 'tshal mchod dang bstod pa bya// ci 'dod yid smon gsol ba gdab// de nas sna tshogs dar gyis gril// dri bzang sman dang lhan cig tu// ran+ta'i za ma tog tu gzhug/ 'bral med lus dang grib ma bzhin// rang gi mchan khung g.yon du 'chang// nyon mongs rtog tshogs rab zhi nas// ye shes snang ba ngang gis 'char// gnas skabs rkyen dang bar chod sel// mthar thug mchog gi dngos grub 'byung// zhor la thun mong dngos grub kyang// rtsol med char gyi rgyun bzhin 'bab// nyes pa kun las grol nas kyang// bde legs yon tan dpal dang ldan// 'di dag lus la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor lus rgya bral ba'i tshe// 'ja' 'od sku gdung ring bsrel 'byung// sa g.yos me tog char 'bab cing// sgra dang bcas te rtags bzang 'byung// gang dag ye shes rgyud drug po// gang gis bcang dang klog pa dang// 'bri dang kun tu sus chud pa// tshe 'dir bde legs dpal la skyob// tshul khrims 'chal dang dam tshig nyams// sdom pa gsum la 'gal ba rnams// sor chud nyes pas mi gos shing// bskal pa grangs med sdig pa 'dag/ tshe 'phos rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing// skad cig nyid la bgrod par 'gyur// de don yang dag nyid la gnas// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rgyud 'chang ba'i thabs dang che ba'i yon tan bstan pa'i le'u ste brgya dang bdun pa'o// a+thi+-i/// e ma dpag med bcom ldan

gyis// sku gsung thugs las mngon byung ba// bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i lam// mthun rkyen bsgrub cing 'gal rkyen bzlog/ thun mong las tshogs yid bzhin nor// gdul bya 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// legs gsungs legs gsungs legs par gsungs// bdag dang yang sprul sprul pa'i 'khor// nyid kyi stobs las mngon byung ba// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// klu dang rig sngags 'chang la sogs// dri zar bcas rnams yi rangs nas// bcom ldan gsungs la mngon par bstod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing las/ rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste brgya dang brgyad pa'o// a+thi+-i/// yon tan khyad par rmad du byung ba'i rgyud bstan pa'i srog shing zhes bya ba/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis bsgyur ba rdzogs so// rta nag dregs pa sde brgyad tshogs kyis bka'i bya ra mdzod// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ d+ha thim/ sprul pa'i sku mchog sangs rgyas gling pas/ ja dkar dung gi sgo mo nas bton pa'o//// bla ma dgongs pa 'dus pa las bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi drag sngags phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg chod bzhugs so// u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ rgya gar skad du/ g+hu ru d+he wa DAk+ki ni/ sarba karma tan+t+ra k+Shu ra spr-i sha ts+tshe da na nA ma/ bod skad du/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen rngam pa drag po gtum rngam rab tu khros pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las mi zad pa rgyan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// snang srid rab tu g.yos nas ni// 'byung ba me rlung 'khrugs pa'i klong// bdud dang rU tra rab bsgral nas// sha khrag rgya mtshor 'khyil ba'i dbus// drag sngags mtshon cha'i gur khang du// dregs pa khyo shug bsnol ba'i steng// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas sku// gzi brjid rab 'bar skur bzhengs nas// stobs kyi dpa' shugs rab bskyed de// sku gsung thugs las 'od kyi zer// tsha tshwas snang srid stong khams gang// ma rungs pa rnams tshar gcod cing// sprul pa dpag med 'gyed pa'i tshe// 'khor gyi gtso mchog dbang chen rgyal// ha ya g+h+rI wa dgra bgegs gshed// rab tu khros pa'i stobs shugs can// sku la dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// spyi gtsug dbang skad rta mchog 'tsher// sprul dang yang sprul dpag med

'gyed// gsung gis rngam pa'i nga ro sgrogs// hUM phaT sgra yis stong gsum g.yo// ha ha'i gad mo cher 'byin cing// dgyes pa'i gdangs skad 'byung po skrag/ sgrol 'gyur med pa'i thugs klong nas// ngang gis ye shes rtsal 'byin yang// ma rungs pa la dug char 'bebs// brtse bas 'gro la rab dgongs nas// rdzu 'phrul shugs kyis drag por sprul// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi gtso mchog gis// nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul rtsal bshig nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// hrIH'bar ba'i klong nas skur bzhengs pa// yang dag don ldan bcom ldan 'das// sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa po// brtse bas bdag la deng 'dir dgongs// gdul bya rengs par gyur nas ni// ma dag log pa'i lam zhugs pa'i// lus ngag yid spyod ma rungs pa// sdang zhing gnod gdug rtsal phyung nas// yongs la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams// de dag 'dul bar byed pa'i thabs// drag po'i shugs kyis stsal du gsol// byams par gyur pa'i thugs mnga' zhing// zhi ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang// thabs kyis gdug pa 'dul slad du// rab tu khros pa'i shugs phyung nas// drag rbad las rnams stsal du gsol// zhes sogs myur du zhus pa'i tshe// bcom ldan rngam pa'i stangs stabs kyis// phyogs bcur gzigs shing gzi brjid kyis// snang srid ma lus rab tu g.yos// ma rungs cho 'phrul bkyes nas ni// ljags zor rngam pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sprul pa dbang chen dpal// gdul bya ma rungs 'dul ba'i las// thabs kyi rgyal por ngas bshad kyi// thog mar brnag pa'i 'dun pas nyon// bar du rab tu khros pas nyon// tha mar drag shul spyod pas nyon// sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes rim bzhin// gtan la gang phebs brnag par byos// log pa'i lam zhugs gdul bya rnams// thabs kyis 'dul bar bya ba dang// bdud dang rU tra la sogs pa// lam gyi 'gal rkyen byed pa'i bgegs// dgra sogs 'joms pa'i las rnams kyang// drag shul ldan pas yang dag brtsam// 'bar zhing rab tu rngam pa yis// legs brjod las dang las kyi rigs// rab tu gsal don yang dag brjod// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// a+thi+-i/// dgra bgegs log 'dren 'joms pa'i las// sngon du 'gro ba'i rim pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang dus dang gang zag dang// dmigs bya gang yin ngos bzung dang// dmigs bya'i rU pa bya ba dang// thun rdzas dang ni bcas ka ste// drag sngags bsgrub par byed pa'i gnas// spyi dang bye brag khyad par gsum// spyir ni rab 'jigs dur khrod

gnas// ngam nag skyi g.ya' hom khung 'dra// chu rong brag 'dab 'dre srin 'khrugs// bya gcan rngam pa ma rungs rgyu// gnam sa gru gsum ngam nag cing// dug dang dug shing mang po skyes// steng nas lhung la khad 'dra dang// 'og nas gyen du gzengs pa 'dra// sa rdo ri brag khros 'dra'i gnas// bye brag gnas ni bsam mi khyab// ye shes lha yi drag sngags gnas// spyi bo'i khrod du ma yin zhing// rab tu dben la bag phebs pa// bas mtha' yangs pa'i sa phyogs so// 'jig rten pa yi drag sngags gnas// dur khrod la sogs 'dre srin rgyu// rab gnas ma byas sa phyogs te// ngang gis 'jigs pa'i gnas su bsgrub// gzhan yang bye brag so so'i gnas// gang la gang rigs gnas su'o// khyad par drag sngags bsgrub pa'i gnas// rab ni sa dong mun pa ste// rim pa bdun gyi sa 'og na// las kyi gshin rje gnas pa'i phyir// stongs grogs mthu dpung byed pa'o// 'bring ni sa khebs brag phug stong// ngam nag mun pa rab tu 'khrigs// dregs pa sde brgyad gnas pa ste// byang phyogs kha blta'i phug pa shis// las rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sku gsung thugs rten mi bzhugs gnas// yang na rab tu gnas zhig cing// 'byung pos bdag byas gtsug lag khang// mdor na 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs// rgyu zhing gnas pa'i sar bsgrubs pas// gcig rgyab gcig gis byas pa yi// gang dang gang gis las byas pa'i// de dang de dag myur du 'grub// thogs pa med pa'i mthu thob 'gyur// de bzhin drag sngags bsgrub pa'i dus// dus gza' drag po rgyu ba ste// phung gsum bdud kyi nyi ma dang// dregs pa stobs ldan rgyu ba'i dus// gza' dang skar ma rtsub la sogs// gang dang gang gi rigs rnams la// de dang de yi rigs bstun nas// nam phyed srod dang mun pa 'khrigs// dus der drag po'i bsnyen sgrub dang// las la sbyar ba rab tu shis// zla ba mar gyi ngo dag la// las mtha' mnan bsreg zor las bya// yang ni sngags pa'i rgyud 'khrugs nas// rngam zhing ngar dang ldan pa'i dus// skad cig nyid der las sbyor brtsam// gnam lcags thog dang mtshungs pa ste// las gang thogs pa med par 'grub// rab tu g.yo ba'i dus dang ni// phyi nang 'byung ba 'khrugs pa dang// nyi zla sgra gcan 'dzom pa'i tshe// mngon spyod drag po'i las la 'jug/ des ni las rnams myur 'grub 'gyur// mngon spyod bsgrub pa'i gang zag ni// sems rgyud rab tu gtum pa las// blo stobs che zhing zhum pa med// lus rngam khro bo khros pa 'dra// mig rtsa dmar la skra lo gzing// spyod lam thug thub rab tu che// ngag nyung bzlas brjod sngags la brtson// sha khrag dmar la rab tu dad// drag po'i (14)

las la rab tu brtson// rgyud rtsub khro gtum rab tu che// zhe nag 'dzin shes gtong mi shes// bstan la brtse zhing spyi sems che// bya ba gang yang mthar 'byung byed// brtson 'grus ldan zhing snying rus can// gar yang thogs med 'jug pa yi// gang zag de 'dras bsgrub pa na// myur 'grub dgra bgegs thul bar 'gyur// de las log pa'i gang zag rigs// 'jam la zhi dul ldan pa yi// blo sna thung ba'i rigs can gyis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// dmigs bya ngos bzung rnam pa gnyis// dgra dang bgegs te dgra bo ni// spyi dang bye brag rnam pa gnyis// spyir ni sangs rgyas bstan pa la// gnag pa'i sems 'chang gdub rtsub can// dge 'dun spyi dgra byed pa dang// dkon mchog sde pa'i nor rnams 'joms// dkor cha 'joms shing dben gnas bshig/ byang chub sems dpa'i thugs dkrug cing// bsam gtan bsgom pa'i gegs byed pa// bla ma dam pa'i sku la bsdos// sems can yongs la 'tshe ba byed// rtag tu sdig pa'i las la spyod// dge 'dun dbyen byed gnag sems byed// dkon mchog gsum la rgyab kyis phyogs// mdor na sangs rgya bstan pa yi// spyi dgra byed cing 'gro la 'tshe// dmigs bya de 'dra bsgral ba'i yul// bye brag rang nyid ma nyes par// do bsdau phod btsug brnyas pa 'chang// rkun sna gtad cing jag 'dral byed// brdung btsog 'phrog bcom rtsub 'khrug ston// len nyes med par zhe gcod cing// sku la bsdo zhing rigs la bsnyegs// gnag pa'i mthil 'cha' za lam gcod// mdor na rang la sdang byed cing// lus ngag yid sogs du ma yis// gnod cing sdang bar gang byed pa'i// rnal 'byor sgos dgra yin pa'i phyir// de dag myur du bsgral ba'i yul// rang gis ma nyes gzhan gyis btsug/ de dag bsgral ba'i yul yin no// bgegs ni las kyi mnar ba yi// lus sems ma rungs 'byung po'i rigs// ngang gis gzhan la gnod gyur cing// dkar po dge ba'i bar chad byed// tshe la rku zhing srog la 'jab/ kha rje dbang thang dag la gnod// mtho ris thar pa'i gegs byed cing// 'khor ba ngan song rgyu sogs pa'i// bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha// skabs tshol glags lta lus srog 'joms// bsgrub la bar chad sna tshogs byed// 'dre bdud 'byung po gang dang gang// dge ba'i las dang bsam pa la// bar chad byed pa gang yin pa// mi min de dag bsgral ba'i yul// de ltar dmigs bya ngos zin nas// dgra bgegs rU pa bya ba ni// 'bur du dod dang ris su bris// ming byang dag la gdags pa'o// dang po 'bur du btod pa ni// so so'i zag rdzas rjes sa dang// dur khrod dag gi sa dang ni// phung shul 'dre gnas dag gi sa// dug

khrag ro sol dur thal dang// dme ba rabs chad mdze po yi// bsdad shul 'grim lam khang sa ste// mdor na shin tu bkra mi shis// ngan pa las byung rdzas rnams las/ kham sa gnag lci bag phye dang// 'bru nag phye dang dur thal dang// rang rang las kyi sa sna sogs// gang dang gang las byung ba yi// rU pa che tshad lus dang mnyam// 'br-ing po dmigs bya'i khru gang ste// tha ma de yi mtho gang tshad// gzugs dang dbang po skye mched dod// rid la nyam thag stobs dang bral// yi mug ngu ba'i rnam 'gyur can// yan lag rengs sam 'khums pa'i gzugs// sha shor rus pa'i mkhrig ma zhig/ bgegs la yi dwags rnam pa can// gsus pa che la yan lag rid// mjing pa phra zhing mgo bo rgyas// mig ni gyen la a 'bras log kha bgrad lce brkyangs ma ne 'phyang// pho mo gang yin dbang po dod// gang yang lus kyi cha tshang bar// 'os pa'i tshon gyis mdog bsgyur zhing// rnam shes chags pa'i gta' yin pas// gzugs dang skye mched dod par bya// ris su bris pa'i ling+ga ni// gzhi ma ro ras dug shog dang// la la zhing lpags dag la ste// gang yin che tshad mda' gang la// 'bring po khru gang tha ma yang// mtho gang sor bzhi dag la bri// snag tsha phal cher dug khrag ste// rang rang gang rigs rdzas kyis bri// de yang skye mched dod pa la// dbang po tshang zhing yan lag rdzogs/ kha mig bgrad cing skra lo gzing// rkang lag lcags sgrog byad du gzhug/ rang la rang gshed byed pa'i tshul// de ltar bris dang la la ni// dmigs bya'i 'dra 'bag gzugs su bkod// de dang de ltar bye brag rnams// rnam rig shes rab can dag gis// gang la gang 'os bkod par bya// de ltar bris pa'i snying ga ru// dgra la nr-i dang bgegs la tri// tha mar rang rang ming rus dang// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ma ra ya khug dza/ yig mgo nang du bstan pa bri// dpral bar rus bri kha la ni// dung dung dza dza bri bar bya// brla la bla dgas bri bar bya// byin pa gnyis la nr-i tri bri/ 'doms la phaT dang rkang zhabs yi// yan lag dzaHhUM baM hoHbkod// spyi bor mA ra ya nan bri// g.yas su pha rgyud rtsad chod dang// g.yon du ma rgyud mngal nas skoms// mdun nam lto bar srid pa dkrug/ ces sogs dmod mo gang shes bri// tha mar las sngags gang 'os bkod// de'i mthar dzaHdang khram ris dang// sbal sbrul sdig pa 'dzings pas bskor// thar lam bros khung med pa'i tshul// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i klong du tshud// gzhi ma sa steng med pa can// rab tu gtams pa bri bar bya// de las gzhan yang rang rang gis// las mtha' dang ni bstun te bri// de ltar bris pa'i rU pa la// rang rang zag pa'i rdzas kyis byugs// sngags rnams mi bklag rang bab

bzhag/ mnga' thang nyams par bya ba'i phyir// mgo rting bzlog nas lteb pa dang// bzhag pa'i lugs kyang de bzhin bya// dug khrag la sogs rdzas ngan yang// gang rigs las kyi mtha' dang bstun// mdor na brnag par byed pa yi// dgra bgegs rU pa'i ling+ga ni// rang gzugs skye mched dod pa la// rab tu nyams pa'i tshul can bya// thun rdzas skam rlon rnam pa gnyis// skam thun rdzas ngan sna tshogs dang// ke tse shang tse nyung dkar dang// til dang 'bru nag sna tshogs dang// zha nye zangs lcags khro phye dang// rtsub pa'i rdo phye dkar nag dang// dug rigs sna tshogs 'bras bu dang// dur khrod las byung rdzas rnams dang// rang rang gshed rdzas sna tshogs so// rlon thun khrag la gzhi blangs pa'i// sna tshogs dug gi khu ba dang// yugs sa'i mngal khrag mdzo drel chu// mdze pho'i khrag rnams gang rnyed dang// mtsho lkugs chu mig lkugs pa'i chu// rabs chad pho mo'i mchil snabs dang// lkugs pa'i dri chen dri chu dang// de sogs rdzas ngan sna tshogs pa// phye ma ril bu spangs pa la// dri ngan rab tu bku ba can// shin tu gdug par byas pa'o// de nas bca' ga'i rim pa ni// shin tu nag pa'i gnas khang du// byang du kha bltas brub dong bcas// dur khrod la sogs sa rdzas kyis// stegs bu mda' gang gru bzhi'am// 'dom gang gru bzhi la sogs pa'i// rigs dang rigs las byung ba bya// dpangs su khru gang byas pa la// dbus su brub dong gru gsum bya// yangs dog thod pa kha sbyor shong// de las gzhan yang gang rigs bya// phyi nang med par dug khrag dang// dur thal ro sol dag gis byugs// rdzas ngan rnam pa du ma yis// dkyil 'khor brub dang khyab par byugs/ kha bad bang rim lcags ri sogs// tha ma drag po'i rtsang gis bskor// rigs dang rigs mthun ldan pa'o// mkhas pas gang la gang rigs bya// mdor na 'jigs la rngam pa can// las kyi gshin rje'i pho brang ltar// zhing lpags mi mgo'i dra phyed dang// rgyu ma'i lda ldi ro ras kyi// 'phan gdugs la sogs dur khrod kyi// pho brang rab tu 'jigs par bya// de las gzhan yang bcas kyi rigs// gang la gang dang de la de'i// bye brag rnam pa mang po dag/ mkhas pa rnams kyis dpyad de bya/ khro rgyal gtum po'i pho brang las// dregs pa sde brgyad 'du ba'i gnas// 'dre srin 'byung po 'tshogs pa'i sa// drag po las kyi hom yin pas// 'jigs la ya nga'i tshul can bya// de ltar byas pa'i hom khung du// dgra bgegs dmigs bya'i rU pa gzhug/ thod pa kha sbyor la sogs pa'i// ling snod rdzas ngan gang rigs kyi// nang du gzhug par byed pa'o// ming byang dag la 'di ltar gdab// drag po dag ni dug rigs kyi// shing las byas pa'i byang

bu la// dug khrag rdzas ngan sna tshogs kyis// dgra bo'i ming rus mkhan gsum bkod// sgo khyi yul 'brog sa zhing dang// bang mkhar mi nor 'khor bcas kyi// nor 'khrul med pa'i ming bkod de// brub dong phyi nang bar khyams su// rnam pa mang du byas la bkod// gzugs dang bkram pa gang rigs bya// de nas snang srid lha 'dre la// gtor ma gser skyems btang nas kyang// bka' bsgo bden stobs drag tu brjod// ye shes lha la mkhyen gsol bya// 'jig rten lha la nyes pa bsgrag/ rang gis ma nyes bden pa brjod/ kho yis nyes pa phra ma gzhug/ rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// blta ba gnad du tshud pa dang// ye shes lha yi sngags tshad bgrang// rang rang gnyen po stobs kyi lha// gang la gang rigs ldan pa gces// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las/ sngon du 'gro ba'i las rim bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// a+thi+-i/// bcom ldan dpag med he ru kas// dbang chen 'bar ba la sogs pa'i// drag po 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// drag sngags dngos gzhi'i las gsungs pa// bsnyen dang sgrub pa las sbyor te// bsnyen pa la yang rnam pa gnyis// ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa dang// 'jig rten dregs pa'i bsnyen pa'o// ye shes lha yi bsnyen pa la// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum ldan pa'i// grangs rtags dus tshad gtan la dbab// 'jig rten dregs pa'i bsnyen pa la// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// gnad la dbab pa'i tshul gyis ni// lha srin dregs pa gang yin pa// srog sngags g.yel med myur du 'bad// mngon sum rtags kyis gtan la dbab// rnal 'byor g.yo med ngang du bzhag/ de sogs bsnyen pa'i rim pa rnams// gong gnon yin pas tshags su gzhug/ de nas sgrub pa byed pa ni// dang po 'bod pa'i bsgrub pa dang// bar du rbad pa'i bsgrub pa dang// tha mar bsad pa'i las rim ste// spyi dril rnams la nges pa med// man ngag rang rang gzhung du bya// dang po 'bod pa rnam pa gnyis// ting 'dzin sngags dang rdzas bcas la// brten nas ye shes lha 'bod bsgrub// grub nas gang 'dod phrin las sbyar// dmigs rten rdzas dang dkyil 'khor dang// skong rdzas gtor tshogs rang rang gi/ dgyes pa'i rdzas dang dmigs pa dang// drag po'i sngags kyi rim pa la// brten nas 'jig rten lha 'dre 'bod// bdag bskyed ye shes lha gsal gdab// che ba'i nga rgyal drag tu bskyed// 'jig rten lha 'dre mdun du dmigs// bran dang bka' nyan tshul du bya// mdor na rje dang 'bangs kyi tshul// de lta bu yi tshul du 'bod// rbad dang bsad pa'i bsgrub pa ni// zung 'jug yin pas 'di lta ste// dmigs bya bskyed dang

dgug pa dang// lha dbye srog dang phral ba dang// gzugs la dbab dang byad du gzhug/ thun gyis brab dang srog 'phrog las// gzugs phung lha la dbul ba dang// rnam shes spar dang tshe lung dang/ khrus lung dag gis las la sbyar// dang po dmigs bya bskyed pa ni// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal gyis// mdun du las kyi gshin rje yi// pho brang drag shul 'jigs pa'i gnas// gti mug mun pa nag po'i nang// zhe sdang rlung nag 'tshub pa'i dkyil// 'dod chags me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus// las kyi bshan pa rgyu ba'i sa// khro rgyal dmag dpung 'dus pa der// dmigs rten rU pa de nyid kyi// dgra bgegs gang yin sa bon las// mngon sum lam mer snang ba'i gzugs// shin tu rid la nyam thag pa// lag pa mya ngan phyag rgya bca'// skra gzing mig nas mchi ma 'bab// so gtsigs lce brkyangs ma ne 'phyang// yi mug tshul du gnas pa'am// yang na dgra bgegs gang yin kyang// rang gzugs rnam 'gyur cha lugs can// shin tu rgud pa'i rnam par gsal// de ltar brten la bskyed nas kyang// rnam shes rten la dgug pa ni// rang nyid dbang chen 'bar ba'am// mos pa'i khro bor bskyed bya ste// che ba'i nga rgyal ldan pa'i ngang// thugs ka la sogs gnas rnams nas// pho nya sprul pa'i las mkhan ni// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// dpag tu med pa'i spro bsdu yi// dgra bo zas la yengs pa'am// gnyid kyis non pa'i dus su dgug/ lag pa lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bca'// dkon mchog bden pa'i stobs brjod de// dmigs bya dgra bo gang yin gyi// rnam shes yi ge nr-i yi tshul// rang dbang med par bkug nas kyang// dmigs rten rU pa dag la bstim// gzhan yang dbang po gzugs phung bcas// drag tu bkug la gzugs la bstim// lus 'dar ngag dngangs sems myos nas// mngon sum mdun du khugs par bsam// bgegs kyi sa bon tri las bskyed// dgug gzhug sngar dang 'dra ba las/ khyad par nam phyed nyin byed dgug/ rnam shes tri yi rnam pa can// dmigs rten rang gzugs dag la bstim// gzhan yang dgra bgegs 'gugs pa yi// sbyor ba'i rnam grangs dpag med bya// lha dbye grogs dang phral ba ni// rdzas ngan dud pas rU pa bdug/ dbye ba'i phyag rgya dmod mo dang// sngags rnams brjod cing dmigs pa gtad// pho lha dgra lha ma lha dang// zhang lha srog lha le'u'i lha// yul gyi rtse lha la sogs pa'i// mgon skyabs dpung grogs byed pa yi// rgyab brten dag dang phral bar bya// grogs med rten dang bral nas kyang// mgon skyabs dpung rogs med par bsam// de nas gzugs la dbab pa ni// lus la lus dang ngag la

ngag/ rnam par shes pa rten la bstim// de yang bye ma tshan mo la// mar thim lta bur gyur nas kyang// lus ngag yid gsum gcig tu 'dres// de yang lus ngag yid gsum po// rnam par nyams nas rab tu myos// bkrag dang gzi mdangs yal nas ni// sngo la ham pa thal ba'i mdog/ dbang po'i stobs bcud nyams par dmigs// de nas byad du bcug pa ni// dbang po yan lag byad du gzhug/ rnam shes gru gu lta bur bsgril// phyag rgyas yan lag bkyig pa dang// 'khyog 'gul med par bsdam pa'i tshul// tshon skud sna lnga la sogs pa// byad thag rnams kyis rU pa de// 'gul dbang med pa'i tshul gyis ni// rgya gram skor bu ris su
