bsdam// stobs dang gzi mdangs nyams nas ni// mkha' lding gdos kyi non pa ltar// g.yo 'gul med par gyur bsam mo// de nas thun gyis brab bya ste// skam thun rlon thun gang yin kyang// bsad sngags las kyis ngar blud de// thun rnams sprul pa las kyi mtshon// gnam lcags 'bar ba'i thog chen dang// dug dang nad kyi skyi 'dang char// rno ngar ldan pa'i mtshon char dmigs// rig pa'i ngar bskyed ting 'dzin bsar// las sngags drag po 'brug ltar bzlas// thun char drag po thog ltar dbab// ting 'dzin myur mgyogs glog ltar bskul// dmod mo ngan pa mda' ltar 'phen// brnag sems zhe sdang mun ltar gtibs// srog gi shan pa rbab ltar bsgril// dus gsum dus drug thun lam blangs// de nas pho nya'i dmag drangs la// srog 'phrog bsad pa'i las la 'jug/ pho nya rbad cing phrin las bskul// las kyi shan pa ma rungs pa// sprul pa yang sprul bcas rnams kyis// dmigs bya dgra bgegs gang yin pa// srog bcad dbugs 'gag lus po gtubs// sha zos khrag 'thung rus pa bcom// lhag rol tsam yang med par bsam// rul myags thal ba rdul du brlag/ bsad pa las kyi spu gri'i ngar// rab tu 'bar ba'i las byas bsam// de ltar rnam shes rten dang phral// srog dang bral ba'i gzugs phung de// ye shes las las grub pa yi// lha dang srung ma thams cad kyi// zhal du dbul zhing bstab par bya// 'dod chags khrag la hub kyis btab// zhe sdang rus la chem gyis bzas// gti mug sha la hab kyis rngam// dug gsum sha khrag rus pa'i tshogs// lha dang srung ma'i zhal du bstab// rdul cha phra mo tsam zhig kyang// ma lus zhal du thim par dmigs// de ltar gzugs phung lha la 'bul// las kyi lhag ma bsdu bar bya// de nas rnam shes spar ba ni// bdag nyid lha yi thugs ka nas// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba// rgyangs kyis thon nas dmigs bya yi// rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo ni/ khab len rdo yis lcags blang

bzhin// ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar thim// ye shes sems dpa' rang nyid kyi// thugs kar thim nas gnyis med kyi// rang nyid chos kyi dbyings su gshegs// yang na ye shes sems dpa' de// dpag chen gnam mda' 'phang ba bzhin// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs par dmigs// tshe lung bdag gi thugs ka nas// yi ge a dkar 'phros pa yis// kho yi tshe srog bkug nas kyang// rang gi snying gar bstim pa yis// rang gi tshe srog bsnon par dmigs/ khrus lung rang gi gnas gsum nas// yi ge 'bru gsum 'phros pa las// ye shes bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun babs// dmigs bya'i lus ngag yid la phog/ de yi nyon mongs sdig sgrib rnams// rnam par byang de sgrib bral nas// ye shes chen por gyur par dmigs// de ltar gnas spar tshe lung khrus// sgrib sbyang las sbyor gang byed kyang// ye shes lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// snying rje byang sems rgyud la bya// ye shes dag pa'i dgongs pas spar// sgrib pa dag nas las rnams 'grub// byang chub lam gyi grogs su 'gyur// de ltar mngon spyod dngos kyi las// stobs chen rgyal pos brtsam pa na// gnod byed dgra bgegs brlag par 'gyur// yang dag las kyi mthar thug ste// gdul bya log sred gyur pa rnams// bsgral nas 'dren pa'i thabs mchog go/ bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las/ dngos gzhi'i las rim bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// a+thi+-i/// gzi brjid mtha' yas bcom ldan 'das// ston pa dbang mchog rgyal po la// 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi gtsor gyur pa// dbang chen 'bar bas yang zhus pa// drag po'i las kyi mtha' sdud rnams// gdul bya'i 'khor la stsal du gsol// zhes pa stobs kyis zhus pa yis// ston pa gzi brjid dpal 'bar bas// drag po'i las rjes bka' stsal pa// ma yengs 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gnod byed dgra bgegs bsgral la sogs// drag sngags las kyi rjes rnams ni// rang nyid ma nyes dpang gzug dang// kho yi nyes pa bsgrag pa dang// bzhes drangs za lam gtad pa dang// phrin brdzang mnan bsreg 'phen pa'o// rang nyid ma nyes dpang gzug pa// ye shes lha dang srung ma dang// snang srid lha 'dre rnams dang ni// yul lha gzhi bdag la sogs la// gtor ma gser skyems gsol mchod bya// bdag nyid lha yi nga rgyal bskyed// ho phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dang// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dam can chos skyong srung ma dang// ye shes dbyings kyi lha tshogs rnams// bdag la gsan cing dgongs su gsol// lha klu gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i// snang zhing srid pa'i lha 'dre rnams// 'jig rten

las las grub pa yi// sprul pa yang sprul bcas pa ste// 'jig rten srung ma 'khor bcas rnams// bdag la gsan cing dgongs su gsol// phyogs mtshams steng 'og la gnas pa'i// yul gyi sa bdag gzhi bdag dang// rtsi shing nags tshal ri brag la// gnas shing rten bcas mi ma yin// snang srid lha 'dre ma lus rnams// bdag la gsan cing dgongs su gsol// rgyal po blon po btsun mo ste// mgo nag stong sde srid pa'i bdag/ pho mo 'gro ba ma lus pa// bdag la gsan cing dgongs su gsol// legs nyes gnyis kyi stangs gcod cing// bzang ngan gnyis kyi shan 'byed pa'i// mkhyen ldan rnams kyis gzu dpang mdzod// bdag ni ma nyes g.yo med de// thog ma med nas da lta'i bar// bla med byang chub chos spyod pas// 'dir yang theg mchog chos dang mjal// skyes nas da lta'i bar dag tu// mi dge spangs nas dge ba spyad// lus ngag yid gsum chos la spyod// las kyi rgyu 'bras khyad ma bsad// dkon mchog gsum po thod bzhin khur// dam can chos skyong rtag tu mchod// snang srid lha 'dre'i yi ma bcad// rigs drug pha ma sun ma phyung// tshe gcig byang chub bsgrubs lags kyang// las kyi dkar nag bden pa rnams// bden brdzun dbye ba khyed rnams kyis// bden rdzun shan 'byed mdzad du gsol// bdag la nyes pa cung zad med// de phyir deng 'dir gzu+u dpang mdzod// bden pa can la mthu dpung bskyed// mi bden pa la bka' chad phob// ces sogs gang dang gang rigs pa'i// ma nyes dpang gzug gang shes brjod// de nas kho yi nyes pa bsgrag/ gnod byed dgra bgegs che ge mo// yar gyi lha la do bsdos shing// mar gyi 'dre la brnyas pa btsug/ bar gyi grogs la 'gran sems bcas// sangs rgyas bstan pa'i spyi dgra byas// dkon mchog gsum gyi dbu 'phang smad// bla ma dam pa'i sku la bsdos// gsang sngags gnyan gyi dam tshig bkral// chos 'khor gtsug lag dkor nor bcom// 'gro ba yongs la gnod pa bskyal// sdig pa mi dge sna tshogs spyad// las 'bras dkar po khyad du bsad// bstan pa yongs kyi rigs la bsnyeg/ rnal 'byor sngags 'chang bdag cag la// do brdaus phod btsug gnod pa bskyal// dkon mchog skyabs gnas mi bden zer// 'di yis las ngan sna tshogs spyad// 'di la bsgral ba'i zhing bcu tshang// nyes pa can gyi che ge 'dis// rang gis las byas rang la smin// 'di la bka' chad dbab tu gsol// zhes sogs nyes pa du ma bsgrag/ dgra dang bgegs gnyis so so yi// nyes pa bsgrag tshul shes par bya// de nas bzhes drangs gtor ma bskyal// zor la sogs pa gang dang gang// 'os pa'i las sbyar skabs rnams

su// 'di ltar dmod bcol las rnams bya// ho dgra bo dam nyams bsgral ba'i zhing bcur gyur pa'i che ge mo 'di la bsad pa dang bsgral ba'i las tshang bas/ che ge mo 'di las kyi rlung dmar gyis rgyab nas bskyod du chug cig/ gti mug 'jigs pa'i mun nag gis mdun nas gtib cig/ 'dod chags rngam pa'i me dpung gi tsha ba'i dbal gyis gzhob du sreg gcig/ zhe sdang drag po'i ri rgyal lhun po'i 'og tu non cig/ phrag dog rngam pa'i chu srin gdug pa can gyi gre bar stim zhing/ nga rgyal rtsub 'gyur gyi 'khor lo stobs chen gyi rtsibs la skyon cig/ shan 'byed las kyi gshin rjes khram la thob cig/ pho nya las byed 'jigs pa'i sha zan gyi khar chug cig/ nyon mongs las kyi rgya mtsho gting med kyi gting du skyur cig/ mi bzad 'bar ba'i byad thag lcags sgrog gis byad du chug cig/ khro rgyal 'bar ba'i phyag mtshan las kyi mtshon cha'i char phob cig/ lan chags las kyi gzugs phung 'byung po 'dre srin 'tshogs pa'i btson dong du skyur cig/ lhan cig skyes pa'i lha bdud du phob cig/ mnyam par 'ong ba'i bdud kyis bskos la thob cig/ gnam gyi 'ju thag dkar po gyen du chod cig/ rten pa sa'i rtod phur drungs nas phyung zhig/ che ge mo 'di yar gyi che gsum dang phrol cig/ mar gyi chung gsum dang phrol cig/ dkon pa'i tshe srog stung zhig/ lta ba'i mig dang phrol cig/ bsam pa'i snying dang phrol cig/ rgyab brten dpung rogs dang phrol cig/ 'go ba'i lha dang phrol cig/ skyobs pa'i dbon dang phrol cig/ bsten pa'i rje dang phrol cig/ gnas pa'i yul dang phrol cig/ mdza' ba'i grogs dang phrol cig/ bsags pa'i nor dang phrol cig/ phung gsum bdud dang sprod cig/ gnya' non byur dang sprod cig/ sdang ba'i dgra dang sprod cig/ gnod pa'i bgegs dang sprod cig/ 'du ba'i nad dang sprod cig/ 'chi ba'i rkyen dang sprod cig/ pho bdud mo la phob cig/ mo bdud pho la phob cig/ rgyab kyi gos dang phrol cig kha'i zas dang phrol cig/ sbo'i chung ma dang phrol cig/ mchan gyi bu dang phrol cig/ lag gi nor dang phrol cig/ bla mchod bdud du phob cig/ nye ba dgra ru slong zhig/ lha gshed bdud du thob cig/ pho rgyud rtsad nas chod cig/ mo rgyud mngal nas skoms shig/ chung rgyud drungs nas phyung zhig/ yar gyi che gsum la bab na seng chen gyi khog pa 'bus g.yeng ba bzhin du thong zhig/ mar gyi chung gsum la bab na lcug phran zor bas brngas pa bzhin du thong zhig/ pha spun nang tshan la bab na lug khyu la 'phar sbyang brgyab pa bzhin du thong zhig/ pha khu rgan rim la bab na sdong rgan rtsa ba nas 'gyel ba bzhin du thong zhig/ gzhon nu dar ma la bab na sgo nga brag la brgyab pa bzhin

du thong zhig/ mo btsun mdzangs ma la bab na me tog sad kyis khyer ba bzhin du thong zhig/ zas nor longs spyod la bab na me rdul rlung gi bskyod pa ltar thong zhig/ g.yo ba'i lus la bab na drag chen la thog phog pa ltar thong zhig/ smra ba'i lce la bab na bung ba theb kyis mnan pa ltar thong zhig/ bsam pa'i snying la bab na smyo 'bog can brgyal nad kyis thebs pa ltar thong zhig/ bya ba'i las la bab na shog skya rlung gis bskyod pa ltar thong zhig/ stod la tsha ba'i nad kyis gzir zhig/ smad la grang ba'i nad kyis gdungs shig/ bar du 'dus pa'i nad kyis dkrug cig/ klad khrag zho ltar dkrug cig/ lus sems bal ltar g.yeng zhig/ gzhogs g.yas pa skam du chug cig/ g.yon pa rul du chug cig/ chu dang gram thang skya mo'i bar du ya thod nyi ma 'de ru chug cig/ ma thod bye ma 'gam du chug cig/ che ge mo 'di la mi rung ba'i ltas ngan cho 'phrul sna tshogs thong zhig/ lus srog dbang thang dang bcas pa lhag ma med par myur du bzhes shig/ mi tshe ring po la dus ma 'debs par bzhes shig/ bar snang stong pa la tshad ma 'dzugs par bzhes shig/ skye rga na 'chi la khungs ma 'byin par bzhes zhig/ ces pa la sogs bzhes drangs shing/ dmod mo sna tshogs rigs mthun brjod// de nas za lam gtad pa ni// dmigs bya'i rU pa khrag ris can// srung ma'i gtor ma bcas pa 'bul// phrin las myur mgyogs brag tu bskul// dul mo brtul zhing las la rbad// de nas drag tu 'di skad brjod// ho/ ye shes dang las las grub pa'i srung rang rang gi srung ma'i ming nas brjod do// ma thugs dam can khyed rnams la/ dgra bo che ge mo 'di'i lus srog dbang thang chus srid dang bcas pa zas skal du gtad pa yin pas/ 'di'i sha zo/ khrag 'thung/ srog chod/ dbugs longs/ las kyi mtha' bsdus la/ lo dang zla bar ma bzhag/ zhag dang za mar ma shor bar myur du sgrol cig/ che ge mo 'di'i lus srog la steng lha'i za lam gtod cig/ 'og klu'i za lam gtod cig/ drang srong gza'i za lam gtod cig/ ces sogs srung ma mang po dang// snang srid lha 'dre mang po yi// ming nas bos te za lam gtad// rigs dang rigs mthun bdud du dbab// de bzhin rang gshed rang dbab kyi// za lam gtad pa'i rim pa rnams// las mthun sprad pa'i drag sngags brjod// drang srong rnams kyi dmod pa 'dor// bgegs chen dag kyang gshed du dbab// las kyi rim pa drag myur 'bad// de nas nang rtags cho 'phrul dang// rtsub 'gyur sna tshogs 'byung ba dang// srung ma thams cad drag tu rbad// phrin las bskul zhing gnyer gtad bya// dgra la 'khu 'phrig slong ba yi// ltas ngan phrin bskyel gtang bar bya// sna sel las

kyi gtor ma btang// dam can chos skyong la sogs pa// srung ma gnad la dbab bya zhing/ kho la cho 'phrul 'byung tshul rnams// dug shog ro ras nag po la// phrin rdzong yi ge bris nas kyang// gshed dang sprad la gnas su bskyal// gang la gang rigs gnad dang bstun// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i las sbyor rnams// bskrad dang dbye dang gzir la sogs// las mtha' mngon spyod drag tu gzir// rnam par nyams par byed pa'i las// drag shul 'jigs pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// las rjes dgra bgegs ling ro rnams// mdze pho rabs chad nag po dang// klo mon mtha' mi'i thod pa dang// gcan gzan dar ma'i thod pa ste// gang la gang rigs nang du brub// thun dang thal 'dam nag pos bcad// ro ching ro ras yugs sa yi// dor mas gril nas tshon skud kyis// byad du gzhug sogs dam par bya// dus gza' phud gsum dag dang sprad// la gnyan lung gnyan chu mdo dang/ khrims lam bzhi mdo la sogs pa'i// lha 'dre ma rungs gnas pa'i sa// chu brag gtsug lag mchod rten zhabs// gang 'os sa ru gnan gtad bya// steng nas 'byung ba me chu dang// ro g.yam rang thag chag po la// ri rab rdo rje rgya gram bri// mnan gzir dmod bcol bcas pas mnan// mnan pa las kyi mtha' sdud kyi// las sbyor gnad la dbab par bya// dgra dpung mnan dang bgegs dpung bshig/ smyo byed las kyi sbyor ba bya// yang ni las rjes bsreg pa ste// phung gsum bdud kyi nyi ma la// drag po'i shing gis hom khung brtseg/ dug khrag til nag 'bru nag sogs// thun rdzas rnam pa sna tshogs dang// dmigs bya'i rU pa gtor ma dang// sha khrag la sogs bsreg rdzas bcas// mtshon gyis gtubs la rim bzhin 'bul// me spar lha bskyed las rnams bya// me nang drag po'i srung ma dang// pho nya las mkhan rngams pa bskyed/ kha gdangs nang du dmigs te phul// rang rang las sbyor sngags dang bcas// dmod pa'i tshig gis drag myur bsreg/ bar mtshams le lo ma zhugs shing// ting 'dzin thang lhod med par bya// dmigs bya lhag med bzhes shing bsreg/ ro ma thal sol rlung la 'phyar// yang na khrims lam dong du mnan// 'phen pa zor gyi las rnams ni// drag sngags las kyi gtor ma de// sde brgyad dregs pa 'gyu dus dang// phyogs sbrad dmigs pa'i ngar dang bcas// dug khrag mtshon cha'i char phab nas// dmigs bya dgra dang bgegs kyi steng// gnam lcags skyi 'dong 'bab pa ltar// rdul phran lta bur brlag dmigs te// las kyi sngags dang dmod mo'i tshig/ zor gyi las su brdeg par bya// rnal 'byor khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis// lus kyis dpa' shugs gzi brjid bskyed// ngag

tu zor las dmod pa gyer// yid kyis zhe sdang brnag sems bcas// rnam 'gyur tshom rngams 'jigs gzugs bstan// dul mo brtul zhing thal mo brdab// mchi ma phyung zhing 'o dod 'bod// dmod bcol las kyi spu gri gdags// dar chen bskyed pa'i rol mo bsgrag/ mi rung cho 'phrul 'gyed pa'i phyir// ro mgo bsgril zhing ro lag g.yab// zhing lpags dag kyang drag tu brdab// 'byung ba me chu la sogs gtor// de ltar drag po'i las kyi mtha'// rbad bskul mnan bsreg 'phen pa sogs// gang dang gang dag las sbyor rnams// gnas skabs tshul dang tshul min par// bye brag rim pa phyes la brtsam// las byas gnad du song ba dang// ma song rang la log pa dang// ma log nyes med gzhan la 'byams// de dang de yi la nye brtag/ bzlog pa byad ma gnad la dbab// rdugs pa dag la yang yang bskyar// 'byams la dmigs bsgyur gsal shing btsug/ rang dang pha rol dmigs bya yi// lha dang srung ma khams rigs bstun// 'gyangs na las kyi spog chog bya// mthun la bzur zhing mi mthun sprad// gzhan yang dus dang gnas skabs dang// yul dang yul can gang yin pa// rigs dang mi rigs shes par bya// bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las rjes kyi las rim bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// a+thi+-i/// gsung gi dbang phyug dpal 'bar ba// ston pa dpag med rgyal po yis// de skad 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la// mngon spyod drag sngags las rnams kun// thog ma bar dang mtha' rim bzhin// bstan pa'i don du legs par gsungs// de nas dbang chen 'bar ba sogs// drag po las kyi 'khor rnams kyis// rang rang dpa' ba'i rtsal phyung zhing// sprul pa rang gzugs bcas pa bstan// gdangs skad snyan pa'i shugs dag gis// mgrin gcig tu ni mngon par bstod// hrIH dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi dbang phyug mtha' yas sku// 'od dang gzi brjid dpal 'bar shing// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' ba// yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i spyan// le brgan ljags kyi dbang po la// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi 'bru bkod de// gdul bya dag dang ma dag pa// gnyis mnyam chen po'i ngang du bstim// brjod pa'i tshig la 'bras bu'i don// rmad du byung ba e ma ho/ khyod sku snang ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rab tu rgyas shing g.yos pa las// 'gro ba'i ma rig mun sel ba// snang ba'i ye shes sgron me spar// ngo mtshar 'di dag dpal du che// gang la gang 'dul phrin las kyis// de dang der ston rnam par mdzad// dpag tu med pa'i sprul pa yis// snang srid 'khor 'das yongs la khyab// dpal 'bar

chen po'i sku la bstod// e ma khyod gsung snyan pa yis// sgra dbyangs phyogs rnams yongs la khyab// 'dul bya rnam pa du ma la// rang rang skad kyis gsung rdol bas// don la ma g.yos sgra tshig gsung// log pa'i lam du gang 'khyams pa// legs pa'i lam la yang dag bkod// dbyangs kyi sprul pa yang sprul las// don dang bcas pa'i sgra tshig gis// 'dod 'byung yid bzhin char chen phab// ma dag log spyod gnas su bsgyur// yang dag mdzad pa mthar phyin mdzad// 'gag pa med pa'i gsung las kyang// rgyun chad med pa'i chos char gyis// nyon mongs me yis gdungs pa la// ye shes bsil ba'i sprul pa bstan// 'brug stong ldir 'dra'i nga ro yis// mu stegs lta ngan pham par mdzad// ston pa dbang phyug gsung la bstod// e ma khyod thugs yangs pa'i klong// mkha' ltar dag pa'i bcom ldan 'das// nyi ma sprin bral 'bum gyi gzi// thugs rje brtse ba'i 'od zer gyis// dra bas nye ring med par gsal// brtse chen ye shes rnam dag pa// gcig dang du ma dang bral bas// grangs las 'das pa'i snang ba 'gyed// 'di dag rgyal dang rgyal rnams kyis/ kha lo bsgyur mdzad mngon 'phags pa// bsam gyis mi khyab gdul bya yi// bsam pa nyid kyi dgongs pa las// dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i 'phro 'du shar// brtse dang mi brtse gnyis bral zhing// de bzhin mkhyen dang mi mkhyen pa'i// phyogs su ma lhung ris ma chad// zung du ma 'brel ya ma chad/ khad mnyam yangs pa'i pho brang du// thugs kyi snang ba rnam par snang// rnam par bkra zhing rnam par 'phro// don rnams kun dang yang dag pa// 'khor 'das gnyis med gcig tu gdal// thug pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zag pa med pa'i 'od zer gyis// mtha' med 'gro ba re re zhing// snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs mdzad de// yang dag 'khor lo de snyed kyang// dus mtha' med par rab tu bskor// de dag khyed kyi thugs mtha' yas// sku mtha' yas dang gsung mtha' yas// yon tan phrin las mtha' yas dpal// g.yo med dgongs klong mtha' yas pa'i// thugs rje ye shes khyod la bstod// e ma ho/ dpal dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das/ khyod kyi sku gsung thugs dkyil nas// shar zhing sprul pa'i yi ge dag/ tshig don gsal bar mngon phyung ba// bdag sogs gdul bya grol ba'i mgon// thogs med rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// snying dang spyi bor yang dag 'chang// ngo mtshar thod du 'di khur ro// bkod pa mtha' yas gsung tshig la// 'di kun mngon par spyod pa'i rtsal// ma rig gnyid las slong ba'i sgra// bdag 'dzin zhen pa gcod pa'i gri// nyon mongs gcong nad 'byin pa'i sman// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i

gru// thar pa'i sa chen bgrod pa'i skas// dgra bgegs log 'dren 'dul ba'i mthu// nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba// rdzu 'phrul ye shes rtsal mchog ste// mchog dang thun mong 'byung ba 'di// bdag cag yang dag spyi bos len// dgongs pa bkrol la rjes yi rang/ khro rgyal dbang chen dpal 'bar dang// bdag cag yang dag 'dus pa'i 'khor// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// klu dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang// drang srong bram ze mi'am ci// dri za grul bum la sogs te// bdag cag rjes su yi rangs shing// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod// ja ma yi dam mkha' 'gro thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rgyud spu gri reg gcod las/ rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// a+thi+-i/// phrin las drag pos dgra bgegs bdud dang log sred can gyi gdul bya 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po spu gri reg gcod ces bya ba/ bdag 'dra pad+ma 'byung gnas kyis dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du bsgyur ba rdzogs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ kha tham/ d+ha thiM/ rta nag dregs pa sde brgyad tshogs kyis bka' 'di bsrungs// gter rkun dam nyams log lta bka' la ras gcod byed// rnal 'byor chos la gnas dang rjes 'jug rnams la gnod// bstan la 'tshe byed bdud rigs gdug pa can rnams kyi// lus ngag yid gsum stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dbang po nyams par gyis// sha khrag zhal du stob cing lhag ma med par mdzod// bka' 'di'i bdag po u rgyan gsung sras rjes 'jug gi/ dam can rgya mtsho rnams kyis rtag tu srung ma dam par gyis// bka' gsang 'di nyid phyogs dus kun tu dar rgyas mdzod// bkra shis bde legs dpal 'bar kun tu khyab par shog/ sprul pa'i sku mchog gter ston sangs rgyas gling pas ja dkar dung gi sgo mo klu btsan gnas pa'i sa nas gdan drangs pa'o//// u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ bod skad du/ bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod ces bya ba/ byin rlabs thams cad 'dus pa'i bcom ldan 'das bla ma sku gsum gyi bdag nyid dpal he ru ka bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kun 'dus rig pa chos kyi sku// yongs khyab gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs// sprul bsgyur ston mdzad sprul pa'i sku// yang dag nges don rdzogs pa'i dpal// rang snang rnam dag ye grol ba// bskyar gzhi bral ba'i sems nyid de// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can min// bcing grol kun la 'das pa ste// gtan la phab nas yang dag rtogs// gud du ma yin rang rtsal rdzogs// bdag lus rtsa yi ri bo la// bskyod pa rlung gis rab g.yos shing// khod snyoms ye shes thig le 'phro// rang bab

gshis las ma g.yos ngang// nyam nga med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig ye shes gnyis mnyam bsre// smin par byed dang grol byed dang// bde stong yang dag skad cig rdzogs// 'khrul pa gzhi la yongs rdzogs pas// ye shes bla ma'i sa chen nyid// rtsol med skad cig nyid la gnon// de skad nga yi rang rig la// sprul pa'i 'khor la yang dang yang// sgrib pa med pa'i tshig gis bshad// rgyas pa'i don dang bsdus pa'i don// rnam par rab tu 'phros rnams la// 'di kun rang byung gzhi tshig go/ bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// 'dir bdag sprul pa'i 'khor rnams la// byin rlabs yongs su 'dus pa yi// dbang don yang dag bshad kyis nyon// dbang gis smin par ma byas na// grol bar byed pa'i zab lam chad// cho ga'i rgyal pos dbang bskur te// 'di ltar smin grol sa la gnas// de phyir dbang 'di sus bskur ba// mtshan nyid kun ldan bla mas bskur// rang rig rtogs pa'i gding la gnas// zhen pa'i ro la mngon ma chags// gzhan don thugs rje'i rtsal dang ldan// bskyed rdzogs brtan pa thob pas bskur// de bzhin gang la bskur ba'i yul// gsang sngags brda yi snod rung ba// blo yangs dad brtson dam tshig gnas// bla mas ji ltar bka' stsal pa// lus ngag yid rtsol ldan pas bsgrub// 'jig rten chos la yid mi 'jug/ gtong phod che zhing mched la brtsi// yid gnyis the tshom bral la bskur// nya stong tshes brgyad gza' skar bzang// phyi nang mthu rkyen 'dzom pa'i dus// bla ma dang ni slob ma gnyis// gcig yul gcig la 'dres dus der// smin byed dbang gi dus mchog go/ sa gtsang rab dben mkha' 'gro 'du// yid 'ong byin chags 'tshe dogs bral// lha 'dre mi gsum yongs kyis bsngags// mthun rkyen 'dzom pa'i gnas mchog tu// rtsal dang ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dkyil 'khor gsum la gnas pa'i ngang// legs par sa yi cho ga brtsam// 'byung po 'dul zhing byin chen dbab// de nas dkyil 'khor las la brtson// gtor mchod la sogs phyi nang dang// gsang ba'i rdzas dang dbang bskur rdzas// go rim ma log legs par bsham// thog mar dge ba sngon 'gro'i las// rnal 'byor lus dang ngag yid gsum// rang ngos bzung bas gtan la phab// gsang sngags spyod pa nges 'byung spyad// de nas bdag bskyed mdun bskyed la// dam tshig ye shes bsre bsnan zhing// bzlas pa'i rkang grangs rdzogs par 'bad// mchod pa sman rag gtor sogs 'bul// bar du dge ba'i dngos gzhi ni// bdag nyid 'jug pa'i dbang blang zhing// slob ma sta gon la gnas pas// dkyil 'khor 'jug pa'i cho ga 'bad// de nas (15)

bum par bcud dbab pa// spro bsdu'i dmigs pa ma yengs bya// lus ngag yid bde bsam gtan pas// rtags dang mtshan ma gtan la phab// dang po bum pa sbyin byas te// rig pa'i dbang lngas sgrib pa sbyang// lus nyid lha ru smin byas nas// rnam grol 'bras bu ye shes dbab// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bstan// gsang mtshan rdo rje'i ming nas 'jug/ mtshan nyid ldan pa'i pho mo ni// bdun las mi mang don mthun gtad// gsang dbang mchog ni bskur ba ste// yab yum rdo rje pad+ma las// legs 'byung dngos grub mchog don ni// lce yi dbang pos blang bar bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i dam tshig ni// bka' la mi 'da' thub par bsrung// ngag gi dbang po smin byas nas// longs spyod ye shes mchog la reg/ gsum pa shes rab ye shes kyi// bde stong smin byed dbang bskur bas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// bcud kyi snying po don gyi mchog/ skal par ldan pa'i skyes bu gang// dga' ba bzhi yi ye shes kyis// bde stong zag med ting 'dzin 'phel// lam snang 'bras bu skad cig rdzogs// nyon mongs rnam grol snang ba yis// mngon sum rang rtsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang// yon tan phrin las rtsal chen gyis// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// dam tshig nyid la gnas par bya// 'di don mchog gi sa la reg/ bzhi pa snang srid gzhi bzhengs kyi// don dbang tshig gis brda sprod pas// lus ngag yid gsum gtan la dbab// 'khor 'das chos rnams ma lus pa// rang snang dkyil 'khor rang la rdzogs// spros bral chen po de bzhin gshegs// rgyal tshab dam par dbang bskur bas// gzhi rdzogs sems kyi dkyil 'khor la// byas dang byung ba med pa dang// snang dang mi snang med pa dang// thams cad gdal khyab lhun 'byam mo// de ltar sku gsum ye shes lnga// gzhi bral lhan cig snang ba ste// skal bar ldan pa'i lus ngag yid// rab tu smin cing ye shes pheb// bla ma lhar bcas dgyes pa yi// mchod gsol me tog maN+Dal 'bul// rin chen dbang gi mtha' rten du// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen dang// pad+ma rgya gram la sogs sbyin// rang gzhan smin pa'i las la brtson// rdo rje rgyal por mnga' dbang bskur// grangs 'das bka' yi chos kyi sgo// de ltar smin par byas nas phyai// 'di kun gsang ba'i de don te// dam tshig chen po'i don la spyod// rang srog mig gi 'bras bu ltar// rab tu gces pas dam par bsrung// 'di ltar rgyal ba'i gdung rgyud 'dzin// skad cig rig 'dzin sa la reg/ tha mar dge ba rjes mchog ni// rdzogs pa'i ye shes rang snang ba// ye shes lha gshegs dam tshig bsdu// spros bral chen po'i ngang nyid nas// rdo rje'i glu

blangs bde nyams skyong// dga' ston gtang rag rim gro 'bad// rdo rje slob dpon dgyes mchod bskang// dal bsdu dge ba'i shis pa brjod// yang dag snying po dbyings su bsngo// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ smin byed dbang bskur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// bla med yang dag ston pa yis// nyid kyis sprul pa'i 'khor rnams la// lus ngag yid gsum grol byed pa'i// bskyed rim lha yi gnad gsungs pa// nyon cig snang can rig pa'i 'khor// snang ba 'khrid pa'i sna thag tu// 'khor ba ru log byed pa'i thabs// ye shes lha la rig pa gtad// lhun grub rang gsal 'od kyi sku// snang stong sgyu ma'i rang gzugs can// longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i sku// chos sku rol pa'i rtsal las snang// shar lho nub byang steng 'og phyogs// de bzhin mtshams la sogs pa dang// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar dang// dus gsum dus med dus kyi dbyings// phyi rol 'byung ba 'dus pa'i mkhar// rnam par snang ba'i gzugs brnyan rnams// rang snang rnam dag gzhal yas khang// sems can skye 'gror gyur pa yang// 'byung ba'i dngas ma 'dus pa yis// phung po la ni gzugs can dang// las kyi dbang btsan dkar nag chos// gzugs med yid kyi lus la sogs// bag chags rang snang bcas pa ste// dag pa rtsal gyi ye shes lha// ma dag sna tshogs las spyod pa'i// 'gro ba drug sogs yul can bzung// 'dzin pa'i rtod phur ma zhig bar// bag chags sna tshogs 'khrul pa'i lus// yid kyi dbang po'i spyod yul la// nang du 'byung ba'i rang rtsal las// bdag lus sgyu ma'i grong mkhar du// rnam par snang ba'i gdos pa can// rnam pa du ma'i gzugs su chags// rtsa dang rlung dang khams dang yang// rnam par rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// las 'bras byas byung byed pa'i mthus// dkar dang nag dang 'chol par yang// las kyi 'phro 'du byed pa ste// rang snang rnam par dag shes na// ye shes lha yi gzhal yas su// ngo bo stong pa chos kyi sku// rang bzhin rang gsal longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje'i rtsal snang 'phro 'du ba// rang byung sprul pa'i skur grol bas// 'khrul snang rang dag lha yi sku// dkar ser dmar ljang la sogs pa// sku mdog sna tshogs 'od dang bcas// zer gyis 'gro ba 'dul ba'o// yongs khyab chen po'i lhar grub ste// de ltar ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i blo// gzung 'dzin rang snang 'khrul phyir brgyud// de dag 'khrul 'khor bshig bya'i phyir// dang po de bzhin nyid kyi ngang// kun tu snang ba'i ting 'dzin las// rgyu yi yi ge rnam par spros// de las bdag nyid dam tshig pa// mos bskyed sku mdog phyag mtshan bcas// che

dang chung dang rang mtshams par// yid kyis rnam par sprul zhing bskyed// gdod nas dag pa ye shes sems// bkug bstim rnam par rol pas spyad// 'phro dang 'du ba'i rang bzhin gyis// gtad gzhag med par rnam par gnas// yang dag lha tshogs de bzhin gshegs// rim dang skad cig dran rdzogs su// tha ma rab kyi blo yis gsal// rang sngags mtshan bcas snying po dang// mtshan ma med pa'i rang sngags kyis// gnad la dbab pa'i mchu sbyor dang// 'byin 'jug gnas pa'i 'gro 'ong gis// rang snang gtso 'khor btson du bzung// dbyer med gcig tu gtan la dbab// nus pa'i rtsal chen sbar bar bya// gnam sa ri rab g.yo bar bya// rgya mtsho hub kyis gdab pa dang// nyi zla cha lang lta bur brdab// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang// phyi nang gsang ba'i rim gyis dkrug/ phyi nang snang srid dbang du byas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha rnams rang dbang bran du bya// bdag dbang kho yis ma yin zhing// kho nyid bdag gi dbang du ste// cho 'phrul gar gyis gtan la phab// de ltar bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi// rang snang gnad la phab nas kyang// 'khrid pa'i sna thag la brten nas// 'khrul pa'i g.yul ngo rim gyis bzlog/ bag chags ri bo thabs kyis bsgyel// phrin las dmigs su ngang gis bsgyur// sna tshogs las la dbang byed pa// bdag nyid lha yi shugs ldan pas// gang yang thogs pa med 'grub 'gyur// gang la gang 'dul thabs ldan pas// de la der ston las la sbyar// rang gzhan rnam dag zhing la spyod// e ma 'di ni gsang chen gyi// gsang ba'i yang gsang rmad po che// gdul bya mos blo'i yul du snang// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ grol lam bskyed rim gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// yang ni ston mchog rgyal po yis// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor rnams la// grol byed rdzogs rim 'di gsungs pa// nyon cig rang byung rang rtsal 'khor// snang zhing srid dang de las gzhan// dngos dang dngos min gnyis snang chos// gzugs dang ming gi mtha' can kun// la 'das chen po'i dbyings su thim// 'di kun blta ba'i rgyal po yin// gdod nas dag pa'i gding chen bca'// bcos bslad med par gtan la dbab// bcing grol med pa'i gnas lugs la// bcos bslad med par rang gzhag nas// g.yo 'gul med par gtan la phab// blang dor med pa'i ngang nyid la// rang bab lhug par bzhag pa yis// yengs 'khrul rkyen dang bral ba'i don// khor yug bar mtshams med par 'char// snang srid rol pa rang grol thob// 'di kun bsgom pa'i rgyal po yin// rang rtsal rig pa'i cho 'phrul kun// rang shar

rang la grol ba'i gnad// g.yo 'gul 'pho 'gyur med par gzhag/ rang lugs bab la rtsal chen 'bar// bzang dang ngan dang dkar nag chos// gang yang blang dang dor med par// rang snang rang grol chen por bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid las mnyam snang ba// byed pa med las thams cad byas// gang yang dgag dang bsgrub med par// bab la spyod pa'i rnam 'gyur can// 'di kun spyod pa'i rgyal po yin// kun gsal kun tu snang ba'i chos// bcos bslad med par rang gshis su// 'gyur ba med par ngang du phyam// lus ngag yid la rnam rol ba// sku gsum bslab pa nyid la gnas// phra mo'i las kun rnam par snang// rang byung gzhi las g.yos med par// lam gyi rtsal chen rab rdzogs par// phyi nang 'khrul pa'i blo zad de// rang byung bcud du rab smin pas// 'bras bu rtsol med gzhi la phebs// 'di kun 'bras bu'i rgyal po yin// re dogs med pa'i rtsal chen gyis// mtha' bral dbyings la kun spyod skyong// bya ba byas shing byed pa byas// bya rtsol snang ba'i chos la 'das// snang srid 'khor 'das ma lus pa// skad cig rang byung dbyings su rdzogs// de las snang stong ye shes kyi// rtsal chen 'bar ba sna tshogs kyi// nyid las rang byung snang ba ste// 'khor dang 'das pa'i spyi mes yin// de las rnam par rol pa yis// gzhi snang ye shes g.yos ma g.yos// byad dang me long rten 'brel yin// rgyu dang rkyen las ma g.yos pa'o// g.yo ba med las g.yos pa dang// med las nga yir 'dzin snang ba// lugs 'byung dang ni lugs bzlog ste// mdung khyim bar snang 'ja' ris bzhin// cho 'phrul rnam par de 'phrul pas// la la 'khor lo'i rtsibs la bskyon// ma rig la sogs 'thibs pos non// la la ye shes rang rtsal rdzogs// mkhyen dang brtse ba'i bdag nyid can// la la gzhi las g.yos med par// bzang dang ngan sogs rtsal ma 'phros// bag la nyal du gnas pa'o// de dang de yi gnas dpyad de// skye 'bri la sogs yang dag shes// dgongs dang yang dag dgongs pa dang// gnyen dang ldem dang drang po dang// dgongs pa'i cho 'phrul yang dag las// 'du dang 'phro ba'i chos rnams kyi// gtang gzhag med la de bzhin spyod// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ grol lam rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// yang gsang zung 'jug ston pa yis// zung du 'jug pa'i chos rnams kun// zung du 'jug pa'i 'khor rnams la// zung du 'jug phyir yang dag bstan// 'khor dang 'das pa'i chos rnams kun// spyi dang bye brag khyad par yang// zung du 'jug pa chen po ste// snang ba ma 'gags bskyed pa dang// stong pa mtha' bral rdzogs pa yang// gnyis med chen por

zung du 'jug/ ma byas rang byung chos rnams dang// rtsol byas byung ba'i chos rnams kyang// 'gag med zung du 'jug pa'o// rgyu las byung ba'i chos rnams dang// rkyen gyis bsgyur ba'i chos rnams kyang// gnyis med zung du 'jug pa ste// mdor na gnyis dang gnyis chos kun// gnyis med spros bral zung 'jug chos// de phyir bde dang stong pa'i chos// zag med klong du zung chud pas// thabs kyi dpa' bo stobs ldan dang// shes rab dpa' mo stobs bral ba// lhan cig gnas pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// snang stong ye shes nyid snang ba// 'khrul 'khor ba yi rnam 'phrul gyis// 'khor 'das yongs grub ye rdzogs dpal// rnal 'byor rgyal po rnams kyis blta/ khyim gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la// yid bzhin nor mchog rab snang ba// rgyu byed bdag po'i cho 'phrul dang// 'gro dang 'ong dang gnas pa'i stobs// nyi ma zla ba sgra gcan 'dzin// gling bu'i sgra las drangs nas ni// steng dang 'og tu rnam par bcing// 'phro ba dgag cing gnas pa spyod// rnam par rgyu dang rgyu ba ni// dgag dang mi dgag blang dor med// de dag yid kyi skyes bus bsad// nyi ma dag tu yang dag ldan// zla ba dag tu yang dag snang// zla ba dbyings su bskyod de bcing// nyi ma 'og tu gnas pa spar// 'bar dang 'dzag pa'i cho 'phrul kun// srog gi gnas su yang dag sba// kun lam rtsal gyi 'phro ba ni// bskyed pa'i cha dang yang dag ldan// 'du bar byed pa rdzogs pa'i don// mnyam gnas zung du 'jug pa ste// gzhi las 'phags shing lam du gnas// 'bras bu dbyings su phyin pa yi// zil zer bas kyang pa char gyi rgyun 'babs pas// dbang dang dbang yul yongs la khyab// dbang la khyab pas rnam par gsal// dbang yul la khyab cho 'phrul snang// de kun sgyu ma'i zhing khams te// dag pa gsum gyi rtsal 'phar bas// ma dag cho 'phrul thabs kyis gnon// rang las shar ba'i rang rtsal gyis// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkra// rgyu las byung ba'i dngos po ni// ye shes rol pa'i rtsal chen 'bar// 'od kyis snang mun ma lus pa// bsal nas rnam par rab tu bkra// mtha' yas gdal ba'i rtsal las kyang// glang chen stobs la seng+ge'i rtsal// nya ltar 'phyo dang glog ltar 'khyug/ gnam lcags thog chen 'bar ba'i shugs// lo brgyad byis pa'i ngang tshul can// phyi nang gsang ba'i de nyid shes// srid pa tha ma'i lus gyur pas// thun mong mthong snang sna tshogs snang/ khyad par ye shes mig can la// rnam par bkra ba'i gzugs snang ba// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// sku gsum nyid las ma g.yos pas// zung 'jug rtsal du shar ba'o// g.yo dang 'gul dang ldeg pa dang// 'od kyi dra bas khengs pa

dang// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// dri zar bcas pa thams cad kyang// dga' zhing mgu nas mngon par bstod// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ grol lam bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug gi rim pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje'i sku la pad+ma'i ljags// rnam grol de bzhin yang dag thugs// rtsol med rang byung bcom ldan 'das// thogs med rgyal po 'od mi 'gyur// smin grol zab mo'i chos rnams ni// snang ba'i 'khor la char du phab// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu smin// rtsal chen lam gyi lo 'dab rgyas// dpag chen bzhin du mkha' la spyod// e ma ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// sku gsung thugs la mngon par bstod// bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// byin rlabs rang byung du bstan pa bla ma'i gsang rgyud bka'i bang mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so//// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ gter rgya/ kha tham/ d+ha thim/ rgya rgya rgya/ o rgyan gsung sras sprul sku sangs rgyas gling pas snga dkar dung gi sgo mo nas bton pa shu b+haM//// u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ bod skad du/ yi dam gyi gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal zhi ba dang/ khro bo dang/ rngam pa dang/ yab dang/ yum dang/ sras dang/ 'khor dang/ sprul pa dang/ yang sprul du bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dkar ser dmar ljang 'khrigs pa'i klong// dpal chen rngam pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// zhi ba'i ngang las khro skur bzhengs// rnam 'gyur cha lugs sprul pa can// bzhad pa'i nga ros stong khams gang// brtse ba'i thugs rje cher 'gyed pa// dpal chen stobs kyi rgyal po yis// nyid kyi sku yi dkyil 'khor nas// rang byung sprul pa'i 'khor shar zhing// mdun du rnam par bkod pa las// gsang chen tha ram 'di gsungs pa// a la la ho// snang srid 'khor 'das spyi dpal gtso// spyi gtsug dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rab tu gsal ba'i 'od shar ba// gcig tu bzlum dang dum bur 'thor// zlum po nyid kyi klong du thim// de kun rang rtsal rdzogs pa'i mgon// dum bur 'thor ba kun tu khyab// nam mkha'i khams kun rab snang byas// mi mngon dbyings nas rnam par snang// me las me dang chu las chu// rlung las rlung dang sa las sa// nam mkha' g.yo med yongs la khyab// khyab bdag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor can// ral pa'i cod pan rab gzeng

pas// sa 'og sa steng sa blar khyab// sprug cing rnam par sprugs pas kyang// 'gro ba'i lo tog smin mdzad de// spyi phud dang por gyur pa'o// yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram las/ spyi gtsug rnam par blta ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste dang po'o//// a la la ho// snang srid 'khor 'das spyi dpal gtso// mgrin snang gsung gi dkyil 'khor du// sgra yi bkod pa rab snang ba// smra ba'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// lha dang lha min mi dang ni// dud 'gro yi dwags dmyal ba'i mthar// nyid kyi gsung gi dbang po yis// khyab cing so so'i mthun snang du// skad dang sgra don bcas pa mdzad// sa dang rdo dang shing bu dang// me chu rlung la sogs pa yi// skad dang sgra las mngon pa'i tshig/ gsung dang bcas te yang dag snang// pad+ma'i ljags dang dung gi tshems// bum pa'i dkyil du dril ba yang// rnam par bkra ba'i le brgan las// ma 'dres snying po'i tshig tu gsal// de kun yang dag gsang ba'i mgon// mang po gcig tu dril ba dang// gcig las rnam pa du ma spros// rigs drug 'gro ba'i snang ba yang// so so pa la so so yi// lus ngag yid rgyud smin pa dang// yang dag de bzhin nyid bstan te// rnam grol ye shes bde chen bstan// rang la rang snang nyid brdal bas// lha mi la sogs 'gro ba yi// rang snang snang ba'i dal rgyas nas// rnam par blta dang rnam par smra// bsags pa thams cad zad pa ste// de nas bsag pa mi mnga' la// bsags 'bras myur du 'jig pa'o// snying po sngags spyod gsang bstan pa// gsang zhing rnam par gsang ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po mchog la reg/ kun rdzob mtha' yang de bzhin stong// de yang ljags kyi dbang po yi// longs spyod mgrin pa'i dkyil 'khor las// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor rab 'khrugs pas// stobs kyi nus pa rnam par smin// bkrol ba med kyang rang grol dang// bcing ba med kyang zhig pa'o// rab tu 'khrugs par gyur rnams kyang// 'khrugs pa med la de bzhin gshegs// sa lam bkod pa dus gcig rdzogs// spyi phud gnyis par gyur pa'o// yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram las/ mgrin pa rnam par blta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// a la la ho/ snang srid 'khor 'das spyi dpal gtso// gsang gter thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mkhyen brtse'i bkod pa rab snang ba// 'gyur med tha ram nyag gcig don// rgyan gyi bkod pa du ma dang// cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang// rab tu 'khrugs pa'i sems dpa' dang// rnam par brtse ba'i sems ma dang// gnyis med rol pa'i ye shes te// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rnam pa sna tshogs rab 'char ba// rang byung rang la rnam par thim// sprul dang bsgyur dang stabs pa dang// rnam

par rab tu 'khrugs pa yang// nyid las ma g.yos nyid kyi rtsal// 'di bdag yangs pa'i dpa' shugs gsal// 'phro dang 'du dang 'khyil pa dang// dgag pa dang ni stsal ba dang// rnam par rab tu g.yo ba can// gti mug las kyang gti mug dang// zhe sdang las kyang zhe sdang nyid// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal ba// 'dod chags nyid kyang 'dod chags pa// phrag dog nyid kyang dbang byed pa// las kyi las te las kyis las// lcags kyis lcags rnams gcod pa dang// de bzhin shing gi shing bsreg pa// rdo yis rdo gcog rang rang mthus// rang rtsal rang gi nus pa 'jig/ bdag gis bdag po nyid 'joms byed// bdag gis bdag nyid yang dag bstod// byas pa yis ni byas pa 'jig/ sems kyi sems sun sems kyis 'byin// las kyis las ni 'joms pa'o// las kyis las kyang sog pa ste// rigs mthun nang gis rigs mthun 'joms// dpa' shugs bskyed pa de bzhin ltar// rgyal ba'i thugs la thugs rje yi// rol pa rnam par rol spros pas// gdul bya gdul bya dag gis 'dul// ye shes rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ye shes rgyas pa nyid kyis mthong// rang byung dag pa rang byung gis// yang dag mthong nas yang dag ston// de mthong rgyun mar mthong bas mthong// rig pas rig pa rtogs pas rtogs// dkar pos dkar po nyid byed la// nag pos nag po nyid byed do// nga las nga byung nga yis shes// nga las nga byung nga yis bsgribs// nga las nga byung nga yis bsal// thams cad nga yi dkyil 'khor du// 'du dang 'phro bar byed shes pas// shes dang shes pa nyid shes byas// mkhyen pas yang dag mkhyen pa la// rtsal gyis rtsal yang 'byin par byed// ji ltar nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// nam mkha' nyid du rab snang ba// rab rib rab rib nyid la ste// rab rib rab rib nyid kyis so// de ltar rnam par bkod pa'i dpal// spyi phud gsum par gyur pa'o// yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram las/ thugs ka rnam par blta ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// a la la ho// snang srid 'khor 'das spyi dpal gtso// srid pa'i bdag po nyid bdag dpal// srid las srid pa'i lugs 'byung ba// bdag gis srid pa 'dir ston byed// las kyis 'phen pa'i las rnams kun// las kyis 'ching ba'i dra ba gcod// ma dag pa dang dag pa dang// shin tu dag dang yang dag dag/ dag pa gsum gyi dag pa yis// las kyi sgri ba pa rnam par bcing// bcings pa rnam par grol ba yi// ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po yis// rnam par nges pa rnyed par 'gyur// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// bsags pa'i las kun yang dag pas// srid pa'i mtsho las rnam par grol// bdag dang

bdag gir 'dzin pa dang// bdag gi snang ba rab rgyas pas// de kun bdag las grol ba yang// srid pa'i 'ching las grol ba ste// bdag dbang rkyen gyis rnam bskyod pas// srid pa nying 'khrul 'khor lo ni// yang nas yang du yang bskor bas// de dag thag pa gcod pa yang// srid pa'i 'ching las grol ba ste// 'dam las skyes pa'i pad+ma ni// 'dam gyi skyon gyis ma gos pa// 'dam med pad+ma mi 'byung yang// pad+ma nyid las pad+ma yi// sa bon 'dam gyis bskyed nas byung// 'khor bar gnas pa'i mi gang dag/ 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa grol byed pa// 'khor bar nyid du rang gnas pas// 'khor skyon ma gos de dag kyang// srid pa'i dra ba chod las so// de ltar srid pa'i dra ba dag/ gcod par byed pa'i sa mkhan ni// dngos can gsal ba'i rang 'od kyis// rang snang 'od du rab 'bar ba// rang rig rang byung chen po'i rtsal// 'gro 'dul thabs kyi rgyal po yis// sna tshogs rtsal gyis snang bar byed// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'bar ba las// thabs kyi cho 'phrul rab snang ba// mdzad pa'i rnam sprul rtsal shar zhing// ye shes snang bar rab rgyas byed// bdag rtog 'ching ba'i srid pa dang// gzhan 'dzin dbang yul srid pas bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pa rab spangs nas// srid pa'i dra ba kun las grol// yar dang mar du zang thal bas// de dag srid las rnam grol ba// mar du thal ba rab 'gags nas// snang byed rab tu thal bar 'gyur// bar du rnam par lding byed kyang// srid las rnam grol lding las grol// de dang de sogs dkar nag chos// srid las grol dang ma grol dbang// las kyi 'ching ba dag ma dag/ 'ching ba dag pas srid las grol// 'ching ba ma dag srid par 'khor// des na srid pa'i 'khor lo ni// bshig pa'i rten 'brel zab mo ni// thabs kyi sbyor ba rnams las 'byung// thabs ni thabs ldan chen pos gsungs// de la yang dag brten nas byas// bla ma dang ni 'brel pa yis// ye shes rtsal las 'byung bar 'gyur// de ni dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// spyi phud bzhi par gyur pa'o// yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram las/ srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam par blta ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// a la la ho// snang srid 'khor 'das spyi dpal gtso// gsang ba mchog las legs byung zhing// gsang las yang dag gsang bar ldan// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung zhing// 'khor ba rnams kyang gsang ba las// byung zhing 'khor ba'i 'khor bar 'khor// de bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yang// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung zhing// mya ngan 'das dang mya ngan 'da'// gsang ba'i 'khrul 'khor 'dzin kyang 'jig pa can// gsang ba'i gnas la rnam par

gnas// bde ba'i ye shes gang bskyed pa// gsang chen sgo yi rnam rol las// 'byung ldog gnas pa rnam par byed// steng dang 'og dang bar dag dang// sdong po gsum dang yal ga dang// 'khor lo lnga la sogs pa yi// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyang// bkra shis gang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis// rnam par g.yo dang mi g.yo ba'i// ting 'dzin yang dag 'phel 'gyur zhing// de la rnam par rgyu ba yi// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag rnams// rnam par gyes pa'i rnam grangs su// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dag/ las dag byang chub nyid gyur nas// yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang// zla ba rnam par dkar bar 'phel// nyi ma'i stobs kyang rab 'bar bas// 'bar 'dzag stobs mnyam sbyor ba yis// rnam grol 'bras bu mchog la reg/ g.yas g.yon steng 'og rnam bcings pas// gang gi thigs pas rgya mtsho dkrug/ rlangs pa'i 'od zer stong khams khengs// 'dzag pa med pas 'dzag pa 'phel// 'og nas bcings te steng du bskyod// sgra gcan dag gis mnyam gnas pa// yongs khyab ngos bzung bral ba yi// mchog don rnam par bsgyings bltas pas// yang dag mchog la yang dag par// gnas pa'i stobs kyang de las 'byung// mdor na gnas dang spyod pa dang// 'gro dang 'ong dang 'dug pa dang// khyim dang bdag po nor byas par// ro mnyam gcig dang khang mnyam pas// gsang ba'i gnas las legs par 'byung// las grub mchog dang thun mong ba// mthar thug las kyang mthar thug nyid// gnas skabs las kyang gnas skabs kyi// 'dod 'byung dpal dang gsang bar ldan// 'bras bu de las ye shes lnga// sku gsum mchog la rnam par gnas// ye nas gnas pa'i bdag nyid la// gnas par shes shing gnas par 'gyur// gsang mchog yid bzhin mchog gi gter// de las shul mtshon gzhal du med// yang dag bcud du gsang ba smin// de phyir gsang ba yang dag pas// la lar dbang med thabs kyis gsang// la lar go med ye gsang ste// la lar rmad du byung bas gsang// la lar sgo ma phye bas gsang// dam med log par lta byed la// gsang ba gnyan phyir yang dag gsang// de ltar gsang ba rnam bkra ba'i// thabs dang shes rab mchog la reg/ spyi phud lnga par gyur pa'o// yi dam gsang rgyud bka'i tha ram las/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnam par blta ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// a la la ho// dngos grub yid bzhin gsang ba mchog gi rgyud/ bka'i tha ram zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// sa ma yA/ rgya rgya rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ gter rgya/ kha tham/ d+ha thim/ rgya rgya rgya/ bdag 'dra gar gyi dbang phyug rol pa ye shes kyis ja dkar dung gi sgo mo nas gdan drangs pa'o////

u rgyan gsang ba brda'i skad du/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro'i gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig ces bya ba/ chos sku skye ba med pa'i dbyings las/ longs sku gsal dag rnam par bkra ba'i gzi brjid kyi/ sprul sku 'gro 'dul thabs kyi rgyal mo/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba'i dbang mo che dpal 'bar brtse ba'i sgra dbyangs ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan bde ba'i dbang mo che'i// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor nas// rnam par rol pa'i rtsal 'gyed ma// sprul dang yang sprul dpag med kyis// sa dang bar snang g.yo byed ma// sku gsung thugs las rang byung ba'i// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro 'khor dang bcas// kun kyang rab 'jigs dur khrod chas// dar dang rin chen rus pas spras// lag na gri thod kha T+wAM 'dzin// sku yi rigs dang gsung gi rigs// thugs kyi rigs dang yon tan rigs// phrin las rigs dang rnam lnga lnga// rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// de bzhin rigs dang rnam pa lnga// dkar ser dmar ljang mthing ga ste// ye shes las las grub pa yi// 'khor dang yang 'khor bcas rnams kyang// sna tshogs las byed cho 'phrul 'gyed// rnam 'gyur gar gyi rol pa can// stangs stabs gcig tu ma nges shing// gdul bya'i don du nges med ston// dgongs pa'ang gcig tu ma nges par// gang la gang 'dul thabs ldan pas// 'gro 'dul thugs rjes yongs la khyab// de ltar gtso 'khor bcas pa rnams// dur khrod rab 'jigs klong yangs su// lhan cig rnam par rol pa'i tshe// gtso mo'i sku las sprul pa'i 'khor// dkar mo rigs kyi DAk+ki mas// ye shes bskyed pa'i tshul zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje lus kyi lde mig bstan// gtso mo'i gsung las sprul pa'i 'khor// dmar mo rigs kyi DAk+ki mas// bzlas pas sngags kyi tshul zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// gsung dbyangs ngag gi lde mig gsungs// gtso mo'i thugs las sprul pa'i 'khor// sngon mo rigs kyi DAk+ki mas// gnas lugs dgongs pa'i don zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// thugs mdzod gnas lugs lde mig gsungs// gtso mo'i yon tan sprul pa'i 'khor// ser mo rigs kyi DAk+ki mas// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa'i gnad zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// bsnyen sgrub las kyi lde mig gsungs// gtso mo'i phrin las sprul pa'i 'khor// ljang nag rigs kyi DAk+ki mas// sna tshogs phrin las don zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs las bsgyur lde mig gsungs// nyid kyi sprul pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// ye shes las las grub 'dus

nas// mgrin gcig dbyangs kyis zhus pa ni// cho 'phrul rtags kyi byung tshul zhus// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// rtags dang cho 'phrul lde mig gsungs// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// sku las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// rang cag gtso 'khor bskyed 'dod na// rang 'dod bral ba'i brtse sems kyis// gnas bzang dur khrod rab 'jigs bsgom// rang snang rtsal gyi cho 'phrul las// ye shes chen po'i me rlung gis// bdag lus 'byung ba'i grong khyer bshig/ skad cig yengs med dmigs pa yis// hrIHdang ma las gtso mo ni// dmar nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// zhal gcig khro zhal 'jigs rngams can// zhal gcig rtog med phyag gi gdong// rab tu khros pa'i gad rgyangs sgrogs// phyag g.yas gri gug nam mkhar phyar// g.yon pas thod khrag thugs kar bskyil// brkyang bskum ro yis gdan la 'gying// rnam 'gyur gar gyi rol pa can// dur khrod rin chen rus pa dang// sna tshogs dar gyi cod pan spras// nu ma 'bur zhing b+ha ga rgyas// lang tsho dar la bab pa'i tshul// ral pa nag po gyen mthur las// dril bu g.yer kha'i sgra dbyangs 'khrol// dpa' bo las kyi tshul can du// mchan khung khru mo kha T+wAM ga/ gtso mo chen mo dpal 'bar ma// rang 'od 'khrigs pa'i dbus na bzhugs// de yi phyogs bzhir bskyed pa'i 'khor// shar du rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge ha las byung ba yi// sngon mo'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje gri gug thod pa 'dzin// lho phyogs rin chen rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge ri las byung ba yi// ser mo'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// rin chen gri gug thod pa 'dzin// nub phyogs pad+ma rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge ni las byung ba yi// dmar mo'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// pad+ma gri gug thod khrag 'dzin// byang phyogs las kyi rigs kyi 'khor// yi ge sa las byung ba yi// ljang gu'i mdog can mkha' 'gro ma// rgya gram gri gug thod pa 'dzin// kun kyang rnam 'gyur gar stabs can/ khros pa'i tshul la dur khros chas// rang rang thabs kyi dpa' bo dang// mnyam rol kha T+wAM mchan khung 'khyud// so sor rang rang rigs kyi 'khor// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo mang pos bskor// kun kyang cha lugs rnam 'gyur kun// gcig tu ma nges sna tshogs ston// sgrub pa po yi grogs mdzad cing// dam tshig can gyi bstan pa bsrung// nyams pa can la chad pa gcod// rang 'od 'khrigs pa'i klong dkyil na// de ltar gtso 'khor bskyed pa ste// gdul bya'i snang tshul tha dad pas// lus grub rtsa grub lhan cig

pas// gzhal yas ma bskyed ngang gis gsal// rtsa grub de la thig les khyab// sna tshogs rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ma bskyed rang bzhin lhun gyis grub// de ltar rtsa dang thig le'i bdag/ byang chub sems kyi rgyun rlung gis// bskyed bya skyed byed skyed mkhan rnams// rtsol bral rang byung rnam par dag/ des na dam tshig ye shes kyang// gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir// gnyis med gnyis su med par rol// 'on kyang rig rtsal cho 'phrul las// chu la chu bzhag rnam pa can// dgug bstim dmigs pa'i bye brag kyang// gang 'os rnam 'gyur sna tshogs spro// de ltar dam tshig ye shes bskyed// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ mkha' 'gro'i gtso 'khor bskyed pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das bka' stsal pa// gsung las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// mkha' 'gro gtso dang 'khor rnams kyi// bzlas pa sngags kyi tshul lugs ni// rtsa ba yan lag rnam pa gnyis// rtsa ba gtso mo'i bzlas pa ste// A+oM badzra b+ha ra hI/ DA ki ni trIHswA hA/ phyi nang gsang bar rab grags pa'i// 'dzab dang shub bu'i bzlas pa dang// skye med rdo rje'i bzlas pa ste// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can gyis// 'byin 'jug gnas pa rlung gi grangs// rang byung rtsol bral bsnyen pa yis// ye shes mkha' 'gro ngang gis 'grub// rtsol bcas 'bad pa nyid dag gis// 'jig rten 'khrul gtam spangs nas ni// dad brtson dam tshig ldan pa yis// yang dag rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa ni// grangs dang dus dang rtags rnams ni// yang dag gsungs la 'bad par bya// phyi nang rlung gi sbyor ba dang// rang babs gnas lugs 'khrul 'khor gyis// dmigs pa snying ga'i 'khor lo bskor// sa bon dag la rab bskor bas// dga' ba 'khyil pa ye shes bskyed// spyi bo la sogs gnas lnga ru// sngags kyi ye shes sems dpa' dbab// bde stong ngang du mnyam par bzhag/ spangs rtogs ye shes grub pa ste// dril dang bsgrag dang gtor ba dang// gnad la nges par dbab pa yis// bcom ldan 'das ma nyid dang ni// rnal 'byor dbyer med gcig gyur pas// 'phro 'dus 'khor rnams dam la btags// dmigs pa'i gnad kyis rab tu gzir// yan lag 'khor gyi bsnyen pa ste// srog gi yi ge nyid bstan pa// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// rim bzhin ha ri ni sa ste// a yis yang dag dbu brnyes shing// hUM gis sdud cing phaT kyis gtor// sdud pas snying gi dkyil du ste// gtor ba rtsa gnas lus la'o// a ha ri ni sa hUM phaT/ 'di bdun yang dril srog gi sngags// gnad 'bebs ye shes dbab dang bcas// A be sha ya hrIM hrIM gdags// srog yig dam du bcangs pa'o// rang rang mtshan sngags

bstan pa ni// A+oM badzra DA ki nI hUM phaT/ A+oM rat+na DA ki nI hUM phaT/ A+oM pad+ma DA ki nI hUM phaT/ A+oM karma DA ki nI hUM phaT/ de ltar rigs bzhi dag la ni// rigs bsdus pa yi gtso mchog tu// A+oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI hUM phaT/ kun khyab ye shes gdal khyab bo// de ltar srog yig mtshan sngags te// gtso 'khor rab tu dril nas ni// gnad la gzir ba'i sngags bstan pa// oM badzra b+ha ra hI/ hrIHma DA ki nIha ri ni sa/ sarba sid+d+hi pha la hUM a/ de ltar rtsa srog yang dag ldan// dngos grub bcas pa de nyid kyi// las kyi 'bras bu mchis par 'gyur// gtso 'khor gnad la phebs pa yis// so so'i sbyor ba nyid dang ni// rlung gi gnad la yang dag dbab// srog gi gnad du yang yang bskul// rlung gi rta la rab skyon pas// gang la gang 'dul thabs kyi cha// shAt+tiM ba shaM puSh+tiM dang// mA ra ya yi las mtha' sbyar// de las spros pa'i yan lag tu// ngar dang ldan pas gang dang gang// so sor gtan la dbab pas 'bad// rtsol bcas rtsol bral nyid dag dang// stobs dang ldan pas shes par bya// gzhan yang gsung las rab grags pa// bstod dang gnad nas bskul ba'i las// so sor rdzas dang bcas pas kyang// gang la gang rigs shes par bya// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ bzlas pa sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// thugs las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// yang dag don gyi gnas lugs ni// gud na yod pa ma yin cing// rang gsal rang byung bde chen chos// gdod nas rnam dag ye shes nyid// spros bral chos kyi skur bzhugs pas// rang byung nyid las de ma 'das// gsal la dag cing rnyog pa med// me long chu zla'i rnam pa can// mdzes shing yid 'ong mtshan dper ldan// snang stong longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhugs// de yang rang las gud du min// thugs rjes 'gro 'dul rtsal po che// yangs pa che la longs spyod cing// cir yang sprul pa'i rnam 'gyur can// 'phro dang 'du dang dpa' shugs can// gnas dang longs spyod yang rtsal can// gdul bya 'dul ba'i thabs stobs can// sna tshogs sprul pa'i skur bzhugs pa// de ltar sku gsum rang byung dang// de las rnam par rab 'phros pas// yang dag gnas lugs rdzu 'phrul mchog/ bsam gyis mi khyab yang dag ldan// rnam par rig bkra shes par bya// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ yang dag don gyi gnas lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// yon tan sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// bsnyen pa dang ni sgrub pa'i don// dang po bsnyen pa'i las la 'jug/ lus ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro

yi// stangs stabs rnam 'gyur dag la bslab// 'khrul 'khor gnad la rab tu gzir// ngag ni log gtam smra ba bcad// rlung gi rtsol ba dang ldan pas// bzlas pa sngags kyi gnad la gzir// yid ni mi 'gyur dang ldan pas// sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// lha dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gzir// de ltar lus ngag yid gsum po// yengs med lha yi srang la gcur// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// g.yo ba med pa'i gnad la gzir// lus ngag yid gsum gtan thub pas// ye shes byin chen pheb pa dang// rtags dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung// de nas sgrub pa'i las la 'jug/ gza' skar dus tshod shis pa la// yid 'ong gnas su dkyil 'khor bri// phyi nang gsang sogs rdzas rnams dang// mchod gtor thugs dam skong rdzas rnams// bkod pa phun sum tshogs par bsham// mtshams kyi rim pa dam par bcad// dgyes par byed pa mchod pa'i rdzas// 'du bar byen pa brten pa'i rdzas// las la rgyug pa mngag pa'i rdzas// sna tshogs rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// dur khrod rdzas la gzhi blangs pas// bag gro phyin chags brjid par bkram// de ltar rten rnams rdzogs pa dang// rang nyid sgo gsum mnyam gnas pas// sgrub pa'i las la 'jug par bya// bdag bskyed mdun du bskyed pa yi// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal bar bsgom// de nas bzlas pa'i las la 'jug/ smra ba bcad de yengs med 'bad// thun bar dmigs pa'i 'khrul 'khor bskor// mchod dang gtor ma bstod pa bya// ye shes dbab cing phrin las gzhol// de ltar rtags rdzogs bar du ste// dus la ma g.yel bsgrub par bya// phyi nang gsang rtags rdzogs nas kyang// bsgrubs rjes las kyi mtha' sdud dang// dmigs su bskyur ba'i rim pa rnams// rang rang gnas skabs skabs dang bstun/ bsgrub pa'i snying po lon par bya// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// phrin las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro nyon// phrin las mkha' 'gro kha bsgyur sna tshogs ni// bsnyen dang sgrub la brtan thob nas// gang dang gang gis zhi ba'i las// bdag nyid rdo rje mkha' 'gro yi// nga rgyal ldan pas sna tshogs brtsam// de bzhin rgyas pa'i las rnams kyang// bdag nyid rin chen mkha' 'gro yi// nga rgyal ldan pas sna tshogs brtsam// dbang byed dbang gi las rnams kyang// bdag nyid pad+ma mkha' 'gro yi// nga rgyal ldan pas sna tshogs brtsam// drag po mngon spyod las rnams kyang// bdag nyid las kyi mkha' 'gro yi// nga rgyal ldan pas sna tshogs brtsam// de las gzhan pa'i sna tshogs kyang// bdag nyid sangs (16)

rgyas mkha' 'gro yi// nga rgyal ldan pas brtsam par bya// gzhan phan bsam pa'i las sbyor gyi// brtsam pa mthar phyin rang don kun// shugs 'byung 'gag pa med par 'grub// rang 'dod khengs pa'i las sbyor ni// tshe lo dgu khri dgu 'bum bar// 'bad kyang ngal ba don med yin// sgrib pa med pa'i bsam gtan gyis// gang dang gang gi las bsgrubs kyang// dngos dang sprul pa yang sprul gyi// dngos sam sprul pa'i tshul can gyis// las gang myur du 'grub par 'gyur// pho nya las kyi sngags pa yis// sngags la brten pa thob nas kyang// legs phyogs dkar ba'i 'dun pa yis// legs brtson don grub rgyal po'o// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las// las kha bsgyur gyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das mas bka' stsal pa// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// DAk+ki bsnyen cing bsgrub pa yi// rtags dang mtshan ma'i rim pa ni// phyi dang nang gi rten 'brel du// rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab 'char// rab la dngos dang 'bring la nyams// tha ma rmi lam dag la 'char// sku bzhi ye shes lnga sprul dang// yang sprul grangs las 'das pa ste// sku dang gsung dang thugs thob rtags// so so'i rigs dang rigs 'dra ba// mkha' dag shel dang bum gter dang// rin chen 'bru yi phung po'am// char du bab sogs dpag med dang// bza' btung la sogs longs spyod rdzas// sbyin dang 'bul ster bkur sti byed// ma sring mdza' mo bud med rigs/ rgyan mdzes gos bzang gus shing 'dud// grogs dang brtse dga' rjes su 'brang// dga' ba'i rnam 'gyur dpag med ston// rigs pa dngas shing bde stong 'bar// bde legs yon tan 'phel ba yi// rnam 'gyur brda rtags dpag med 'byung// sgra 'od zer dang mdzes pa'i gzugs// rigs dang rigs 'dra dpag med 'byung// gzhan yang cho 'phrul rnam pa ni// phyi nang 'byung ba'i nyer len dang// las dang las rnams 'thab pa dang// rtsa rlung thig le'i gang stong dang// de dag 'khrul pa'i cho 'phrul las// lus ngag yid kyi dkyil 'khor du// bsam gyis mi khyab 'byung ba ste// rang rang blo yis legs par dpyad// bzang la rnam par mi spro zhing// ngan la skrags pa bskyed mi byed// gang dang gang gi rtags dang ni// cho 'phrul rnam pa gang la yang// ched med gal ma mchis su gzhag/ rnam par 'chol ba'i rigs rnams dang// nges pa can dang nges pa med// de sogs gang dang gang la yang// bsam gyis mi khyab brtag dka' bas// rnal 'byor lus ngag yid nyams gtso// lus ngag yid gsum dbang 'byor bas// snang srid gtan la phebs pa ste// 'bras

bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// bzang mo'i klong du smin cing grol// bskyar med 'khrul 'khor la thag bcad// 'pho 'gyur med par gtan la phebs// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las// rtags dang cho 'phrul bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas nyid las sprul pa'i 'khor// dkar mo sku dang dmar mo gsung// sngon mo thugs kyi rigs rnams dang// ser mo yon tan rigs dang ni// ljang gu phrin las rigs rnams te// ye shes dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// dngos dang sprul pa yang sprul 'khor// las las grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// dngos dang sprul pa yang sprul te// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro mtha' yas rnams// dga' zhing spro ba'i rnam 'gyur gyis// lus kyis gar stabs sna tshogs bstan// ngag gis bstod bsngags glu dbyangs sgrogs// yid kyis bsam gtan rang bzhin sprul// bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las bcas pa la// rnam 'gyur du mas mngon par bstod// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// g.yo dang 'gul dang brdeg pa dang// 'od kyi dra bas khengs pa dang// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin// dri zar bcas pa thams cad kyang// dga' zhing gus pas mngon par bstod// mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig las/ rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// phrin las mthar phyin rmad du byung ba mkha' 'gro gsang rgyud bka'i lde mig ces bya ba rdzogs so// sa ma ya/ rgya rgya rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ gter rgya/ kha tham/ d+ha thim/ sprul sku gar gyi dbang phyug gis/ yos lo dgun zla tha chung gi tshes brgyad yos kyi dus su bla dkar klu btsan gyi gnas nas gdan drangs pa'o// sa 'brug gi lo stag gi zla ba na chos kyi bka' bkrol nas 'brug gi zla ba la bka' rdzogs lung rdzogs u rgyan yab yum gyi byang sems dkar dmar dang bcas pa/ bdag cag rtsa ba'i bu bco lnga/ chos bdag nyer gcig dang/ las can brgya dang rtsa brgyad rnams la rim par gnang ba lags so////

u rgyan gsang ba'i skad du/ rgya gar skad du/ bud+d+ha sarba pu tra e ka/ g+hu h+yA pu ri sa ma tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras gcig po/ gsang ba gcod pa sa bon gyi rgyud ces bya ba/ dran pa kun gyi thog ma yi// dngos mdzad sangs rgyas thog ma la// dang po nyid du phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur gyi// dgongs pa nyid dang grangs med par// thugs kyi snying po ji lta bar// gsung zhing bstan pa'i dus gcig na// mya ngan 'das pa'i thog mar ni// 'di ni nyag gcig rnal ma yi// don gyi sa bon rnams su ni// nges pa'i snying po nyid du yang// gsungs so bstan to bshad pa yin// bstan pa'i gsung ni rgya mtsho kun// la la gnas skabs yul don du// la la ma 'ongs 'jug don yin// la la 'dul don tha dad nyid// snying gi snying po tshig 'ga' las// kun gyis grub pa ma yin no// bstan pa 'phel byed sa bon du// 'di kun bzhag cing byin brlabs las// rang byung nyid du thugs las rdol// de phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thugs kyi sras ni gcig par yang// rang byung chen po'i 'phel dang bcas// 'byung ba'i sgra dang bral bar byung// 'di ni bstan pa gang byung du// 'od dang bcas te 'byung ba yin// gang la bab par gyur pa'i mi// bstan pa kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// 'di la ldem por bstan pa med// sus kyang bshad cing nyan med par// rang byung dgongs pa klong rdol du// nyi ma sprin las thon pa bzhin// sus kyang ma bsgribs rang byung ngo// 'di la 'byung bzhi'i gnod med pas// nam mkha' dag la 'bar bar snang// sangs rgyas 'bras bu sus thob par// 'di nyid de la snang ba yin// 'di ma mthong ba'i sangs rgyas ni// gcig kyang 'byung ba snga phyir med// de phyir bstan pa rnams kyi btsas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras gcig po// myang 'das 'thob pa'i sna thag yin// dgongs pa rang thog 'bebs pa yi// gnad kyi tshig tu 'di nyid byung// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang// sangs rgyas nyid ni sus thob pa// de tshe 'di ni lan gsum du// nam mkha' dag la 'phar ba dang// rang 'od lnga po 'di las 'byung// 'di 'dzin rnal 'byor skal che bas// lan gsum 'di yi tshig kun kyang// lhag dang chad pa med par ni// rdo rje'i lce yis sus brjod pa// 'di yang de dang mnyam par yang// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// de phyir bstan pa'i rgyud rnams kun// thams cad dus gcig bsgoms shes kyang// 'di mi snang bar grol ba med// 'di ni sa bon rang 'phel bas// bstan pa'i bdag po gang sangs rgyas// 'di nyid sa bon med par ni// bstan pa'i gsung ni tshig tsam yang// lce yi dbang pos

brjod mi nus// de tshig 'di la ma brten par// rdul cha tsam yang 'byung ba min// bstan pa gcig gi snyigs ma la// byin rlabs tshig ni 'di kun kyang// gang la snang ba'i mi des kyang// ma mthong rgyud dang bstan bcos ni// lce yi dbang pos brjod par nus// sems can kun gyi bsam pa dang// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa dang// ci ltar mthun pa'i chos kun ni// 'di yis ston par nus pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dang gcig/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa dang// dbyer mi phyed par 'dis 'gyur ro// de phyir bstan pa'i me ro yin// rang byung tshig gi rgyal po 'di// so so'i sems can skye gzugs la// so so'i brda skad ji lta bar// 'di nyid de ltar snang ba yin// de phyir rang byung yi ger ni// thog ma bab kyis grub nas byung// rang byung bcom ldan 'das la yang// 'di ltar rdzogs pa'i lugs su snang// chos kyi sde snod nyid du ni// 'di tshig ye nas rang shar bas// thog ma dran pa'i gzhir gyur te// dran pa thams cad ma stongs par// tshig 'di kun kyang snang ba yin// dran zad tshig 'di zad par ni// rdo rje zhes ni tshig 'di kun// 'byung ba'i rkyen dang bral bas na// rdo rje kun 'byung gsang sngags yin// thabs lam du mas mtshon pa'i phyir// rang thabs bsgom pa 'di las byung// snying po rang 'dul bstan pa'i bcud// gzhi nyid kyi ni bab yin no// chos kun mnyam pa'i nan tan tshig/ rang gnad du ni 'di kun shar// 'di la nus pa gcig nyid med// bsgom dang bsgrub pa'i rtsa bar yang// 'di sngags 'khrul pa'i tshig ma yin// ma 'khrul sngon thog nyid kyi gzhi// 'di las 'phros pa spros pa'i rgyud// rgyu las 'bras bu rang byung bzhin// 'di nyid las ni tshig kun kyang// dran bsam bral ba'i ngang nyid las// byas pa med par byung ba yin// 'od zer 'dzin pa'i skyes bu la// 'di ni snang bar 'gyur ba'o// de las 'phel nas grangs 'ga' 'byung// gsang ba'i bden pa gcig pa nyid// grangs med rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi// thugs rdol nyag gcig dgongs don gcig/ 'dzin med yangs pa'i rtod phur yin// thod brgal theg bab kun gyi gnad// rang sa 'byed pa'i lde mig mchog/ 'di ni bde ba'i sa bon 'dzin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab yin// mkha' mnyam dag pa'i gnad gzer 'dis// bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba 'dzin// 'di yi grangs sna bzung bas ni// lha min g.yul rnams rang log tu// 'di tshig bzung ba tsam gyis 'gyur/ khams gsum g.yul kun 'dis bzlog go/ rigs drug rnams kyi 'bros khung 'geg/ mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer du// 'jug par byed pa'i 'khor lo yin// srid pas bcings pa rnams la ni/ 'di yis grol bar byed

pa'o// dam pa'i snying po gdung rgyud du// rang bzhin du ni bab las byung// 'dis ni bla ma'i sku mi spang// snying la nyi ma'i 'od brdal bas// phyogs bcur khyab pa'i mun pa ni// 'di yis rang sangs nyid du 'gro// lhag par gnas pa'i ye shes ni// 'di yis mchog tu ston par byed// dkon pa'i mchog rnams skyed pa'i yum// sems dal bsam gtan ngang gis 'grub// chos sku'i snang ba dus gcig tu// ston par byed pa'i sgron ma'o// phyin ci log las yang dag tu// dag par byed pa'i chu rgyun yin// theg pa kun gyi mthar thug tu// skyel par byed pa'i shing rta'o// thos bsam bsgom pa'i rgyang shing du// 'jug par byed pa'i dngos po yin// sde snod thams cad 'dzin pa yi// mnyen lcug ldan pa'i lcags kyu'o// rnal 'byor dag pa'i dkyil 'khor te// lam du 'jug pa'i sa mkhan yin// mngal rnams khung sgo 'geg par byed// thar pa'i skas ni rang 'dzug yin// rnam dag 'od kyi mthongs 'byed pa// chos rnams kyi re gnas pa// bdud dang mu stegs mgo non yin// shes rab rmugs pa'i gsal 'debs so// smon 'jug kun gyi srog shing yin// lha dang sngags kyi mdo mdud do// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bskyed shing ngo// lta bsgom log pa'i dag byed khrus// man ngag snying po rdzogs pa'i sa// rdo rje theg pa'i grangs rdzogs nas// 'di ni thig le nyag gcig go/ 'gro rnams lam la 'dzud pa'o// theg pa'i rgyal po yongs rdzogs kyi// yon tan byung tshul rang byung ngo// le'u dang po'o//// e ma ho/ gsang mdzod rang bzhin tshig 'di yang// rang byung ye dag chen por ni// spel tshig gsang ba 'di ltar snang// ye thog dang po'i sangs rgyas ni// dang po mngon 'phags dran pa mgon// phyag rgya rang dran 'khor lo ni// gzhi las 'phags pa'i khyad par tshig/ spyi phud sngon gyi thog mar gyur// 'di dus khrag khrig bdun cu yi// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// snying pos brgyan pa'i bskal pa la// sde snod dang po'i sangs rgyas mgon// mnga' mdzad phyag rgya 'khor lo la// 'khor ni 'dzin pa bye ba lnga'i// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// spyi mes dang po pha rol mgon// dkyil 'khor snying po rab spros pas// bskal pa gser gyi yi ge la// sa ya drug gi phyag rgyar bzung// sngon thog dang po 'phags pa mgon// phyag rgya dang po nyid snang bas// bskal pa 'od zer 'gyed pa la// bdun 'bum gyi ni 'bras bu'o// 'jig rten dra ba mgon po yi// spros bral phyag rgya 'di spros te// bskal pa me tog mdzes pa la// bstan pa'i 'bras bu phyal yas las// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// snying po stong gi spyi phud mgon// snying po dam pa'i 'khor lo las// bskal pa rtsod pa'i snying po la// grangs med bzhi yi snying po'o/

'od ldan dang po sems can mgon// spros med snying po rang sgra las// bskal pa snang ba'i sgron ma la// ban bun stong gi phyag rgyar bzung// mdzes pa'i dang po 'gro ba'i mgon// yang dag snying po rnam spros te// bskal pa rags pa'i yan lag la// nyar nyer brgya yi grangs kyis ni// phyag rgya 'di ni dam pa'o// thugs brtse'i snying po nyan thos mgon// phyag rgya yang dag lam spros te// bskal pa dung gi sgra dag la// grang phreng bcu yi dam par ro// mi pham zang ma sgra bral mgon// yang dag nges pa'i rgyud las ni// bskal pa dra ba'i 'od zer las// dung phyur bdun gyi lam rgyal bzung// snying po sems rnal bdud rtsi mgon// nges pa'i sa bon rab bsgrags pas// bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs can la// 'bur rdul bdun gyi nges par bzung// rang bzhin drag po ldeng gdeng yang 'dzin mgon// phyag rgya 'khor lo gdan spros te// bskal pa smra ba'i gzhi dag la// phyal phyol dgu yis dam par bzung// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lha min mgon// yang gsang 'khor lo rnam spros te// bskal pa'i bum pa reg ldan la// yal yol drug cu'i snying po'o// rim pa lnga pa gtsug phud mgon// bla med snying po yang spros pas// bskal pa yang gsal rab 'byams la/ khrag khrig bye ba dgu brgya yi// bla na med pa'i gsang ba'o// 'jig rten thog ma shes rab mgon// bde chen snying po yang spros te// bskal pa bkod pa chen po la// 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// lha yi lhar ni 'di nyid do// 'chang ba rnams kyi thog ma mgon// nges pa'i 'bras bu 'di spros te// bskal pa rin chen spungs pa la// sa ya dgu bcu'i mgon po yi// rgyas par bsngags te dam par ro// yang rjes 'byung ba me 'od mgon// dngos por bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya ni// snying po nyid du spros pa las// bskal pa rab tu g.yo med la// rab mtha' bcu yi mgon po yi// snying po snying gi dngas mar ro// chags med rdul bral dri med mgon// gsang chen nges pa nyid du ste// bskal pa g.yo sgyu bral ba la// bye ba dgu khri'i grangs mgon gyi// 'du ba'i phyag rgya nyid du'o// dran pa dri med bsam gtan mgon// dri med nges pa'i gsang tshig spros// bskal pa mthar ldan seng+ge la// nyal nyil sum cu'i rgyal ba yis// 'di ni bden tshig dam par ro// dam pa'i skyes bu chos kyi mgon// sangs rgyas shes rab sa bon spros// bskal pa gdung ba sel ba la// sang seng dgu khri'i gdung 'phel bas// dam pa'i phyag ni yang dam du'o// spyi phud stong gi ye thog mgon// sngags kyi rtsa ba 'di sngags pas// bskal pa dung gi snying po la/ kha g.yel stong gi gdung 'phel bas// gsang chen dam par rab bzung ba'o// sangs rgyas dra ba mgon po yi// phyag rgya nyid du

gdung bzung bas// bskal pa bye ba'i snying po la// nyag thag dgu khri'i gdung 'dzin pas// 'di nyid snying po'i don du'o// yang dag gsang ba pad+ma mgon// snying gi snying po dkyil bzung byas// bskal pa yongs su brtse ba la// dang ding stong gi yang 'phel bas// 'di ni snying po yang dag spros// sems can snying brtse me tog mgon// dran gzhi dang po rab bzung bas// bskal pa yod par rab mchog la// rdul med dgu yi gsang 'dzin pas// gsang chen stong gi dam par ro// bskal pa dra ba nyi 'od mgon// dam pa'i snying por nges babs pas// bskal pa glang po yongs rdzogs la// rang rdul nyid kyi rjes 'dzin pas// stong nyid gsal ba'i mig tu spros// yongs rdzogs 'khor lo rigs kyi mgon// sems kyi dngos po dam par bzung// bskal pa bla na med pa la// khrag khrig drug cu'i yang 'phel bas// gsang chen 'khor lo nyid du'o// dri med dag pa chos kyi mgon// yang gsang nges pa'i lung 'di spros// bskal pa gcod pa rang grol la// nyal nyil nyid kyi 'phel gdung gi/ rim pas mngon par rab spros pa'o// yang gsang dang po thog ma mgon// rdo rje yang dag gsal thub pas// bskal pa khyung chen gshog rdzogs la// 'bum phrag lnga yi gdung 'phel bas// phyag rgya rang rdzogs nyid du'o// snang mdzad dang po mar me mgon// bla med rdo rje snying po spros// bskal pa mda' yi yongs bzung la// rnga yab gsum gyi gdung 'phel bas// rigs ldan rnams kyi phyag tu bzung// yid shes dang po gnas gsum mgon// snying thig rtsa ba'i dngas mar spros// bskal pa reg pa'i stobs can la// kha g.yel drug gi gdung 'phel bas// gong 'phel phyag rgya dam par spros// dpa' bo 'jigs sangs dngas pa'i mgon// dri ma med pa'i snying du babs// bskal pa dran bsam bral ba la// yal yol stong gi gdung 'phel las// 'di kun skyon dang bral bar ro// drag po chags bral bde ba'i mgon// chags med rang rig phyag rgyar spros// bskal pa mya ngan bral ba la// dung phyur gsum gyi gdung 'phel bas// med pa rnams kyi dang por ro// chos sku dngos dag dri med mgon// dam pa gsung gi snying por spros// bskal pa zil gyis gnon pa la/ sa ya nyid kyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun yang dag nyid du'o// yang sangs rgyas pa sgyu ma mgon// tshig bral bde ba'i snying po spros// bskal pa chos kyi 'khor lo la// bye ba dgu yi gdung 'phel bas// nges pa'i lam gyi thog mar ro// stong pa nyid ni dge ldan mgon// gsang ba'i yang gsang chen por spros// bskal pa pad+ma brtsegs pa la// kha g.yel lnga yi gdung 'phel bas// snang ba rnams kyi thog mar ro// skyes bu

byed pa 'od zer mgon// 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i rim par spros// bskal pa dang ba'i dbyangs can la// rdul mtha' bzhi yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun mngon par rang 'thad do// shes rab mi rnyed sgyu 'phrul mgon// sems nyid thog ma'i dkyil 'khor spros// bskal pa lha yi phyag sor la// nyal nyil bdun gyi gdung 'phel bas// snying po rang dag gnad du'o// bde ba dam pa dngos grub mgon// gsang chen snying po dam par spros// bskal pa yan lag med pa la// sang seng drug gi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun yang dag dam par ro// dngos po yang dag stong pa'i mgon// skyob pa dam pa'i phyag rgya spros// bskal pa grangs mtha' log pa la// stong phrag dgu yi gdung 'dzin pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du'o// chos kyi grags pa gnyis med mgon// yang gsang rang byung tshig 'di spros// bskal pa yongs su grol byed la// nyal nyil gsum gyi gdung 'phel bas// mnyam pa rang gnas nyid du'o// ye nas gsang ba dri med mgon// byin rlabs rang byung yi ge spros// bskal pa seng+ge rtsal sprugs la// khrag khrig bdun gyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun dam pa'i thugs dkyil du'o// mi pham dang po sangs rgyas mgon// gsang ba thugs kyi bu gcig par// bskal pa dga' bas myos pa la// dung phyur phyed dang dgu gdung gi/ 'di nyid dmigs med rang dam mo// dran spangs mngon 'phags rang bzhin mgon// 'byung ba'i sgra dang bral bar spros// bskal pa 'du ba chen po la// kha g.yel lnga yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di tshig rang byung gsal bar ro// bar ma'i dang po skye med mgon// 'di ni phyag rgya rang stobs te// bskal pa khu byug rang byung la// thar ther gsum gyi rtags shar bas// 'di tshig rab tu bsngags pa'o// 'jig rten grangs bskal ut+pal mgon// gsang chen rab rgyas phyag rgya spros// bskal pa rab tu mthong ba la// 'bum phrag dgu yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun snying gi dkyil du pheb// 'das pa'i dang po dra ba mgon// snying po gsang ba yang dag spros// bskal pa bud med rang 'dul la// phyal phyol dgu yi rgyal ba yi// 'di tshig rang rig dam par ro// gnyis 'das dang po zhing khams mgon// rdo rje chen po'i gsang tshig spros// bskal pa rang sgra zad pa la// sa ya gnyis kyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di tshig gzigs dang rab mkhyen bzung// drug mtha' thog ma gnyis pa mgon// 'dul tshig snying po bla ma spros// bskal pa dge ldan chen po la// 'bum phrag lnga yi gdung 'phel bas// snying po rnams kyi yang snying du// mdzad pa bzhi thog thod rgal mgon// bla na med pa'i nges lung spros// bskal pa seng bram ze yang ge bsgyings pa la// khri phrag dgu

yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun gsal ba'i tshig tu'o// mtha' bral yongs rdzogs skyon bral mgon// bral gsang tshig 'di phyag rgya spros// bskal pa skyed par byed pa la// stong phrag dgu yi gdung 'phel bas// med tshig rdzogs par yang dag bzung// ye rdzogs dang po sgyu ma mgon// yang gsang 'bar ba 'od zer spros// bskal pa rab tu 'phags pa la// khrag khrig gnyis kyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di ni nges pa'i gsang chen po// dri ma dngos bral bde ba'i mgon// 'di nyid lam rgyal dam par spros// bskal pa g.yang sa chen po la// khri phrag bdun gyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di tshig rim pa dang por spros// 'dus pa rnams kyi thog ma mgon// nges pa'i gsang chen rab bsngags te// bskal pa gser 'od dam pa la// yang 'phel dgu khri'i mgon po yis// 'di kun gsang chen snying du bab// yang 'byed stong gi dang po mgon// gsang ba'i snying po yang gsang spros// bskal pa le lo ye dag la// ther zug dgu yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di yang snying thig gsang bar phab// gsang ba kun gyi sngon thog mgon// phyag rgya snying gi dkyil du spros// bskal pa dri med bzang snying yang po la// nyar nyer lnga dgu yang yi gdung 'phel bas// 'di tshig bla med snying la phab// ston pa'i dang po nam mkha' mgon// yang bsdus rang byung tshig 'di spros// bskal pa mthar chags chen po la// nyal nyil drug gi gdung 'phel bas// 'di nyid bsam gtan 'khor lo bzung// stong pa'i yang mdzad dam pa mgon// 'di kun g.yo med rang byung tshig/ rdzogs pa dngos dag bskal pa la// 'bum phrag dgu yi yang gdung gis// 'di kun nges pa'i 'bras bur spros// dang po gsang 'dzin dngos grub mgon// 'di yang mdzad chen dag par spros// bskal pa grangs brdal gsang chen la// kha g.yel gsum gyi gdung 'phel bas// 'di kun yang dag lam nyer bzung// dri med rang zad 'byung bral mgon// dkyil 'khor kun dag rtsa ba spros// bskal pa mo mtshan rgyun gcod la// thar ther brgya yi gdung 'phel bas// gsang ba'i yang zhun theg par bzung// mos chen rnams kyi dang po mgon// snying po mig dag phyag rgya spros// bskal pa 'khor ba'i mun sel la// 'bum phrag lnga yi yang gdung gis// 'di nyid spros te dam du'o// sems rig kun gyi spyi phud mgon// nga med sngon du phyag rgya spros// bskal pa snga mo mo stong ldan la// bye ba dgu yi gdung 'phel bas// nges shes kun gyi thog mar bzung// bslab gnas kun gyi dang thog mgon// phyag rgya mig ldan stong du spros// bskal pa sgyu ma snang mdzad la// yal yol gsum gyi yang gdung gis// 'di tshig gong ma'i gong mas bzung// rim pa sngon gyi

skyed byed mgon// bab byung med snang phyag rgya spros// bskal pa snying rje kun 'dus la// sang seng lnga yi gdung 'phel bas// snying po gsang ba chen por bzung// 'jigs pa kun bral seng ge mgon// sangs rgyas sras ni gcig pa spros// bskal pa bzang po rab gang la// stong phrag bdun gyi gdung 'phel bas// 'byung ba'i rang sgra bral bar bzung// rdzogs pa'i yang thog tha ma mgon// don dgongs nyag
