yongs kyi rje bo ni// mthing nag shang lang mda' dang gzhu// tshangs pa lha rnams kun gyi gtso// spu gri nyi ma'i zer thogs pa'o// pho rgyud rgyal po yongs kyi bdag/ mdog dkar zhags pa spu gri 'dzin// gsang ba sku lha'i gtso bo dkar// rdo rje dang ni ru+u mtshon 'chang// mgon po ma hA kA la ni// mthing nag beng dang gri gug thogs// dregs pa'i ded dpon sum cu po// sna tshogs gos gon re re'ang// 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis 'khor dang bcas// sprul pa yang sprul bsam mi khyab// gsal 'tsher 'bar ba'i skur bsgoms te// snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya// A+oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+taM hUM phaT// thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer brgyad gnas pa// 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub pa'i sngags// dregs pa can gyi sde brgyad kyi// bstan pa bsrung zhing sku dgra 'dul// 'gras pa'i dgra rnams sgrol bar 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas stobs ldan nag pos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen thabs la mkhas// dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa'i thabs// gdug pa ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// dpal chen he rus bka' stsal pa// dmod pa drag sngags bsgrub 'dod pas// srog chags bsad pa'i ri shur 'dra'i ri yang 'dra'i sa// dmar po khrag gi mdog 'dra'i ngos// dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar ba la// srin po khros pa'i

gzugs bris la// dmigs pa'i rten du mkhas pas gzhag/ yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang// shin tu 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// tsakra rtsibs dang sgo bzhir bcas// rab tu gsal ba'i dbus nyid du// bdud bgegs nyi zla pad+ma'i khar// lha mchog stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'jigs pa'i zhal// phyag na rdo rje dung khrag dang// lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// zhabs gnyis dregs pa pho mo gzir// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo ni// mkha' 'degs sa gzhi gnon pa'i phyag/ zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// yum dang gnyis med sbyor byed pa'i// drag sngags gtso bo bskyed par bya// drag sngags sde dpon bco brgyad po// rang gi sngags las bskyed bya ste// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// thod pa gri gug 'dzin mdzad cing// thod pa gri gug 'dzin yum ldan// bdud nag me 'bar zhes bya ba/ khram shing bdud zhags thogs pa dang/ khram shing thod rlon 'dzin pa yi// yum dang srin po gsod byed ni// ral gri thod 'chang de yi yum// gri gug me mgo thogs pa'o// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po ni// mdog sngon ral gri dar nag 'phyar// dar nag zhing lpags 'dzin pa'i yum// ma hA de wa sku mdog dkar// ba dan shel gri 'dzin pa dang// thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mchod gtor thun gyi gtor ma 'chang// mthing nag btsan po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhing lpags thogs// mu stegs nag po zhes bya ba/ kha T+wAM ga dang tri shUl 'dzin// du ba mjug ring gza' yi gtso// nag po khram shing dgra s+t+wa 'chang// rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya ba// mdog dkar shel gr-i dar dkar 'dzin// mdog ser 'gong po yongs kyi gtso// sprul pa'i lag pa 'gyed pa dag/ mdog dkar rdo rje mdzes pa ni// dkar dang dmar ba'i ru mtshon thogs// 'jig rten btsan gyi rgyal po ni// btsan gyi mdung dang gri 'dzin pa'o// klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa// dmar po bum pa rus sbal ldan// dregs pa dmod pa'i mtshon cha can// srin po'i gzugs can mtshon cha thogs/ kha nas dmod pa'i drags sngags zlos// gang la dmigs pa'i srog lus gcod// de lta bu ni gsal ba dang// snying po 'di yang bzlas par bya'o// A+oM badzra sarba duSh+taM hUM phaT// thog mthar A+oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer drug gnas pa// dmod pa drag sngags snying po yin// de nas drag sngags gang 'dod bsgrub// gdon mi za bar grub 'gyur te// rdo rje'i brag kyang tshal bar 'gas// zhes gsungs so// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dmod pa drag sngags bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// de nas dpal chen

po ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang/ der sprul zhing 'dus pa'i 'khor/ khro bo dang/ khro mo rnams dang/ grub pa'i rig 'dzin gyi tshogs lhun gyis grub pa dang/ phyag rgya chen po dang// tshe la dbang ba dang/ sa la gnas pa ste/ so so'i bsgrubs pas grub pa'i sku la rus pa'i rgyan dang/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang/ phyag gdub dang/ zhabs gdub dang/ dbu rgyan dang/ stod g.yogs dang/ smad g.yogs dang/ dbang gi thor tshugs dang bcas pa/ phyag na rdo rje dril bu+u bzung ba sha stag ste/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i rig 'dzin dang bcas pa de dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rangs shing mngon par dga'o// khro bo sgos sgrub kyi skabs te gsum pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ le'u bco brgyad zhi khro 'dus pa'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// shog ser gyi bu la lha brag tu bshus so zer ba 'dug// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wAn sarba su ga ta sa mu dA yot+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang/ dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang/ phyi nang rgya khyon tshad med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i nang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun bzang he ru ka la/ 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang/ rig 'dzin pho mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi dregs pa pho mo rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po'i nang nas rig 'dzin pho mo rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan spyi dpal rje// slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan nyid dang// smin par byed pa'i lam dang ni// phyag rgya sgrub pa'i thabs la sogs// rtsa ba'i rgyud du ma gsungs pa// phyi ma yi ni rgyud chen 'dir// sems can rnams la sman pa'i phyir// gtso bos rim bzhin bshad du gsol// a la la ho/ zhes phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru kas 'khor rnams la 'di skad (19)

ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// gsang sngags sgo ni slob dpon te// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing// dbang rnams thob par ma byas nas// nyan pa la sogs brtsam pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// bde gshegs rjes 'brangs slob dpon te// de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing// sngags rnams ma 'dres so sor mkhyen// shes rab che zhing brtson 'grus che// phyi nang rgyud shes cho ga skong// thabs kyi spyod pa sna tshogs la// gang dang gang la ma rmongs shes// las kyi bye brag thams cad la// lhag chad med pa thams mkhas shes// gsang ba mchog gi thabs rnams sbed// che mchog he ru'i slob dpon yin// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// shin tu 'dus pa chen po ste// 'di las 'da' bar mi byed pa// yan lag dam tshig mchog tu len// spyod pa'i bye brag thabs yin pas// mi spong mi 'dor 'bad bsrung ba// mdog dkar gzugs dag stobs dang ldan// ga bur dri ldan ri mo 'chang// rtag par sems can don la dga'// sems can sgrol ba'i thabs la mkhas// skad gdangs dung sgra yod pa ni/ khrag 'thung he ru'i slob dpon yin// phyi nang chos la ma rmongs mkhyen// khyad par shes rab phun sum tshogs// rig pa'i gnas mchog ma 'gags shes// chos spyod bcu rnams lhag par brtson// slob dpon 'khur zhing mched la gdung// sems can ci dga'i spyod pa byed// thabs kyi bye brag rnams la mkhas// gcig gam thams cad mtshan nyid 'dzin// don mthong dga' ba mtha' dag yod// gshin rje gshed po'i slob dpon yin// lam gyi thabs rnams khyad par ston// rtag par bzlas shing 'phro 'du dga'// snying po sngags la dad mos che// blo gsal rig pa khyad par yod// spyod lam rnams bzhi'i seng+ger spyod// glu gar rol mo rnams la dga'// mchod pa'i bye brag thabs mchog mkhas// lung bstan bka' bzhin byed cing gzo// spun la gdung zhing sems can 'dud// pad+ma dbang chen slob dpon yin// phyi nang rnam rtog mi skye shing// rgyud dang mdo sde dag la mkhas// thabs mkhas ting 'dzin drod tshad brtson// sde snod gsum la ma rmongs dang// rtog bcas the tshom ma lus sel// gsang ba sbas pa'i thabs rnams mkhyen// dad pa rnams la skyo dub med// gsang ba'i sde snod drug rnams kun// rtog bcas snod ngan rnams la sbed// gsang ba'i chos rnams sems la 'chang// 'bad pa'i stobs kyis man ngag 'tshol// rtsa bar bcas pa bsrung byed pa// rdo rje phur pa'i slob dpon yin// thos brtson yon tan kun gyis brgyan// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa

gsum// de yi thabs kyis 'dul thabs rnams// de yi spyod pa ma 'gags mkhyen// byams dang snying rje gang 'dul ba// rjes su mthun pa'i thabs mchog gis// ji lta ji ltar 'dul mdzad pa// thabs mkhas dad ldan ting 'dzin gsal// gnyis med blo ldan brtul zhugs che// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i slob dpon yin// lta spyod ting 'dzin brtson 'grus che// thabs mkhas man ngag zab mo 'chang// mkha' 'gro chos skyong bran ltar chags// 'jig rten mchod bstod slob dpon yin// yi dam lha yi bsnyen pa rdzogs// sngags kyis sbyor ba dag la mkhas// drag po sngags kyi rtsal thob pa// dmod pa drag sngags slob dpon yin// de nas slob ma'i mtshan nyid bshad// dpa' zhing snying stobs shin tu che// phyi nang 'dus pa'i chos la mkhas// lhun sdug phrin las dag la dga'// dgongs pa nyams lon mu stegs bzlog/ lta log sun 'byin yang dag dgod// bde ba'i lam ston thabs la mkhas// bzo mkhas rig gsal bla ma bsten// 'dzin la mkhas shing brjed med pa// ut+pal zhes bya'i gang zag de// che mchog he ru'i slob mar bzung// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// dam tshig ma nyams thub par bsrungs// shes rab che zhing dad pas dpa'// ston pa'i bka' lung dag pa gnas// slob dpon 'khur zhing spun la gdung// nyon mongs sbyongs shing snying rje che// spyod gzob lus la ga bur dri// tsan+dan zhes bya'i gang zag de/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i slob mar gzung// thabs dang stobs kyi rtsal 'chang zhing// rin chen sna tshogs sbyin par gtong// spyod yangs byung lam lhun sdug ngag snyan bde// ji ltar ji lta'i spyod pa yis// de lta de lta'i slob dpon 'khur// bla ma shes rab dgos 'dod skong// nga bdag skyon spangs dad brtson che// dam tshig ldan zhing shes rab ldan// rgyud thos legs par ston pa ni// gshin rje gshed po'i slob ma yin// dge bcu rtag spyod mi dge spangs// bde 'jam khro ba'i sems mi 'byung// glu gar rol mo sna tshogs ston// mdog mdzes tsan+dan dri bzangs dang// stod smad phyed cing sked pa phra// yan lag bde 'jam 'bar 'bur med// skra mtho sen mo zangs 'dra dmar// sbyor ba'i yan lag thabs la mkhas// dad ldan brtson 'grus snying rje che// pad+ma zhes bya'i gang zag de// pad+ma dbang chen slob mar bzung// gong gi yon tan thams cad rdzogs// rgyal po sde bcas kun gyis bstod// mu stegs sde pas bsngags pa brjod// sde pa bzhi yis spyi bor 'khur// rdo rje phur pa'i slob ma yin// dkyil 'khor mtha' dag las la mkhas// gsang bsgyur kyang drug gab sbas man ngag thub// slob dpon 'khyar zhing spyod pa yangs// mngon rdzogs ma mo'i

slob mar bzung/ khong gdug zhe gnag zhe sdang che// sha khrag dmar la longs spyod byed// lus dang srog la mi blta bsgrub// 'jig rten mthu yi slob mar bzung// g.yo sgyu chung zhing yid ches che// sdod la brtson zhing bsgrub bsran che/ khor gdug yid ches sngags la brtson// drag sngags dmod pa'i slob ma yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ slob dpon dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// gang zag gi mtshan nyid kyi skabs te dang po'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig rig 'dzin pho mo rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang 'dod pas// byang ri skyob cing lho ri gzhol// shar gyi ri dma' nub ri mtho// ri brag dmar pos mtha' ma bskor// mdun na me tog snam bu yod// bya rgyal skad ni sgrog pa'i gnas// der ni ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rim bzhin du// lha gsal 'phro 'du'i tshogs byas la// so so'i snying po bgrangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rnams su dbang bskur bya// che mchog yon tan dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chen po rab dben par// maN+Dal byi dor byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga yi chag chag gdab// mtshan ldan bdud rtsi lnga sbyar nas// che mchog lha tshogs gsal byas la// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// yon tan phrin las dbang bskur bya'o// yang dag thugs kyi dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chen po rab dben pa// sha na khram spyang rgyug pa'i sar// bya gcan sha za mang po 'khor// mi ro mang po mkhar du brtsigs// shin tu ya nga'i gnas su ni// lnga bcu rtsa brgyad lha tshogs rnams/ khro gtum gdug pa'i sprin tshogs kyi// gnas nas rab tu gsal bar bsam// so so'i snying po bgrangs nas ni// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs nas// yon tan phrin las dbang bskur ro// 'jam dpal sku yi dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// maN+Dal byi dor byas pa la// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ khrag chen go ro tsa na yis// steng du mnan la byugs par bya// gshin rje'i lha tshogs gsal byas te// 'bar gsal rngam pa'i hUM gi tshogs// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga ru dbang bskur bya// pad+ma gsung gi dbang bskur ba// nub tu kha bltas zla gam dbyibs// me tog snam bu yod pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas nas ni/ khrag chen dag gis chag chag gdab// dbang gi lha tshogs gsal byas nas// dmar po hrIHyi tshogs bsams nas// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga ru dbang bskur ro// phrin las

phur pa'i dbang bskur ni// gnam sa gru gsum dbus gnas par// ce spyang bsad shul 'dra ba ru// mi ro gsar rnying yod pa'i sar// 'bar 'phro gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// phrin las lha tshogs gsal byas nas// 'bar ba rngam pa'i tshogs chen las// so so'i snying po bzlas nas ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga ru dbang bskur bya// ma mo rbod gtong dbang bskur ba// dur khrod chu gling rkang gcig pa// ma tshogs dbang phyug 'du ba'i sar// sha chen khrag las byas pa yi// dmar po snying gi mchod tshogs bshams// rkang chen gling bu 'bud pa dang// b+han+d+ha'i cha lang brdab pa dang// tshil chen dud pa chen po gtang// gang bsgrub yi dam byed pa la// srog gi snying po bgrangs nas ni// bka' mi 'da' bar dbang bskur bya// 'jig rten mchod bstod dbang bskur ba// srog chags bsad pa'i shul 'dra ba// dmar po khrag gi mdog 'dra'i sar// maN+Dal gru gsum 'bar ba la// srin po khros pa'i gzugs byas te// de steng slob ma gzhag par bya// mkhas pas de ltar dbang bskur nas// rag sha rag sha ma laM rag sha hriM kha rag sha hriM// 'jig rten rang rgyud dregs pa can// bran bzhin 'khol bar dbang bskur ro// drag sngags dmod pa'i dbang bskur ba// brag ri sbrul nag 'greng ba'i sar// chu gsum 'dus pa'i sum mdo la// dred po dred mo langs pa 'dra// rkang gcig gnod sbyin gnas pa'i sar// dkyil 'khor byi dor byas pa la// sbrul nag khrag gis chag chag gdab// che mchog he ru bdag bsgoms la// drag po'i gsang sngags bzlas shing bskur// spyi yi dbang bskur sngags ni 'di'o// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ AHna maHsarba ta thA ga ta bA' ga badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hUM na maHsarba ta thA ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ trAM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ hrIHna maHsarba ta thA ga ta karma badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85hUM/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las lnga yi dbang bskur ro// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ dbang skur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// dbang gi skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// dngos la gnas shing tshor med pa// ma rig rmongs pa'i gti mug de// spangs pas 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chos nyid don gsal 'gyur// ma rig pa yi gti mug de// spangs pas bden pa'i tshig mi rnyed// spyad pas 'od gsal chos kyi dbyings// ye shes chen por gnas par 'gyur// che mchog yon tan bsgrub par bya// de yi don ni spyad bya ba// A+oM ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge

dgu pa ni// che mchog he ru'i snying po ste// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs pa// rang bzhin grub pa'i byin dbab phyir// gsang sngags zab mo rab spyod pas// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod// rang rang gnas su bder bzhugs pa// dbang bskur byin dbab thams cad rdzogs// yang dag dpa' bo'i sku lhun grub// ye shes lnga ldan sangs rgyas sku// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas lnga yi rab tu 'khrigs// de yis bsam gtan thams cad rdzogs// che mchog he ru'i phyag rgyar bshad// ces gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ che mchog phyag rgya'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// zhe nas sdang ba'i ngan sems bde// spangs pas 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chos dbyings ye shes thob// yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub par bya// de yi don ni bshad par bya// rtsa ba brgyad ni snying po'i mchog/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ bde gshegs gzhal yas bsod nams rdzogs// de yi rjes 'gro snang ba dag/ snang ba dag pa'i ye shes te// ru lu 'phro 'du sbyor bas so// 'khor ba rnam grol byang chub sems// 'di ltar snang ba'i chos nyid ni// ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yi// rab tu bdag gsal dngos med bsgom// chos dbyings me long ye shes te// de la sems brtan gsal gyur ni// yang dag thugs kyi phyag rgya yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ yang dag thugs kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// yongs su khengs pa'i nga rgyal de// nga 'o nga yi sems 'char zhing// de yis log pa'i lam gnas shing// spangs pas mu stegs lam du 'gro// spyad pas chos nyid chen po yin// rtog med bde ba'i lam gnas shing// ye shes chen por der gnas 'gyur// 'jam dpal gshin rje bsgrub par bya// A+oM a kro te ka hUM phaT/ snying po a kro 'bru bdun ni// gshin rje gshed po'i snying po ste// rtog med bde ba'i lam gnas shing// ye shes chen por der gnas 'gyur// byang chub sems nyid dam pa ste// yang dag rin chen 'bar ba yin// yon tan snying po dam pa lon// gshin rje gshed po'i rgya ru bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// 'dod la chags pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de yis 'bras bu rlag par byed// spangs pas don rnams rnyed

pa med// rab tu bcings nas gnas ngan len// yongs su dag pa'i 'dod chags de// spyad pas 'bras bu chen po thob// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gsal// pad+ma dbang chen bsgrub pa gyis// oM ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ yi ge bdun pa dbang chen sngags// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags bcas pa// 'phro 'dus gyur pa'i dam tshig ni// le brgan lta bur gyur pa ste// 'khor ba'i bag chags rtog bcas dang// gnas ngan len pa thams cad kun// gdod nas sangs rgyas nyid gnas pas// dag dang ma dag gnyis med de// de yi rang bzhin sangs rgyas so// bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin pas/ khyab pa'i ye shes chen po des// lha yi gnas su bsgom par bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyar bshad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ pad+ma gsung gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// log pa'i sems can phrag dog che// spangs pas 'bras bu 'byung mi 'gyur// spyad pas chos nyid don gsal 'gyur// nan tan ye shes chen po 'grub// phur pa phrin las bsgrub par bya// de yi don ni bshad bya ba// oM badzra kI li kI la ya hUM phaT/ kI la ya ni 'bru dgu pa// rdo rje phur pa'i snying po yin// don dam snying po yongs su grub pa'i tshe// bzlas dang ma bzlas tshig gi tha snyad yin// ye nas bzlas pa rang byung chen po yin// ngo bo nyid kyi sngags kyi rang bzhin no// de 'dra bzlas pa don gyi snying po yin// ma bcos rang byung snying po sngags tshig ste// zab mo bzlas pa yin zhes rgya ru bstan// de yis brtan byas dam pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes lnga gsal don dam dbyings nas spyod// rten 'brel lus ni byin rlabs nyon mongs bsreg/ phra mo'i ting 'dzin yi dam dngos su gsal// bzlas pa mthar phyir 'bras bu chen po yin// rang gi bzlas pa yin zhes rgya ru bstan// rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis 'di bzlas na// gang gis bzlas kyang snying po len par byed// sngags kyi snying po ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas snang dang mi snang med// rtag dang chad dang yod med dang// brjod dang smra bsam yul las 'das// rang bzhin gnas pa'i snying po de// ye shes mchog tu gyur pa las// rang gi rang bzhin de bzhin de// bden pa'i snying po rang bzhin pas// yang dag don du mkhas pas brtag/ phrin las phur pa'i phyag rgyar bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las// phrin las phur pa'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// ma mo'i don la mos pa yis// bla med he ru bsgrub par bya// oM ma hA kro d+ha hUM

phaT// gsang sngags yi ge 'bru bdun pa// bla med he ru'i gsangasngags yin// mkha' dbyings dag pa'i rang bzhin ni// brtan pa'i don rnams dag pa ste// dag pa nyid na dag pa med// mi shigs pa yi ngo bo la// dngas ma'i sa bon las byung ba// brtan pa'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas// gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas pa ste// yang dag don chen zab mo'i mchog/ gsal ba nyid na gsal ba med// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i phyag rgyar bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las// ma mo rbod gtong gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rnal 'byor bstan pa srung byed na// dregs pa kun 'dul bsgrub par bya// oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ ye shes bcu pa'i gsang sngags ni// dregs pa kun 'dul gsang sngags yin// spro bsdu'i sngags kyi rim pas g.yos pa'i tshe// rnam dag rang gi ngo bo de nyid len// ngo bo nyid dang rang gi rang bzhin med// bdag dang tshogs bcas ma lus de bzhin de// ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no// de thob 'bras bu mthar phyin bde bas gang// gshed mas srog la 'debs pa'i rgya ru bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud las/ 'jig rten mchod bstod dregs pa kun 'dul phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rnal 'byor sngags la mos pa la// dmod pa drag sngags phyag rgya bstan// oM badzra sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT// stobs kyi yi ge brgyad pa ni// stobs ldan nag po'i gsang sngags yin// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su gsal byas na// rang gi sngags bcas dmod pa'i yi ge ste// 'byung ba lnga 'khrugs sdug bsngal nyams su myong// ma bcos rang byung nges pa'i snying po yin// gsad ba ldog med srog sngags rgya ru bstan// zhes gsungs so// nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud las/ dmod pa drag sngags stobs ldan nag po'i phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// bsgrub pa bka' brgyad phyag rgya'i skabs te gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa las/ nges par 'byung ba phyi ma'i rgyud ces bya ba/ le'u bcu gcig pa rdzaugs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ lo tsA ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po khri srong lde btsan gyi phyag dpe/ rin po che'i gter du sbas so////

rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sa mu dA ya man+t+ra tan+t+ra ut+ta rot+ta da nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sngags rgyud/ phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka la/ 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang/ rig 'dzin rnams kyis bskor te bzhugs pa las/ de'i tshe rdo rje chos la sogs pa'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis bskor ba lan stong byas te/ 'di skad zhus so// e ma spyi dpal chen po lags// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor sgrub pa pos// sngags kyi dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// sngags kyi de nyid bshad par zhu// zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs rnal 'byor don ched du// sngags kyi don rnams zhu ba legs// don grub dngos grub 'thob pa ni// sngags kyi bzlas pas 'grub pa yin// de yang sgrub thabs rnam pa brgyad// che mchog yon tan bsgrub pa dang// yang dag thugs kyi bsgrub pa dang// 'jam dpal sku yi bsgrub pa dang// pad+ma gsung gi bsgrub pa dang// phur pa phrin las bsgrub pa dang// ma mo rbod gtong bsgrub pa dang// 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub pa dang// dmod pa drag sngags bsgrub pa dang brgyad// 'di rnams bsgrub pa bka' brgyad yin// A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu gnyis pa// che mchog yon tan snying po yin// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge 'bru dgu pa// yang dag thugs kyi snying po yin// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAt+na ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa// 'jam dpal sku yi snying po yin// oM pad+man+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu bzhi pa// pad+ma gsung gi snying po yin// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu bzhi pa// phur pa phrin las snying po yin// A+oM gu+u h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu+u h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI stAM/ ma ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT// gsang sngags yi ge sum cu pa// ma mo rbod gtong snying por bshad// A+oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa ni// 'jig rten mchod bstod snying por bshad// A+oM badzra sarba duSh+tAn hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge brgyad pa ni// dmod pa drag sngags snying por bshad// bka' yi gsang rgyud thams cad rnams// bsdus pas bsgrub pa brgyad du 'dus// sngags kyi gtan tshigs tshad ma 'di// thabs kyi rgyal por gnas pa'o// 'di dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gang// sngags kyi dngos grub rang la shar// yid bzhin nor bu ma btsal

rnyed// bya ba'i las la the tshom med// 'di dang mi ldan rnal 'byor gang// phyogs 'ga' tsam la brten pa rnams// sngags kyi de nyid ma rtogs par// bya ba'i las rnams kun la rmongs// zhes gsungs so// sngags kyi de kho na nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa// spyi dpal chen po thabs la mkhas// thabs dang shes rab yi ge las// sngags kyi na ya brtsi ba'am// yi ge btu ba ji ltar lags// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin las// skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// thabs dang shes rab yi ge ste// thabs ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// shes rab pad+ma'i rang bzhin no// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// sngags kyi sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung// de yi rnam pa 'di ltar bshad// ka kha ga g+ha nga// tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya// Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na// pa pha ba b+ha ma// ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH sgra'i gnas brgyad nas byung ba 'di rnams ni/ thabs rdo rje'i yi ge yin te/ sde tshan brgyad pa'o// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ e A+ai/ o A+au+au/ aM a/ sde tshan brgyad dang sbyar ba yis// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug po 'di rnams ni/ shes rab pad+ma'i yi ge'o// gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin las// yi ge btu ba 'di ltar bshad// thams cad kun gyi dang po la// dbyings yig gnyis pas 'og tu brgyan// dbyangs yig bcu gsum steng du brgyan// de la dbyangs yig bco lnga pas// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// 'di ni ye shes lnga rdzogs yin// sngags rnams kun gyi mgo la bzhag/ A+oM/ pa tshan gsum pa gzhag par bya// de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// ka tshan dang po gzhag par bya// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ma tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de steng Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM badzra kro ta ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru bcu gnyis pa// che mchog yon tan snying po de// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru

bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par byas// pha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og sha tshan bzhi pas spras// de la ya tshan dang pos spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis spras// A+oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM dang phaT kyi thog mtha' brten// gsang sngags yi ge 'bru bdun pa// yang dag thugs kyi snying po ste// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ thams cad kun gyi dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan gsum po 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ ta tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ ta tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan lnga par bzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bdun pa// 'jam dpal sku yi snying po ste// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bstan// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de dang ta tshan gsum par ldan// pa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang por bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bdun pas brgyan// de dang ta tshan dang por ldan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi

pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pa 'og tu spras// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM pad+mAn kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa// pad+ma dbang chen snying po ste// 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ de nas pa mtshan gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan gsum pas 'og tu brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og pa tshan gsum pas spras// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan// de dang ka tshan bzhi pa dang// ta tshan yi ge lnga gnyis ldan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par byas// pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bco lngas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par brgyan// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pas brgyan// de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba bi g+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu bzhi pa// phur pa phrin las snying po ste// gtso 'khor bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang por ldan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge lnga par ldan// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga par bzhag/ sha tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la ya tshan gsum pas spras// de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gcig brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang por ldan// tsa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ tsa tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas

brgyan// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ ka tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pas spras// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum brgyan// ta tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gnyis par ldan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas mdzes// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la ta tshan dang pos spras// ya tshan yi ge gnyis par ldan// steng du dbyangs yig bco lngas mdzes// pa tshan yi ge lnga gnyis bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum mdzes// ka tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes// ta tshan yi ge lnga pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig bzhi pas mdzes// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// ya tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge dang por ldan// de la dbyangs yig bcu gsum spras// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// steng du thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de la Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu+u h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge sum cu pa// ma mo rbod gtong snying po yin// 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags su bshad// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ pa tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// tsa tshan yi ge dang po bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan lnga par ldan// Ta tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og sha tshan gsum pas spras// ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og pa tshan gsum pas spras// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og Ta tshan dang pos spras// de la dbyangs yig gnyis pas brgyan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// de steng thig les mdzes par bya// pa tshan yi ge gnyis pa bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge bcu pa ni// 'jig rten mchod bstod snying po de// 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags su bstan// ye shes lnga rdzogs dbu ru bzhag/ pa tshan yi

ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang tsa tshan gsum par ldan// de 'og ya tshan gsum pas spras// sha chen yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ ya tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og pa tshan gsum pas spras// ta tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig lnga pas brgyan// sha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de 'og Ta tshan dang po bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan// de dang ta tshan lnga par ldan// sha tshan yi ge bzhi pa bzhag/ de la dbyangs yig drug pas brgyan// de steng thig les mdzes par brgyan// pha tshan yi ge gsum pa bzhag/ de dang Ta tshan dang por ldan// rin po che yi phra yis bcad// A+oM badzra sarba duSh+tAM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yi ge brgyad pa ni// dmod pa drag sngags snying po ste// 'khor dang bcas pa'i sngags su bstan// zhes gsungs so// sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// spyi sngags kyi skabs te dang po'o//// de nas rig 'dzin rnams kyis gsol pa/ spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang// spyi sngags btu ba de lags na// so so'i sngags kyi phreng ba rnams// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// dpa' bo chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// so so'i snying po bshad kyis nyon// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs kyi// sngags kyi rim pa 'di rnams so// oM bud+d+ha bai ro tsa na oM/ oM badzra de ti sha ya sha ra ti oM/ oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ oM badzra bud+d+ha lo tsa na hUM/ oM rat+na sam+b+ha ba trAM/ oM badzra ban+b+ha ra li ni trAM/ oM badzra a mi tA b+ha hrIH/ oM badzra mA ma kI hrIH oM badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+ha a/ oM badzra sa ma ya tA rA hA/ oM badzra sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ oM badzra d+ha ra hUM/ oM badzra sa twa hUM/ oM badzra rA dza hUM/ oM badzra rA ga hUM/ oM badzra sA d+hU hUM/ oM badzra lA' s+ye hUM/ oM badzra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badzra aM ku sha hUM/ oM badzra dI baM shwa ra ti hUM/ oM many+dzu shrI ku mU ra mu la trAM/ oM rat+na d+ha ra hUM/ oM badzra rat+na hUM/ oM badzra sUr+ya trAM/ oM badzra ke tu hrIH oM badzra ha sa ha/ oM badzra mA le hUM/ oM badzra puSh+pe trAM/ oM badzra pA sha hrIH oM badzra su phaT/ ma hA de ba e dzaHb+h+yo/ u ma de bI e dzaHb+h+yo/ ya ma ya dzaHb+h+yo/ ya ma dan+ti ya dzaHb+h+yo/ ya ma ru lu ma dzaHb+h+yo/ e ka dza TI trag dzaHb+h+yo/ du phrag du dzaHb+h+yo/ dun tiM du b+hi shuk+Shu dzaHb+h+yo/ tri pa sha li tri dzaHb+h+yo/ haM shaM tri dzaHb+h+yo/ bi nA ya ka u dzaHb+h+yo/ d+hA ki ni maM dzaHb+h+yo/ nA ga phu dzaHb+h+yo/ nA ga kro d+hI shwa rI phu dzaHb+h+yo/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sngags kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//// dmod pa drag sngags kyi sngags bstan pa/ oM badzra sarba duSh+t+wAM hUM phaT/ ya ma ya tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ ma ma sngags 'di lha grangs dang ma 'grigs pas lhag gam/ ru lu ma tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ tir+thi ka tha tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ du phrag du tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ dun teM du tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ de ba a tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ rU tra nri tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ rak+sha ra tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ rag mo ra tsit+ta hrIMHhrIMHdzaHdzaH/ yak+Sha k+Sha tsit+ta hrIM hrIMHdzaHdzaH/ yag mo k+Sha tsit+ta hrIM badzra sA d+hu tri tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ haM shaM tri tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ ra hu la pa tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ nA ga phu tsit+ta hrIM hrIM dzaHdzaH/ dmod pa drag sngags kyi sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// bsgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi sngags kyi bye brag gi phreng ba bstan pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o//// de nas rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal chen po lags// sngags kyi bshad pa dgos pa rnams// de don rgyas par bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na bcu gcig grongs mdzes pa// che mchog yon tan srog sngags yin/ oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// badzra rdo rje/ kro d+ha khro bo/ ma hA chen po/ shrI dpal/ he ni dgyes pa/ ru dbang drag/ ka phrin las/ hUM ni ye shes khro bo la// phaT ni rnam rtog gcod pa'o// de ni don chos nyid dang sbyar te bshad pa'o// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga yi snying po'o// badzra mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje/ kro d+ha khro bo/ ma hA shrI he ru ka yab che mchog yum gnam zhal// hUM bsdus phaT gtor ba'o// de ni yab yum gnyis kyi snying por bstan pa'o// oM badzra zhi ba rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs phyag mtshan gyi sngags/ kro d+ha mthar byed khro bo'i sngags// ma hA shrI che mchog yab yum gyi sngags/ he ru ka rigs bzhi yab yum gyi sngags/ hUM dreg pa 'dul ba'i khro bo bcu'i sngags/ phaT sgo ba bzhi yi sngags so// de ni lha tshogs rnams kyi snying por bstan pa'o// rnal 'byor dbang chen thob 'dod pas// ma la ya yi sa phyogs su// ting 'dzin brtan po thob gyur nas/ khrag 'thung 'phros pa'i lha rgyud gsal// de ltar yig 'bru bcu gsum mo// che mchog yon tan lha tshogs kyi// srog dang srog gi snying por bstan// de ltar srog thob snying po rdzogs// thun mong dngos grub gang 'dod 'grub// de ltar spyad cing gnas pa ni// rang gi sems nyid der 'phrul bas// sems kyi mtshan nyid gdod nas dag/ rgyu dang rkyen las rag ma lus// sems kyi cho 'phrul thams cad kyang// ye nas lhun gyis grub pas na// dper na mtshal dang khu ba 'dra// mtshal dmar khu ba dmar ba bzhin// thun mong dngos grub thob nas ni// mchog gi dngos grub chen po 'thob// tshe gcig sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// zhes gsungs so// che mchog yon tan gyi sngags ky-i dgongs pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// yang dag thugs kyi 'dzab dgongs la// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na yig 'bru bdun gnas pa/ khrag 'thung lha rgyud srog snying yin// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// ru ni chags pa chen po'o// lu ni kun bzang yum gyi

mkha'// ru ni nyon mongs dbang sdud pa// lu ni srid gsum dbang du sdud pa'o// hUM ni dgyes pa chen po'o// sprul pa mang po 'gyed pa'o// b+h+yo ni chos kyi dbyings 'jig rten gnas 'gyur ba'i yi ge yin pa'o// hUM tha ma yon tan rin po che nor bu rin po che/ phaT ni chos kyi dbyings bde ba chen par bskul ba'o// de ni sngags kyi don dang sbyar te bstan pa'o/ khrag 'thung drug cu rtsa brgyad snying por bstan pa ni// oM ni khrag 'thung yab yum bcu'i snying po'o// ru lu gong ma gau rI brgyad// ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad// hUM ni 'jigs byed khro bo bcu// b+h+yo ni dbang phyug ma nyi shu brgyad/ hUM sgo ba bzhi/ phaT spro ba'o/ khrag 'thung lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyi snying por ston pa ni/ oM khrag 'thung yab yum bcu/ ru lu gong ma gau rI brgyad// ru lu 'og ma phra men brgyad/ hUM sgo ba bzhi/ b+h+yo dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ hUM tha mas dbang du sdud pa/ phaT kyi las byed pa'o// yang dag don gyi lha dgur ston pa ni// oM dpal chen yang gyi srog tu gnas// ru lu gong ma yum gyi srog tu gnas// ru lu 'og ma gau rI ma brgyad kyi srog tu gnas/ hUM dang pos lha dgu po de dbang du sdud pa'o// b+h+yo ni las la skul bar byed pa'o// hUM tha mas mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dbang du sdud par byed pa'o// phaT ni snang srid thams cad rang dbang med par dbang du sdud par byed pa'o// dpal chen po yab yum gyi snying par ston pa ni/ oM ni dpal chen po'i snying po'o// ru lu gnyis yum gyi snying po'o// hUM thugs dam gyi rgyud skul ba/ b+h+yo las la 'gyed pa/ hUM drag tu skul ba/ phaT gdug pa sgrol ba/ 'jig rten pa'i srog gi snying por bstan pa ni/ oM gtso bo badzra he ru ka/ sku mchog dmar po'i ngo bor gnas// ru lu gau rI ma mo brgyad po yang// srin mo brgyad kyi ngo bor gnas// ru lu sing ha'i phra men brgyad po yang// srin mo brgyad kyi ngo bor gnas// hUM khro bo chen po bcu po yang// ging chen bco brgyad kyi ngo bor gnas// hUM rta gdong sgo ba bzhi po yang// bse mo bzhi yi ngo bor gnas// b+h+yo dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyang// srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi ngo bor gnas// phaT 'jig rten dregs pa las la 'gyed// 'bru brgyad sngags kyi 'phro 'du yi// 'jig rten dregs pa gnad nas bskul// 'bru dgu sngags kyi 'phro 'du la// 'od dang sgra dang gzugs kyang ston// gnad nas bskul cing las la sbyar// thams cad sems kyi cho 'phrul te// bsdus pas hUM gi ngo bor gnas// rab tu dben pa'i dur khrod gnas// hUM las badzra he ru ka/ yab yum gnyis su med par gyur// ru lu sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis// bde gshegs thugs dam rgyud bskul nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdu// dngos grub rang dbang bya ba dang// 'gro ba'i don

rnams bya ba dang// phrin las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// yang dag thugs kyi sngags kyi 'dzab dgongs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// 'jam dpal sku yi 'dzab dgongs la/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na yig 'bru bco lnga gnas// gshin rje'i lha rgyud srog snying yin// oM ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa/ a skye ba med pa/ kro skye ba med pa las skye ba'i cho 'phrul byung ba/ te rig pa'i ye shes kyi gti mug dag pa/ ka karma las kyi rgyal po/ ya yan pa chen po/ man ngag sod gnon pa/ ta bde ba dag pa/ ka thugs rje chen po/ ha dgyes pa chen po/ na ngan song stong pa/ ma kun gyi gzhi/ tha thugs dam bskul ba/ b+ha nya thugs rjes sgrol ba// dza thugs rjes 'gugs pa/ hUM thams cad sdud pa/ phaT thugs rjes rnam rtog thams cad gcod pa'o// don chos nyid dang sbyar te bshad pa'o// oM ye shes rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa ste/ ya mAn+ta ka'i snying po'o// a yum bi tA li'i snying po'o// kro e ka tsa ti'i snying po'o// te ral pa tshar dgu'i snying po'o// ka ya ma ra tsa'i snying po'o// ya myos byed 'bar ba'i snying po'o// man Ar+ya me ru'i snying po/ ta kong rtse brag 'joms kyi snying po/ ka ban glang mgo can gyi snying po/ ha ya ba ti'i snying po/ na rmig pa'i snying po/ ma lha mchog dud kha'i snying po/ tha a ba glang mgo'i snying po/ b+ha nya mig dmar gyi snying po/ dza chos kyi rgyal po'i snying po/ hUM bdud 'joms kyi snying po/ phaT rtel ba'i snying po/ lha bcu bdun gyi snying por bstan pa'o// oM ye shes lnga dang ldan pas sngags kyi mgo 'dren pa'i// a kro te ka gtso bo yab yum gsum gyi snying po'o// ya mAn+ta ka gshed bzhi'i snying po'o// ha na ma tha gshed bzhi'i yum gyi snying po'o// b+hany+dza hUM ni phyogs skyong yab yum bcu gnyis kyi snying po'o// phaT sgo ba bzhi'i snying po/ lha rgyud dang sbyar te bstan pa'o// oM a kro te ka gshin rje gshed po'i snying po/ ya mAn+ta ka gshed bzhi'i snying po/ ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ mthar byed brgyad kyi snying po/ ya mAn+ta ta ka gshed mthar byed dang bcas pa'i snying por bstan pa'o// oM ye shes lnga dang ldan pas sngags kyi mgo 'dren pa'o// a kro te ka gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'o// ya mAn+ta ka gnod par byed pa'i mgo chom/ ha na ma tha rgyob sod/ b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ b+hanya kyis chings/ dzas khug hUM gis sdus/ phaT kyis gtor/ gdug pa 'dul ba'i sngags su bstan pa'o// oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka gtso bo'i snying po/ ha na ma tha b+hany+dza yum e ka dza TI'i snying po/ hUM sdus shig phaT gtor cig yab yum gnyis kyi snying por bstan pa'o// dur khrod chen po'i sa phyogs su// ting 'dzin brtan par gyur pa na// 'jig rten lha tshogs

gsal byas nas// yig 'bru bcu bdun 'bum du gdon// ma gshin 'bum sde'i srog nyid kyang// rang dbang med par 'thob par 'gyur// thams cad gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor che// gshin rje gshin rje ma rig pa// gshin rje ma spangs rang sa grol// 'jam dpal sku'i 'dzab dgongs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// pad+ma gsung gi 'dzab dgongs la/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na bcu bzhis grong mdzes pa// pad+ma dbang chen lha rgyud snying po yin// oM ye shes lnga dang ldan pa// pad mi 'gyur ba'i rig mAn byams pa chen po/ ta bde ba chen po/ kr-ita dga' ba chen po/ badzra btang snyoms chen po/ kro mi 'gyur ba'i rdo rje/ d+ha bdag nyid chen po/ ha bdag gi sku/ ya 'dren pa chen po/ gr-I gcod pa chen po/ ba dag pa'i sku/ hUM sdud pa chen po/ phaT gcod pa chen po// de ni don dam chos nyid dang sbyar te bshad pa'o// oM ye shes rnam pa lnga/ pad mAn+ta kr-ita pad+ma dbang chen gyi snying po/ badzra kro d+ha zil gnon gyi khrau bo brgyad kyi snying po/ ha ya gri ba yum rnams kyi snying po/ hUM bka' nyan las byed kyi snying po/ phaT sgo ba bzhi'i snying po/ pad+ma dbang chen lha rgyud dang sbyar ba'o// oM ye shes lnga pad+ma na pad+ma'i rigs/ ta kr-ita rta mgrin/ badzra rdo rje/ kro d+ha khro bo/ ha ya grI ba rta mgrin/ hUM gtums sod/ phaT gsod sngags/ lha 'dre'i dmag dpung gzhom par bstan pa'o// oM ye shes lngas 'khol ba/ pad mAn+ta kr-ita pad+ma dbang chen/ ha ya grI ba gsung rta skad dang ldan pa/ hUM sde brgyad las la gzud cing dbang du sdud pa/ phaT las la skul ba'o// dam can ji bzhin skul ba dang sbyar ba'o// oM ye shes rnam pa lngas sreg pa/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita pad+ma dbang chen/ badzra kro d+ha rdo rje khro bo/ ha ya grI ba rta mgrin/ hUM stobs kyis klu gdon thul/ phaT sod/ nA ga klu 'dul ba'i don du bzlas pa'o// de ltar gnyen po'i don ston pa// dpal gyi rta skad thengs gsum dang// ma mo'i 'gying skad thengs gsum dang// rnal 'byor brda skad thengs gsum gyis// dang pos snang srid thams cad kun// rta mgrin dbang gi lha ru byung// gnyis pas snang srid sha khrag gyur// gsum pas ma sring dbyings nas bskul// bstan pa'i mkhar spe'u rtsig pa'o// 'di lta bu yi don rtogs na// shin tu 'jigs pa'i dur khrod du// dbang chen rta yi nga rgyal gyis// gang dag gnas par byed pa des// rta mgrin dbang gi sbyor ba yis// lha srin las la 'di yis 'khol// lha 'dre'i dmag dpung 'di yis 'joms// sa bdag klu rnams 'di yis thul// drag sngags bsnyen pa 'di yis skyol// gsung gi dngos grub 'di yis

'thob// dbang mchog sku yang 'di yis mthong// gsang sngags zab mo'i man ngag 'di// skal med rmongs pa'i gang zag dag/ kun la bstan par ma gsungs so// pad+ma gsung gi sngags kyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// phur pa phrinalas 'dzab dgongs la// oM badzra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nan baM hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na bcu bzhi'i grong mdzes pa// phur pa lha rgyud snying po yin// oM ni gzhi rtsa ba thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gdung 'tshob pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i thugs/ byang chub kyi sems so// badzra ni dbyings gting mtha' med pa nas skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba thams cad phur bu'i sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas/ mi gnas par mya ngan 'das pa'i byang chub sems so// kI li kI la ya ni/ de ltar sku gsung thugs kyi 'od zer gyis bsgral nas// chags pa med par mya ngan 'das pa'i byang chub ste/ chos nyid chags pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis mtho ris dang ngan song las mi stong pas zin pa las mi 'da' ba'i byang chub sems so// sarba ni yum gyi dbyings las skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba thams cad lhag pa'i byang chub sems las mi gnas pas/ shes rab yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi sems so// big+h+naM ni yab kyi mkha'i byang chub kyi sems las bskyed pa'i rgyu thabs byang chub kyi sems so// baM ni de ltar thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos nyid byang chub sems so// hUM ni rgyud lnga gnas su dag nas/ 'bras bu sku lngar lhun gyis grub pas/ mthar thug chos nyid kyi byang chub sems so// phaT ni de ltar 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las te/ ma btsal rdzogs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i byang chub sems so// phur pa rtse gcig pa de'i don phyi mo nas rang bzhin gyis gnas pa zhes bya'o// lha tshogs sngags su bstan pa ni// A+oM ni dpal chen yab yin te// badzra zhes pa yum yin no// kI ni ye shes khro bo la// li ni dbyings kyi khro mo yin// kI ni thabs kyi mche ba can// lA ni shes rab gshog pa can// ya ni sras mchog khro bo yin// sarba thams cad sdud pa'o// big+ha ni dgra dang sgrib pa yin// nan ni bgegs rnams 'ching ba yin// baM ni dbang du sdud pa ste// hUM ni phyag brnyan sgo ma bzhi// phaT ni sgrol ba'i phrin las rdzogs// dkyil 'khor gsum du bstan pa ni// dang po oM dang badzra ni// bdag nyid rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// kI li kI la'i yi ge bzhi// phyogs bcu khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ro// ya ni rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sarba thams cad ma lus pa// big+h+nAM bgegs zhes bya ba ste// baM gyis chings la hUM gis bsdus// phaT kyis mi gnas sreg par

byed// bcu gcig 'dus pa'i sngags su bstan// oM ni ye shes rnam pa lnga// badzra ye shes rdo rje yin// kI li kI la ya dang lnga// rang bzhin dag pa'i phur pa'o// sarba big+h+nAM thams cad bgegs// baM gyis non la hUM gis bsdus// phaT kyis mi gnas sreg par byed// nyams dga' ba yi gnas dag tu// mthing nag hUM las sku bskyed pa// rdo rje gzhon nu'i nga rgyal gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtags bzlas na// gsang sngags byin rlabs dngos grub dang// log 'dren sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas mthu// 'thob par 'gyur bar the tshom med// ces gsungs so// phur pa phrin las kyi sngags kyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// ma mo rbod gtong 'dzab dgongs la// oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka/ guh+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM/ ma ma yo ge ni ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer nyi shu brgyad// srid pa ma mo'i srog snying yin// dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// bdag nyid bla med he ru ka'i// nga rgyal brtan por bzung byas nas// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// ma mo mkha' 'gro thams cad kun// rang dbang med par las la gzud// gang dang gang la dmigs pa yi// las rnams de dag thams cad kun// skad cig tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// oM ye shes lnga/ gu h+ya yab/ dz+nyA na ye shes/ shrI dpal/ he dgyes pa/ ru dbang sdud/ ka phrin las/ gu h+ya yum gyi mkha'/ dz+nyA na yum gyi ye shes/ kro d+hI yum/ shwa rI dbyings/ s+t+waM dbyings su thim pa/ ma chos kyi dbyings/ ma rig pa'i ye shes/ yo gi nI rnal 'byor pa/ ru lu mkha'/ ru lu dbyings/ b+h+yo las/ hUM sdus/ phaT gcod pa'o// sngags kyi don chos nyid du bshad pa'o// oM ye shes lnga// guh+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka yab kyi snying po/ guh+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI dbyings kyi yum drug gi snying po/ ma ma yo gi nI rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma rje mo bcu bzhi'i snying po'o// ru lu ru lu sman mo sum cu'i snying po/ b+h+yo dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi snying po'o// hUM dbang du sdud pa/ phaT las la 'gyed pa'o// ma chen bdun cu rtsa lnga'i snying por bstan pa'o// A+oM ye shes lnga 'dus pa/ guh+ya dz+nyA na ye shes gsang ba'i thugs// shrI he ru ka dpal chen po/ guh+ya dz+nyA na gsang ba'i yum/ kro d+hI shwa rI yum gyi tshogs/ s+t+waM ni thams cad dbang du sdud/ ma ma yo gi nI ma mo dbang du sdud cing 'khol// ru lu ru lu ma mo mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud pa/ hUM gis dbang du sdud/ b+h+yo yis las la 'khol/ phaT kyi thams cad sgrol bar byed/ mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags su bstan pa'o// oM gu ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu ya dz+nyA na kro ti shwa rI shrI s+t+waM/ ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'o// ma ma yo gi nI rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma'i snying po'o// ru lu ru lu b+h+yo ni

las kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po'o// hUM dbang du sdus/ phaT las las bskul ba'o// mkha' 'gro rnam bzhi'i snying por bstan pa'o// ma mo rbod gtong gi lha tshogs kyi sngags kyi dgongs pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi 'dzab dgongs la/ oM badzra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+t+wAM hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas/ bar na 'bru brgyad grang gnas pa// dregs pa 'dus pa'i snying po yin// oM ye shes lnga/ badzra rdo rje/ tsaN+Da gtum po/ sarba thams cad/ duSh+taM stobs che ba/ hUM dbang du bsdus/ phaT kyis las la 'dzud pa'o// sngags kyi sgra don bstan pa'o// oM badzra tsaN+Da dregs pa kun 'dul gyi snying po/ sarba duSh+t+waM dregs pa can sum cu'i stobs/ hUM yum khams gsum spyi 'dul ma/ yab yum gyi bar du dregs pa can bcug pa stobs dbang du sdud pa'o// phaT kyis stobs 'phrog pa'o// dregs pa dbang du sdud pa'i tshul du bzlas pa'o// oM ye shes lnga dang ldan pa/ badzra rdo rje/ tsaN+Da gtum po/ sarba thams cad/ duSh+tAM gnon pa/ hUM dbang du sdud pa/ phaT kyis gcod pa'o// drag sngags su bstan pa'o// dben pa chen po'i sa phyogs su// rnal 'byor stobs dang ldan pa yis// dregs pa dbang du bsdu 'dod na// bdag nyid khro chen skur bsgoms la// 'jig rten dregs pa gnad la bor// dbang du bsdus te dam stsal la// phrin las rgya mtsho kun la sbyar// zhes gsungs so// 'jig rten mchod bstod kyi sngags kyi dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// dmod pa drag sngags 'dzab dgongs la// oM badzra sarba duSh+t+waM hUM phaT/ thog mtha' oM dang phaT bzhag nas// bar na grong khyer drug gnas pa// dregs pa gzir ba'i snying po yin// oM ye shes lnga/ badzra rdo rje/ sarba thams cad/ duSh+t+waM gnon pa// hUM sdud pa/ phaT gcod pa'o// sngags kyi don bstan pa'o// oM badzra stobs ldan nag po'i snying po'o// sarba dregs pa can sngags bdag bco brgyad/ duSh+t+waM gzir cing gnon pa/ hUM 'byung ba lnga'i bdag mo/ yab yum gyis dregs pa can bar du bcug la gzir ba'o// phaT kyis gzir zhing gcod pa'o// dregs pa can gzir ba'i don du bzlas pa'o// oM ye shes lnga'i rang sngags/ badzra rdo rje/ sarba thams cad/ duSh+t+waM dregs pa can gyi stobs so// hUM zil gyis gnon pa thugs 'dus pa/ phaT gcod pa'o// drag sngags gzir gnon du bzlas pa'o// bdag nyid stobs ldan gsal ba las// dregs pa ma lus gzir byed cing/ khams su dregs pa gnad la bor// de nyid sde brgyad las la dgye// bstan pa'i bsrung mar dbang bskur ro// zhes gsungs so// dmod pa drag sngags kyi dgongs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// sgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi

'dzab dgongs sngags kyi don bstan pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o//// ma tshang bskong ba'i rgyud ces bya ba le'u bcu dgu pa skabs gsum pa/ rdzogs so/ rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi phyag dpe/ rin chen gter du sbas/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ 'di la tshig sna nyung zhing le'u bcu gnyis par bka' sdod kyi sngags bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu pa zhig snang yang don tshan gzhan ni 'di nyid rgyas par 'dug go/ !/ ma tshang kha bskang ba'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rnam par dag pa'i bdag nyid chen po 'gyur ba med pa rdo rje'i rang bzhin can/ dus gsum gyi 'dod pa ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub par nus pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gter mi zad pa'i dbyings lta bu/ srid pa dang zhi ba'i chos ma lus pa skad cig tsam la thugs su chud pa/ ye shes kyi thig le chen po sna tshogs su rnam par 'phrul pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam par snang ba ste/ 'og min gyi gnas thun mong ma yin pa'i nam mkha'i khams kyi gtos chen po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i dbyings/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas mchog chen po yon tan chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pho brang/ ye shes kyi gzhal med khang kha dog dang dbyibs dang/ 'dod pa'i yon tan rgya chen pos mdzes shing/ rnam par bkra bar byas pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa de na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'khor 'dus par gyur pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa chen po dang/ de dag gi yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mig can ma dang/ rdo rje dbyings ma dang/ bzod pa chen mo dang/ dam tshig gi lha mo dang/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ byams pa dang/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang/ byang chub sems ma rdo rje dbyings phyug ma dang/ rin po che'i dbyings phyug ma dang/ pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma dang/ las kyi dbyings phyug ma dang/ rdo rje sems ma dang/ rin po che'i sems ma dang/ pad+ma'i sems ma dang/ las kyi sems ma dang/ de dag gi yang 'khor

gyi dam par gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje rgyal po dang/ rdo rje chags pa dang/ rdo rje mdzes pa dang/ rdo rje gzi brjid dang/ rdo rje rin chen dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ rdo rje bzhad pa dang// rdo rje chos dang/ rdo rje rnon po dang/ rdo rje smra ba dang/ rdo rje 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje las dang/ rdo rje bsrung ba dang/ rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang/ dbang phyug rgyal po dang/ bkod pa'i rgyan dang/ rin chen 'od 'phro dang/ snang ba'i 'od dang/ phyag rgya'i rgyal po dang/ spos kyi glang po dang/ spobs pa brtsegs pa dang/ pad+ma'i rgyal po dang/ pad+ma dam pa dang/ rdo rje mi g.yo ba dang/ thogs med rgyal po dang/ rin po che'i dbang sdud dang/ grub pa'i las dang/ dga' bar ston pa dang/ mi g.yo ba'i mtha' dang/ de dag gi byang chub sems ma sgeg pa mo dang/ bdug pa ma dang/ lcags kyu ma dang/ me 'od ma dang/ phreng ba ma dang/ me tog ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ rlung g.yab ma dang/ dbyangs mkhan ma dang/ mar me ma dang/ lcags sgrog ma dang/ gsal bkra ma dang/ gar sgyur ma dang/ chu 'dzin ma dang/ dril 'khrol ma dang/ 'bebs byed ma dang/ bde ba rgyas 'debs ma dang/ bde ba za byed ma dang/ bde ba rmongs byed ma dang/ bde ba tshe 'phel ma dang/ khrus kyi lha mo dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi lha mo dang/ bla re'i lha mo dang/ gzugs kyi lha mo dang/ lha mo dpal be'u ma dang/ 'jigs byed ma dang/ skyon bral ma dang/ mdangs can ma dang/ skyabs can ma dang/ dri med ma dang/ sgra sgrogs ma dang/ thogs med ma dang/ gzhan yang lha'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ mi'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ lha ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' dang/ yi dwags kyi byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byol song gi byang chub sems dpa' dang/ dmyal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang/ gzhan yang rdo rje lcags kyu can dang/ rdo rje zhags pa can dang/ rdo rje lcags sgrog can dang/ rdo rje dril bu can dang/ de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa khyab pa'i zhing khams kyi bkod pa dang/ gzhal yas khang gi 'khor lo la snang ba dang/ yab dang yum gyi rnam pa gnyis su med pa dang/ thabs kyi rang bzhin du snang ba dang/ shes rab kyi ngo bor bzhugs pa dang/ de bzhin du de dag so so'i rang bzhin dang/ gzugs dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ mig dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid dang/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam

par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ zad par gyi khams dang/ ma lus par snang ba'i khams la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa/ dngos po'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad du gyur pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das des rab tu 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs chen po de dag dang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang/ dri ma dang bcas pa dang/ sems dang sems las byung ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ shin tu stong pa nyid dang/ ma rig pa dang/ stong pa nyid chen po dang/ rgyu'i tshogs dang/ gzhi'i khyad par dang/ lam gyi rang bzhin dang/ thabs dang shes rab kyi byed pa dang/ mthong ba dang/ goms pa dang/ spyad pa dang/ thob pa dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ 'gog pa dang/ bgrod pa dang/ spangs pa dang/ sbyangs pa dang/ bsgyur ba dang/ shes pa dang/ mngon du gyur pa dang/ dbang du gyur pa dang/ so sor rig pa dang/ rtogs par bya ba dang/ klong du gyur pa dang/ bskyod pa dang/ 'jig pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ mi g.yo ba dang/ brtan pa dang/ phyogs dang/ dus dang/ khams dang/ rigs dang/ byed pa dang/ las dang/ bsam pa dang/ skye gnas dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/ len pa dang/ 'dod pa'i srid pa dang/ gzugs kyi srid pa dang/ yid kyi srid pa dang/ tha mal pa dang/ log pa dang/ phyogs tsam nyid dang/ nye ba dang/ yang dag pa dang/ mthar thug pa dang/ mchog tu snang ba dang/ mngon du gyur pa dang/ thun mong du snang ba la sogs pa yul dang/ snang ba dang/ dngos po dang/ srid pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la rag ma lus shing yang dag par gzigs pas rnam par gzigs par mdzad do// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mo la sogs pa ji snyed du 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams kyis 'di nyid kyi don dang lan pa'i chos rnams rang gi ngo bo stong par mthong ba ni/ dper na nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ni/ gzhan gyis brtag par dka' zhing gzhal bar mi nus pa bzhin du mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// oM chos dbyings don dam spros bral rang bzhin las/ gzugs dang mtshan ma'i 'dzin pa mi mnga' yang/ stong pa'i shes rab ma 'gags spros bral ba'i// chos sku lhun grub mnyam nyid bzhengs su gsol// AHgdod nas dag pa'i ye shes

tshogs las grub// bsam gyis mi khyab mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku mchog bstan du gsol// hUM rnam par dag pa'i smon lam mthus grub cing// byams dang snying rje'i thugs kyang rab bskyed pa'i// sna tshogs rigs kyi rang gi mchog gyur yul// sprul pa sku yi rigs kun dbyung du gsol// hrIHma 'gags skye med ngo bo stong nyid sgra// yan lag drug cu gsung dbyangs dpag med pas// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i bye brag tu// kun gyi lam gyur sde snod de gsungs shig/ hA mi 'gyur thugs kyi dgongs pa dpag med las// gnod sdig zhi dang 'dod pa'i don rgyas dang// phal pa dbang bsgyur gdug byed tshar gcod pa'i// kun gyi don spyod phrin las de mdzod cig/ ces bskul bas/ de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sku gsung thugs kyi gnas thams cad nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po bkye ste/ nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang/ 'khor 'dus pa de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar bzhugs nas/ lham me lhang nge lhan ne ba mthong bar 'gyur to// de ltar 'dug pa'i khyad par du yang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gangs chen mtsho rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing stug po bkod pa'i gnas nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'grub pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du shar gyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi/ sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug par mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen yod pa'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi gnas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag gi yang 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za bar grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to/ de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing pad+mo can gyi gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi nam mkha'i khams na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul dang bral ba'i gnas na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag 'khor gyi thog mar 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// de la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs shing 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas de dag gi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang/ sangs rgyas de dag gi 'khor gyi thog mar rang nyid 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang so so nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bkod par gzigs so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang khams dang bag la nyal gyi khyad par gti mug gi dbang du gyur pa dang/ zhe sdang gi dbang du gyur pa dang/ nga rgyal gyi dbang du gyur pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi dbang du gyur pa dang/ phrag dog gi dbang du gyur pa dang/ ser sna'i dbang du gyur pa dang/ khro bo'i dbang du gyur pa la sogs pa rnams kyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir/ gdul bar bya ba'i 'khor kha cig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bzhugs par mdzad do// de bzhin du kha cig la ni rdo rje'i rigs dang/ kha cig la ni rin po che'i rigs dang kha cig la ni

pad+ma'i rigs dang/ kha cig la ni phrin las kyi rigs dang/ kha cig la ni sbyin pa chen po'i rigs dang/ kha cig la ni khro bo chen po'i rigs la sogs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rab tu bstan to// de nas phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba'i gzhal med khang na rang bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa de dag so so'i gtso bo chen po rnams la so so'i 'khor rnams kyis rang gi bstan pa'i sde snod gsung dbyangs mi zad pa'i yan lag bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams zhu zhing 'gro ba sems la snang bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyi yang gtso bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yab rje bo// kun tu bzang po nyid la zhu zhing 'dri ba sems la snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dpal chen kun bzang mchog/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las dang// yon tan dpag med ji snyed pa// ma lus khyod kyi thugs la gnas// blo ldan rnams kyis bsgrub bya ba// nyid kyi sngon du bya ba dang// phyi ma phyi ma rab 'byed pa'i// rgyud rnams su ni legs bshad las// ma tshang ba rnams kha bskangs shing// the tshom som nyi gcad pa'i phyir// ma lus rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// ji ltar rigs pa'i yan lag rnams// thugs rje chen pos bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis thugs zhi ba chen po las phyung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba ma lus pa bstan pa dang/ rigs dang dngos po thams cad kyi dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing thos la rab tu rtogs te/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du phyi ma'i dus kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi don du dgongs par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la slar gsol pa/ kye ma kun tu bzang po yi// sku dang gsung dang thugs nges pa// rang bzhin gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rdo rje gsum las 'gyur med kyang// ma lus sems can khams snang ba// dus gsum rdo rje sangs rgyas gsum// thugs kyi dbang phyug gnas gyur pa// kun tu bzang po rdzu 'phrul che// 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che// bsam pa'i yul las rab 'das te// ma lus 'khor ba'i chu bo'i rgyun// mya ngan 'das par bar chad (21)

med// shin tu rnyed pa dka' ba nyid// mngon sum myur du sgrub byed pa// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus rgyud// bstan pa'i mchog gyur gang bshad de// rtogs shing mthong bar dka' ba'i don// mnyam par 'dod na phan don du// mgon mdzad khyod la gsol ba na// bde bar gshegs zhes gang la bya// thams cad 'dus pa ji ltar gzhag/ rgyud ces bya ba ji lta bu// de la dbye ba ji ltar bshad// rang gi ngo bo ji ltar lags// zhi bar gnas pa ci yi phyir// bcom ldan zhes ni gang la brjod// rigs brgya dbye ba ci yi phyir// dam par brjod pa ci zhig lags// bsdu ba'i rim pa ji yan lag yang tsam zhig/ bdag cag de don nyan 'tshal na// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa kun tu bzang// 'khor rnams bskul ba'i don gsan nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// nges par phyung ste bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs// gang gis spang bya ma lus spang// thob par bya ba mtha' dag brnyes// mi 'gyur sku gsung thugs rdzogs pa// bde ba chen po zhes bya ste// de yul 'bras bur gshegs pa'o// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// myur zhing 'jug pa'i bde ba ni// dka' spyad sdug bsngal mi gnas pa// 'dis 'gro lam gyis gshegs pa'o// sems can bde gshegs rgyu dang bcas// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i sems// gnas skabs glo bur dri ma can// gzhi nyid bde ba 'dir gshegs pas// bde bar gshegs zhes brjod pa yin// rnam pa bcu brtsegs gnas pa gsum// ji snyed pa yi bde bar gshegs// thams cad ma lus yul de la// 'dus pa'i tshogs pa yin par bshad// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu rnams// rgyu dang thabs dang mthar thug tu// 'brel ba'i don dang ldan pas rgyud// rang bzhin thabs lam 'bras bu yis// rgyud gsum du ni bye brag dbye// ma bcos ma bsgyur ma bslad cing// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong dang// yod med mtha' dang bral ba yis// dbyer med zung 'jug rang ngo tsam// gdul bya 'dod chags can don du// mdzes bya yon tan ldan pa yis// tshul dgus phyi rol drang ba'i phyir// sku gsung thugs ni zhi bar gnas// phyi nang gsang ba'i bdud bcom zhing// yon tan phun sum tshogs ldan pas// rang gzhan gnyis med don rdzogs la// bcom ldan zhes su brjod pa yin// nyon mongs khams dang phung po dang// dbang po yul dang bcas pa yis// rang gi rigs dang dbye ba mchog/ legs sbyar rigs brgyar 'gyur ba'o// sgrub byed lus ngag yid gsum ni// mi dge rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bsgrub bya lam gyi khyad par du// mthar thug sdom byed dam pa'o// de dag nye bar bsdu ba

ni// bsnyen sgrub las kyi khyad par te// rgyas bsdus rab tu bsdus pa yang/ dbang gnyis kyang// de dag de nyid 'brel ba'o// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// kye ma kun tu bzang po che// dkyil 'khor zhes ni gang la bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa ci zhig lags// de bzhin rdzogs rim ji ltar gdags// rnal 'byor zhes ni ci la bgyi// thabs zhes bya ba ji lta bu// shes rab kyang ni gang zhig lags// don dam kun rdzob ji lta bu// dbyer med du ni 'dod pa gang// de kho na nyid ji ltar mthong// gsang ba rang ni ci zhig gnas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos dbyings don gyi snying po dkyil// rig pa'i ye shes sna tshogs 'khor// rang bzhin gzugs brnyan ting nge 'dzin// brda dang tha snyad bsam mi khyab// bsgrub bya sbyang ba'i gzhi nyid ni// skye gnas bzhi las srid pas na// tshul mthun bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhis// blo rim rtogs pa bskyed rim mo// de nyid srid pa bar do'o// shes rdzogs tshul gyis ston pa rnams// mngon par sangs rgyas tshul bzhin du// sgrub byed de ni rim par 'gyur// rten gyur tha mal shes pa'i rgyud// ma bcos rang bzhin rnal ma la// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gi rgyud// 'bad rtsol dmigs pa mtshan mar bcas// mtshon du yod pa tsam nyid thabs// dus gsum mi dmigs de nyid kyang// brda thabs byin gyis brlab pa dang// gnad du mtshon pas gang rtogs pa// ma mthong shes pa shes rab yin/ blo dang blo min khyad par gyis// don dam kun rdzob zhes su bstan// rang bzhin tshogs pa rgyu 'bras kyis// chu dang 'o ma du ba me// rta dang skyes bu ji bzhin du// tha dad gcig pa dbyer med de// dkyil 'khor lha dang sngags la sogs// snang dang stong pa tha dad med// thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong// gsal bcas de nyid kho na'o// gsang ba zhes bya sku dang gsung// thugs kyi gsang ba mthar thug pa// sbas pa dang ni dgongs pa dang// sgra tsam min dang nges pa'o// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// kye ma ston pa kun tu bzang// lha zhes bya ba ci zhig lags// de bzhin sngags kyi don chen ci// snying po zhes pa ji lta bu// ting 'dzin zhes pa ci phyir gdags// gzhal med khang zhes gang la bya// mchod pas kyang ni ci zhig bya// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu// ye shes kyang ni gang zhig lags// dbang bskur zhes pa ci phyir brjod// phrin las bshad pa'i don ched ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mthar thug pa dang gnas skabs su// phan byed nus pa lha yin no// gang las shes dang gang las skyob// shes shing skyob pa sngags kyi don// yon tan mthar thug gang ston pa// thabs chen bshad pa snying

por 'gyur// sgrib med ye shes myur du rdzogs// ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba yin// rgya khyon yon tan tshadamed pas// gzhal med khang par de 'gyur ro// bsgrub bya sgrub byed gang mnyes pa// de ni kun gyi mchod pa yin// phyi nang gsang ba'i chos rnams la// de nyid rgyal btab phyag rgya'o// rtog med bde dang gsal bas khyab// gang la gnas pa ye shes yin// lus ngag yid la nyon mongs pa'i// dri ma 'khrud byed dbang du brjod// zhi 'phel chags dang khro bo yis// bsam pa gnas 'gyur phrin las so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// byang chub sems chen ji ltar lags// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ci// sangs rgyas zhes pa gang zhig lags// de don blta ba ji lta bu// bsgom par bya ba ci zhig lags// spyod pa spyad pa ji tsam zhig/ dam tshig gnod pa gang la bya// bsnyen pa zhes pa'i dgos pa ci// sgrub pa yis ni ci zhig 'grub// rgyas gdab kun ni ji ltar 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma skyes ma 'gags zhi bar gnas// ngo bo dngos min gter chen mchog/ snying rje stong pa dbyer mi phyed// 'di ni byang chub sems chen yin// lus ngag yid gsum ngang gis dril// mi phyed don gyi rdo rje de// chos kun rig pa'i rjes su gnas// de ni 'dzin byed skyes bur 'gyur// ji snyed don bya bya ba yang kun spangs nas// blang bya ma lus rab tu brnyes// ma rig thib po rab sad cing// dgongs pas shes bya rab tu rgyas// de la tshul bzhin ma nor mthong// yang dag don rtogs blta ba'o// phyi rol don gyi rtog pa log/ nyon mongs phra ba tsam gyis kyang// mi brdzi goms stobs skyed byed pa// mthong ba nyid la bsgom pa'o// dang po'i las dang bsgom pa dang// brtul zhugs 'chang dang mnyam gzhag dang// rang gi sems la gang spyod pa// mi spyad ma mthong de spyod yin// rin chen sa gzhi bzang lta bu// skyon med gzhan bskyed nus par ldan// nyes pa'i rtsa ba nges par spong// mi 'gal ston pa dam tshig go/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen gsang// brtsam zhing phan 'dogs ma rungs 'dul// bsod nams tshogs dang bskyed rim 'brel// bsgrub bya nyer gyur bsnyen pa ste// mchog gyur pa dang thun mong las// dkyil 'khor gsum 'phros cher bsgrub pa'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu phan tshun du// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// tha dad gcig tu gang bsdus nas// gcig gis gcig gsal rgyas 'debs so// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ci// snying rje zhes pa gang zhig lags// sems can don du ji ltar spyad// rig pa'i brtul zhugs ji ltar spyad// zung du 'jug pa'i spyod pa gang// bdag nyid ji ltar byin gyis brlab// bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor ji lta

bu// dngos grub zhes ni gang la bya// tshe 'di'i 'grub tshul ji ltar 'byung// bar ma dor ni su zhig grol// skye bar brgyud la thogs pa gang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags so sor rtog pa ste// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ye shes te// gti mug chos dbyings snang ba'o// nyon mongs ye shes de bzhin no// sems can chos dang dmigs med kyis// snying rje gsum las yongs mi 'da'// sbyor ba goms pa brtan byas nas// gsad gso sbyin dang snyan pa dang// bzhi yis rnam bsdu khams gsum gyi// bdag tu skad cig tsam gyis 'gyur// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rig pa'i brtul zhugs bla na med// gang la bsngags pa'i 'khor ba dang// mi 'bral mi spang dam tshig yin// don dam kun rdzob thabs shes rab// snang zhing stong pa 'khor ba dang// mya ngan 'das la sogs pa'i chos// thams cad dbyer med zung 'jug go/ rang gis rang rig ye shes de// rig mthong rtogs pas rang byin brlab// 'gog pa'i rdo rje dbugs dbyung rngub// 'jug gnas ldang ba khyad par gyis// 'bru gsum rang gi ngo bor gnas// kun rdzob pa la bzlas pa yin// mngon shes drug sogs thun mong ste// byang chub rdo rje mchog yin no// smin dang grol bas mthu stobs rdzogs// mngon du gyur pas tshe 'dir bsgrub// le lo dang bcas bar ma do// shin tu so sos skye ba bgrang// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// de dag bsgrub pa'i thabs gang lags// de yi dngos nyid ji lta bu// so so 'dor ba'i rtogs pa gang// bsam gtan zhes pa ji lta bu// rlung gi rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// de nyid 'dzin pa gang la gnas// rjes su dran pa'i yan lag gang// ting nge 'dzin du gang zhig bshad// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab tu bsnyen pa'i cho ga dang// nye bar bsgrub dang de bzhin tshe// phrin las spyod pas thabs su 'gyur// byang chub sems gzhi stong pa dang// sa bon tshul du nges 'byung zhing// gzugs rtags yi ge mtshan mar bcas// thabs dngos thun mong nyid du 'gyur// mchog tu gyur pa 'di lta ste// phyi nang dbang po yul grub pa// rang gnas shes pas so sor 'dor// snyoms 'jug thams cad byin gyis rlobs// rtog spyod dga' bde rtse gcig nyid// gsang bcu byung yang rab sbyor spro dang bsdu// rang shes rig cing de zad pas// dngos gzhi mngon shes lnga la dbang// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin rlung// 'byung ba lnga dang tshul 'drar snang// gang bu snom byed rtse la bzhag/ rang gzhan byang chub sems dpar snang// rang gi snying po gnas su bsam// dbang por lam bsrungs zlum por bkod// gzung bya dri ma dang bral bas// de nyid ye shes sems dpar gsal// mi
