'gyur byang chub sems bsgoms pas// mtshan ma lnga bstan srog gi lam// nam mkha'i khams la so sor bstan// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba yin// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// dngos bsdu gzugs kyi nang du bsam// skad cig ma yi ye shes gsal// sgrib pa ma lus sel bar byed// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// rang rig byang chub sems ni gang// de yi rgyu ni ji lta bu// gang zhig gis ni rkyen du 'gyur// 'bras bu 'dod pa ji ltar 'grub// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji tsam na// tshul ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur// nges dang 'grub par byed pa gang// nye bar mtshon pa'i dpe gang yin// dgos pa yang ni ci zhig lags// mtshan nyid mtshon tshul ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzhi dang ngo bo mtshan nyid rnams// ma lus lhun gyis grub bdag nyid// mtha' bral ma spangs ma thob pa// sgro skur dang bral byang chub sems// lhan cig skyes dang bdag tu blta// kun tu brtags pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// nyon mongs nyer len mtshungs par ldan// bag nyal kun sdang rgyu yin no// lhan cig byed rkyen bsod nams dang// de ma yin dang mi g.yo'i las// legs nyes phra rags mang nyung gis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor bar sbyar// 'bras bu lus dang longs spyod dang// chos dang 'phen pa'i skal ba yis// ji ltar bsams dang smon lam dang// 'jug pa'i las kyi khyad par byed// dus ni dus gsum thams cad du// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul gnas de nyid// 'dod dang mi 'dod la sogs pa'i// gnas skabs so sor 'byung ba'o// tshul ni yang dag log pa dang// nges dang ma nges snang mi snang// sna tshogs kyis ni bral ba dang// thob pa'i bde sdug tha dad myong// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// gcig gis dus gsum dus med par// rtogs dang ma rtogs phyogs gcig gis// kun la khyab pa nges par 'grub// rtsa me 'khor lo la sogs bzhin// rin chen rgyur byed stong sgra dang// gsal dri ma g.yos sna tshogs lus// mtshon pa dpe yi nye phyogs yin// rang gi ngo bo thog ma yin// rnam par rtog bral rnal 'byor te// rten sogs rgyu 'bras 'gog pa la// log pa dgag pa'i gol ba'o// gcig dang du mar 'dzin pa dang// mtha' brgyad bral ba'i bdag nyid can// brda thabs byin rlabs gtan tshigs kyis// nyams su myong bas mtshan nyid shes// de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// rgyud rnams kyi ni ston pa gang// de dag gnas kyang ci 'dra zhig/ de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par gang// 'khor gyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu// dus ni ji tsam zhig na 'byung// rig pa'i rjes 'dzin ji lta bu// gleng slong zhes bya gang zhig lags// don du gnyer ba gang la bya// de dag bye

brag dbye ba gang// lam gyi yan lag gang gis bsdu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun tu bzang po don gyi mchog/ skyon med thams cad 'dus pa yin// lnga drug gcig gnyis gsum bzhis bsdus// gdul bya'i rigs la sna tshogs snang// gsang ba'i b+ha ga nam mkha'i khams// mtha' bral bsam mi khyab la bzhugs// skal yod skyes bu'i rigs kun la// nges dang ma nges lnga dang ldan// thugs kyi khyad par bye brag med// ma bstan ma gsungs bar gnas kyang// tha dad sku dang gsung gi tshogs// bdag la nye bar ston par mthong// nyan pa po ni dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos rang rgyal lha la sogs// rim bzhin rang la bstan pa 'khor// dus dang bral ba'i dus gsum nyid// dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// rdzogs gnyis gsum dang rtsod pa la// gang rigs tha dad so sor 'byung// ji ltar mos pa de yis 'dul// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dag/ phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul gyis te// nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' dang// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis te// cig char rim dang thod rgal dang// dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i tshul// las dang mos pa spyod pa dang// lam gyi sa yis yon tan bsdus// dang po pa dang kun tu spyod// brtul zhugs dang ni mnyam gzhag gis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i spyod pa bsdus// mthar thug pa ni thun mong yin// rgyud kun gyi ni gleng bslang ba// e baM ma yA shru ta b+ha ga bAn kA ya bA ka tsit+ta saM mu di ta/ badzra ba man ta yang na ta/ 'di nyid kyi ni sgras brjod pa'i// yon tan ma lus gleng gzhi'o// de yis gleng bslang nyid du 'gyur// gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu dag/ 'di yi don du gnyer bya yin// shes bya gshis dang lam gang zag/ thob bya 'bras bu dag gis dbye// bsod nams dang ni ye shes kyi// tshogs dang smin dang grol ba dang// bskyed dang rdzogs dang shin tu rdzogs// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab phye ba'i// lam gyi yan lag rab tu bsdus// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// byang chub sems dpa' tshul chen po// dpa' bo skyes mchog 'jig rten mgon// bsam sbyor phun sum tshogs pa yis// dus gsum sangs rgyas yab kyi gdung// legs 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa yis// the tshom med par don bsgrub 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal pas/ phyogs bcu dang dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thugs kyi dgongs pa gcig tu bsdus pas/ khams gsum dang 'gro ba rigs drug tu snang ba'i sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i don bsgrub cing ma grol ba rnams grol ba

dang/ ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir brtson par spyod cing gnas par bzhugs so// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i tshul nye bar spyad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po gsang ba 'di dag nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las phyung ngo// oM hUM trAM hrIHhA/ oM hUM oM dzi na dzika/ hUM badzra d+h+r-ika/ swA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ aM A ro lika/ hA pra dz+nyA d+hIka/ muM lAM mAM pAM tAM/ aM hUM mUM d+hA twI shwa rI/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA' ga ra ti/ tAM badzra ra ti/ oM bai ro na tsa Na hUM/ oM badzra a k+Sho b+h+ya hUM/ oM rat+na saM b+ha wa trAM hUM/ oM a mi ta b+hA hrIHhUM/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ oM bud+d+ha lo tsa na hUM/ oM paN+Da ra pa sa na hUM/ oM mA ma kI d+harma hUM/ oM sa ma ya tA rA hUM// e ma sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ ma bcos rang gi ngo bo nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab ye shes tshogs// gti mug rnam dag rgyal pau che// oM// e ma rang byung bde chen thugs kyi mchog/ bdud las rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas te// zhe sdang mi 'gyur longs spyod ldan// hUM// e ma yon tan rin chen dam pa'i gter// yid bzhin 'byung ba zad mi shes// re skong nam mkha'i ting 'dzin mdzod// nga rgyal rang gnas che ba'i mchog/ trAM// e ma rnam dag gsung ni mtha' las 'das// dri med nam mkha' lta bur grags// skyon bral chos kyi yi ger snang// 'dod chags skyon bral bla na med// hrIH e ma dam tshig don rnams kun sgrub pa'i// nyon mongs srid 'joms mthar 'byin pa// phrin las chen po rdzogs mdzad pa'i// phrag dog las kyi rtsol ba bral// hA// zhes ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa mdzad nas// dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo dam par dbang bskur ro// de nas rigs so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rnams kyang rang rang gi snying po de kho na nyid kyis phyung ba ni/ oM badzra sa man+ta b+ha dra hUM/ kun tu bzang po'i snying po'o// oM badzra d+ha twI shwa rI hUM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra sa twa hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po'o// oM badzra rA dza hUM/ rdo rje rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM badzra rA ga ra ti hUM/ rdo rje chags pa'i snying po'o/ oM badzra sA d+hu huM/ rdo rje legs pa'i snying po'o// oM badzra lA' s+ye hUM/ rdo rje sgeg mo'i snying po'o/ oM badzra d+hu pa hUM/ rdo rje bdug pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra aM ku sha dzaHhUM/ rdo rje 'gugs ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra dI pa sha ra ti hUM/ rdo rje me sgron snying po'o// oM many+dzu shrI ku mA ra mu la trAM hUM/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i snying po'o// oM rat+na d+ha rA hUM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra rat+na hUM hUM/ rdo rje rin chen gyi snying po'o// oM

badzra sUr+Ya trAM hUM/ rdo rje gzi brjid kyi snying po'o// oM badzra ke tu hrIHhUM/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM badzra hA sa hA hUM/ rdo rje bzhad pa'i snying po'o// oM mA le hUM hUM/ rdo rje phreng ba ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra puSh+pe trAM hUM/ rdo rje me tog ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra pA sha hrIHhUM/ rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra su kha hA hUM/ rdo rje bde ba ma'i snying po'o// oM lo ke shwa rA ya hUM/ spyan ras gzigs kyi snying po'o// oM pad+ma d+ha rA hUM/ pad+ma dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra d+harma hUM hUM/ rdo rje chos kyi snying po'o// oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na traM hUM/ rdo rje rnon po'i snying po'o// oM badzra ba sha hrIHhUM/ rdo rje smra ba'i snying po'o// oM badzra tsakra hA hUM/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i snying po'o// oM badzra gI ti hUM hUM/ rdo rje dbyangs mkhan ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra A lo ke trAM hUM/ rdo rje mar me ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra s+pho Ta hrIHhUM/ rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i snying po'o// oM rA ga ra ti hrIHhUM/ rdo rje gsal sgron ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra pA Ni sa man+ta hUM/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o// oM badzra karma d+ha rA hUM/ rdo rje dbyings phyug ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra karma hUM hUM/ rdo rje las kyi snying po'o// oM badzra rak+Sha trAM hUM/ rdo rje srung ba'i snying po'o// oM badzra yak+ShA hrIHhUM/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi snying po'o// oM badzra san+ti hA hUM/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi snying po'o// oM badzra nIrti hUM hUM/ rdo rje gar sgyur ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra gan+d+he trAM hUM/ rdo rje byug pa ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra g+han+De hrIHhUM/ rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra A be sha ya hA hUM/ rdo rje 'bebs ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra k+Shi te gar+b+ha ya hUM/ sa'i snying po'i snying po'o// oM badzra su kha nirti hUM/ bde ba rgyas 'debs ma'i snying po'o// oM d+harma ke tu hUM hUM/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi snying po'o// oM rA dze shwa rA ya trAM/ dbang phyug rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma maN+Da la hrIHhUM/ bkod pa rgyan gyi dam pa'i snying po'o// oMrat+na rasmi ha hUM/ rin chen 'od 'phro'i snying po'o// oM badzra sa twI hUM/ rdo rje sems ma'i snying po'o// oM rat+na sa twI hUM/ rin chen sems ma'i snying po'o// oM d+harma sa twI hUM/ chos kyi sems ma'i snying po'o// oM karma sa twI hUM/ las kyi sems ma'i snying po'o// oM badzra kha gar+b+ha hr-i da ya hUM/ nam mkha'i snying po'i snying po'o// oM a mo g+ha shwa rA ya hUM/ bde ba za byed snying po'o// oM A lo ka pra b+ha hUM/ snang ba mchog gi snying po'o// oM mu dra rA dzA trAM hUM/ phyag rgya'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pra ti b+hA na rA dza hrIHhUM/ spobs pa'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pra ti b+hA na ku Ta ye hA hUM/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'i snying po'o// oM de bI sho d+ha ni hUM hUM/ khrus kyi lha mo'i snying po'o// oM de bI ke tu trAM hUM/ rgyal mtshan lha mo'i snying po'o// oM de bI bi tA na hrIHhUM/ bla re'i lha mo'i snying po'o// oM de bI tshat+t+ra hA hUM/ gdugs kyi lha mo'i snying po'o// oM ma hA mai tri sa ma e hUM// byams pa chen po'i snying po'o// oM mu ka ra ga sa ma

hrIHhUM/ bde ba rmongs byed ma'i snying po'o// oM pad+ma rA dza ya hUM hUM/ pad+ma'i rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM pad+mo t+ta ma sa ka la trAM hUM/ pad+ma dam pa'i snying po'o// oM badzra a tsa la hrIHhUM/ rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i snying po'o// oM a mo g+ha rA dza hA hUM/ thogs med rgyal po'i snying po'o// oM de bI pad+ma bAn hUM hUM/ lha mo pad+ma can gyi snying po'o// oM de bI b+hai ra bA trAM hUM/ lha mo 'jigs byed ma'i snying po'o// oM de bI a do ShA hrIHhUM/ lha mo skyon bral ma'i snying po'o// oM de bI bi dza yA hA hUM/ lha mo rnam rgyal ma'i snying po'o// oM sarba pa ri sho d+hA ya hUM/ sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'i snying po'o// oM badzra gan+d+he dza la ya hUM/ bde ba tshe 'phel ma'i snying po'o// oM rat+ne shwa ra hUM hUM/ rin chen dbang phyug gi snying po'o// oM karma sid+d+hi trAM hUM/ grub pa'i las kyi snying po'o// oM A ra ta shA stA hrIHhUM/ dga' bar ston pa'i snying po'o// oM a tsa la ak+Sho b+h+ya hA hUM/ mi g.yo ba'i mtha'i snying po'o// oM dza ya ba te sarba she ne hUM hUM/ lha mo skyabs can ma'i snying po'o/ oM de bi pra tsa la bi ma le trAM hUM// lha mo dri med ma'i snying po'o/ oM ba sha pa ta tsi ta si hrIHhUM/ lha mo lcags sgrog ma'i snying po'o// oM de bi ka ru na pra ga ri hA hUM/ lha mo thogs med ma'i snying po'o// oM de ba mu ni hUM/ lha'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM ni Na mu ni trAM hUM/ lha min thub pa'i snying po'o// oM nr-i ye mu ni trAM hUM/ mi'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM nr-I ye mu ni nr-i hUM/ dud 'gro'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM pre ta mu ni preM hUM/ yi dwags thub pa'i snying po'o// oM tir+Ya mu ni k+ShaM hUM// oM na ra ka mu ne sruM swA hA/ dmyal ba'i thub pa'i snying po'o// oM badzra aM ku sha dzaH oM badzra pA sha hUM/ oM badzra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badzra g+han+De hoH/ sgo srung bzhi'i snying po'o// dang po rgyu yi snying po ste// gsum sogs bskyed pa'i snying po'o// ma lus rdzogs pa bzlas pa'i sngags// 'di bshad zhi ba'i lha rnams kyi// snying po'i kha skong nyid du bshad// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// de yi nga rgyal ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa yi dbus gnas te// bzhugs pa'i 'dug stangs bstan bya ba// rkang g.yas brla dang byin pa'i dbus/ g.yon pa legs par bzhag nas kyang// de nyid steng du g.yas bzhag pa// dang po rdo rje'i skyil krung yin// g.yon gyis g.yas pa'i byin par mnan// pus mo gnyis ni sar phab pa// zhi ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i sku// gnyis pa pad+ma'i bzhugs stabs yin// rkang pa g.yas pas g.yon pa yi// brla yi steng du cung zad mnan// de nyid g.yon pa'i 'og tu gzhag/ gsum pa sems dpa'i skyil krung yin// g.yon pa yis ni skyil krung phyed// legs bcas de yi drung nyid du// rkang pa g.yas pa drang por bzhag/ dpa' bo'i bzhugs stabs bzhi pa'o// gdan steng rkang pa gnyis ka yis// thur du drang por bsrang bar bya// mnyam zhing

brtan par bzhag pa ni// lnga pa bzang po'i bzhugs stangs so// mtho gang tsam gyis rkang pa gnyis// bar bzhag stan la 'dug nas ni// tsog pur bar bzhag bzhugs pa ni// tsog pu'i 'dug stangs nyer drug pa// rkang g.yas sems dpa'i skyil krung phyed// brtan cing g.yon pa sgeg bcas kyang// bdun pa rol pa'i bzhugs stangs so// de dag dbus dang phyogs bzhir bstan// dang pos rigs kyi phyag rgya bstan// gnyis pa yis ni lha mo ste// gsum pas sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// bzhi pa rdo rje khro bo rnams// lnga pas phyi rol sems dpa' ste// drug pas bran dang pho nya'o// bdun pas 'jig rten sbyong rnams so// de dag phyag rgya so sor bstan// de nas phyi rol bskor bya ba// gom stabs rnam pa bdun yin te// dang po dbus su rkang mtheb dang// rting pa mnyam por cig la bcer// rang gi thad kar legs bzhag pa// mthun pa'i stabs su nga yis bshad// de nas shar du gshegs nas ni// g.yas pa'i brla dang pus mo bsrang// g.yon gyi byin pa brlar bcar nas// bar mtho lngar bzhag g.yas brkyang yin// lhor ni g.yon brkyang de las bzlog/ thad kar bzhag nas g.yas g.yon par// rkang mthil lnga yis tshad bzhag pa// de dag lho nub tu yang sbyar// nub tu zlum po pus mo gnyis// so so'i gnas su lag gnyis bzhag/ chu bya'i gshog pa ltar gnas pa// nub dang nub byang gnyis kar sbyar// byang gi phyogs su sa ga'i stabs// sor mo rnams ni phyir bstan zhing// pus mo'i lha nga thad kar brgyang// rkang mthil nyi shu rtsa drug khyon// g.yon pa'i brlar ni rkang mthil gtad// rkang gcig yin te byang shar mtshams// g.yon pa'i sor mo g.yas kyis mnan// rus sbal stabs kyis shar lhor brtsam// de dang sbyar la lag pa'i gar// dang po la ni lnga yin te// rdo rje'i gar stabs bsrung ba'i tshul// steng 'og gnyis su lan gsum gsum// rdo rje gsor ba de yi gar// lag gnyis ro bzung za ba'i tshul// phyogs blta rdo rje ro langs stabs// rdo rje'i stabs sam gtun shing gis// bgegs brdung ltar byed gtun shing stabs// g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying gar bstan// g.yas pas rdo rje ba dan phyar// dpung mgor bzhag pa ba dan stabs// gnyis pa'i dus su bstan bya dgu// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yis// rdo rje 'phen tshul de yi stabs/ kha yi steng 'og lag gnyis gdengs// gnyis bcas 'jigs pa ltar byed pa// rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba'i stabs// g.yon pa rtse gsum snying gar bzhag/ g.yas pa khu tshur dbyig pa ltar// 'degs byed rtse gsum sar 'jog pa// stobs chen 'degs pa'i gar stabs so// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis

bkan te/ khar bzhag ha ha yi ge bzhis// dgod tshul rdo rje gad mo'i stangs// g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub mo bsgreng// g.yas pas rdo ba 'phen tshul ni// rdo rje rdo yi gar thabs so// de las mkhrig ma gnyis mdud pa// rdo rje zhags pa'i thabs yin no// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yi/ khu tshur mthe bong nang nas bton// bsgreng ba rdo rje be con thabs// de nyid las ni g.yas pa yis// mdung rtse gcig pa'i tshul byed pa// rdo rje rtse gcig gar thabs so// de las rdo rje gdub bu 'degs// bgegs gsod tshul du byed pa ni// rdo rje gdub bu'i thabs su bshad// gsum pa g.yon brkyang dus ni bcu// rang gi kha ni 'og phyogs bltas// gdangs shing lag gnyis mkhrig mang mdud/ kha yi drung bzhag seng+ge'i stabs// de nyid las ni phyogs kun blta// lce 'gyur seng+ge'i glal ba yin// g.yon gyis rdo rje phur bu bzung// bgegs kyi steng bzhag g.yas pa yis// rdo rje khu tshur tho ba yis// brdung tshul rdo rje tho pa'i stabs// rdo rje sgeg mo'i gar dang ldan// mgo ni g.yon gyi phyogs 'dud cing// bskor ba bud med sgyu 'phrul stabs// rdo rje bsdams pas snying ga nas// 'dra byed rdo rje dral ba'o/ khu tshur mthe'u chung gnyis bsgreng bzlog/ kha 'gram gnyis bzhag mche ba'i tshul// rdo rje mche ba'i stabs su bshad// g.yon pa'i khu tshur shugs kyi tshul// g.yas kyi dpung mgor ral gri 'degs// rdo rje ral gri'i thabs yin no// g.yon mdzub mo dang g.yas pa yi// mdzub mo gnyis mdud g.yas mdzub mo// lcags kyu ltar byas lcags kyu'i stabs/ khu tshur gnyis kyis g.yas phyogs su// 'degs tshul rdo rje mdung thung thabs// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yi/ khu tshur thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul// lan gsum thag mdung 'phen thabs so// bzhi pa zlum po'i gar thabs ni// dgu ste lag pa g.yon brkyang ba// da drung g.yas pa'i mthe chung bskum// ba dan tshul byas rdo rje'i gar// phyogs bzhir sa gnon la sogs pa'i// so so'i phyag rgyas gsal byas pa// sgo bzhi byin gyis rlabs pa'i thabs// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas sdigs mdzub// bsgreng ba rdo rje 'khyil pa'i thabs// g.yas pa rdo rje snying gar 'dzin// g.yon gyi dril bu rna bar dkrol// rdo rje sgra yi thabs su bshad// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// mthe'u chung mdzub mo rdo rje mdud// 'khor lo bskor ba de nyid thabs// snying gar pad+ma kha 'byed tshul// pad+ma kha phye'i stabs yin no// g.yon gyis gzhu 'dzin gzhu yi tshul// mda' 'gengs tshul ni g.yas pa yis// rna ba'i drung 'gengs mda' gzung thabs// de nyid 'phen tshul byed pa ni// rdo rje mda' 'phen thabs yin no// rkang gcig dang por bshad de

bzhin// g.yas dngagayon sogs lan gnyis bskor// bdun pa rus sbal gar stabs ni// g.yon pa dkur brten g.yas pa yi// rdo rje snying gar gtod de 'jog/ de dag legs spyad phyogs kun bskor// sa gzhi bsrung ba'i las yin no// de nas bdag nyid bsrung bya ba// dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i ngang nyid las// phyi dang nang gi khrus byas te// chos rnams stong pa nyid du bsam// bdag med don la mos par bya// mgrin pa hrIHlas pad 'dab brgyad// mdun gyi 'dab ma lce yin te// de nyid hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga dkar por bsam byas la// badzra dzi hA zhes pas bstan// lag gnyis mthil du a las ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor re re bsgom// de steng hUM las rdo rje ni// rtse lnga sor mo rnams su bsam// hasta badzras brtan par byas// rang gi snying gar nyi ma la// yi ge hUM gyur rdo rje ni// sngon po rtse lnga hUM gis mtshan// de las 'od 'phros khro tshogs byung// bgegs rnams tshar bcad tshur 'dus pas// rang la thim pas khro bo'i sku// rdo rje 'dzin par grags par gyur// mthing ga zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub me 'bar bcas// dpal 'bar mo dang bcas pa bsgom// ched brjod bstod pas brtan par bya// nga rgyal ldan pas sor mo rnams// phan tshun bsnol te rdo rje bsdams// oM gr-i h+Na badzra sa ma ya hUM baM/ de yi rab tu brtan par bya// de nyid mgo yi phyogs lngar bzhag/ oM badzra dz+wa la a na lA ka hUM a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ de yis rigs bdag dbang bskur blang// rdo rje lag pa g.yas g.yon 'khyud yang gyis// mtheb mdzub gnyis la oM hUM bsam// bcun mdud ka nan bcings pa ni// rdo rje khu tshur mkhrig mar bsnol// snying ga mgrin pa ltag pa dang// spyi gtsug rgyab dang lte ba dang// dpral ba la sogs gnas dgur ni// rdo rje'i mdud pa dam bcas nas// lhag ma lus la dra bar bcing// de nas lag g.yon sdigs mdzub bsgreng// g.yas pas rdo rje gsor bya zhing// oM badzra dz+wa la a na lArka hUM/ zhes brjod bgegs la rdo rje bsnun// sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba de// nang du 'bar ba lta bur bsgreng// oM badzra dz+wa la a na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hany+dza ra Na hUM phaT/ zhes pas bgegs rnams bsregs par bsam// rdo rje spyan gyi nga rgyal gyis// sor mo bsnol bsdam sa la bzhag/ oM badzra ne tri ban+d+ha sarba big+h+nAM// 'od kyi zhags pas bgegs rnams bcing// bdag nyid rab tu bsrung bar bsam// de nas phyogs kun bsrung ba ni// rdo rje can gyi nga rgyal gyis// sngar bzhin phyag rgya sa la bzhag/ oM badzra dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha hUM// 'og phyogs bgegs kun bcing par bsam// rdo rje khu tshur me ltar bskor// lcags kyu lta bu spyi bor bzhag/ oM badzra hu lu hu lu

hUM phaT// 'jigs byed kyis ni steng phyogs bcing// rdo rje gnod sbyin nga rgyal gyis/ khu tshur mthe bong gnyis brkyang la// 'dzub mo mche ba ltar byas te// oM badzra yak+Sha hUM// zhes pas steng phyogs mnan te bcing// rdo rje gtsug tor nga rgyal gyis/ khu tshur gnyis bcings mthe'u chung sbrel// mdzub mo rtse sprad spyi bor bzlog/ oM b+h+rUM badzra b+han+d+ha paM// rdo rje zhags pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ khu tshur mkhrig mar mdud cing bskor// oM badzra pA sha hrIH// de nyid mtshungs pas shar phyogs bcing// rdo rje ba dan nga rgyal gyis// mthe bo bsnol te mdzub mo bsgreng// mthe chung ba dan ltar byas nas// oM badzra pa tang ki pa taM ki ni ri Ta// de yis nub phyogs bgegs bcing ngo// rdo rje dus mtshams nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhal ngo bstan// oM hrIHbadzra kA li ru Ta ma Ta// byang phyogs bgegs kun de yis bcing// rdo rje rtse mo'i nga rgyal gyis/ khu tshur ri bo 'degs ltar bya// oM badzra shi kha re ru Ta ma Ta// lho yi phyogs su bgegs bcing ngo// rdo rje las kyi nga rgyal gyis/ khu tshur gnyis bcing mkhrig ma bsnol// mthe'u chung sbrel te mdzub mo bsgreng// oM hUM badzra karma// rdo rje ra bas bskor bar bsam// rdo rje sor mo bsdam byas nas// oM druM badzra b+han+d+ha paM// phyi rol rdo rje'i dra mig bsam// rdo rje las kyi nga rgyal gyis// de nyid kyi ni phyag rgya dang// oM badzra b+hany+dza sum+b+ha ni hUM// de yis rdo rje rgya gram bskor// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba rnams// ma lus rdzogs par ldan byas nas// srung ba'i yan lag rim bzhin 'grub// de nas mkha' la 'khor lo bsam// mchod pa'i lha rnams rang las sprul// yan lag bcu yis kun mnyes bya// rten yul de dag rang la bsdu// rnam smin phung po 'od kyis sbyang// bsod nams mthar thug de la dmigs// de nas ye shes tshogs bsgom phyir// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// ye shes lnga dang sbyar te bsgom// rjes la rten la gzhal med khang// 'byung ba'i gzhi dang bcas la bsgom// de nas so so'i rigs kyi gdan// gang ltar bsngags pa de bzhin bsam// de la lha rnams rgyu dang rkyen// thabs dang yan lag gdag gis dbyung// gsum gsum thabs gsum dgu yang bzhi dang gsum dang rgyu// kun rdzogs cho ga yan lag yin// de la gsal brtan dmigs pa bya// ye shes lha rnams de bzhin dgug/ bar snang khams dang gzhal yas khang// chos bdun drug gis de mnyes bya// de nas ma lus bslab bya blang// sdom pa dang ni dam tshig gzung/ mchod bstod bshags dang phrin las bcol// bzod pa'i yul dang nyes pa bshags// dus rnams kun tu mnyes par bya// de nas rang gi gnas su gshegs// bkra shis smon lam chen po gdab// de yi dge ba mthar thug bsngo// de nas bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su bslab// phrin las bzhi la dus sbyar dmigs// phyi nang gsang dang ma nges pa'i// srid pa zhi ba chos nyid snang// ma lus khams dang rigs dang blo// bsam pa nyon mongs yang dag brjod// rnam shes yul dang bcas pa dang// phung po rnam grol rigs kyi sku// las dang kha dog ye shes gzugs// phrin las gdul bya'i khyad par las// ji ltar rigs pa'i tshul dag gis// bla med lam la yang dag gnas// rgyu 'bras lnga dang drug la sbyar// zhes bshad rigs brgyad bsdus pa'o// yan lag bshad pa'i kha skong yin// zhi ba chen po'i yan lag gi// khyad par bshad pa'i le'u'o//// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gang du 'dod chags rnam dag pa'i// skyes bu 'dul ba'i don gyi phyir// zhi ba'i lam gyi rnal 'byor dag/ rim pa bzhin du bka' stsal pa// thog mar 'jig rten thun mong ste// rjes su theg pa la zhugs bya// de nyid las kyang khyad par du// bsam pa che la rab tu sbyar// de bzhin du ni rab tu dpag/ sngon du song bcas rnal 'byor bzhis// bskyed pa'i rim pa de mthar dbyung// brtan cing gnas pa dang po las// de nyid shes par bya ba'i yul// lus la brtan pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched 'byung ba rnams// rigs brgya lnga dang bzhi bcu gnyis// gsum dang gcig tu bsdu ba dag/ yongs su shes pas gsung grub pa// de ni rdo rje'i bzlas par 'gyur// de yis sems kyi ting nge 'dzin// mthar thug dang ni rmi lam dang// sgyu ma lta bu'i lam la slob// de yis dbang bskur yongs rdzogs nas// rang bzhin 'od gsal snang bar byed// yon tan srid dang zhi la sogs// gnyis su snang ba dbyer med pa'i// zung du 'jug pa rtogs par 'gyur// mi slob lam ni rab tu rdzogs// de ltar ming yang dmigs bshad lam gyi rnam// yan lag phyogs gcig tsam nyid las// phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no// de nyid rim par bstan pa las/ khams kyi mngon bskyed phung po yang// sha rgyus rtsa dang pags pa dang// skra dang dri ma lha rus rkang// khu ba rdul dang khrag chu ser// rnag zhag ngar snabs bshang dang gci// mchil ma klad pa rkang mar dang// gnye rgyu mkhal long mkhris lgang ba// glo snying mtsher ba pho ba dang// bad kan srin bu phyi dang nang// skra dang ba spu sen mo dang// mgo dang yan lag nying lag sogs// snang ba'i phung po khams skye mched// lhan cig gnas pa phung po yin// phrad par shes dang blta ba dang// ma rig bag chags sred len rgyun// nyon mongs tshogs ni bsags las byung// rtsa ba'i lnga phung 'di dag ni// gtso bo sangs rgyas lngar shes bya// skye mched sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs// sa chu me rlung

stong pa nyid// spyan ma gos dkar sgrol mkha' dbyings// lnga dang gcig dang gsum gyis bsdus// khyad par rigs brgyar dbye ba yang// gzugs nyid rnam par snang mdzad las// bye brag ring thung phra sbom sogs// phyi nang gnyis snang la sogs pa// de nyid gtso bo'i rang bzhin no// bdag gzhan gnyis sogs rnams rin 'byung/ kha dog sna tshogs mtha' yas te// 'od snang nus pa don grub yin// rig bcas rig med mi bskyod pa'o// tshor phung rin chen 'byung gzugs las// 'dus mkhris las tshor mi bskyod pa// bad kan rlung sogs rin chen 'byung// mtha' yas kyi ni bde bar tshor// sdug bsngal tshor ba don grub yin// btang snyoms rnam par snang mdzad do// 'du shes phung po mtha' yas gtso// mi bskyod rkang gnyis par 'du shes// bzhi pa rin chen 'byung ba'o// rnam med 'og dpag med pa yin// mang por snang ba don grub ste// g.yo med rgyu bral rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin 'du byed don grub gzugs/ khyad par rnam snang lus 'du byed// ngag gi snang ba 'od dpag med// yid ni mi bskyod pa yi gzugs/ khams kyi 'du byed rin 'byung ste// thar pa don yod grub pa'o// rnam shes mi bskyod pa yin te// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus kyi rnam par shes tshogs kun// snang mdzad rin chen 'od dpag med// don yod mi bskyod rang gi gzugs// 'di dag gtso 'khor yab kyi dngos// dang po sum cu nyid du 'gyur// khams kyi dbye bar snang ba yang// lci zhing sra bas rten byed sa// bud+d+ha lo tsA nyid yin no// brlan dang gsher pas rab tu sdud// chu yi khams ni mA ma kI// tsha dro smin zhing skem byed pa// me ni gos dkar ma yi khams// bskyod 'degs rngub dang 'byung ba dag/ yang dang g.yo byed sgrol ma'i khams// go 'byed yangs pa'i yon tan ni// stong nyid mkha' dbyings kun tu bzang// rus pa skra dang bshang ba dang// snying dang mchin pa rnam snang mdzad// spu dang sen mo rnag rin 'byung// so dang lpags sha 'od dpag med// rgyus pa rtsib rus don yod grub// dri ma rgyu mkhris mi bskyod pa// nang gi khams lnga'i dbye ba ni// ri rab rnam snang mdzad byin rlabs// shar lho nub byang gling bzhi yang// rim bzhin rigs kyi byin rlabs yin// de dag phyi yi sa khams so// chu khams mA ma kI yi gzugs// bad kan mchi ma rnam snang mdzad// gcin rdul khrag dang kha chu dag/ go rim byin gyis rlabs pa'i rigs// phyi rol rgya mtsho rnam snang mdzad// 'bab chu chu bo bkod ma dang// lteng ka rnams kyis rigs bzhir 'gyur// gos dkar mo nyid me khams la// mgo bo me drod rnam snang mdzad// snying ga lte ba yan lag dang// lto ba'i me rnams so sor ris// rdo las byung ba'i gtso bo (22)

ste// rgyun bzhag me shel gtsub shing dang// nags kyi me yis phyi yi rigs// rlung khams sgrol ma'i khams rang bzhin/ khyab byed rlung ni gtso bos bsdus// srog 'dzin mthur 'byin rgyu ba dang// me mnyam rim pa'i byin rlabs gnas// steng 'og dbus rlung gtso bo ste// phyogs bzhi rang gi rigs phyi rol// kun bzang mkha' dbyings phyi nang gi/ stong pa lnga dang phyogs lngar shes// skye mched sems dpar sbyar ba yang// mig gi skye mched sa'i snying po// de la rigs kyi lngar phye ba// snying po dag ni mi bskyod mthing// ser nag rin 'byung me'i rang bzhin// 'bras dkar chu ni 'og dpag med// g.yo 'gyur rlung ni don grub bo// gzugs snang 'dzin byed rnam snang la// rang byin rlabs pa'i skye mched lnga// rna ba phyag na rdo rje ste// phra rags gzugs ni mi bskyod pa// gtsor gyur rang bzhin rnam snang mdzad// bu ga mtha' yas 'od pag med// g.yo byed rtsa ni don yod grub// sgra rnams 'dzin byed rin 'byung ngo// sa yi skye mched nam mkha'i snying// phra gzugs rang bzhin nang dbus dang// sna bug dri 'byed rim bzhin du// mi bskyod rnam snang rin 'byung dang// don grub mtha' yas rang byin rlabs// lce yi skye mched 'jig rten dbang// gzugs dang rang bzhin rtsa ba dang// gtso rtsai yang mo ro yi khyad 'dzin rnams// shar dbus lho nub byang gi gtso// sgrib pa rnam sel lus skye mched// ngo bo rus pa sha dang lpags// reg snang lnga ni snang mdzad de// lho nub byang shar rim pa dag/ yid kyi skye mched 'jam dpal te// lus la brten pa'i rnam shes tshogs// kun gyi bdag dang yul du gyur// phyi dang nang dang sbyar ba ni// dbang po yul dang skye mched rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor che// gzugs sgra dri ro reg yul rnams// lnga dang bcu ni rlung rang bzhin// srog sel gyen rgyu mnyam khyab byed// lha rnams yang dag nges par rgyu// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag tshul// dang po phung po la brten spyod// gnyis pa rnams ni dpa' bor gnas// phyi dang nang gi las kun bsgrub// rtsa ba gsum ni rten bcas shing// kun gyi rnam shes ma lus gnas// srog 'dzin tshul du rtag par rgyu// dang po srog gi rlung zhes bya// bshang gci khu ba khrag 'og rlung// thur du 'dren sel de nyid do// dbang po'i sgo dang yan lag gis// myong reg la sogs mnyam gnas te// za 'thung smra sogs stod du 'byin// 'gro zhing sdod bskyod gyen gyur grags/ khyab 'dzin 'gro ldog tshogs kun gnas// de la khyab byed rlung du bshad// shar sogs dbus gtso rang bzhin gnas// snying 'doms lkog ma lte ba dang// tshigs rnams la ni rab tu brten// yan lag rnam pa lnga nyid kyang// ldang rgyu mig gi skye mched la// snang ba

sgrib bral yid yul mthong// rol dang 'gying bag sgeg nyams bcas// rjes su chags dang mngon longs spyod// sdug dang mi sdug btang snyoms gzugs// phyi nang byed pa'i las kun bsgrub// dbus shar nas brtsams rim bzhin gtso// rna rgyu sgra ste rna ba'i yul// 'ur 'ur mgo dang sgra 'byin dang// rtag par rgyan sgra glu dang ngu+u// yi ge brjod pa gnas kyi rgyu// chu shing lag dang rol mo sogs// phrin las bzhi yi brjod sgra dag/ gtso 'gyur rim pa sngar bzhin no// sna yi skye mched yang dag rgyu// ma lus dri dang yan lag dri// kun 'dzin nang gi bro zas dri/ khyad par dri dag mi bskyod pa// gzhan dag dbus lho nub byang rim// lce yi rnam shes rab tu rgyu// mngar kha bska dang lan tshwa tsha rim gyi// dngos rgyu lus kyi yon tan te// bstan nas 'khyud dang sgau reg dang// rngub dang gnyis rab sbyor ba yis// gnas rnams gsum dang dbu ma'i gnas// dbus lho nub byang shar sogs kyis// go rim gyis ni yul lnga yin// ye shes lnga yis rab phye ba// rten gsum dag cing grol ba la// rnam rtog bag chags ma lus sbyangs// chos dbyings rnam dag ye shes so// dngos po ma lus gzugs brnyan bzhin// cig char snang shes me long 'dra/ khams gsum bsam pa snod bcud tshogs// sems rtogs ngang du mnyam de nyid// dus gsum phyi nang chos kyi dngos// ji bzhin ma 'dres rtogs pa de// rang bzhin sgo gsum las rdzogs spyod// ma lus grub pa'i ye shes te// rang gi rigs las byung ba yi// de bas phung po skye mched khams// gtso bos byin brlab so so'i rigs// yum dang sems dpa' lha mo dang// sems ma thub pa sgo srung ste// dam pa'i rigs ni rnam brgya ste// phung po skye mched yul dang bcas/ khams lnga 'byung bzhi rnam dag pa// rgyal ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis yin// phung po de nyid rigs lnga ste// lus ngag yid ni sku gsung thugs// rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang// gsang ba chen po'i rigs gcig go// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs rnam lnga la/ khyad par shas che gnyen po ni// rnam dag phyag rgya'i tshig bsgrub ste// zhi ba bsgrub mchog kha bskang yin//// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar rnal 'byor lus kyi lha// nges pa'i snang ba thob gyur nas// phung po khams dang skye mched dang// 'byung bzhi rnam shes yul dang bcas// dngos grub kun gyi thun mong du// lha dang stong pa rnal 'byor gsum// rags pa las ni phrad gyur pa// ngag gi sgra dang rdo rje yis// bzlas pa'i sngags kyi de kho na// srog 'gyur kun gyi dngos grub bshad// phung po nga bdag rang bzhin can// 'od lnga'i 'phro 'du dpag med las// shin tu phra ba'i rnal 'byor bsgom// ri rab rtse yi

dmigs pa lta// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge gsum// 'ong dang 'dug dang 'gro ba la// mgrin pa snying ga lte gsang gnas// steng du 'gro la sogs pa dag/ dbugs las rig pa nyi shu lnga// bsdus pa'i gzugs brnyan steng sgo las// lnga dang bcu sogs phyi dang nang// byang chub sems rgyu mkha' la gnas// 'gro rnams kun gyi rnam shes rten// rtsa ba yan lag lnga dang bcu// yul gsum g.yas g.yon dbus la gnas// las bzhi la sogs gsum gyis spyod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das snang ba// ma lus dbugs spro rnam shes kyi// rtsa ba nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs// nam mkha' dang mnyam sa bon te/ kha dog ting nge 'dzin la sogs// spangs pa'i dngos grub dam pa ste// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul// 'od ldan gzhal med khang du bzhugs// sna tshogs phrin las spyod pa ni// don chen byed dang steng 'og 'gro// btang snyoms gnas dang khyab par byed// 'gro dang rnam 'gro yang dag 'gro// rab 'gro nges 'gro khyad par gyis// lta nyan snom myang reg dang bsam// rang gzhan longs spyod bsam mi khyab// gzhal med khang par gnas pa'i lha// rten byed pad+ma 'dab brgyad dbus// mi bskyod pa yi rang bzhin bzhugs// 'og sgo pad+ma bzhi dbus na// gsang gnas rin chen 'byung ldan te// steng 'gro bcu gnyis pa yi sar// 'od dpag med pa'i ngo bo nyid// don grub drug cu rtsa bzhi dbus// snyoms mdzad me yi rang bzhin no/ khyab gnas phyi rol yan lag brten// rnam snang mdzad pa de bzhin no// 'gro ba zhes bya gzugs la spyod// rnam 'gro sgra yin yang dag 'gro// dri spyod rab 'gro ro myang zhing// nges 'gro dag ste de dag ni// nyi zla rol mo la sogs pa'i// gnas nas gshegs te rang longs spyod// lha dang lha mo 'od zer bcas// 'byung ba ye shes lnga bdag gis// bskul te bzlas pa gsum du byed// gzhal med khang gi steng sgo la// rlung me sa dang chu rang bzhin// rang rang gi ni 'gro byed bzhi// g.yas nas drod bcas steng 'og dmar// pad+ma rigs kyi bzlas pa yin// g.yon na snyoms byed dbugs dang bcas// 'od zer ljang gu las rig bzlos// thun mong 'og 'gro sa yi gzhi// rin chen rigs kyi 'od zer zlos// rin chen shel bag dkar po'i 'od// mi bskyod rang bzhin bzlas pa yin/ khyab chen kun 'gro rten pa dang// rten bcas kun tu snang mdzad zlos// dkyil 'khor kun tu sdud pa'i dus// don gnyis mthar phyin gnas par bya// 'gro ba'i bzhon pa de nyid shes// sngags zhes bya ba gnyis pa ste// ji ltar sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung// yi ge sgra yi brjod pa dag/ lnga bcu'i yan lag kun rnams kyang// rtsa ba ma skyes gcig yin te// ma bcos pa las

gsum du 'gyur// tha mal pa la 'gro 'ong nas// dang po'i las la yang dag gzugs// gzhi yis sems can khams bskyed cing// lam rdzogs dril la phyi nang 'gro// rang bzhin grub pa'i bzla ba gsum// nyon mongs kun sbyang phrin las spyod// oM AHhUM/ dus gsum thams cad 'di la gsal// gnas dang rab tu byed pa la// dang po'i thun la lnga yin te// gnyis pa nyi shu rtsa lngar bzlas// gsum la brgya gnyis nyi shu ltar// bzhi pa la ni dgu brgya ste// lnga pa nyi khri chig stong dang// drug brgya zhag gcig dag la bzlas// 'di ni shin tu phra ba'i lam// bzhon par bcas te phrin las 'grub// gsung tshig ma lus 'di yis zlos// ngag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs 'dod pa'i/ lam gyi kha skong bshad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan mchog la rab dgongs shing// dam tshig rdzas kyi bsgrub pa bshad// rigs lnga'i dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rtsa brgyad yan lag stong dang bcas// phyi nang gsang ba'i de nyid las// rang bzhin spyad dang bsgrubs las byung// phan dang nus mthu dpag med kyang// tha mal rnam rtog dbang gyur te// dngos su spyad par ma nus pa// dri dang kha dog ro bsgyur phyir// rtsa ba lnga las yan lag go/ cha mthun rgyal blon 'khor rnams kyis// dbye ba bsdu ba rab sbyar te/ khrol bu phye ma gong bu la// nga yi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis/ byin gyis brlabs te rtags phyung ba// bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod yon tan yin// rang bzhin gnas pa'i yon tan la// longs spyod sgo nas bsgrub pa ni// spyi dang bye brag so so ste// dang po rten gyi gang zag ni// nga yis rab stan mtshan nyid ldan/ khyad par bla ma mnyes byas shing/ dbang rdzogs thob cing dam tshig ldan// lha dang mkha' 'gro nyer gnas pa// sgrub 'byor lus srog gtong phod cing// brtul zhugs brtson 'grus ldan pas brtsam// 'byung bzhi'i nus pa rgyas shing 'phel// ston zla gsum ni dus kyis mchog/ dka' thub brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang// grub pa mchog brnyes rnam snang rgyu// rang dang bla ma kha bskang ba// don grub byang chub sems kyi rgyu/ ma dang sring mo bu mo dang// mtshan nyid kun ldan snang mtha' yas// gnas bdun pa dang bu chung dang// mtshan nyid kun ldan rin 'byung yin// sangs rgyas yab yum rang nyid dang// gzhon nu lo brgyad ma chad rnams// mi bskyod bsgrub pa'i rgyu yin no// grogs ni mngar gsum tsha ba gsum// bzang drug 'bras bu gsum dang ni// yung ba spang rtsi se rgod shun// ka ra ga bur khyi'u ro tshan/ khyi gu dkar mig ma bye'i sha/ so rtog bong nga skye bar shun// bse ru brag zhun bar pa

ta// ser thig sro lo ut+pal sngon// de dag sbyar zhing bsgrubs spyad na// rims nad dug nad khrag nad sel/ bdud rtsi cong zhi brag zhun dang// ba lu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum// se 'bru gcan gzan sha sbyar te// bsgrubs shing spyad na mchin nad sel// bdud rtsi cong zhe sdig srin dang// se 'bru sug smel tsha rigs rnams// sbyar bsgrubs mkhal ma'i nad kun sel// bdud rtsi bzang drug shu dag dkar// seng ldeng khaN+Da thang chu dang// ga bur ka ra cong mu zi// bse ru rgya ru gnag rgod 'bras// tha kar rdo rje bong bu'i sha/ sbyar te bsgrubs pas mdze nad sel// mtshe 'bras zo sha sbyar sha spos// sbyar zhing bkrus na kha spu dang// smin ma skye bar byed pa yin// bong 'bras bong nag spang btsir khu// khyi nag phag nag brun mu zi// ka ra sil sman thang chu rnams// chu grang gis sbyangs bkrus shing spyad// 'brum bu'i nad rnams thub cing sel// bdud rtsi dang ni tsha ba gsum// gnag rgod mkhris pa bya rgod tshil// mar rnying dang sbyar zhag dgur bsgrub// ril bu byas te rtag tu bsten// grang bas mi tshugs gos su 'gyur// bdud rtsi bya dang sgong rtsi dang// mu zi gla rtsi drod gsum tsha// mar rnying dang sbyar zhag gsum bsgrub// rtags phyin rkang la byugs pa na// sa chu grang lhags kyis mi tshugs// bdud rtsi gser srang drug cu bzhi// mar srang de dang mnyam par sbyar// ru rta bcu drug srang dang mnyam// bzang drug srang brgyad 'bras gsum mnyam// zla ba bcu bsgrub longs spyad na// rkang mgyogs dngos grub rnyed par 'gyur// bdud rtsi dug sbyar byang ba'i shar// do thal zangs lcags rdo phye dang// wa spyang mdze khrag sha rus rnams// shang tshe skye tshe yungs kar nag/ rgya gram lam dang chu 'gram sa// gangs dang ri mtho mchod rten sa// rdo lcags rin chen sna lnga'i phye// ldong ros gla rtsi sha tshil chen// rta bong mu zi tsher ma'i shing// zi ra gu gul dkar nag dang// g.yi sbyang phag dang bong bu'i brun// gzhan yang thun rdzas drag po'i rdzas// ser ba khu 'phang gangs chu dang// drag po'i snod du zhags gsum bsgrub/ khyab 'jug dang sdebs longs spyod na// thog ser drag po 'bab par 'gyur// de la sogs pa las kyi tshogs// gso spyad bcos ma gang bsngags pa// rtsa ba yan lag tshul du spyad// bsgrubs pa ma yin rang bzhin gyis// nus pa dpag med ston bya ba// rgyal po lta bur bsgrub pa ni// dri chen chu rgyun bzang sa dang// sbal te mtheng tshigs tsam du skam// rin po che'i snod ngang pa yi// sgo nga'i dbyibs 'dra sbu gu can// steng du btso bo'i snod yin no// bcud bcas gang ba 'og gi snod// steng btso bar bsdams kha bcad pa'i// bzang skyobs bzang drug ngan skyobs dug/ tsha 'bras drug ni longs spyod skyobs// sbyor ba

mthar phyin khyad par du// gla rtsi mu zi shing kun tshal// sga tsha ti tsa seng phrom dang// mgron thal tshil chen yungs kar dang// bdud rtsi sbyar te zhag bdun du// bsten na klu gdug gdon las thar// cong zhi gu gul shu dag gnag/ pi ling thar nus gag lhog sel// ka ra sbrang rtsi sle tres dang// shing mngar gla rtsi shu dag kar// sbyar bsten glo nad rnying pa sel// yungs kar sgog skya mi rus rnying// zhag bzhir bsten na 'brum nag sel// tsan dan a ru a par gsum// sbyar ba zhag bzhis mig nad sel// sbrang rgod mkhris pa sbyar bskus na// zwa gu thor pa'i nad kun sel// se rgod me tog yungs kar dang// sbyar bas dug nad sel zhing srung// lo nyung kha ser btsong sgog skya// sbyar bas sbyar dug sel bar byed// rgya tshil byi ba'i klad pa dang// 'bras bu gsum dang bzang po drug/ rtsa ba lnga bskol bcud rnams la// dri ro kha dog nus pa dang// zhu ba'i rjes sogs legs par btsir// thabs ni srul dang gdul ba dang// dbye dang dbyung dang btso ba dang// btsir dang skam dang bsnur ba yis// phye ma ril bu lde gu dang// zan dang tshod ma thug pa dang// chang dang mar khu sman mar dang// 'gam phye zan dron 'o ma mar// de dag las gyur rgyal po dang// blon po bram ze dmangs rigs dang// rigs ngan gdol pa bu chung dang// smyon pa lta bu'i gnas skabs kyis// tha dad sgrub pa gang zag gi// blo dang dbang po bsam pa yis// rab tu phye ba'i khyad par gyis// sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i thabs su 'gyur// bye brag so so'i bsgrub pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad rang gi rgyu/ khyad par gtso bo'i sgrub thabs ni// sngon du 'gro ba'i tshogs rdzogs nas// mar dang 'o ma mnyam blugs te/ khams dang longs spyod mthun pa la// kun sbyor rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin// sngags dang bcas pas bsgrub par bya// tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// dkar gsum mngar gsum yan lag bcas// snod bzang bcas te longs spyod bya// phye ma bcud kyis len sgrub yin// sha bzang gsar dang bdud rtsi gnyis// bca' lga bung bu ri yis brgyan// zla ba gcig tu srul zhing bsgrub// sha ltar longs spyod bsten cing spyad/ khyad par gdul zhing bsgrub pa ni// tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum// mar dang phye bzang gdab cing btso// bshos gtsang lta bur bsgrub cing spyad// sna tshogs 'o mas sbyar ba ni// de nyid grub pa'i longs spyod yin// mngar gsum gyis sel de nyid do// nas brus dang bcas mthun par bsgrub// bdud rtsi skam legs zhing phabs dang// bcas pa zhag gsum mnan cing bsgrub// chang bzhin du ni longs spyod btung// tsha 'bras cong zhi mar rnying dang// brag zhun dang sbyar sman

mar sgrub// mngar dang 'o mar tsha 'bras rnams// sbyar ba 'gam byer bsgrub pa yin// gzhan yang ril bu phye ma dang// sman mar khaN+Da lde gu dang// gong bu bcud len la sogs pa// dri ro nus pa'i skyobs bsdus pa// 'u su sgog skya mar rnams te// dang po gnyis pa mngar gsum yin// nus pa tsha gsum rtsa ba lnga// spyir spyad rtsa brgyad yan lag stong// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba'i khyad par gyis// bsgrubs pa'i khyad par 'bras bu ni// gtsang sme dang bral longs spyod nus// thun mong 'du zhing khyad par rdzogs// rtsa ba chen po'i sgrub pa yin// rdo rje'i rigs kyi sgrub thabs ni// rtsa ba rgyu yi khyad par las// mi rta khyi dang bya la sogs// srog chags che phra gang rung ba'i// byang chub sems kyi rtsa ba dang// gshegs lam bzhugs gnas 'bras bu dang// chu ba tshil dang rkang mar dang// thal kar rdo rje mtshan ma dang// cong zhi brag zhun la sogs rnams// mtshan ldan snod sbyar legs par bsgrub// rtsa ba cong zhi cu gang yin// rin chen rigs su bsgrub pa ni// sngags pa'i rgyu ldan mang nyung ran// chu tshod kyis ni legs par btso// rdul dang phral te legs par btsag/ srang bcu 'o ma mar pre gsum// mar blug chu tshod bzung zhing gdu// bcad tshod zin par bsgrub par bya// tho rangs dus su longs spyod bza'// glo bur dag tu bza' ba ni// skyes pa bud med mtshan dang ldan// dar gzhon sha tshil legs par dbye// ma rul ba de chu ser dbyung/ kham pa'i nang bcug mer bsreg btso// yang na nas sran tsam brdungs la// grod pa'i nang du khu ba gdu// sha bzang shing kun khyad pa blang// ba glang glang chen rta dang khyi// yan lag dag tu gyur pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs su sgrub pa ni// rang dang bla ma'i phyag rgya'i rdzas/ khyad par gzhon nu skyon med kyi// pad+ma'i rak+ta tshogs tshad de// yan lag a shwa gan+d+ha dang// 'bri mog nye shing ra mo shag/ tsan dan dmar po btsod rgya skyegs// star bu shing tog ser le brgan// rgun 'brum shing mngar me tog mngar// tshogs tshad mtshal dang dmar po'i rigs// rigs dang mthun par nye bar bsgrub/ khyad par sku gsum bsgrub pa blang// tsan dan dang ni li shi'o// glo bur shangs kyi bu gar bsgrub// las kyi rigs kyi bsgrub pa ni// bar ma snod gzhan grang du gzhug/ bdud rtsi bsings pa'i chu dang bsre// bzang drug gla rtsi a ru ra// zhib brtags kha tshar btab la bsgrub// yang ni dri chu bsgrub pa'i thabs// rdza yi dong bu cha gnyis bya// bar du gzer gyi them bu gzhug/ do nong nang par brje zhing btung// dang po yis ni khrus bya zhing// bar gyi bdud rtsi spyad cing sgrub// tha ma'i rdzas de phyi ru bor// 'bras bu gsum ni bcud kyis len// 'di dag khyad par dam tshig ni// tsha

sngo sha rul sgog btsong dang// chang nyes sred pa'i nyi ma me// bsgrub pa 'jigs pa'i rdzas kun spang// yon tan dang pos lus rdzogs shing// gsum pa mdze dang rlung thub ste// gnyis pas sems gsal 'brum bu thub// bzhi pas bkrag bzang rgyu+u gzer thub// lnga pas sa bdag bad kan te// phyi nang gsang ba gsum gyis ni// nye bar rgyun du sgrub byed na// bdud rtsi rnam lnga tsha ba gsum// mar rnying dang sbyar zla drug bsgrub// tsha grang nad kyi gnyan po rnams// skyobs dang grogs kyis legs sbyar ba// yun du bsgrub pa phyi bshad de// pho sha 'am ni mu zi dang// tshul bzhin legs sbyar nang du bsgrub// phyag rgya'i grogs dang bcas pa ni// gsang ba chen po'i bsgrub pa yin// kun la chos gsang dam tshig ste// dngos grub mchog thob 'bras bu yin// las tshogs so sor sgrub pa ni// bdud rtsi dri chen rgyu bzang dang// tsan dan ka ra 'bras bu gsum// yungs kar skyer pa'i bar shun dang// sbyar ba legs bsgrubs longs spyad na// sbyar dug rlung nad thams cad sel// dom mkhris tsha ba gsum gyis bsgrubs// mgul nad gag pa la sogs sel// bdud rtsi dkar dmar tshil chen dang// gla rtsi bzang drug cha mnyam bsgrubs// zhag bdun gyis ni rtags phyung ste// longs spyod mdze nad thams cad 'joms// rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi phul gang gdul// bdud rtsi srang gnyis mar srang gcig/ a ru chus sbangs 'o mar sbyar// grib skam byas te bzang drug dang// tsan dan dkar dmar tsha ba gsum// 'bras gsum cong zhi bu ram spang// bal bu shug pa'i khaN+Dar bcas// tshad ldan bsgrubs te longs spyad na// 'du ba bzhi sel longs spyod rgyas// bdud rtsi 'bras gsum ba le ka/ bzang drug tig ta ba sha ka/ tsan dan dkar dmar gla rtsi dang// sbrang rtsi cong zhi skyer khaN+Da// sbyar bsgrubs longs spyod mkhris nad sel// bdud rtsi tshil chen 'bras bu gsum// mar dang bu ram sbyar bsgrubs na// snying rlung mgo 'khor la sogs sel// bdud rtsi mkhris pa tshogs tshad dang// snyag snag kyang sbyar sha dug sel bar byed// khyi mig khu+u dang nyung sa bon// brag zhun mar khu sbyar ba yis// me dug sel zhing srung bar byed// ga bur yungs kar pho bya tshan// lug gzhon smad sha gdus pa yis// dug nad sel zhing srung bar byed// mar khu rta dkar khrag sbyar bas// stod na sha mdzer nad las thar// gu gul nag po mu zi dang// ti tsha sbyar bas 'bras nad sel// se 'bru shu dag gu gul gnag/ sbyar bas pho lhog sel bar byed// khyi lud gu gul nag po dang// mar khu sbyar byug sha ro sel// phag tshil gur gum sbyar byugs pas// sha 'phar sel te gla rtsi dang// mu zi gu gul sbyar ba yis// phol mid rus nad sel bar

byed// tsha ba gsum sbyar grang nad sel// mkhris pa dri chus tsha ba sel// skyer shun gla rtsi yung ba dang// gu gul shu dag nga nag/ spru ma ru rta mu zi yis// lhog pa'i rigs kun bsrungs shing sel// de dag nad zhi byed pa ste// gdon zhi byed pa'i las kun ni// mi rta khyi yi sha dang khrag/ lham rnying tshil chen rta'i mchin pa// ra khrag dang bcas rgyal gdon zhi// bya sha nal bu'i klad pa dang// dre'u'i khrag sbyar ma mo zhi// btsan dug ba lang btsan zhi byed// sprel sha khyi lud rgyal phran no// nag po brgyad sbyar klu zhi byed// gdon gzhan bdud rtsi nyid kyis zhi// rgyas pa'i las su bya ba ni// bdud rtsi mar khu rtag bsten na// 'dzam gling bye ba phrag brgya yi// longs spyod kun la dbang byed 'gyur// mu zi cong zhi ra mo sha/ sbyar na tshe yi dngos grub 'byung// ba mar 'o ma mu zir sbyar// rgas pa'i mtshan ma thams cad sel// dbang gi las su sgrub pa yang// ra dkar 'o ma sin+d+hu ra// pad+ma rak+ta sbyar byas na// mo rigs thams cad dbang du byed// cong zhi byang chub sems sbyar na// pho rigs thams cad dbang du 'gyur// lteng khu dri ma mar nag gsum// sbyar bsten yul khams dbang du byed// sgrol phyir mnan dang bskrad dang dbab// byugs dang zos pas drag po 'grub// rbod gtong gnod pa ma lus bzlog/ phrin las rnam bzhi'i las tshogs yin// gzhan yang log gnon bsgrub pa ni// grang 'byam byung na rgya thal dang// btsod dang sgog skya pi pi ling// chang dang sbyar te bsten pas thub// 'bras zan tsha ba gsum yang rung// nas tshig zan nam chang yang rung// ma zhu'i sgregs ngan byung ba na// tsha sna gsum gyi sbyor ba bya// ma zhu na ni sgog skya'am// dri chu'i thang du gtang bar bya// bdud rtsi chen po ma zhu na// dri chu bar dang tsha sbyar btang// rlung skyes mar ram tsho khu btang// mkhris pa skye na ka ra ste// bad kan la ni ru rta ste// grang ba la ni tsha ba gsum// tsha ba skyes na cu gang ngam// gur gum btang bar bya ba yin// dri chen la ni dri chu ste// de ma zhu na snabs yin te// thig le dkar dmar de nyid do// mkhris par lhung ba'i rtags byung na// tig ta ba le ba sha ka/ bdud rtsi cong zhi sbyar bar bya// bad kan a ru ra yi thang// rlung la 'bras gsum tshil chen no// tsha grang la sogs de bzhin sbyar// skyugs bro gnyid med 'phyos pa la// chu phul bdun la mar phul phyed// 'o ma phul gang mnyam du gdu// rlung skyes skrangs la sogs pa sel// 'bru gsum gyis ni kun byin brlab// srin log dang po byung ba la// sgog skya'i chu skol gtang bar bya// skyug log 'o ma lud mar btang// gso na tsam pa bag tsam ste// srog rtsa'i srin ljang mgo khra yis// bdud rtsi bsgrub la rang shugs thon// mchin sbaum sdig pa 'bu shun dang// mi tshil ra

tshil phag tshil dang// bzang drug tsha sna tshogs chad la// ril bu ril ma tsam bzhi gtang// de dus 'gyel na 'chi 'gyur te// sman pa mkhas pas gtar kha bya// sman gyis gtar bas khrag dbyung ste// de thon tshe tshad nyi zla 'dra// de nas bsgrub pa bya ba ni// dang po bdag gi lus sbyang phyir// sngon 'gro nad dang zas brda ste// a ru ra ni cha bzhi la// ba ru skyu ru phyed phyed do// bzang drug ga bur tsan dan sogs// rtsa ba'i bdud rtsi dang sbyar te// rlung la bu ram dang sbyar te/ khrag mkhris che na ka ra'o// grang ba tsho khu+u ram nye ba// de dag ril bu'i sbyor ba'o// bdud rtsi phye ma zo mar sbyar// 'ol gom phyi ma'i bsgrub pa'o// bdud rtsi dron mo sha chen sbyar// mnan zhing sgrub pa shar bsgrub pa'o// nyung khu shu+u la ram nye dang// lca ba'i khaN+Da bdud rtsir sbyar// gsum mam lnga ru lde gur bsgrub// 'o ma dang sbyar bskol ba ni// 'o thug bdud rtsir bsgrub pa yin// rak+ta bzang po rnams dang sbyar// de nyid bsgrub pa chen por 'gyur// phye bza' dang sbyar bskol zhing btso// zan dron chen por bsgrub cing spyad// de la phabs bzang gdab cing bsgrub// ma babs ma langs bar du ste// rtags bzang byung na chu bzang sbyar// de ni btung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// ra mgo lta bu'i chu bsings na// grang ba'i nad rnams ma lus sel// skam nyung khaN+Da a ru ra// gser mdog rnam par rgyal ba dang// re'u ral khye'u'i tshan dang sbyar// dug rnams ma lus 'joms pa'i mchog/ brgya byin lag ni 'o mar sbyar// bzhin sha kha dog mdangs ldan 'gyur// mu zi sgog skya cong zhir sbyar// bad mkhris sel zhing gzhon nur 'gyur// shu dag kar sbyar de bsgrubs na// gzugs mdog la sogs ldan par 'gyur// drag zhun dang sbyar mchin nad sel// dug 'joms stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// nye shing rang skyar rkang mgyogs 'grub// ra mo shags kyis mkha' la 'gro// lcam pa sbyar bsgrubs mkhal nad sel// a shA an d+ha 'o mar sbyar// bcud len bsgrub pa chen po yin// gze ma bdud rtsi'i chang gis ni// grang rlung mtha' dag sel bar byed// dzA ti bu ram bong nga dang// tsha ba gsum dang mar khus bsgrubs// zas dang ma 'dres longs spyad na// glo snying la sogs stod nad sel// gser gyi me tog mkhris nad sel// bzang drug phyir bsgrubs khrag nad do// gser mdog gis ni dug rigs 'joms// lug mig gis ni sa rnams mthong// bskor bzlog chen pos mdze nad 'joms// de dag dang po'i las can te// mdog ni dkar gsum mthun pa ste// mngar gsum gyis ni ro dang ldan// ga bur gla rtsi dri yin no// ji ltar rigs pas bsgrub pa yi// goms dang bcos pa'i bsgrub sgrub pa pos kyang pas so// bdud rtsi

rnam lnga myur du bsgrub// spyir 'gro yon tan bstan pa ni// dpag med bsam gyis mi khyab ste// zla drug sbyor bas mdze nad gso// bcu gnyis gzungs thob thos pa 'dzin// lo gnyis bsgrubs pas mthu rtsal ldan// nor rdzas dbang 'gyur lo gsum gyis// gzhi yi mdze dang rim nad 'joms// lha dang lha min dbang du sdud// lnga yis seng+ge glang chen dang// rma bya mkha' lding dag dang mtshungs/ tshe ring nad med rig rgyud 'phel// drug gis sa gsum nor rnams thob// spyan lnga sku lnga ye shes 'grub/ tshig gcig chad dam// bslab bya kun la ring gyur skong// mtshams med la sogs sdig sgrib sel// brgyad kyis bsad gso'i rdzu 'phrul 'grub// dgu yis rig 'dzin phyir mi ldog/ bcu yis sa bcu yongs su rdzogs// bcu gsum gyis ni sa bcu gsum// mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs/ khyad par bdud rtsi dri chen grub// rnam snang chos dbyings ye shes brnyes// byang chub sems kyis rdo rje sems// me long lta bu'i ye shes 'gyur// rak+ta snang ba mtha' yas dang// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// dri chu don yod grub sku dang// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so// mAM sa rin chen 'byung ldan dang// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// gzhan yang bye brag mar khu dang// sbyar ba'i yon tan dpag tu med// phyi nang gsang gsum sbyor ba'ang// yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo// rgyal blon dmangs ltar bsgrub pa yang// yon tan chen po rdzogs pa yin// bye brag so so'i bsgrub pas kyang// lung ston la sogs yon tan 'char// bsrung bya rgyud la gdams pa la// the tshom yid gnyis ma mos dang// zas ngan bsten dang 'bru mar byug/ me dang nyi ma spyad nyes dang// dam tshig snod mi ldan pa yi// grogs ngan bsten pa spang bar bya// rang la rtags med gzhan la ston// tshul bzhin ma bsgrubs longs spyod pa// phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa dang// las kyi tshogs su sbyar ba rnams// ma 'ongs skyes bu rnams kyis brtag/ yon tan bdud rtsi bsgrub pa las/ khyad par kha skong bshad pa yin//// de nas bcom ldan he ru ka/ rnal 'byor gsum dang rab ldan pa'i// rim pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i lam// 'bras bur bcas pa rab bshad pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// lam gyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// phyi nang bsrung ba rim bzhin brtsam// 'byor ldan yo byad byin gyis brlab// bsod nams tshogs chen bsag bya'i phyir// phung po khams dang skye mched la// rang rig lha yi bdag po dgod// phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rgyas btab ste// mnyes pa mtha' dag rab sbyangs nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de// dbab cing bstan pa'i 'phro 'du bya// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub thabs

la// dkyil 'khor gsum gyi nga rgyal gyis// rtog pa mtha' dag bsal bar bya// de nyid bsal ba'i tshad ldan zhing// skad cig tsam gyis don byed nus// gsal 'phro 'bar ba'i nyams ldan zhing// dngos grub mtshan ma brtag par bya// mthong dang thos dang snang ba dang// shes bya'i yul du gyur par dmigs// 'jig rten chos kyi rtog pa bzlog/ thun mong du ni bsnyen par 'gyur// rim pa chen por bsgrub pa yang// zhi bar gnas dang drag shul spyod// mos pa dag dang 'dun par sbyar// spro dang bsdu ba de bzhin no// bdag nyid gcig pa nas brtsams nas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin dang// rigs lnga dang ni bcu dang gnyis kyang bzhis// nyi shu dang ni de rjes drug/ sum cu bzhi bcu lnga bcu dang// drug cu brgyad dang de bzhin du// rim pa so sor phye ba dag/ dpa' bo 'khor lo tshom bur gnas// grangs nges pa dang bsam mi khyab// bsdus pa dang ni rgyas pa la// 'phro 'du rim pa bzhin du bslab// zhal phyag rnams kyi rnam pa yang// gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang drug/ dgu dang bco brgyad nyi shu gcig/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa'i// rtsa ba yan lag tshul dag gis// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i tshul du dgod// shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i gzhal med khang// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kyi tshogs// ma lus snang ba de yis brgyan// 'gro rgyud drug dang lnga dag dang/ khams gsum khyab par ji snyed pa// bde bar gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dus// dngos dang blo yi yul du bslab// snga ma dag gis rim bstan nas// phyi ma de bzhin slob pa ni// rim gyis gnas pa'i bsgrub chen po// bco brgyad dang ni bzhi bcu gnyis// lnga bcu drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi// so sor yang ni bdag gi lus// phung po lnga ni phyi dang nang// rnam shes brgyad ni yul dang bcas// 'byung bzhi 'du shes bcus bsdus pa'i// de dag ngo bo so sor bsgom// phyi rol dbang po'i yul dang bcas// 'byung ba chen po lnga yi bdag/ rnam shes skye mched yan lag dang// nying lag sha dang khrag la sogs// don snying snod bcas rang gi dngos// de dag tshul las mi 'da' ba'i// rab tu spros pa grangs med mtha'// slob pa lus kyi rim pa ste// de dang rjes mthun sgra dang skad// rtog pa smra brjod de bsgrub pa// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM// badzra he ru ka zhes nas// g+han+d+he ho yi bar dag tu// sngon 'gro 'jug dang bcas te sbyar// lha dang mthun pa'i zhag grangs su// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// glu gar phyag rgya shes rab dang// thabs su sbyor ba byang chub sems// lus ngag yid kyi brda la sogs// longs spyod kun ldan mchod par bya// bsnyen pa sngon song bsgrub pa bzhi// rnal

'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang// rnal 'byor che dang rdzogs pa yi// rnal 'byor dag gi tshul bzhin bya// dang por brtags pa'i gnas dag tu// lus kyi cha mnyam gcig gam gnyis// phyi nang nus dang sbyar la gzugs// tshul du nges pa bzhin du bri// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// yo byad gsum du cha bgos te// mchod sbyin bsngo ba'i yul dang sbyar// 'jigs byed pho brang dkyil 'khor bskyed// phyogs skyong dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// yab yum nyi shus gdan du gzir// bar du gcod pa de bzhin bsal/ thun mong mchog gi bsrung ba brtsam// phyi dang nang du 'dzin pa bzlog/ rU tra chen po tshul bzhin mnan// dbab dang bca' dang bshags pa dag/ nga yis sngar bshad bzhin du brtsam// 'khor lo khyams dang sgo rnams la// rigs bzhi yum dang byas pa dang// ma sring bcu drug pho nya bzhi// 'jigs byed dkyil 'khor de lus la// sku gsung thugs kyi lha rnams bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu yis// yab yum gnas su rgyas btab cing// tshogs pa gsum gyis gang bsngags pa// rigs lnga la ni nyi shu lnga// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las rdzogs tshul ji bzhin par// bskyed dang dgug gzhug rim pas bstan// bzlas brjod 'phro 'du'i bsnyen pa yis// de bzhin bsgrub pa dag la yang// bskul dang bsdu ba dag la yang// smra ba'i skyon bcu bral ba yis// 'bar 'phro gsal 'bar nus shes bya// gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang 'od// so so'i yul la de nyid bstim// dngos grub dang ni bar chad brtag/ de nyid bzlog pa'i sbyor ba brtsam// 'byung chen bzhi yi las la sbyar// thabs dang thugs rje las byung ba'i// byin rlabs kyis ni yul rnams kun// chos nyid zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin// gnyis med thabs kyis ma lus bsgral// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// sgyu ma'i tshul du gzhan la snang// byas dang grub pa gang yang med// ma bcos sems kyi rang bzhin la// bya dang byed pa kun dang bral// bdag nyid don rtogs de bsgral bya// mtshan ma'i rtog pa ma lus kun// phyir gyur snang ba kun las bzlog/ bsgom bzlas bsgyur ba'i goms stobs kyis// brtse ba dang bcas gzhan gyi don// rnal 'byor tsam du de bshad do// dad pa dbang dang 'brel ba yis// lam gyi rtsa ba de nyid las// gsang ba chen po'i dbang bzhin du// rjes su bstan pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ byin gyis rlabs kyi khyad par ni// phyi nang yon tan mtshan nyid rdzogs// rang byin brlab pa'i nus pa can// snod bcud chas gos ting 'dzin ldan// mos pa'i 'dun pa ches g.yos pa// de nyid dbang phyug rdzogs gyur nas// nga rgyal gsum

dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i// byang chub sems kyi yon tan spros// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// mnyes pa mchog gi mchod pa sbyar// tshul mthun lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// gnas dang bcas pa'i dga' ba bzhi// 'khor lo dang bcas gsal byas te// sbyangs shing bgrod pa'i sa dang lam// sku dang ye shes 'bras bur bcas// rtags rnams srog dang rten gyis sbyar// lnga dang bcu sogs nyi shu lnga// brgya phrag gnyis dang lngar de bzhin// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya'i bar// 'gro ldog sdog cing gsal ba rnams// dbu ma gsum du nges par 'du// rang bzhin yon tan gsum gyis brgyan// 'dam skyes gnyis 'byung 'khrung yang sgra stobs ldan// dpe yi chos mthun skye bar 'gyur// bsdam bya sdom par byed pa yi// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de// dpe don rtags kyis sbyar byas nas// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog pa// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// sa chen nyi shu rtsa gcig gi/ yon tan dag dang ldan par gzhug/ rnam shes tshogs dang yul rnams kun// 'od gsal ngang du snyoms 'jug cing// phyi srog dbu mar gzhug pa la// gnas pa che chung brgyad kyis mtshon// yon tan gsum nyid shas che chung// cha mnyam skye ba'i mtshan nyid dbye// tha dad dam tshig tshogs par sbyar// rnam par mi rtog ci nus bslab// bzlog gzung bcas pa sngon du sbyar// bla ma slob ma mtshungs ldan pas// yon tan mtshan ma de nyid ni// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya// rjes su slob ma de nyid kyang// yum dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yis/ lus kyi 'khor lo byin dbab cing// chags dang rjes chags yul rnams la// dpa' mo'i dkyil 'khor nges par brtag/ dga' dang skye dga' mchog tu dga'// bral ba dang ni skad cig bzhi// rnam par bskyod sogs de dag la// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang// bde chen zag med dam pa bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi la rim bzhin dbab// dbab dang bskyil dang gzung dang bzlog/ sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba brtsam// ma lus thabs dang shes rab dang// mnyam pa nyid du rab tu sbyor// phung po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lngar sbyor// rnam shes tshogs brgyad ma mo ste// yul brgyad phra men brgyad du sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo bzhi// 'du shes bcu ni khro bcur sbyor// bde 'gro'i yon tan ma lus mthong// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med lam// rnal 'byor rig pa'i ngang du sbyor// mnyam pa nyid du bsgom zhing gsal// goms pa mthar phyin bar chad med// gsang ba thabs dang shes rab dbang// sngon 'gro shes rjes tshul du 'brel// bskyed rim bsgom dang mtshan rdzogs dang// tha dad med pa'i mnyam sbyor

dang// rang rig nges pa dag gis ni// dbang bzhi'i lam du nges pa la// smin par byed pa'i gzhi yin te// rjes su spyod pa mtha' dag gis// lam sbyang rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor la// lus kyi khog pa gzhal yas khang// don snying rigs lnga yab yum ste// snod drug sha khrag drod dbugs dang// dbang po mig sogs rnam shes rlung// rtsa dang bcas pa ma grub dang// sgal tshigs yan lag nying lag ni// lhu tshigs dum bu ma lus rnams// gtso dang 'khor gyi tshul du mthong// bdag ci 'dra bar de bzhin gzhan// sgyu ma rmi lam bzhin du mnyam// lus ngag yid kyis dben gyur pa'i// sgyu ma'i sku de bsam gtan gyi// bye brag spyod pa dang bcas pas// 'od gsal stong nyid la gnas te// rang gzhan mngon sum gyur pa la// rtog pa che 'bring tha ma'i dus// snang ba rags dang bar ma dang// thim pa'i rim gyis phra ba dag/ skye 'gyur yang na mi skye srid// lus sems snang ba gzhal med khang// rten dang brten par bcas pa ste// 'du byed ma lus phyag rgyar gsal// smra brjod dbyangs dang drug yin te// dran dang rtog pa gang snang nyid// mnyam nyid mya ngan 'das dgongs te// theg pa spyi gcod rab tu brjod// ye shes rang la snang ba ni// 'od gsal don gyi mchog yin te// sku dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// rang gzhan don gyi rtsol ba spangs// 'khor bar rtog dang mya ngan 'das// dbyer med zung du 'jug pa la// he ru ka dpal zhes su brjod// srid zhi chags bral mya ngan 'das// dpal 'bar kro d+hI shwa rI ma// rtsa ba yan lag de bzhin no// sngon du gnas pa bzhi yin te/ khyad par bstan ldan yang pa lam yin no// spyod pa dang ldan lam zhes bya// bsags thob rten gyur de nyid sku// ma lus ma nor gsal ba ni// de yi ye shes chen po yin// smon lam thugs rje'i stobs sad pa// phrin las mdzad pa'i tshul yin no// rang bzhin gyis ni yang dag de// sa lam tshul du grub pa ste// 'bras bu chos sku gcig pu nyid// gzugs sku sangs rgyas bde chen 'dus// yon tan rnal 'byor zab mo ni// sku gsum ngang du rtogs pa yin// gzhi ni mkha' 'gro sgyu ma ste// bde mchog bde bar gyur pa'o// rnal 'byor spyod par rung rnams kyis// the tshom med par spyad pa las// byis pa so so'i skye bo dang// theg pa dman la gzhol rnams kyis/ mthong thos 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur// de bas myur du bgrod pa'i lam// 'di tshe sangs rgyas bsgrub bya ba// sku gsum sa la goms par sbyang// ma nor thugs kyi bsgrub pa la// rim gnyis dbang bzhis bsdus pa'i lam// 'bras bu dang bcas mthar thug tshul/ kha skong dag tu bshad pa yin//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// rin chen (23)

dbyings kyi rgyal po de// rang gi rigs kyi dbang phyug po// 'khor lo bzhi las tha ma'i las// 'khrul zhing 'khor ba rab tu gcod// yab yum phyi nang gsang ba gsum// tshul bcu dang ni 'od zer bkye// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram tshul// gnad skabs 'bru ded bsnur 'gros so// dang po pho mo rnam gnyis bzhi// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// mo yi mo g.yon sa 'og nang// mo yi pho g.yas gnam steng phyi// pho yi gnyis las pho yi mo// ya ma rA dza sa k+She ya// g.yon la 'og nang rnam grangs so// pho yi pho g.yas gnam ste phyi// zhi rgyas g.yon la dbang drag g.yas// pho mo so sor bskor bar bya// 'khrul lugs bzhi la pho mo bzhi// don gyis tshang ba de nyid do// phyi nang gsang ba gnyis yin te// bsnyen sgrub las sbyor dbye ba dang// phyi nang gsang ba'i bdag nyid do// dang po spyi dang khyad par las// spyir sbyar phyi gsum bsnyen pa ste// rgya brgyad cha yin nam mtsho bzhir phye bzlas pa dang// sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu dril// brgyad bskor g.yas su bskor nas su// g.yas bskor gnas su bzlog ste drang// de nyid rtags dang dus grangs su// dam bcas pa ni bsnyen pa'o// de yi rtags phyin bsgrub pa ste// dngos grub sha dang bdud rtsi'i rdzas// ma lus longs spyod ldan pa dang// gzugs brnyan la ni sku gzugs bkod// gsang ba nang gi gsang ba gsum/ khri khrag re res dngos grub blangs// the tshom som nyi med par spyad// gnyis pa khyad par las sbyar ba// dkyil 'khor dbus su e gru gsum// sum brtsegs bris te steng zur la// sgyaid phu gsum la ga'u bzhag/ 'khor lo legs bris nag por sba// phyi nang gsang ba'i nyi ma bzhir// so so rang gi las la sbyar/ khyad par bsnyen sgrub las sbyor la// 'bru brgyad g.yon bskor bsnyen pa ste// gzhi snying gcig dril bsnyen sgrub yin// g.yas bskor bsnyen pa'i las sbyor ro// bsnyen sgrub gsum sbyar spyir sbyar nyid// nang gi bsgrub pa bcu bdun pa// bsgrub pa'i bsnyen pa dag tu 'gyur// dang po a kro te ka'o// ya ma me da k+She bcu bdun// bsgrub pa'i yang ni bsgrub pa yin// ya ma k+She da bcu bdun pa// g.yas bskor bsgrub pa'i las sbyor ro// las rim kun la de bzhin sbyar// las sbyor nyid la dbye ba ni// 'bru ded bdun la g.yon bskor bas// las la sbyor ba'i bsnyen pa'o// de nyid g.yas bskor las bsgrub pa'i// dam tshig ral gcig phyag mtshan ni// las kyi las su bshad pa yin// 'khrul tshul bcu yi bye brag ni// bzhi snying dril dang so sor phye// dang po rtsa ba dril ba dang// las kyi kha skong dril ba las// rtsa ba bzhi snying gcig dril ba// thog ma brgyad gcig dril ba ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// ya me do ru Na yo da ya// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She

ya// yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya// zhes pas rtsa ba brgyad las ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis dril ba yin// bdun bzhi gcig tu dril ba ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me// ya me do ru Na yo da// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She// ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma// nyi shu rtsa brgyad gcig tu dril// drug bzhi gcig tu dril ba ni// ya ma rA dza sa do// ya me do ru Na yo// ya ta yo ni ra ya// k+She ya tsa ni rA ma// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gcig tu dril// lnga bzhi gcig tu dril ba ni// ya ma me da k+She// rA dza sa do// ru Na yo ni// ra yats+tsha ni// lnga bzhi bcu bdun dag tu dril// las kyi kha skong dril ba ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ hrIH shrI a mu kaM b+h+ra ma ya// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying dang// las sngags bzhi snying gcig tu dril// so sor dbye ba drug yin te// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// sa ma rA dza sa do me// ya ma rA dza sa do// ya ma rA dza sa/ ya ma rA dza/ ya ma rA/ brgyad bdun drug lnga bzhi gsum du// bzlas pa bye brag drug yin no// dang po ji bzhin gzhan de bzhin// g.yon bzhin du ni g.yas bzlog bzlas// 'khrul pa bcu la sa zin dgu// yi ge zad pa gcig ste bcu// bdun bskor g.yas g.yon ru bzhi ste// bdun bskor ya nas me yi bar// ya yi bzlas lugs rdzogs de bzhin// gcig las bdun du 'gyur ba las// nyi ma dang po bzhi bcu dgu// bzlas pas dang po'i yi ge zad// gnyis pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar// ru bzhi zad pa'i pho brang dbus// ya nyid lnga 'gyur dag tu bzlas// ma me da k+She// bzhi bzhir 'gyur bas spyir bcu dgu// de yis dbus kyi lnga zad cing// phyi rim nyi ma gnyis pa ste// man chad gsum la bzhi bzhi ste// nyi ma gsum la bcu gnyis te// dbus mtha' zad pa'i ru bzhi'o// ru gcig nyid la bcu drug tu// bzlas pas bzhi po bzhir 'gyur te// de las ltos pa'i ru bzhi yin// nyi ma gnyis pa'i yi ge res// bcu drug sogs pa'i drug cu bzhir// 'gyur bas gnyis pa'i yi ge zad// gsum pa bzhi pa de bzhin sbyar// las skabs gnyis zhes bya ba ni// gnam thus dang ni bsnur 'gros te// dang po sngar bshad gnyis pa ni// rus sbal lta bur bsnur 'gros te// ya ma me da k+She/ rA dza sa do/ ru na yo ni/ rA ya tsa ni/ gcig rjes gcig gis gnon la brtag/ 'od zer snang ba rnam brgyad ni// rtsa ba nyi ma shar lta bu// a kro bcu bdun 'khrul lngar khyab// bya rgod gzan la 'jums lta bu// ya ma ye da bcu bdun pa// gzas pa'i yul la skar mda' bzhin/ khri mun chud pa'i btson bzhin du// dril ba mi gsal kun la khyab// lcags sgrog bcug pa sems gzhungs bzhin// bcu drug kun dang 'brel zhing 'jug/ skyes bu go mtshon bstar ba bzhin// sems dpa' de ni gzhan la skong yang skor// lcags

gzer mi 'chor gzer bzhin du// a mu ka sogs dgu tsho yis// dbang thang bla tshe 'dzin par byed// lha dbang gis brdeg thog bzhin du// dmigs pa thogs med myur byed pa// lce rtse ka ba ya yis brdeg/ spu gris rtsol med gnyis byed ltar// so so'i sngags kyis ma lus gcod// 'od zer brgyad kyi cho 'phrul yin// 'bru ded g.yas g.yon nyin mtshan du// bzlas pas bsnyen sgrub brtags phyin nas// thogs med las la sbyar bar byed// sngags 'khrul mtsho bsdeb bstan pa yang// gzhi dang dngos po thabs 'bras bu// dang po yab yum phyi nang gsang// 'od zer brgyad dang bzlas lugs bcu// ru bzhi rdo rje rgya gram ste// lnga lnga dag ni bzhi lnga'o// dngos gzhi mo yi mor bsdeb dang// mo yi pho bsdeb pho yi mo// pho yi phor bsdeb dang po ste// gnyis pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum// re re'ang de bzhin gsum gsum ste// rnam grangs so sor bsdeb par bya// sum cu rtsa gnyis nyi shu brgyad// brgyad gsum bcu bdun brgyad bdun drug/ lnga bzhi gsum ste bzlas lugs bcu// gsum pa'i sngags mtsho bsdeb pa'o// nyi ma bya rgod btson skyes bu// lcags gser thog dang spu gri'i so// 'od kyi dpe brgyad rang mtshor bsdeb// lnga tshan bzhi dang bzhi tshan bzhis// rdo rje rgya gram ru bzhi'i bsdeb// thabs ni mo yi pho nyid dang// mo yi mo la sum cu gnyis// g.yon bskor yi ge log ma log/ khyad par phye ste mtsho bsdeb bya// pho yi pho dang pho yi mo// g.yas su bskor ba sngar bzhin no// phyi yi phyi brgyad phyi yi nang// sum cu rtsa gnyis phyi gsang la// legs par brtags te sngags mtsho bsdeb// nang phyi yi ge dgod phyung ba// nang gi nang ni g.yon bcu bdun// nang gi gsang ba bcu bdun g.yas// yi ge dang ni sngags tshig bzlog/ nang gi gsum ni sngags tshig bsdeb// gsang gsum phyi gsal yi ge dang// sngags tshig rnal ma dag tu ste// gsang nang yi ge bzlog pa la// tshig ni rnal ma g.yas su bskor// gsang bzhi snying las kha bskang nas// gsum dril gsang ba'i mtsho bsdeb thabs// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya// ya me do ru Na yo da ya// ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya// yi ge nyi shu rtsa brgyad la// ya ma rA dza sa do me// ya me do ru Na yo da// ya da yo ni ra ya k+She// ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma// yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// ya ma rA dza sa do// ya me do ru Na yo// ya da yo ni ra ya/ k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma/ yi ge bcu bdun pa bzhi'o// ya ma me ta k+She/ rA dza sa do/ ru Na yo ni/ ra yats+tsha ni// yi ge brgyad pa 'di nyid do// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ bdun drug lnga bzhi gsum rim bzhin// ya ma rA dza sa do me/ ya ma rA dza sa do/ ya ma me da k+She/ rA dza sa do// ya ma rA/ bzlas lugs bcu

bsdeb dang po bzhin// nyi ma gsum pa la sogs sbyar// g.yon pa bzhin du g.yas de bzhin// g.yon pa tshig bzlog 'bru ma bzlog/ 'bru bzlog tshig ni rnal ma ste// g.yas pa la yang de bzhin sbyar// bzlas lugs bcu yi mtsho bsdeb dngos// oM a kro te ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ ya ma me ta k+She/ rA dza sa do// ru Na yo ni/ ra ya tsa ni/ oM hrIHSh+tIHbi kr-i tA' na na hUM phaT phaT sa ma ya/ nyi ma dang po nas bzhi'i bar// rtsa ba bzhi snying dril ba'o// r-i r-I l-i l-I/ ya ma ra ni ts+tsha ya k+She/ gnyis pa man chad g.yos bskar sbyar// bdun pa bzhi snying gcig dril bas// nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nyid do// a mu ka ka pa ye/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig yang snying ngo// 'od zer brgyad kyi mtsho bsdeb yin// ya ma me da k+She/ ya me da k+She ma/ ya ma k+She da me/ ya da k+She ma me/ rA dza sa do/ do ru Na yo/ yo ni ra ya/ yats+tsha ni rA/ ru bzhi rdo rje'i mtsho bsdeb bo// de ltar bsdeb pa'i 'bras bu gsum// dang po bsnyen sgrub gsum bsdeb pa// mo yi mo ni bsnyen pa ste// mo yi pho dang pho yi mo// bsgrub pa yin te pho yi pho// las la sbyar ba'i mtsho bsdeb yin// phyi yi phyi dang nang gi phyi// gsang ba'i phyi rnams bsnyen pa'o// nang nas gsum bsgrub gsang gsum las// 'od zer brgyad kyi las sbyar ba// nyi ma bya rgod btson ni bsnyen// skyes bu go mtshon g.yon bskor bsgrub// go mtshon g.yas bskor btson lcags gzer// gser thog spu gri bzhi dril bas// bzhi snying gcig tu dril ba'i las// de la bzhi ni bsnyen pa ste// brgyad nas gsum gyi bar du phye// g.yon du bskor bas bsgrub pa'o// brgyad nas gsum phye g.yas bskor ba// thams cad las la sbyar ba'o// dbus su nyi shu bskor bsnyen te// tha ma bcu drug bskor bsgrub pa'o// lnga bzhi g.yas su tshang bar bskor// las la sbyar ba yin de ltar// mtsho bsdeb 'bras bu dang po'o// gnyis pa phrin las bzhi bsdeb la// mo yi mo ni zhi ba ste// mo yi pho rgyas pho'i mo dbang// pho yi pho ni drag po'o// phyi yi phyi nang gnyis zhi ba// phyi gsang nang phyi gnyis rgyas te// nang gi lhag ma gnyis dbang yin// gsang ba gsum ni drag po'o// bzhi snying gcig dril zhi ba ste// brgyad nas bdun pa g.yas bskor rgyas// brgyad nas gsum du phye ba dbang// de dag g.yon bskor drag po'o// phrin las so so'i kha skong sbyar// rtsa ba nyi ma tsan+d+ra zhi// bya rgod 'jums 'dra rgyas pa ste// spu gri so gril lta bu dbang// lhag ma rnams ni drag po'o// lnga bskor bzhi ni zhi ba ste// gnyis pa bcu drug rgyas pa'o// gsum pa bcu drug dbang yin te// bzhi pa bcu drug drag po'o// de ltar 'khrul lnga phrin las bzhi// mtsho bsdeb 'bras bu gnyis pa yin// gsum pa sku gsung thugs bsdeb pa// mo yi pho mo gnyis ni sku// pho yi mo gsung

pho'i pho thugs// bzhi snying gcig tu dril ba sku// brgyad nas gsum du g.yon rnams gsung// de nyid g.yas bskor thams cad thugs// nyi ma bya rgod gzan 'jums sku// lcags sgrog khri mun gnyis ni gsung// lhag ma rnams ni thugs yin no// 'khrul lnga sku gsung thugs gsum du// mtsho bsdeb 'bras bu gsum pa'o// gzhan yang bsnyen pa zhi ba dang// sku gsung rnams ni yul du bshad// bsgrub pa dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang dang gsung ni thabs zhes bya// las la sbyar dang drag po dang// thugs ni 'bras bur bsdus pa yin// de ltar 'khrul 'khor mtsho bsdeb la// ngo bo kun gzhi bag chags dang// bcas pa rnam dag gshin rje gshed// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// chos kyi sku yi dngos yin mod// srog dbugs mdangs 'phrog nges pa'i tshig/ de nyid kyang ni gcod pa ste// 'khor bas gcod cing 'khrul pas 'khor// gsang sngags bcu bdun pa yin te// a kro te ka hrIHSh+t+wI'o// ro langs mtha' sdud dang bcas pa'i// 'khrul dang 'khor ba rnam gnyis las// dang po phyi nang gsang gsum dang// ru bzhi dag tu 'khrul pa'o// phyi nang gsang gsum dngos yig bdun// rnam pa gcig po bcu bdun las// bcu gsum gnyis dang nyi shu brgyad// bcu gnyis gnyis dang bcu bdun no// bzhi po gnyis dang bdun yin te// gsum gnyis lnga dang bzhi gsum las// ya ma ya me ya da ya k+She/ zhes pas phyogs kyi dbu gzung nas// g.yon bskor bzlas pa sum cu gnyis// de ni g.yon du 'khrul pa'o// ya k+She ya da ya me ya// g.yas bskor so gnyis g.yas 'khrul lo// ya nas me dang ya nas k+She// ya nas k+She dang ya nas me// de ltar bdun bskor dril ba ni// gnam thus bzhi snying gcig dril ba// nyi shu rtsa brgyad dag tu 'khrul// ya nas yo dang ya nas do// ya nas yo dang ya nas da// drug drug drug bskor dril ba ni// las kha bskang te nyer bzhir 'khrul// ya nas k+She ra do ru drug bzlas pa// las kha bskang ba'i drug 'khrul yin// ya nas k+She ra do ru ni rA ni// de yis mgo 'jug lnga dang bzhir// bskor ba chig dril bcu bdun 'khrul// ya nas ya yi bar du brgyad// nyi ma dang po bzlas pas 'khrul// ya nas me yi bar du bdun// gnam thus yin te bdun du 'khrul// ya nas do ru drug bzlas pa// las kha bskang ba'i drug 'khrul yin// ya nas k+She ru lnga 'khrul ba// bzlas pa dbus kyi lte bar 'khrul// ya nas dza ru bzhi bzlas pa// gnyis pa yin te bzhir 'khrul pa'o// ya ma rA ni shar phyogs kyi// las sdebs bzlas pa gsum du 'khrul// de ltar g.yon gyi bsnyen sgrub nas// g.yas kyis gsad cing rnam shes dbral// bzlog pa g.yas bskor g.yon rjes

dpag/ g.yas su bskor cing 'khrul pa yin// bca' gzhi 'khor lo stegs bu gnyis// gzhi dang gnag smug bskor thabs dang// bsnyen sgrub gsang sngags tshang bar dgod// dur khrod ro ras legs par btul// snag tsha dug sna tshogs pa dang// mi khy-i ra gsum grir shi ba'i/ phrag dang bsres pas bris pa rgyu// lcags dang mi rkang mi bsad mda'// de ni smyu gu'i rgyu yin no// 'khor lo rim pa bzhi dang ldan// thig bzhi btab pas re mig dgu// phyi rim bcu gnyis bcu drug la// sum cu gnyis dang ldan par bya// dbus su ya ma me da k+She// shar du rA dza sa do// lho ru ru Na yo ni// nub tu yo ni ra/ byang du rA ya ts+tsha ni// gdug pa'i yi ge bcu mnan dgod// phyi rim dbyangs yig bcu drug dgod// de yi phyi rim thod phreng dang// phaT kyis bskor te g.yon yin no// de bzhin yi ge'i bzlas lugs bzlog/ bskor phreng thams cad g.yas su'o// 'khor lo gnyis bris kha sbyar te// steng la mnan pa'i 'khor lo bris// 'og la bsreg pa'i 'khor lo'o// gtso bo'i skur gsal ljags rdo rje ni// rtse lnga rwa gdengs khong seng can// nang nas sngags dpal me 'dra bas// gwa'u'i 'khor lo la gzhug bya// yang na lcags sdig me stag bzhin// 'phros nas gwa'u'i dmigs la bstim// sha zos khrag 'thung rus pa 'chos// las bsgrub dur khrod sha rus nyab// ting 'dzin dmigs pa gnad la brdeg/ 'khrul lugs gong ma'i 'khor lo'o// ru bzhi'i 'khrul 'khor lte ba la// lnga ste phyi rim bcu gnyis la// yi ge bcu gnyis zad par bzlas// bzhi bskor bcu drug dag tu shes// dang po dbus su 'khrul zhing bskor// ya nas k+She dang ya nas ma// ya nas me dang ya nas da// dang po'i nyi ma bsnyen pas so// rA tsa sa dau/ do ru Na yo/ yo ni ra ya bcu gnyis pa'o// nyi ma gsum pa bzhi pa'o// 'khrul 'khor snga ma bzhin du sbyar// ya ma k+She da me/ dbus kyi g.yas su 'khrul pa yin// rA ni ts+tsha ya/ ya ra ni yo/ yo Na ru do/ do sa tsa ra/ g.yas bsad nyi ma gnyis pa'o// phyi rim nyi ma gsum las med// yi ge zad pa'i bzhi tsho bzhi// de la ltos nas ru bzhir bshad// de ni 'khor lo bcas pa yi// de nas dkyil 'khor bca' gzhi ni// gnas ni dur khrod skyi g.ya' dang// shan dmar ri dang chu gling dang// rkang gcig brag nag ri bo dang// de la sogs pa drag por bsgrub// ro dang ro zas ro gos sogs// stag gzig g.yi spyang lung sde dang// ce spyang sbrang bu tre la sogs// de dag gnas sar dkyil 'khor bca'// sa ni lung shul dag nas blang// gru gsum rdo rje zla kham la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad dag gis bskor// sgo bzhi mu khyud bzhi dang ldan// gru gsum rtse la rdo rje bri// dgra bgegs ming rus cha re

gzug/ zla kham bca' lugs gsum gyi rten// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshed chen dgod// rtsibs brgyad phyogs su gshin rje'o// phyag mtshan be con la sogs dgod// sgo bzhi la sogs gnas rnams su// ci rigs par ni lha rnams dgod// las kyi kha tshar bstan pa ni// a kro bcu bdun sku yi sngags// hrIHSh+t+w-IHbcu bzhi thugs kyi sngags// kA la brgyad ni gsung gi sngags// sa ma bcu ni yon tan no// phrin las g.yon gyi bzhi snying dang// rtsa ba phyi nang gsang ba gsum// 'od zer brgyad dang ru bzhi'o// phyi nang gsang ba gnas gsum dang// gnam thus 'bru ded gnyis ka la// g.yon gyi las kyi dus su ni// a mo ka b+ha ma
