rak+ta mur tsa mA ra ya/ zhes pa g.yu spyang gdags par bya// g.yas bsad pa la ka ba ye// gdags bya phyi ma g.yon gyis 'dren// phyi nang gsang gsum 'od zer brgyad// ru bzhi rnams ni rang gzhung ste// 'bru ded g.yon bskor ru khugs chung// g.yas bskor 'bru ded ru khugs che// gnam gcig 'du chu ru ru g.yas bzhir ded// g.yas su nyer brgyad chen po che// las kyi kha skong ro langs sngags// oM du ru sa ma ra tsa ni/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig yang snying sngags// sngar bzhin du ni skrad bcur 'gros dang yang par bya// oM dur sa k+She ya ra ni// oM du+u ra sa yo na ru// oM du ra sa me do sa dza/ sngags mjug rnams ni sngar bzhin sbyar// ar gtad thabs kyi sgo bzhi ni// ya ma ra/ ya me do/ ya da yo/ ya k+She ya/ mtha' sdud sngar bshad bzhin du'o// ya ma rA dza sa do me/ me do ru Na yo da/ da yo ni rA ya k+She/ k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma/ mjug gsum sngar bzhin sbyar bar bya// ngan sngags mtsho bsdeb bdun bstan pa// dang po gzir ba'i las bya ste// yungs kar lcags phyes brab cing 'dis// oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka hrI shrI many+dzu kA la rU pa/ a mu kaM dgra bgegs hrIHk+Sh+w-IHka ba ye/ tr-i na a te a te/ khri'am 'bum gyis khugs chen bzlas// de yang chungs na/ oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka shrI many+dzu kA la rU pa dgra bgegs hrIHSh+t+w-IHa mu kA kri na u ne u ne u ne/ u u u/ siM da ye bya tsa ye/ du ru ye/ tsi tra ya/ ha la ye/ myags thum ril rbad/ stong ngam khri bzlas gzir bar bya// dbye ba gsum ni lha lnga ste// 'tshe byed mgon byed skyob par byed// grogs byed srung bar byed pa yi// yul lha pho lha dgra lha dang// ma yi lha dang srog gi lha// g.yag dgar yul lha'i rtags yin te// yugs sa'i zhabs ma bsregs la skrad// pe ti sha ya phaT zhes pa// hrIHSh+t+w-IHbcu pa de la gdags// zhang blon byung na pho lha ste// glang rog rwa bsreg sngar bzhin dbye// khwa spyang dgra lha'i rtags yin te// tshil chen khyi lud bsreg pas dbye// bud med ri dwags mo lha sman/ ra dang til nag rta bon po// bsregs te mo lha ngang

dbye bzlas// ting 'dzin mi gsal srog lhas bgegs// til nag gu gul sbyar bas bdug/ sngar gyi sngags kyi gang yin pa// phye zhig ces btags so sor dbye// rigs kyi gnyen dang dbye ba ni// ya ma me da k+She/ rA dza sa do/ ru Na yo ni/ ra ya ts+tsha ni/ pha khu bu dang nu la sogs// pho ti sha yang che ge mo phye phaT/ rus gnyan dang ni dbye ba'o// ya ma k+She da me zhes pa// g.yas bzlog ma dang sru mo dbye// dgug pa nyi ma dang po la// ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ nr-i A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ gnyis pa la ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ A yur+dz+nyA na A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ gsum pa la/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ ti ya nr-i A kar+Sha ya hUM dza/ bzhi pa la/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni/ rA ma ya/ rU pa skan+d+ha hUM dza/ zhes pas rim bzhin dgug par bya// bla rtags nyams su blang ba ni// sha ba'i bla dang lug dang gnyan// phag gi bla dang byi la dang// g.yag dang ba glang rta dang gla// ra yi bla zhes rab tu grags// srod la sha ba nam phyed gnyis// tho rang nyi ma phyed la ste// gnyis ni srod dang rta ni gung// ra ni nyi ma nub kar rgyu// de nas bla sngags bstan pa ni// ya ma rA dza sa do me// badzra kI li kI la sha tri sha tri/ pa ta kI la ya/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya me do ru/ Na yo da/ badzra kI la ya/ mu ru kI la ya/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya da yo ni/ ra ya k+She/ badzra kI la ya/ ku ru ku ru/ kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya hUM phaT/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ni mA ra ya/ oM kI li kI la ya/ thu ma mA ra ya thA/ kI li kI la ma ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+w-IHbi kri tA na na badzra kI li kI la ya// ruM ru ruM ru/ kI li kI la ya mA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+w-IHbi kri tA na na hUM phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya mA ra ba ra shu/ ta na ta na/ pa ra pa ta ya/ kI li kI la ya/ ma ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM hrIHSh+t+w-I bi kri NA na na hUM phaT/ badzra kI li kI la ya/ ro ti ro ti sho bar ya/ kI li kI la ya/ mA ra ya phaT/ bla rnams gzugs la phyir brab pa/ oM badzra kI li kI la ya/ shre tra ku kung la yang hUM phaT/ tri badzra mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de rnams kun la re re la// bdun bdun bzlas shing dus bzhir gdab// de nas thun gyis brdeg pa ni// byang nas lhor bltas sa gsum la// ling+ga 'am ni 'khor lor brdeg/ byang gi/ ya ma rA ni tsa ya k+She ya/ a mu ka che ge mo'i snying bam ril rbad ya/ nub kyi ya k+She ya ra mi yong ya/ a mu ka che ge mo sha trUM sa pa mu to rbad ya/ lho'i ya da yo Na/ ru do me ya/ a mu ka che ge mo ra ya/ khrag tu rbad ya/ shar gyi ya ma do sa dza rA ma ya/ a mu ka che ge mo mo ga ya khrag tu rbad ya/ thun brdeg pa'i sngags yin no// de nas phur pas gdab pa ni// gtso bo gshed kyi skur bsgoms la// oM nr-i mA ra ya/ mA ra du/ ya ma snying/ ya ma khrag tshal pa baM ril/ duM bu duM bu/ dgra bgegs mA ra ya dza/ oM nr-i mA ra ya n-i/ b+hin b+h+rig ma na yang ya ta ki ra tsa/

be tA li/ kro d+hI shwa rI/ snying khrag chod/ rtsa la 'jig/ khrag la rngubs/ kI li kI la ya/ baM ril rbad/ ya ma rA dza sa do me/ snying la me dun b+h+yo/ ya ma do ru Na/ yo da snying la me dun b+h+yo/ kI li kI la ya rbad ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya snying la dun b+h+yo/ kI li kI la ya rbad ya/ ya k+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya snying la dun b+h+yo/ kI li kI la ya rbad ya/ sngags dang phur pa'i thun gyis brdeg khyad par las kyi 'khrugs bsdeb ni// sde brgyad spyi bsgrub yang snying bgrang// rtags byung gsum mam lnga nas ni// gang byed bgrad ste bzlog pa'o// dang po rtsa ba'i yi ge gsum// de nas rtsa ba'i skur bskyed de// de yang mnan na lnga pa bzlas/ mtshan sngags sngon du yang byung 'di mchan bu gang gi yin ma nges// de nas rtsa ba'i snying po ste// kun gyi thun mong mthun par bsgrub// dbang du bsdu zhing dam tshig bstan// phrin las bcol nas dgug bya ste// bla dang rang gi snying po bzlas/ khugs nas gang yin las la sbyar// sngags 'khrugs sdebs kyi las bya ba// rtsa ba bskyed rgyud dgod par bya// srog gi snying po drang ba ste// mchod pa rtsa ba'i snying po'o// dbang du bya ba dbyangs yi ge// dmigs pa nye ba'i snying po'o// mi 'da' ba ni dam tshig ste// las gang bsgrub pa de nyid do// sngags kyi 'khrul ni rtsa ba dang// dam tshig las sbyar snying po dang// yang snying rnams ni mgo bor bgrang// mjug la gdab pa kun la brdeg/ grangs mang nyung ni rtags mtshan dang// dam tshig sngags dang dbyangs yig sngags// rtsa sngags mgo mjug khyab par gdab// 'khrul 'khor sngags kyis 'khrul pa ni// spyi dang so so gang bsgrubs kyang// phyi nang gsum du sku gsung thugs// nyin par ya yaM yang a hri yis drang// mtshan mo ma a e hi yang hri yis drang// de yang mtshan rtags bzang ngan sbyar// nye bar ma gyur sgrib sbyangs bshags// bskang dang bzlas pa drag tu bya// bya nag byung na tshur log rtags// myur du bzlog pa'i snying po bzlas// cho 'phrul che na gnyen po gtang// de yang las la mi 'gro na// dbang du bsdu zhing re re bgrang// grub rtags byung na dam tshig dang// dbang dang yang snying sum sbrel bzlas// nyan par gyur na phyag rgya bstan// dam tshig bsre zhing phrin las bcol// rak+ta stabs la srog snying phrog/ ldog med 'gyur nas bsad gso dang// dge sdig las kyi dbang bskur te// de nas gang bcol phrin las 'grub// las sngags bzlas shing phros pas sgrol// spyir bstan phan gnod gang byed kyang// rtsa ba dam tshig yang snying las// bzhi snying dril ba la sogs pa'i// gang dmigs de las 'phral rtags 'byung// mjug tu las sbyor mtha' bsdu ba// gong 'og gang 'os blang zhing spyad// dam tshig spyi dang bye brag dang// gzhi dang gnyen

bzhi la sogs pa// spyi gsum dgu drug tshangs par spyad// gdong mo bzhi yang stong pa'i gzhi la sogs pa la// las mtha' sum cu tshang ba dang// dgug dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang// dgar dang gtong dang rmongs pa dang// smyo 'bros la sogs las tshad spyad// mon mo shel mig ma yi sngags// cho 'phrul thun zor las la bsngags// bsad pa'i las dgu nyi shu gnyis// bcu bdun gsum sogs gang byed kyang// dang po rtsa bas sku bskyed bya// sku rdzogs bsgrub gzhung so so dang// gsum mam lnga ru bsnyen pa gzug/ las grub rtags byung las bzhi spyad// dam tshig rtsa ba las so so// yang snying las sngags dril la bzlas// ya ni gshin rje ma ma mo// ra ni srin po k+She gnod sbyin// ni ni drang srong sa sa bdag/ tri ni the 'gong oM ye shes// oM hUM phaT gsum lhun gyis grub// ya dang rbad ni gsad pa yin// dzaH'gugs mA ra ya gsad pa// mi 'byed ra glog sa'i bsgrub pa// swA hA mchod pa zhi rgyas te// a i u 'gugs dbang du sdud// e bskyed oM rgyas o khyab zhing// ya a hrIH ma i ti/ oM bA gI shwa ri muM/ a nr-i su tri pre du/ rnam par shes pa rlung 'dra ba'i// lcags kyu'i rnam pas bkug nas kyang// srin bu me khyer 'drar bcug ste// myur bul ma gsal 'byams pa dang// ngan dang 'dres dang lhag chad dang// sna tshogs g.yeng ba'i skyon spangs te// bsgrub par bya ba thabs yin no// 'khrul 'khor lde mig kha skong yin//// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang gi rgyal po'i skur gyur nas// skye bo 'dod chags can don du// gsung gi bsgrub pa rab bstan pa// dbang gi rgyal po rnam pa gnyis// 'khor ba pa dang mya ngan 'das// don dam kun rdzob snang ba la// gnas lugs gshis kyi rang bzhin dang// gdul bya thabs kyi snang ba'o// thog ma chos rnams ma lus kun// yang dag bden pa de bzhin nyid// ma nor ma bcos ma btsal ba// ma skyes ma 'gags ma dmigs pa'i// snying po byang chub sems kyi ngang// 'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos shing// yon tan gyis kyang ma reg pa// rnal ma rang byung mtshan nyid bral// brjod med bsam 'das chos kyi sku// byang chub chen po de nyid do// bsgrub tu med de mthong du yod// btsal du med de rtogs su yod// bsgrub tu med de snang du yod// gnas lugs don gyi rta mgrin yin// thabs la phyi nang gsang ba gsum// sgrub byed gang zag blau ldan yin// shes rab dman pa rnams kyis ni// bla ma bkur zhing dbang blangs te// gsang ba chen po'i snod rung bya// shes rab sgron ma'i don gyis bstan// gzhi lam 'bras bur yid ches bya// kun rdzob tsam du snang ba ni// dri med sems ni gtsang ma'i rgyu// blta ba ting 'dzin de yi rkyen// man+t+ra ma hA mu dra yin nam mun+d+ra

'bras bu bstan// gnas ni dben gnas bas mtha' sogs// nub tu phyogs pa'i nyams dga' zhing// dmar gsal zla ba kham pa 'dra// me tog dmar pos brgyan cing spras// dbang dang ldan pa'i rtags thob cing// yon tan phun tshogs gnas de ru// brtag dang bslang dang sbyang ba dang// gzung dang bdag gir bya ba yis// sa yi cho ga byin brlab bya// sa yi bdag po mnyes byas nas// bar chad bgegs bsal phyi mtshams bcad// bsod nams tshogs bsags las la 'bad// zhi ba'i las kyis bshags sbyang bya// phyi nang gsang ba'i rdzas bsags te// byin gyis brlab pa rgya cher bya// bsnyen pa'i mchod pa'i las gzhi la// tsan dan dmar dang rak+ta dang// dbang la shis pa'i byug cing brgyan// nub tu kha bltas gos dmar bgo/ ting 'dzin shes rab dang bcas pas// rgyud dag phyi nang gsang gsum ldan// tshad med bzhi ldan bsgom pa ni// gdod nas grub dang rtogs pa gnyis// dang po gzhir gnas rtogs pa bsgrub// rang byung ye shes nyi ma de// rnam rtog sprin bsgribs nyon mongs char// dug chur bab pa'i rgya mtsho las// bag chags gzhir bcas las rnams kyis// myu gu rgyas te phung po lnga// 'bras bur smin pa bzlog pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin ma nor de bzhin nyid// sems 'od ye shes rlung gi mthus// sprin sbyang mkha' la nyi ma shar// sems rtog ye shes chos skur snang// bde chen lhun grub kun tu 'od// stong nyid ye shes go cha yis// snying rje kun snang ting nge 'dzin// sems can sdug bsngal rgya mtsho de// ye shes nyi 'od 'bar bas bskam// thams cad snying por yongs bsgral te// las dang nyon mongs dri ma rnams// thugs rje chu bo'i rgyun gyis bcus// chags med pad+ma can gyi sa// longs spyod rdzogs sku 'gag pa med// gsal byed ye shes go cha rdzogs// de nyid rang la rang sems dngos// bskyed rgyu yi ge dmar gsal hrIH/ thong gshol gyis ni zhing la rlog/ 'od zer 'phro 'du'i rlung gis ni// bag chags rnam rtog ma lus gtor// rgyu yig 'khor lo tshogs chen la// thugs rje sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// bye brag rtogs pa'i go cha bgos// de las thugs kyis phyag rgya 'phros// 'bar ba'i me yis nyon mongs bsreg/ 'phro 'du byin rlabs shar ba yis// mngon par byang chub bla ma'i sa// mnyam pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// phyag mtshan 'phro 'du rdo rje'i sku// phung po gdos pa'i sgrib bcom nas// sku yi phyag rgya yongs rdzogs gsal// sa non rdo rje'i sku thob pas// nan tan ye shes go cha bgos// de dag thabs dang shes rab las// gtso bo yab yum skur snang ba// rgyal thabs spyi blugs rang rig rtsal// ma 'gags sbyangs pa thob byas la// 'bru gsum gyis ni dug

gsum sbyang// de las gnas pa'i sku gsung thugs// 'od spung gis ni las gnyis bsgrub// sbyangs shing mnyes pa de bsgrubs nas// sku ni gzi brjid sprin phung rol// gsung gi yan lag 'brug stong ldir// thugs ni spros bral lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'bru lnga 'phro 'du'i 'od kyis ni// rgyud sbyang mnyes pa'i las kyis ni// rigs lnga sangs rgyas ye shes lnga// rang bzhin grub pa'i dbang bskur bya// oM ma hA shUn+ya ta dz+nyA na A dar+sha dz+nya na/ pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na/ sa man+d+ha dz+nyA na/ kr-i t+yA nU Sh+ThAn dz+nyA na/ badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung// byin gyis brlab cing brda yis bskul// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer spros// gnyis med dgyes pa'i sbyor ba las// b+h+ruM 'phros pa las gzhal med khang// pho brang zla kham dbang gi dbyibs// 'khor lo khyams dang sgo bzhir bcas// so so'i gnas su gdan dang ldan// yab yum rigs kyi dbang chen bzhi/ khro bo khro mo sgo srung bcas// rang sngags ldan pas gsal bar blta// bka' sdod pho nyar bcas te dmigs// dam tshig rten la ye shes tshogs// spyan drang gnyis med bzhugs shing mchod// bstod dang bshags sbyang phrin las bcol// byer zhud le lo rab spangs pas// yi dam bcas pa'i bsnyen rdzogs nas// sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gzugs bsnyan bri// mchod pa bstar te bsgrub pa brtsam// mchog dang thun mong rtags thon nas// phrin las gang 'dod de dang sbyar// las kyi lhag chad ma lus bskang// mang nyung rgyun dang dus tshig su// dgongs nyams spyod lam bstan par sbyar// snang sems dbang gi snang ba 'byung// de ni phyi ltar bsgrub pa'o// nang sgrub shes rab ting 'dzin ldan// bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po'i sku// dngos su gsal rdzogs ngo bo yis// 'jig rten lha srin dregs pa can// rtsol med rang dbang nyid du bsdu// gzugs snang ba dang sgra grag pa// dran reg dbang gi sku gsung thugs// yon tan rdzogs te dgos 'dod 'byung// 'gro don phrin las bsam yas pa// bsam pa dang ni smon pas rdzogs// gsung mchog nang du bsgrub pa'o// gsang sgrub dmigs pa'i longs spyod kyis// yon tan ma lus rang la rdzogs// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i snang ba'o// shes rab chen pos thag bcad pa'i// 'dus ma byas te lhun gyis grub// mkhyen pa thugs rje dang bcas pa// chos sku nyid du 'grub pa ste// don dam kun rdzob snang ba yis// gzhan don mthar phyin sprul pa'i sku// ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyis// bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sa la sbyang// rtsol med lhun grub gzhan don spyad// 'bras bu gzhan nas mi btsal te// rang la gnas pa de nyid

yin// gzhan snang rnam 'phrul yan lag ste// rang sems dbang gi rgyal po la// bcos shing bsgrub tu ga la yod// las dang nyon mongs bag chags 'dam// skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma'i rigs// bsnyen sgrub yan lag nus pa'i sngags// gtso bor brjod pas gsung bsgrub yin/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po de// rang dbang lhun grub dbang gi rgyal// de dag gsang bar bstan pa'o// oM pad+mAn ta kr-ita ha ya grI ba e ka dza ti sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM A ra li dza/ phyi nang gsang ba'i khyad par las// gdul bya thabs kyi rim pa las// gso bsad phrin las dmigs dang sbyar// blta ba don gyis thag bcad cing// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas/ phrin las yan lag gtsor mi bsgrub// rtog pa'i ngo bo sems nyid du// snang ba thams cad dbyer med na// thun mong dngos grub dam pa yin// dbang gi dkyil 'khor rang la snang// rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang thob// rang rig bde bar gnas pa ni// dbang gi bsgrub pa'i mthar thug ste// mchog gi dngos grub rtsa ba yin// lta ba ting 'dzin bsgom ldan nas// spyod pas la dor rta skad gsum/ khams gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang// dam tshig rjes su bskul ba dang// drag po'i las 'jug dang po yin// rang rgyud che ba'i rngam skad dang// byin rlabs rdzas len brda skad dang// phrin las bsgrub pa'i gying skad gsum// lus ngag yid kyi brda gsum ste// se gol dang ni thal mo'i brda// spyugs pa dang ni ngu 'bod brda// lha dang bsgom pa'i brda rnams kyis// spyod pa'i rtog pa bsdus pa ste// gsung gi bsgrub pa dpag med kyang// ngag gi brda las byung ba ste// ngag gi lus la rab tu brten// bskyed pa'i rim pa bsnyen par bcas// sku dang gsung du dril te bsgrub// dgongs pa'i rta skad thengs gsum las// spyod pa bsnyen sgrub gsum sbyar te// rdzogs pa'i rim pa dpe yi chos// 'gros dgu dang ni skad bcu gsum// don rtags mtshon pa dang sbyar ba// sku gsung thugs su dril te bsgrub// gsang sngags bsnyen bsgrub rab rdzogs nas// dam tshig can rnams bskul ba dang// dregs pa'i dmag dpung gzhom pa dang// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams gdul ba dang// bskyed rdzogs gsum dang dgongs pa bzhi// rtsa ba yan lag gsung la bsdus// dbang mchog sgrub pa'i kha skong bshad//// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi phrin las bdag/ rab tu sgrub byed bla na med// blo dang ldan la nges par bstan// 'khor ba'i sa la snying brtser bskyed// mya ngan 'das la dgod pa dmigs// dge ba'i 'bras bu rdzogs par spyad// bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po bsal// dam tshig ldan la phrin las bcol// gnas kyi

dam pa nges par gzung// gzugs brnyan rten gyi pho brang brtsig/ bri dang bsgom pa mchog tu sbyar// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang// phrin las dmigs pa'i rten la dgod// dngos grub gnyis kyi dmigs pa bya// rim pa gnyis kyi gzhi bca' zhing// bsnyen pa gsum gyis mthar phyung ste// dam tshig lha dang gnyis med bsgrub// mtshan ma gsum gyis gtan la dbab// dus la bab na phrin las sbyar// bka' sdod pho nya bran la sogs// spro zhing gzugs la brtan par dbab// gab sbas kyis ni gsal ba gsung// mthong bar byas nas gnas bdun gdab// yab yum sras kyi sngags rnams dang// phrin las sngags kyis dbab par bya// gzer dang mnan pa'i tshul du spyad// don du ma gyur bskang bshags bya// spogs pa cho ga bdun gyis bya// las kyi lhag chad ma lus bskang// sdig pa sbyang zhing gnas nas spar// rtags kyis spro bar gyur pa na// dmigs pa gsum ni mtshon gyis bsgral// zhal zas bstab cing mtshon gyis gtub// gnan pa'i phrin las ma nor spyad// bka' sdod pho nya mnyes bya'i phyir// gtor ma rim pa bzhin du dbul// ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang// dkyil 'khor bsdus te spyod lam bsgom// bsrung zhing rtog pa gzhom pa'i phyir// go cha bgo zhing gnas su btab// mdo sde bklag cing mchod rten bzhengs// snying rjer ldan pas rab tu gsang// brnag pa kho na nyid du bya// gzhan yang thugs kyi gsang chen 'di// gnod cing gdug pa myur bsgral phyir// gzhung dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// tshad med rnam pa bzhi ldan pas// bar chad med par bsgrub pa'i phyir// zangs lcags tsher ma can gyi shing// dbang dang mngon spyod gnyis kyi rgyu// sor brgyad dang ni bcu gnyis tshad// mgo dang skyed pa bcu drug dngos// zur gsum chu srin kha nas dbyung// yab yum sras kyi grangs dang mnyam// byin gyis brlab pa tshul bzhin bya// dmigs pa mi brjed gzungs dang sbrag/ rtags dang ldan pa'i bsnyen pa bya// dkyil 'khor zla gam gru gsum bcas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgo khyams mdzes// sgrub rdzas yan lag ma lus dgod// dbang byin brlab kyis gzi byin bskyed// rang gi gnas su bzhugs su gsol// nye bar byed pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// stong nyid snying rje'i snying po hUM// sems kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba lnga// phyi nang gsang bar rang sngags 'phro// rten gyur gdan dang bcas pa la// 'bar ba'i sku mchog gtso dang 'khor// don dam kun rdzob tshul du byung// zhe sdang rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// sprul pa bye ba 'bum dang bcas// rang sngags phyag mtshan dang bcas pa// bran dang bka' nyan pho nya'i

tshogs// sprul pa dang bcas phrin las mdzad// gnod cing 'gal ba myur du sgrol// dmigs pa drag po'i pho brang du// 'gugs 'dren sdom sgrol pho nya yis// ting 'dzin gsal bas gnas su dbab/ khros pa'i phrin las thams cad brtsam// gzugs phung lhag ma pho nyas rol// rdul phran tsam yang ma lus bsam// de la rang dang dmigs pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum gsal ldan pas// drag shul dpag med spyad gyur na// rdo rje'i brag kyang 'joms par 'gyur// rigs ldan phung po smos ci dgos// las mjug 'phang bsreg gnan pas bsdu//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// mngon rdzogs yab kyis dbang bsgyur te// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag nyid las// brten pa rten dang bcas par bskyed// bdag nyid thig ler mnyam sbyar nas// rnam pa gsum gyi ting 'dzin bsgom// dmigs med bsam 'das rnam par dag/ ma skyes chos kyi dbyings su snang// snying rje nam mkha'i ngo bo las// blang dor med par kun tu snang// med pa'i ngang la mngon gsal ba'i// dbyings las shar ba'i yi ge hUM// bdag gi dbugs las gyur pa yi// 'og phyogs rlung gi sa bon brten// bdag gi brag las gyur pa yi// de steng chu yi sa bon brtan// bdag gi sha las gyur pa yi// de steng sa yi snying po yin// bdag gi drod las gyur pa yi// me yi sa bon phyogs kun khyab// bdag gi sems kyi ngo bo las// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dbyings las 'byung lnga rgyu yis bskyed// mkha' la rlung brten 'byung ba lnga// bdag nyid du ni gsal ba las// sa bon las ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// b+h+rUM las thod rlon gzhal yas khang// ka zhu thod skam ka gdan byas// lha rnams gdung bres klu rnams phyam// gza' rnams kha bad rgyu skar dral// klu rgyal rigs bzhi sbrul nag brgyan// 'khor lo sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// rtsibs brgyad pa ru rab tu gsal// pad+ma'i sa bon 'od kyis sbyang// 'dab brgyad pa ru de nyid snang// 'od kyis mtha' dbus rab tu gsal// gdan gyi sa bon gyis sbyangs nas// brnag pa'i dri za grul bum dang// klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa// byi chings bsnol ba'i gdan steng du// de stangs pho mo bcu bzhi bsgyel// dkyil du rgya mtsho thod phreng gnyis// shar dang nub tu mgo bsnol ba'o// rdo rje khros dang dge rje mo// shar gyi phyogs su bsnol te gding// rin chen khros dang ral ga cig ma// lho yi phyogs su bsnol te bzhag/ pad+ma khros dang dmar mo gnyis// nub kyi phyogs su mgo bsnol ba'o// rnam 'phrul ser mo las mkhan gnyis// byang gi phyogs su bsnol ba'o// rgyan gyi rgyal mo me yi phyogs// dbyings phyug ma ni bden bral phyogs// bdag nyid ma ni rlung lha'i phyogs// (24)

phyogs// gcig pu ma ni dbang ldan phyogs// rim gro bskyed cing 'khor rnams mnan// b+ha ga bcu bzhi'i gdan steng na// bdag nyid byang chub thig le las// snying po ye shes mngon du shar// byed pa po ni kun tu bzang// rnam par thar pa'i dbu ldan zhing// ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// bdag gi gzugs kyi ngo bo las// rnal 'byor nyid bzhi bde mchog ma// bya ba mo ni chos kyi dbyings// chos nyid rtag pa thugs kyi dkyil// 'od zer lnga po rtse nas 'phro// 'byung ba lnga yi zhal mnga' zhing// ye shes drug gi phyag rgya can// phyogs mtshams gnon pa'i zhabs brgyad kyis// ma bgrod par ni srid par khyab// dus bzhi 'char ba'i b+ha ga la// skye 'gag med pa'i klong du thim// srid pa gsum gyis sku brgyan cing// spyi dpal mchog la 'di skad gsungs// hUM ye shes snying po bla na med// bla med khrag 'thung dpal gyi dpal// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' klong kun gyi gter gyi dbyibs// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro kun gyi thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs dam skong// bcom ldan bde ba'i longs spyod 'di// 'dzum mdangs bcas pas dbul lags kyis// dgyes pa'i rdo rje gsor nas kyang// re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phob// mnyam bzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// 'byung gnas skye 'gro bde bar dbab// rin chen dkyil 'jam klong yangs su// spyi dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag/ re skong bdud rtsi'i char chen phob// hUM b+ha ga pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'dab brgyad pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ldan// phyi lcags nang bstan sgo bar bcas// rin chen dkyil 'khor gdan btings nas// bla med rdzu 'phrul lde mig gis// lcags khrol lcags phye gdan la bzhugs// rin chen brtsegs pa'i gwa'u ru// bla med khrag 'thung sku bsil nas// srid gsum 'gro ba'i bag chags bkrus// hUM mi dmigs pa la dmigs pa che// ma chags pa la bde ba che// thar pa de ba'i b+ha ga'i dbyings// blang dor med pa'i klong yangs su// srid pa'i bag chags bkru ba'i phyir// spyi dpal bla na med pa yi// gsang ba'i don ldan lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// ye shes chu bos khrus chen mdzod// oM thabs las byung ba dbyings kyi lam// dbyings las thabs chen bla na med// dbyings dang ye shes sbyor ba las// bdud rtsi chen po'i char chen spro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba mnyes par mchod// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i tshogs su spro// 'gro drug sgrib sbyong phyag rgya che// mu stegs bdud 'dul za byed che// dbang po gsal byed ye shes sgron// 'dod chags byang chub sems su spro// byang chub

sems kyi thig le las// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas na// thams cad thig le nyid kyi ngang// gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che// g+hi sa mu hUM ha/ dza la raM pa ha/ b+hi sha san+ti ha// ma hA laM te ha/ oM badzra kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+mar+ya hUM hUM/ oM badzra shIn+taM pad+ma ka ru ting b+h+yo/ oM mu tri ni b+h+yo/ oM shan+t+ri ni b+h+yo/ b+ha ga dun tri ni b+h+yo/ kha mun dan tri ni b+h+yo/ oM badzra sUr+ya bi to a to ye/ oM badzra pad+ma b+he to ye/ oM badzra kha rag b+hi to a to ye/ oM badzra sring 'gro bi to a to ye/ oM badzra a keM a keM b+h+yo/ oM badzra ta keM ta keM b+h+yo/ oM badzra ni la ni la b+h+yo/ oM badzra lan+ta lan+ta b+h+yo/ oM badzra dza traM mu rang sha/ badzra kha rag snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha kha mun+t+ra saM kha mun+t+ra ba rak+sha b+h+yo/ pra ga ra tiSh+Tha b+h+yo/ pra gi beng gi shaM b+h+yo/ b+h+yo hUM ka ri ka/ ba rod da rod/ ni la chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsan+d+ha/ ma gu+u ra ga to/ ting saM ting saM b+h+yo/ e A ra li/ bu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rak+sha trag rak+sha b+h+yo/ a ting b+h+yo/ byi ting b+h+yo/ su ting b+h+yo/ mun ting b+h+yo/ shAn+ting b+h+yo/ dun+tiM b+h+yo/ har ting b+h+yo/ grub ting b+h+yo/ te baM b+h+yo/ a par d+ha la b+h+yo/ d+ha la du na b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma ya b+h+yo/ nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhan dang sbyar// gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le che// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// 'byung ba lnga yi 'phro 'du byung// bdag gi sa yi ngo bo las// sa bon las ni sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bstan ma sel ma'i mchog/ mi 'jigs sa yi dbu gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// dngas ma'i sbyin pa rtag tu gtang// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dang ba'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul bzhi yi zhabs dag gis// sa bdag gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// bdag gi rlung las gyur pa yis// sa bon las ni skur bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis/ khams gsum thig ler sgo 'byed cing// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las// sbyin pa chen po rtag tu gtang// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu baiDUr+ya// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnod sbyin gnon// bdag gi chu las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems ma'i mchog/ dbu gsum dug gsum dbyings su 'dul// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya 'gyed// dmar mo dbang gi na bzas brgyan// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum chu bdag gnon// bdag gi me las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro 'od gsal sems ma'i mchog/ stobs ldan dbu gsum srid gsum sbyang// phyag drug dngas ma'i longs spyod 'gyed// rin chen sngon mo'i na bzas brgyan// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon// bdag gi bkrag las sku bskyed pa// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i

mchog/ rdo rje'i dbu gsum skye 'gro sgrol// phyag drug sku mdog sna tshogs la// btso ma gser gyi na bza' gsol// zhabs bzhi brgya byin gdan la bzhugs// bdag gi gsang ba'i thig le las// hUM dang mUM las sku bskyed pa// gtso bo'i gdan du 'khor rnams gsal// snying rtsa dbu ma'i cho 'phrul yin// g.yas g.yon gser nyi 'od chen las// bde 'gro nyi zla thod phreng gnyis// snying rtsa phyogs bzhi'i dwangs ma las// gsang ba sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// nang gi rtsa bzhi kha dog bzhi// khros ma bzhi dang dgyes sde bzhi// lte ba pho ba'i rtsa las ni// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms bskyed// rgyungs pa snod kyi rtsa drug las// e ka dza Ti spun drug bskyed// srog rtsa zangs kyi sbu gu las// re ma ti ni mched gsum byung// bshad kha rlung 'doms rtsa gnyis las// nam mkha'i rgyal dang spyi 'gro ma// mgrin pa dbang po'i rtsa bdun las// las kyi srin mo bdun du bskyed// lag pa g.yas g.yon stod rtsa bzhi// sring mo bzhi ru bskyed pa'o// smad rtsa la ni dmag gi rgyal// rgyungs pa smad kyi rtsa las ni// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad po// rang gi gnas la bskyed par bya// byed pa po dang bya ba mo// srid pa'i sngon du byung ba yin// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo lnga// sangs rgyas nyid las shin tu bgres// skyed pa'i rje mo bcu bzhi ni// pha dang med spun bcu gsum// ma mo mkha' 'gro lnga bcu lnga// byang chub sems kyi thig le las// rol pa'i khyad par cir yang snang// bdag nyid che ba rab tu bsgom// ye shes thig le chen po dang// gsang chen bde ba'i lam mchog dang// man ngag rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dbyings kyi yum chen drug po ni// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// 'od chen kha dog sna tshogs kyis// srid pa bde 'gro chen mo dang// nyi zla thod phreng gdan du gding/ khros pa'i dbang chen ma mo bzhi// chags pa'i gdan du gding bar bya// srid pa'i dngas ma brgyad po las// sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi po dang// thugs kyi dgyes sde ma bzhi rnams// mngon sum gdan du gding bar bya// bde chen gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// srid pa chags byed cha snyoms mnan// srid pa rang lugs gnyug ma yis// e ka dza ti spun drug mnan// chags pa'i dbang chen dmar mo yis// 'dod khams gtso mo spun gnyis mnan// srin mo spyi yi mdor bsdus kyis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis mnan// dbang mo spyi yi mdog gsal gyis// 'jig rten srin mo bdun rnams mnan// g.yas g.yon thabs dang shes rab kyis// dmag gi rgyal mo spun bzhi mnan// srid pa 'jug byed phra mo yis// dbang mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad mnan// rtsa dang lus la gnas pa de// shi sa bstan phyir gdan du

bting// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas snying nas drangs// drag po'i sngags kyis gnan par bya// hUM mu kha le ha ha he he hUM phaT nan// kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga shan+t+ri nan// sUr+ya pad+ma kha rag sring 'gro nan// mu tri shan+t+ri dan+t+ri dun+t+ri nan// ta keM ta keM ni la tan+t+ra nan// ma ma hUM b+h+yo nan// ma ma duSh+tAn/ pad+ma rak+ta/ pra be sha nan/ nan phaT/ mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i rtsa gnas la// cha mthun ma mo rnams bsdus te// tsita nan/ tra ta phaT/ zhes pa'i drag sngags brjod pa yis// che mchog lugs kyi he ru ka'i// ral gri rtsa lam nang du zhugs// rtsa sul gnas pa'i ma mo yi// snying gshags khrag chen mngon rdzogs kyi// ljags kyi steng du phul ba yis// mngon rdzogs mdangs dang ldan par gyur// ma mo rnams ni myos shing 'thibs// bdag gi snying khrag zhal du rngub// lce steng bzhag pa phyi rol yin// che ba'i nga rgyal 'di skad bskyed// hUM nga ni khrag 'thung kun gyi rje// nga ni ma mo kun gyi yab// nga ni srid gsum snying rje'i mchog/ nga ni mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso// thams cad kun gyi snying khrag bdag/ khyed kyi snying khrag nga la yod// nga yi dbang du gyur par gyis// dza hUM ti baM ma ma b+h+yo ma ma b+h+yo// ru lu ru lu rag mo b+h+yo/ gdan gyi sku rnams bsgyel nas ni// bdud rtsi chen po khar blugs te// oM badzra a mr-i ta tsit+ta hUM/ de nas gdan las bslang byas te// sgrub pa'i las rnams byed par bsgom// rang lus rtsa yi dkyil 'khor la// ma mo las kyi shi sa bstan// de nas ma mo thams cad kun// 'jig rten snang ba'i lugs bshad pa// nam mkha' stong pa'i yi ge las// mthing nag gru gsum yi ge e// ljang nag 'bar ba'i sa bon las// rdo rje rgya gram dkyil 'khor bskyed// chags pa dbang gi sa bon las// rba klong 'khrugs pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// thugs rje 'bar ba'i sa bon las// sreg byed 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// snyoms mdzad byams pa'i sa bon las// rab 'byams brdal ba'i gzhi ru chags// zhe sdang rol pa'i sa bon las// ri rab brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor snang// yon tan 'bar ba'i sa bon las/ khong seng srog gi ljon shing bskyed// e waM ma ya'i sa bon las// gling bzhi gling phran rim pa bzhin// yon tan gser gyi ri bdun dang// snying rje rol pa'i mtsho bdun ldan// sprul pa las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ri rab de la bskor te gnas// nyi zla gza' dang skar ma rnams// ri rab de la bskor zhing rgyu// ri rab g.yu yi bum rtse la// 'khor 'das chos dbyings rgyal mo ste// tshangs pa kun sgrol tsit+ta brgyad// yum gyi zhabs brgyad bgrad pas brdzis// dpag bsam shing dang bad shing la// a 'bras skyong gi sgo lnga pa// shing lo pad+ma lnga lnga gnas// yum lnga sku yi phyed nub bzhugs// ri rtse bum pa'i shing mtshams

na// brgya byin rkang pa g.yas g.yon las// gser gdug nyi zla'i phreng bas bskor// de steng rgya mtsho thod phreng bzhugs// ri rab bum pa'i lcog bzhi la// b+h+riM gi ri ti'i pho mtshan te// sgo gnas bzhi yi cho 'phrul las/ khros pa'i dbang chen bu mo bzhi// brkyang bskum zur gyi stabs kyis bzhugs// ri rab lcog bzhi'i phyi rol na/ khyab 'jug 'khor lo'i lte ba la// bdud rtsi'i chu mig bzhi skyes par// rgyal chen bzhi dang dgyes sde bzhi/ khrus byed phyed nub tsam du bzhugs// ri rab bum pa'i gru bzhi na// stobs bzang ser skya'i snying ga na// sbas pa'i ma chen bzhi po ni// gan rkyal gnas te bdud rtsi sku// rje mo 'jig rten snang lugs yin// dpag bsam shing gi sked pa la// phya mkhan pho bar chags byed dang// cha snyoms gnyis ni lto sbyor gnas// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// ka la yak+sha'i og mtshams na// nam mkha'i rgyal mo spun gnyis bzhengs// dpag bsam shing gi rtse mo la// tshangs pa dkar po'i lag pa la// dza ti spun gnyis mnyam gzhag sdod// ri rab rmang gi 'gram bzhi la// sa bdag phag gi lte ba na// gru 'degs bzhi ni gyad kyi tshul// ri bdun rol mtsho bar pa la// phung byed klu bdun nor bu'i gnas// srin mo bdun ni lding thabs 'phyo// pad+ma shing gi sum cha na// mgo med snying la bgegs kyi rigs// stong phrag brgyad cu'i cho 'phrul 'gyed// 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo gsum// de steng brkyang bskum brjid pa'i tshul// phyi rim bang rim bzhi po la// rgyal chen bzhi yi spyi bo na// pad+ma brgyad la sring bzhi dang// dmag dpon mo bzhi 'gying pa'i tshul// dpag bsam shing gi rtsa ba na// keng rus khros pa'i gdan steng na// ri brag gru gsum 'bar ba la// bka' sdod nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas// mdor na ri rab rgya mtsho dang// gling bzhi lha yi gnas gzhan rnams// ma lus srid pa'i ma mo yi// rgyud dang lam dang 'bras bur snang// 'jig rten snang ba'i tshul yin no// de nas gsang ba gab pa'i gter// bdag nyid che mchog lus gnas pa'i// rkang pa rlung sogs 'khor lo bdun// lus kyi ljon shing rim pa la// yum drug rje mo dman mo dang// ye shes sbas pa'i ma mo sogs// brgyad cu rtsa gsum rtsa la rdzogs// gzhung lam srog rtsa bsgril ma la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rtsa 'gyur bas// bshang kha rlung dang 'doms su me// gzhu dang drag po'i tshul du gnas// rgyal mo spun gnyis g.yas g.yon rtsa// lte ba'i gzhi rtsa kha sprod la// srid pa chags byed rgyal mo gnas// pho ba dngas snyigs 'byed rtsa la// thig le dang bcas nang du bskor// zas 'ju bas ni cha snyoms ma// lam rgyud lnga yi bag chags ni// sbyong byed snying gi 'khor lo la// rang gi sa bon phrin las bzhi// kun gzhi

yid sgo nyon mongs lnga// a sogs sbyangs pa'i yon tan bdun// dbang po bzhi po mi dbang bzhi// rnam shes sbas pa'i ma mo bzhi// ma bu sbyor ba'i tshul du gnas// snying gar 'khor 'das bskyed pa'i gzhi// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' 'gro ma// rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga yi rtsa// 'od zer rtse la rang bzhin gnas// mar rtse'i rtsa la mu kha le// gser mdung nyi ma'i 'od chen gnyis// phra men ma dang thod phreng gnas// nang gi 'od la dgyes sde bzhi// mgrin pa longs spyod cha snyoms ma// yan lag bdun gyi kha sprod dbus// srin mo bdun ni bza' btung spyod// rang bzhin bcu drug kha sprod la// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// za byed ma mo yul longs spyod// bde chen 'khor lo byang chub sems// tshangs pa'i gdung bzhi rgya gram bris// rtsa 'dab so gnyis kha sprod gnas// srin mo'i yang po'i gnyen po sbas ma bdun// srog rtsa rgyu byed sked pa la// snying rje pad+ma gar dbang gnyis// 'dod khams gtso gsum 'dud pa'i tshul// byang chub sems lam rtsa stod la// dza ti spun drug gnon pa'i tshul// rtsa sman mkha' 'gro nyi shu brgyad// yan lag bzhi la sring mo bzhi// smad la dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi// gsang bzhi tshul gnyis mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// chos kyi mkha' 'gro sna tshogs pa'o// snying nang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la// rtsa ba mi shigs rdo rje'i dbyibs// bye brag lnga yi 'od 'bar ba// thogs med rtsa ba 'byung lnga'i gtso// kun bzang las ni rgyal mo lnga// rig pa las ni dngas ma lnga// kun gzhi sems rtsa sgo lnga'i rtsa// gzhi rtsa 'dzin pa'i rtsa yin te// dug lnga me lce lnga yi rtse// ma rig pa yi rtsa ba las// 'gro ris sa bon lnga yi rtse// rig pa ma 'gags rtsa ba las// ye shes chen po'i rtse mo lnga// mngon rdzogs yab kyi rtsa ba las// rigs lnga'i bde chen rtse mor gsal// 'byung ba lnga ni srid pa'i bskos// rgyal mo lnga ni sprul par shar// gsang ba'i gter du dngas ma lnga// yon tan sgo lnga'i rnam shes yin// 'khor ba skyed pa nyon mongs lnga// 'bras bu 'gro ba drug tu snang// 'dul byed gnyen po ye shes lnga// 'bras bu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// snying rtsa gcig la 'dab ma lnga// de yi rtse mo brgyad du sbyor// nyi zla kha sbyor zhal gyi dkyil// hUM mUM bcud kyi thig le gnas// yum drug rje mo bcu bzhi'i gnas// rang bzhin thig le 'od gsal ba// ye shes ye nas rgyal bar gnas// dngas ma lnga las rgyal mo lnga/ kha dog lnga la nyi thod phreng// gser nyi phra men rgya mtsho ste// shes rab snying rje'i bdag nyid can// rnam shes bzhi la ma bzhi sbas/ khros pa'i bu mo 'od rim la// chos kyi 'khor lo nyi shu la'o// steng 'og dkar dmar thabs shes rab// rta mgrin dbang gi sgo bsrung ma bzhi yang zhing// 'byung ba lnga zhig 'od

du zhu// ma mo lnga bcus gsang dbang bskur// rnam shes lnga la ye shes lnga// dug lnga'i rtsa ba dbang gis bcad// 'gro ba lnga yi bag chags sbyangs// gsal ba'i ye shes kha dog ldan// pho brang rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dbu la 'dus pa'i yab yum rdzogs// mdun rgyab gser gyi nyi ma la// phra men ma dang thod phreng nyid// 'joms byed bag chags gnas sbyangs pa// sbas ma bzhi dang khros ma bzhi// thod phreng dgyes sde ma bzhi'i ngang// mkha' 'gro nyi shu'i dkyil 'khor la// hUM sras drug gi longs spyod mdzad// dbang gi rgyal pos sgo bsrung zhing// rgyu gcig dbyings nas phyung nas ni// 'od zer sngags kyi phreng ba yis// snying phugs zhal nas sngags kyi 'od// bzhu brtul gyis ni thig ler gyur// srog snying rten yang de la bsdu// rlung dang ra~M gyis sgra phyung nas// thig le skye med dbyings su thim// bdag nyid la bzla'i don du bya// 'di ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// yon tan gab pa'i gter du bshad// bshad lugs 'di ldan rnal 'byor ni// ma mo thugs kyi dngos grub thob// des na snying gi lung zhes bya// de nyid las ni rnal 'byor pa// rnam par grol ba'i lugs bshad pa// chos nyid ye shes rang byung dang// yon tan bzhi bsdus grub pa'i rtsa// 'khor lo bdun dang rtsa ba'i srog/ rtsa brgyad stong dang 'khor lo brgyad// nyes rno la yang/ po gnyis dang rdzogs pa'i lung// rim gyis bshad dang bye brag dbye// blta bsgom spyod 'bras 'khor 'das kyi// sa bon so so'i gnas su byung// 'khor 'das sa bon hUM rim spro// rtsa thig bzhi ldan dkyil 'khor na// thig le skye 'chi'i sdug bsngal spong// shrI ma hA su kha badzra bo d+hi hUM ho/ 'bru gcig gtad ltas yang spyod rnam bzhi la// sku gsung thugs su thad chod de// chags sdang nga rgyal phrag dog gi/ gnas bsgyur bsgom bsgrub rnam pa las// gti mug chen po yang dag nyid// sku lnga mngon shar gsung lngar grags// thugs lnga yon tan phrin las lnga// rang gzhan lhun gyis grub par snang// rang gnas gnyis med ye shes dang// mngon rdzogs rgyal po che ba'i mchog/ dpal 'bar yum dang gnyis su med// snang stong gnyis med ye shes la// chos kyi 'khor lo 'bru bcu po// sna tshogs rig pa'i cho 'phrul rten// gsang ba'i gdung bzhi dgyes sde bzhi// 'khor lo nang gi rtsa bzhi po// rang rig ye shes rgyal po la// sems can chen po lnga yi khri// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul kun gyis mchod// dpal gdeng gsang rdzogs bcu bcu bzhi// mi gnas bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ldan// 'dab brgyad dbus na rtse lnga pa// rgya gram phra bkod sa bon las// 'bru bcu don gyi phreng bar ldan// gnas 'dzin la phab 'od 'phro 'dus// 'bur bzhi mdzes pas thugs rgyud

bskul// gtso chen de la gu h+ya bzung// lam du bde ba rgyas par bya// 'od zer 'jig rten khams su spro// yul gnyis ma grub stong par gsal// 'od kyi 'khor lo gnas bzhi la// 'dab bzhi'i lte ba rdo rjer bcas// yab yum mtshon pa'i snying pos bskor// 'od zer gnyis kyis brgyud bskul bas// 'khor ba'i sa bon so sor sbyang// 'dus pas sna tshogs gcig tu gyur// rlung dang lhan cig phyi rol 'phros// rang lus 'dzin pa'i snang ba sbyangs// snang la rang bzhin ma grub pa'i// dbyings kyi yum chen bco lnga po// thugs 'od btso ma'i gser la bsdu// rlung ni skye med a la bsdu// dwangs ma'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams kun// rig pa'i rtsal gyi thig ler bzhu// smin byed stobs kyi ma la bsdu// rtsa ba'i mkha' 'gro lnga bcu drug/ bsdu thabs leb rgan 'bar bar bzhu// stobs kyis 'dzin pa'i til la bsdu// hUM chen 'bar bas ri rab bsregs// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal// ma mo rdzogs pa gsum ldan pas// rten gyi gang zag rang rgyud 'grol// rnal 'byor thugs su gab pa grol// rnal 'byor grol lugs zhes su bshad// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ khro mo bzhi bcur bcas pa yi// drag po'i sngags su bshad pa ni// khru brgyad pa yi dkyil 'khor du// a yi 'phro 'dus stong par sbyang// rdo rje phur bus bsrung bar bya// byang chub sems kyis chag chag gdab// ba su ta yis thig gdab cing// ha lngas sbyangs pa'i tshon gyis bri// dbus su thig bzhi'i le tshe lnga// phyi rol 'khor lo rtsibs chen bzhi// rtsibs ri'i steng du rtsibs brgyad pa// rin po che yi phur pa rnams// rang rigs 'khor lo'i rtsibs la dgod// phyi rol drag po sngags kyi rdzas// ji ltar bsngags pa bzhin du dgod// de nas stong pa'i rang nyid las// snying rje sprul pa'i ye shes shar// rgyal ba'i thugs kyi snying por 'gyur// e gzugs ye shes chen po ste// yaM dbyibs shes rab bdag nyid can// baM klong snying rje'i ngo bo ste// raM 'bar brtson 'grus nyid du ldan// laM ni bsam gtan brdal ba'i sa// keM ni zhe sdang 'joms mdzad brtsegs// b+h+ruM las sna tshogs gzhal yas khang// oM ni gcod pa chen po las// ba las chags pa med pa 'byung// a ni gsal ba'i bdag nyid rgyu// me ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid rgyu// ru ni 'joms pa'i yul du bsdogs ston yang// hUM dang mUM las yab yum gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya hUM dza/ rnam thar dbu ldan stong pa'i phyag rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang thabs kyi gshog/ dur khrod brgyad du ldan par bskyed// yab yum gsang gnas byin brlabs nas// mkha' la gsang ba'i yum bzhi bskyed// le tshe bzhi la gsang ba'i yum// 'di skor sngags rnams ma phye sor bzhag pa ra

ma Na phaT/ dkar mo nyi ma'i gwa'u can// shar gyi le tshe dag la'o// rat+na s+pha ra Na phaT/ ser mo rin chen 'od 'bar lho// pad+ma gar b+ha ya phaT/ dmar mo pad+ma'i bcud 'dzin nub// ga bi tra tha phaT/ ljang gu rdo rje rgya gram byang// shar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la// spyi dpal bcu yi khro bo ste// badzra gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ dkar po li yi rgyal por shar// rat+na gar b+ha kI la ya phaT// 'jigs byed rin chen 'dzin pa lho// pad+ma gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ gar dbang dmar po pad 'dzin nub// karma gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ gar mdzad ljang gu rgya gram byang// mo traM mo tri yang kI la ya phaT/ srog 'od ser skya me 'od can// ka ru gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ srin po 'joms byed mche 'dzin dmar// lo ka kI la ya phaT/ skyob byed rgyal sngon ba dan can// b+ha du kI la ya phaT/ 'jigs skyabs ljang skya thod dbyug 'dzin// karma kI la ya phaT/ rim bzhin mtshams kyi rtsibs la'o// gsod byed mthing ga zhing dbyug 'dzin// yak+Sha kI la ya hUM phaT/ ngur 'jigs mthing ga spu gri thogs// sarba duSh+t+wAM phaT/ gnyis char dbus kyi lte ba la'o// 'jigs byed dkar po nyi ma'i 'od// sa shrI phaT/ shar gyi sgo yi phyogs su'o// sngon mo chu yi 'khor lo can/ ka he phaT/ chu yi dkyil 'khor lho yi sgor// dmar nag me 'khor nub tu'o// ljon sha phaT/ 'bar ba dud kha rgya gram can// byang gi sgo la bsgom par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang bskyed bya ba// gser bur yum gyi mkha' nas gdon// rak+Sha kI la ya phaT/ dmar nag sbrul 'dzin gnod mdzes rgyal// lho yi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o// bi dza ya bi sha kI la ya hUM phaT/ snang byed dkar po 'khor lo can// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la'o// bi shwa gu Na kI la ya hUM phaT/ yon tan snying po khro bo che// ser po rin chen 'dzin pa lho// te sha kI la ya phaT/ dmar bo gzi ldan 'bar ba ni// 'das kyi bing chen nub phyogs rtsibs// ke sha kI la ya phaT/ lhun grub snang byed ljang nag mchog/ thod phreng 'dzin pa byang gi rtsibs// bi sha kI la ya phaT/ me 'khor dmar po kha T+wAM 'dzin// be shi kI la ya phaT/ za byed brtul zhugs ral gri can// hi sha kI la ya phaT// skyod byed rlung gi ba dan can// sngo sangs rlung rgyal sbrul zhags thogs// du she kI la ya phaT/ gzi 'bar ljang skya gri gug can// 'di dag rim bzhin rtsibs mchan la'o// ka sha phaT/ rta mgo lcags kyu dkar po shar// pha ga sha phaT/ phag mgo zhags pa sngon po lho// rung hi phaT/ dred mgo lcags sgrog dmar po nub// rak+Sha gri phaT/ spyang mgo ljang gu dril bu byang// rim bzhin sgo bzhi bsam par bya// nub kyi 'khor lo la bskyed pa// hUM kA ra kI la ya hUM phaT/ hUM bde chen dkar ser thod 'dzin dbus// bi dza ya phaT/

rnam rgyal dkar po ni le can// nI la daN+Da phaT/ dbyug pa sngon po be con can// ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ gshin rje gshed ser zhags pa can// a tsa la nA tha phaT/ mi g.yo dmar ser ral gri can// ha ya grI ba phaT/ rta mgrin dmar mo thod sprul can// nub kyi 'khor lo rim bzhin bsam// phyogs bzhi yin te mtshams bzhi ru// a pa ra dzi ta tiSh+Tha phaT/ 'dod rgyal ljang gu dbyug tho can// a mr-i ta phaT/ bdud rtsi 'khyil ljang rgya gram can// trai lo kya phaT/ khams gsum ljang skya sdigs mdzub can// ma hA pa la phaT/ stobs chen dud pa gtun shing 'dzin// de dag bsgom zhing sgo bzhi ru// 'jigs byed khro bo bzhi bskyed pa// dza la phaT/ dkar po khra mgo sder mo thogs// ke ru ru phaT/ skya ka'i mgo can sprul 'dzin sngo// rig sha phaT/ bya rog mgo can dung dmar 'dzin// bak+Sha ti phaT/ pu shud mgo can ljang gri gug/ phyogs bzhi'i sgo bzhir rim par bsam// byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// phrin las rdzogs pa'i khro bcu bskyed// lcags phur la rten mkha' la gdon// badzra ta kr-ita kI la ya phaT/ b+hi nu thal kha ti ra 'dzin/ kha thun rak+sha kI la ya phaT/ stobs bzang sngo nag gri gug 'dzin// he ma ra ti kA la ya phaT/ gzi ldan dkar po 'khor lo 'dzin// ru pi su tra kI la ya phaT/ 'jig rten 'od sngo me dpung can// rak+sha se traM kI la ya phaT// stong gsum khyab byed dmar thod khrag/ ho he kha rag kI la phaT/ hUM sgra dud kha ro dbyug 'dzin/ da dur phra ti kI la ya phaT/ shugs sgrol ljang nag khrung khrung 'dzin// hUM baM su kI la ya phaT/ skar mda' gdong ser bya khra 'dzin// gar b+ha kI la ya phaT/ glog srin sna tshogs mdog 'ja' thogs// rag sha kro d+ha kI la ya phaT/ mdangs 'phrog sngo sangs rlung g.yab thogs// rag sha phaT/ 'jigs byed dri za dkar stong gsum// gar+b+he phaT/ stong gsum grags gnag lcags mdung thogs// ru se phaT/ khrag gi mtsho skems dmar lcags sgrog/ ki ta ra ta phaT/ khrag lag ljang nag khram shing thogs// dbus dang phyogs mtshams sgo bzhir bsam// de la nam mkha'i 'khor lo dbab// 'bru brgyad sngags kyis dbang byin brlab// mchod pa gsum stob mnyes pa'o// oM shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa rI sa ma ya/ badzra kI la ya hUM phaT/ yab yum bsnyen pas gsang ba yi// ma mo bzhi bskul yum bzhi yis// 'khor lo bcu tshan sum cu gnyis// de yi khrag 'thung lha rnams bskul// so so'i 'phro 'dus 'gro don mdzad// khri phrag gnyis dang stong phrag bzhi// 'bum phrag bzhi yis so sor bzlas// bsnyen rdzogs bsgrub pa'i las chen ni// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i lte ba la// ling+ga nub tu kha mgo brtan yang bltas la// tshon skud gsum gyis btags nas kyang// ming rus snying dang

dpral bar bris// rten bzang kun la bka' bsgo zhing// gsal ba gsum dang ldan byas te// 'byung ba'i snying po gsum gyis sbyang// yan lag nying lag phur pas brdeg/ ral gris gtubs te shar du bsreg/ tsakra rtsibs bcur ldan pa la// sde tshan bcu yi 'khor lo bskor// gcod byed 'phen byed sngags kyis brgyan/ khyi yi grod par ling+ga gzhug/ tshon sna lnga yis bcings shing gdags// yungs kar rgyal pos brdeg cing brab// oM shrI he ru ka da la du+u na rbad/ kha 'dar li rbad/ myogs mugs rbad phaT/ grod pa 'phar 'gul rtags byung nas// ki gang drag po rgyu dus 'phang// sngags gsum gyis ni rten gsum bshig/ lho yi tsakra rgyas pa'i las// 'brub khung rgyas pa'i dbyibs ldan la// ling+ga'i yan lag hUM lnga dgod// dpral bar phaT dang snying ga ru// mA ra ya bkod gsal grub brtan// a yi 'od kyis yon tan bsdu// phyogs bcur khro bo bcu yis dbab// sgo bzhir seng ldeng phur pa yi// mtshon gyis btab ste lho ru bsreg/ sde tshan bzhi yi 'khor lo bskor// gcod khad 'bad yang sngags kyi phreng bas bskor// nai le'i rkyal par ling+ga gzhug/ dug lcags zangs kyi thun gyis brab// oM shrI he ru ka dur pa la hUM rbad/ rak+sha dza ngur b+h+yo/ ki la thun tr-i chuM srog la mA ra ya rbad/ rtags byung nyi ma'i zer la 'phar// nub kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la// gsang chen khro bo zangs phur te// nub phyogs pad+ma zla kham du// yan lag lnga la hUM phaT bskor// shes rab snying rjes phyogs bcur dbab// rnam shes hUM gis sa ru bsdu// nub tu dbang gi sbyin bsreg bya// gdeng chen khro bcu so so'i sngags// gcod dang phab pa'i sngags kyis brgyan// ra snying nang du lcags phyes brab// oM shrI he ru ka srog la thum ling/ kha thum srog la bsdus bsdus/ khrag la thim mA ra ya rbad/ rtags phyung skya rengs zer la 'phang// byang gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la// lcags phung rdzogs chen khro bo bskyed// byang gi pho brang grub gsum gyi// rgya gram bsnol mar ling+ga gzhug/ lus kyi phyogs bcur khyab par gdab// sgo bzhi'i phur pa yan lag la'o// hUM gi has bsdus mkha' la dbab// 'phang gtub bsreg pa sngar bzhin bya// yon tan sngags brgyan tshom bu bcur// tsakra sarba hUM phaT gdab// bya rog snod du sbal khra'i gzugs// nang du dmigs bsal skye tshes brab// oM shrI he ru ka mu la tang kham snying la rbad// ba b+ha da rod tshe la rbad/ nA ga b+hu ba rus pa dur ling rbad/ rtags byung nam gyi phyed la sba/ 'di ni drag po'i sngags lugs te// ma mo las kyi kha skong yin// gzhan yang dbang drag las spyod na// gru gsum zla kham gsum dang bcas// phyi khyams rgyas pa mdzub gang ste// me 'od thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan// b+han+d+ha'i

nang du mu gas bkang// phur pa rdzas kyi gtso bo bzhag/ chags byed chags snyoms gnyis la bri// bdun la ma bdun b+h+ya bdun bri// lha grangs ldan pa de ru dgod// byin gyis brlab pa'i lha bsgom pa// dbyings kyi yum drug mgo bo la// rnal 'byor bcu bzhi'i ngos la'o// bum par bla med he ru ste// lte bar chags 'jig spun gnyis so// skye la dza ti ma mo drug/ lte ba'i dkyil la re ti gsum// dbal logs gsum la dgyes sde ma// bzhi dang sring bzhi bsgom par bya// zur gsum la ni dbang mo ste// rtse mor ma bdun la sogs bsam// bdag nyid phra men rgya mtsho ma// dbu gcig zhal lnga mkha' 'gro lngar// bsgom pa mche ba gtsigs shing bzhad// sprul pa bstim la mchod cing bsnyen// ma mo bdun gyi rten la dbab// dkar nag mtshams su la shan dbye// sems la bsdus te rtsa sngags la// badzra bo d+hi dza la b+ha ga la ru na ho tra kI la ya badzra hu du+u na ma ra Na phaT/ phur pas gdab ste mkha' la dbab// gting dpag med pa'i gnas su bstim// b+ha ya tsit+ta s+t+waM/ laM laM sa ma ya ho// 'di yis don ldan drag shul spyod// shin tu bskangs te bshad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sku gsum bde chen ngang nyid las// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i gzugs su bstan// 'jig rten dregs pa 'dul ba'i phyir// stong phrag brgyad cu'i rgyud kyi sde/ khyad par sprul pa'i sde brgyad la// lha klu ma mo gshin rje btsan// bdud dang rgyal po gnod sbyin gsal// dbye dang spro dang bsdu ba la// dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o// de las sum brgya drug cu ste// tha ma brgyad kyi sde yin te// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba la// yang gsang gter dang drag po sngags// sbas pa dang ni las byed dang// btags chags dang ni brgyad yin te// lha dang lha min dri za dang// mkha' lding lto 'phye mi'am ci// klu dang lus sul po rnams ni// phyi ltar btags shing chags pa yin// rgyal po bdud dang gshin rje klu// gnod sbyin srin po ma mo btsan// de bzhin nang du btags shing chags// ma sangs ging dang dgra lha dang// rmu bdud mu stegs mkha' 'gro dang// 'gong po the brang zhes bya ba// gsang bar btags shing chags pa yin// nang gi rnam shes kun gzhi dang// yid dang yid kyi rnam shes las// dbang po lnga yi dwangs mar bcas// gsang ba'i lam la rgyu ba dag/ yang gsang gter du sbas pa'o/ khyad par sbas pa zhes bya ba// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang// nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna dang/ khro dang gnod pa'i sems rnams ni// kun gyis mi mthong rab tu sbas// drag rtsal lha dang 'thur med bdud// gshin rje gshor dang rgyal po dregs// gnod sbyin shan pa srog gcod

srin// gdug pa klu dang glen pa gza'// rang rang drag po'i sngags su 'gyur// las kyi khyad par byed pa ni// smyo 'bogs brgyal nad snying rlung dang// mdze shu rims nad yams nad dang// pho log glang thabs gzer ba dang// mtshon 'khrug gdug dang rtsod pa dang// gri dang gnam bab rang gshed dang// de la sogs pa'i drag shul spyod// rang gi las kyi khyad par kun// myur du spyod pa zhes bya'o// dpa' ba dang ni mi sdug dang// phrin skyel snying 'byin rgyal po'i las// dregs chen spyi dang dpung bsdebs te// glo bur srog 'bebs bdud kyi las// las kyi 'khrul 'khor dmigs bsal nas// klad 'khor myos byed gshin rje'i las// thog dang ser ba skyin thang las// ri rab bsnyil nus gza' yi las// rgya mtsho'i dbyings nas klong brtol nas// mdze nad gag gtor klu yi las// grir 'thibs rma khrag btsan gyi las// za 'drang za 'dud 'dzin byed cing// rmongs shing rgud byed gnod sbyin las// glo bur srog gcod drag shul ni// srin po'i las su bsngags pa yin// rims nad yams nad gzer nad dang/ khrag 'khrug rmod pa ma mo'i las// de dag gnod pa'i las yin te// phan byed de las bzlog par 'gyur// btags shing chags pas dbye ba ni// lha lam dgra lha rgyal po ging// bdud las rmu bdud mu stegs dang// rU tra rnams su btags shing chags// ma mo las ni mkha' 'gro dang// lha mo srin mo mon mo dang// bal mo klu mor btags shing chags// btsan las yab rje yam shud dang// ge gos ze brang rnams su btags// gza' la rog ti khyab 'jug dang// byi tri pa tra la sogs brgyad// gnod sbyin las ni mon pa dang// 'gong po ya bdud the 'gong rnams// srin po las ni drag byed kun// gshin rje las ni yi dwags tshogs// shin tu btags shing chags pa ste// rnam grangs bsdus pas phye ba'o// rgyas par phye ba 'di ltar bshad// lha las dregs pa'i lha chen brgyad// klu las gdug pa'i klu chen brgyad// gza' las gza' brgyad de bzhin te// gshin rje las kyang phyogs bsrung dang// ma mo las kyang ma bdun dang// srid pa'i gtso dang brgyad yin no// gnod sbyin nor 'dzin sde dpon brgyad// srin po brgyad las srin po yin// bdud las rje bdun gtso dang brgyad// 'di dag rang rigs yon tan dang// rgyud mtha' rdo rje 'dzin gyis ni// tha dad so sor bshad de bzhin// gdul bya'i rigs dang 'dul byed kyi// ston pa'ang de bzhin shes par byos// 'di dag nang gi bskyed tshul yang// ma mo kun gzhi'i rnam shes las// gshin rje yid kyi rnam shes te// bdud ni nyon mongs can gyi yid// mig gi rnam shes lha yin no// rna ba'i rnam shes srin por

snang// sna yi rnam shes bdud du ste// lce yi rnam shes gnod sbyin yin// lus kyi rnam shes btsan dang gza'// dran rtog gzugs sgra dri ro reg/ byed pa'i las rnams de yi 'khor// phan gnod nus pa lha yin te// mi gtong 'bebs pa bdud ces bya// gshin rje yi dwags gshin gyi rje// gdug cing blun pas klu zhes bya// gnad du phog cing mi 'chor bas// gza' zhes bya bar grags pa yin// rten bskyed gzhir gyur ma mo ste// gnod pa ster byed gnod sbyin no// yan lag phyogs su dbye ba yang// gdug rtsub che bas lha ma yin// gang du'ang 'byung bas 'byung po ste// lha min kun sprul mi'am ci// yid kyis dri snom dri za dang// stobs ldan khro gtum srin po yin// mkha' la spyod pas mkha' 'gro ste// zas yid btags pas yi dwags yin// kun gyis bkur bas rgyal po yin// gzhan gyis bstod pas btsan yin no// lta spyod log pa mu stegs yin// dgra las rgyal gyur dgra lha ste// bcos par mi nus rmu zhes bya// mthu stobs rmad byung ma sangs ste// gtum zhing stobs kyi dgong po yin// ngan g.yo'i sgyu ldan the brang ngo// gzhan yang rnam grangs bsam mi khyab// gzhan yang sprul pa yang sprul dang// sum sprul la sogs bsam mi khyab// gtso 'khor bka' nyan las byed kyi// sde brgyad dag tu dbye bar bya// gnas dang rten pa'i khyad par yang// g.ya' ri gangs ri khang pa brtsegs/ khang bzang nyams dga' lha bsgrub ste// ri brag brag nag rab tu khros// byang phyogs mngon par bdun bsgrub bo// rgya mtsho mtsho dang rdzing dang ni// ne seng rgyas par klu bsgrub gnas// sum brtsegs brag nas phyogs ma nges// lho gzhol mkha' chen gshin rje bsgrub// ris 'dus rtse dang chu 'dus mdo// lung pa che 'phro gza' bsgrub gnas// nags chen dur khrod ma mo ste// gling rgyas ri ljongs gnod sbyin gnas// gtsug lag khang chen gsar dang rnying// lha yi khyad par phyogs gzhan bsgrub// ri thang mtshams dang khang mtho rtser// phyogs mthun bye brag sngar bshad zad yang bzhin// brag dmar khros rtsar btsan rnams bsgrub// de dag la sogs gnas gzhan yang// rnal 'byor rig pas legs par brtag/ snang yul phyi yi bsgrub pa'i rdzas// rta dre'u ra lug bya dang khyi// bya rgod rgyal mtshan mtshams par yang gcan gzan gzugs// shing bzangs lo 'bras ldan pa rnams// lha yi rgyal po bye brag mnyes// tsa ra khyi dang 'dab chags rta// nag po'i chas zhugs bdud mnyes 'gyur// shel smug gro mo sman sna tshogs// dkar mngar blo bcud klu yin te// srog chags mo rigs nag chags dang// ba dan pheg rdob dung dang rnga// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan phreng ba dag/ ma mo yum rnams mnyes pa'i

rdzas// rig bcas mda' mdung ba dan dmar// rgyal mtshan bzhon pa'i ri btsan rten// thod mkhar khram shing ba lang sna// dur khrod dkyil 'khor gshin rje la// ra nag mig dmar sha khrag sna// sbrul lpags mda' gzhu gza' rnams kyi'o// rin chen ga'u gzhon pa sngo// dkor cha sna tshogs gnod sbyin rten// mtshon cha sha khrag so ma dang// dur khrod longs spyod srin po dngos// 'dab chags ru mtshon rta dmar dang// mtshon cha drag po ri btsan rten// de la sogs pa dregs pa can// spyi dang khyad par bye brag gis// gang la shis shing bsngags pa dag/ brtul zhugs can gyis brten par bya// rin chen 'bru sna bcud kyis lha// so ba khre 'bras 'bru nag bdud// klu ni rtsi bcud sman gyis rten// gnod sbyin rin chen chu gtsang ste// gza' ni sha khrag rnying pas rten// de nyid sna tshogs mo rigs te// srin po'ang de nyid so mas mi yang/ so// gri btsan bya btsan gyis rol sha/ gshin rje keng rus chu glang sha/ 'di dag mchod pa'i rdzas su bsngags// bsgrub pa'i thabs kyi khyad par las// dmigs pa'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rdzas// so sos mchod cing bsten par sbyar// 'jig rten pa dang tshul mthun pas// 'jig rten mchod rten zhes su bshad//// drag po'i sngags kyi bsgrub pa yang// phyi nang gsang ba gnad dang bcas// gtso chen sku gsung thugs rdo rje// byang chub sems kyis bsgrub bya ba// thun mong khyad par bsgrub pa'i phyir// rang sngags ming dang smos par bcas// bsdu dang spro zhing las la sbyar// rnam pa sbyor ba rtags rnams kyis// mngon du phyung ba de nyid dang// sgrogs shing dbab pa rten sbyong ba'i// brtul zhugs ting nge 'dzin dag ni// stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa yis// don kun bsgrub pa de shes bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// gang la gang gis de ngo bo// gnyis med rig pa 'dzin pa'i thugs// rnam 'phrul nges pa'i blo stobs ni// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// dbyer med dgongs pa'i khyad par che// bsrung bya sdom pa'i bye brag kyang// dregs chen lha yi bye brag la// rten du rung ba mi brnyas shing// lus kyi longs spyod gzhom mi bya// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i nag po'i phyogs// mi bskrad mi brlag bdud la bsdem// gshin rje'i rigs 'khyal ma mo brnyes// klu lnga sha khrag sgog btsong bsrung// mkhon yugs mi gtsang mo rgyud 'khrugs// phra men rdzas nag gnod sbyin te// byams sems phan spangs srin po la'o// gdug byed mi brnyas btsan la'o// cho 'phrul nus pa mi bzlog gza'// 'jig rten gnas pa drag po'i sngags// dmod pa'i tshul du sngags zlos na// shin tu dgos par bstan pa yang// bla snying gter dang gdab phur dang// bcing dang (25)

bsreg dang mnan dang sba// gnas dus thebs dang ldog pa dang// bsrung mtshams drod tshad rtags rigs rnams// gtso chen bsdus pa'i las yin no// lha bdud srin po gnod sbyin dang// rgyal po gshin rje mo rigs te// gza' klu la sogs sde brgyad tshogs// nyi rdo khro chu gri lcags dang// nor bu pha wang long bu'i rdo// mu men g.yu sbram bla snying rdo// shel mkhar chu shing phur pa dang// gri lcags gser gyi thur ma dang// gri mtshon byi thur rkang thur dang// zangs thur la sogs snying thur yin// tsher ma can dang chu shing dang// seng ldeng lcags dang mchog phur dang// dug shing bse dang gri lcags zangs// mthun pas rab phye snying phur bya// mi dang dud 'gro phra men dang// rin chen phra men rang snod bcas// zangs lcags gri yi thod pa dang// stag gzig byi la ne lai dang// hu lu rang grub snod rnams ni// so so'i bcing sdom bla snod yin// mdzes pa'i gzhi la rang sngags gri// thur ma rdo dang bcas la dril// mthun pa'i rdzas dang snod du stsal// snying phur rnams la 'bru gsum dgod// so sor rigs pa'i srad bus bsdam// sgrub pa po yi lus la gdags// sde brgyad gnad kyi rtsa ba yin// dben gnas gtsug lag khang rnying 'og/ ngam grog phug dang phug stong dang// brag nag brag dmar khros pa dang// gangs ri'i mtshams dang shing gcig drung// ri yi rdzong dang 'dus rtse dang// mtshe'u lu+u ma lcags lcig dang// lung pa'i mdo dang chu mig nag/ dur khrod sa yi srubs chen dang// mi shes gdug pa'i gnas rnams su// so so'i las gnyer gtad par bya// dus bzhi'i zla ba dang po dang// de yi tshes grangs brgyad gsum la// skya rengs nyi ma 'char ka la// lha dang rgyal pos las byed 'gyur// klu ni bdun gsum nam langs nas// nub dang gnyis kyi zer la'o// ma mo gnyis gsum nyin mtshan gung// btsan ni 'bring bzhi'i drug gsum la// nang nub nyi ma dmar thag la'o// gnod sbyin dgu gsum srod dang 'jing// gsum bzhi nyi shu dgu la'o// srod kyi 'jing ni bdud kyi dus// gshin rje bcu gsum nyi shu lnga// de dag la sogs 'gro zhing rgyu// sde brgyad dregs pa'i las rnams kun// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing// spyi dang khyad par sdom pa'i mchog/ mtshungs ldan ye shes pa rnams grub// dus grangs mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rdzogs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i man ngag ldan// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam rdzas tshogs// bsrung sdom ma nyams tshad dang ldan// brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs ldan pas// 'di dag 'grub cing thebs pa'i rgyu// de nas bzlog tshul de nyid do// dam bca' khas blangs dus las 'das// sdom rim bslab pa'i tshul mi ldan// bsgrub bya sgrub byed the

tshom bcas// yon tan ma rdzogs las la 'jug/ dmigs dang sbyor ba go rim nor// ngan sems gdug pa'i bsam pa skyes// pha rol sgrol ba drag po rnams// bzlog rgyu rkyen dang bcas par 'gyur// dmigs pa'i mtshan ma ma rdzogs dang// rten med ting 'dzin ma gsal dang// rang rig phur pa ma thebs pa// mtshan ma bzhi gcig la gzhan sdom yang/ la gzhan don rnams// 'byams te don med skyon du 'gyur// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang rdzogs shing// bsnyen sgrub ting 'dzin nus pa ldan// lhag sems bzang zhing las 'jug brtul// dmag dpung che zhing dmigs pa drag/ gtsang zhing brtul zhugs che bas thebs// gang gis gang la dmigs pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma mthong// kun gyis bstod cing dbang bskur dang// phyag dang bsnyen bkur gus pa byed// spro zhing rlom pa'i dpa' gdeng ldan// 'di ni phrin las nus pa'i rtags// mkhan po slob dpon rgyal po dang// rje dpon la sogs gong mar byung// nye yang dbang du ma 'dus rtags// spun grogs pha tshan mnyam gnyis dag/ mnyes na las byed rung ba'i rtags// bran 'bang khol g.yog bu tshar byung// bskol zhing rbad pas mchog pa'i rtags// gar yang rung ste bka' nyan cing// las byed tshul du byung ba ni// drag pa'i las sbyor bya ba yin// dmag 'dren sgyogs 'cha' las la 'dzud// dar 'phyar dung 'bud rol mo chas// dbu che dag gis grogs byed na// rbad pa las la tshud pa'i rtags// gsod cing ling jag 'gyed pa dang// shing gcod brag gshog mkhar bsgyel dang// mes bsres chus 'khrungs sa gnon dang// rlung gis khyer dang rang bzhin zhig/ gsad pa'i las kyi don 'grub rtags// sha za khrag 'thung ston mo za// bshad dang longs spyod byed la sogs// don grub gsad las zin pa'i rtags// rtog pa thugs rjes bsgral ba dang// zhe sdang nus pas bsgral ba dang// man ngag thabs kyis bsgral ba las// bye brag thun mong khyad par dag/ so so'i mthun tshogs man ngag bzhin// bsnyen sgrub rbad gsad las sbyor la// sbyor dngos rjes kyi bya ba dag/ thog ma bar dang mtha' ma'i bar// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi// 'brel zhing tshang la brtson pas spyad// las mjug mnan zhing gtad pa las// bsnyen sgrub gnas lugs skye gnas dang// las khung rang gnas gnad 'grol dang// spyi dang phyi yi skya gcod bya// tshad dang khugs dang bstim dang spyad// kun la man ngag rig ldan bya// gnyen po dngos gzhi bsgrub pa dang// dril dang dbye dang gnas skrod dang// dril dang 'phang ba rgud pa dang// 'thibs dang gzer dang mtha' la gtad// gzhug dang bskyil dang rjes gcad pas// dbab pa gnas su

brdeg par bya// chos nyid bden pa'i blta ba dang// ting 'dzin dmigs gsal bsgom pa dang// dpa' bo brtul zhugs spyod pa dang// rab gnad sngags kyi drag shul dang// 'thad rigs bden pa'i tshig stobs dang// rang gshed thabs kyi yon tan dang// bsod nams tshogs kyi dpung bskyed dang// gnyen po stobs la sogs pas bzlog/ bsrung bar bya ba'ang de bzhin no// lus gnas dang ni bdag po gnyer// dus rdzas thabs dang rjes gcad dang// bsrung dang nus pa rdzogs pas mnan// thabs shing rdzas dang sngags dus lha// ting 'dzin ldan pas bsreg par bya// bsham dang bsgrub dang bshe ba dang// phyogs dus ma nor lam phye bas// dpang gzugs mkhyen gsol ldan pas 'phang// gzhi gnas sngo ba'i gsar zhing bsgrub// bsnyen pa bskyar dang drag sngags dkrug/ rdzas kyis bdug dang shi sar bstan// nyams pa gso zhing bskang ba dang// ngag bkrol lha phye bsnyen sgrub dang// las sbyor lan gsum bskyar bas spogs// mdor na ma grub bar du ni// brnag cing bsgrub pa man ngag gnad// rang bzhin 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// rang gzhan snang ba rtog pa ste// sde brgyad la sogs lha dang srin// ma lus rang gi sems snang bas// gzhan nas grub pa yod ma myong// sems kyang rtog pa tsam nyid las// dbyibs dang kha dog dngos po dang// mtshan ma'i rtsa ba yongs ma grub// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong// de nyid kyang ni des stong ste// mi stong cung zad yod ma yin// stong pa chen po chos kyi sku// spros pa'i mtha' 'dzin rgyu nas spang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs snying po// 'di nyid ngang la gang gnas pa// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang du bsgyur// rtsa ba 'di yin yan lag gzhan// kun gyis 'di la blta bya zhing// bsgom dang rab tu spyad par bya// gtso bor sangs rgyas bstan la dmigs// rang sems dpal dang gdeng ldan pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs su spyad// dam tshig sdom pa bsrung sbyor ba// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub gzhi// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du gsal ba yis// mngon sum 'dod pa bzhin du sgrub// man ngag the tshom spyad pa yis// 'jig rten rtog pa ngan pa ldog/ lus sems bde ba 'khor g.yog pas// rang bzhin rten 'brel rdzas kyis 'grub// bcol bskul dam bdar rbad pa'i grogs// bla srog gis ni dbang med spro// bla rtags kyis ni dus mi 'gyur// bsgrub 'phel dben gnas yo byad yin// yon tan yin te skyon rnams kyang// bsnyen sgrub tshul mthar ma phyin pas// dregs pa rang la ldog par 'gyur// gsang sbyor mi nus dus las g.yel// rten rdzas med la rten mi 'du// pha rol mtshan rtags ma shes pas// dus

min phyal bar 'gyur ba yin// gnad la ma phebs las mi byed// dka' ba ma spyad the tshom skyes// gzhan la bsgrags pas 'khor la gnod// bsrung sdom mi ldan don med spyod// bsam ngan gdug pas ngan 'gror 'khrid// nyon mongs zhe sdang drag po yis// gnyen pos ma bsgyur rU trar skyes// las rim 'chol pas rang la ldog/ rkyang pa ya bral sgrub pa yis// gnod pa bskyed cing las mi 'grub// mkhas par ma sbyangs dmus long 'gro// sngags bsdeb med pas yid spyod de// sngar myong med na the tshom yin// de bas grub rtags ldog rtags dang// rang gnod gzhan gnod rtags rnams kun// ma nor ma 'khrul gtan la dbab// rlung 'tshub chu chen gshin rje rbad// mi dang dud 'gro nag po'i tshogs// las kyi rU tra byung dang 'gro// mo tshogs ma mo'i rtags yin te// thog ser cho 'phrul gnod sbyin no// mgo tug mi mang gnod sbyin te// mtsho rdzing nya sbrul sba lcong klu// bya khyi nag tshogs bdud 'gong tshogs// pho rigs dmag dpon srog bdag gying// gtsug lag khang rnying sde dang bcas// rgyal po dang ni dkor bdag rtags// mi rta zhub gon rang 'phyar ba// lha btsan byung zhing 'gro ba'i rtags// mtshon cha sgyogs dang 'ur rdo sogs// las kyi srin po mon pa'i brtags// ri dwags gcan gzan las gshin rje// kun tshogs pa ni kun gyi rtags/ 'jug yang// mkhas pas dbye bsal rbad sogs bya// ngan pa'i rtags byung rang rang gi/ gnyen po'i stobs kyis myur du gzhil// gshin rje gshed kyi 'khrul 'khor spyad// ma mos thun zor las kun spyad// gza' lcam ma sangs chu rom 'bab// klu la las 'jug gtad par bya// gnod sbyin gyis ni yo byad spel// lha yi 'khor gyis rtsal drag ste// rgyal pos glo bur smyo 'bog gtong// ging zhes bya ba myur mgyogs te// dgra lhar bcas pas cho 'phrul gtong// gshin rje mon pas bla srog brku// ging phran bstod gnod kyang pas rdzas mi 'byor// de dag la sogs lha srin gyi// bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab pas// las gnyer lha tshogs so sor bsgrub// rang gi rigs dang las kyi gnyen// ma shis glo bur sbyar mi bya// dngos grub kun 'byung log par 'gyur// de bas rdo rje 'dzin gyi bka'// ma nor ma 'khrul legs spyad de// brtson 'grus drag pos bsgrub par bya// phyi ltar 'jig rten dregs pa can// nang du sems kyi cho 'phrul yin// gsang spyod chos sku'i yon tan gyis// phrin las sna tshogs grub pa'o// snang ba'i 'dzin pa bde gshegs sku// sgra yi rnam rtog de yi gsung// dran rig yid ni dam pa'i thugs// tha dad dbye ba yod ma yin// zhes pa'i tshig gis bsnyad pa ni// 'jig rten gnas pa'i dregs pa can// sgrub pa kha skong tshul bkod

pa'o// de bas ma 'ongs phyi ma'i dus// lnga brgya pa yi snyigs ma la// bstan pa mdo sde spyod pa'i dus// u rgyan yul du skyes pa'i sras// lag na rdo rje 'byung gnas ni// tshig dang yi ger ston byed cing// byin gyis rlabs kyis spyod byed de// de nas rim pa'i tshul ldan pas// dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa che// shAkya seng ge zhes bya bas// ma lus khong du chud byas te// sham b+ha la yi yul dag tu// rang byung gtsug lag khang chen du// 'jam dpal 'khor dang bcas la ston// de dag rang rig so so yis// mos pa'i rnam grangs spyod pa yis// 'bras bu thun mong mchog tu 'dzin// spyi 'dus rgyal po rgyud kyi mchog/ lung dang rtsa ba yan lag bcas// 'jam dbyangs skyes mtha'i rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan don spyod// sa lam rim pa rdzogs la snang// de nas sprul pa bye phrag brgya// 'dzam bu gling rnams bye brag brgyar// las dang bsam pa byed pa dang/ khams dang rigs mthun kho na ste// tshul gcig dag gi sbyor ba yis// yan lag byin gyis brlab pa dag/ mthun 'jug thabs kyis 'gro don spyod// brgyud pa'i dbang dang drod dag gis// 'di don rtogs shing spyod pa yin// de yid dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu chen po'i gzugs can rnams// phyi rol pa yi chos mthun pa// rtog ge ngan pa'i tshig smra bas// 'di la phyir rgol rtsod byed de// nga la lha sbyin rgol dang mtshungs// glags rnyed gyur pa ma yin no// mos spyod don gyi dbang dag gis// rnam par rtog pa gnyis snang la// tha snyad yi ge so sor ston// don mthar thug la skyon dang bral/ kha cig rnam rtog ngan pas bslus// log pa'i snang bas bsnyad gyur kyang// nyes pa'i lam la dbang ba'i dus// dwangs shing gnong 'gyod yid dag gis// sems dang ldan pas 'jug byed pa// dka' thub mthar phyin la sogs 'byung// de lta bas na rgyud chen 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis bshad pas// bsam gyis mi khyab bsdur mi nus// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// rnal 'byor rnams kyi don bsgrub phyir// bsdus pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya// zhes pa'i tshig gis bsnyad pa ni// 'jig rten gnas pa'i dregs pa can// sgrub pa kha skong tshul du bshad// ces bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs kyi cho 'phrul rnam par bkod pa/ rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag nyid kyi sku la bsdus te/ snod bcud kyi sems can thams cad kyi snang bar nus pa'i nang gi dbang po'i bdag nyid can du bzhag par gyur to// rnam pa dang rang bzhin du grags pa'i dngos po thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan la gnas par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad he ru ka chen po thugs kyi rig pa chen po'i yon tan dpag tu med pa'i don sngar bshad pa las/ ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i le'u rnam par bshad pa'o//// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i spyi rgyud las ma tshang ba kha skong ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o////
